S06bsu049_u:4_0: evaṃ mayā śrutam / ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhamardhatrayodaśabhirbhikṣuśataiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:4_1: sarvairarhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravairniḥkleśairvaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñairājñairājāneyairmahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyairapahṛtabhārairanuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptairekaṃ pudgalaṃ sthāpayitvā yaduta āyuṣmantamānandam /
S06bsu049_u:5_0: [Vaidya_2] tatra khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayate sma - pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitā niryāyuriti /
S06bsu049_u:6_0: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat - kimayamāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira ātmīyena svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhānena svakena prajñāpratibhānabalādhiṣṭhānena bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupadekṣyati utāho buddhānubhāveneti?
S06bsu049_u:7_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya imamevarūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - yatkiṃcidāyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakā bhāṣante deśayanti upadiśanti udīrayanti prakāśayanti saṃprakāśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:7_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hi tathāgatena dharmo deśitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:7_3: tatra dharmadeśanāyāṃ śikṣamāṇāste tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkurvanti dhārayanti,
S06bsu049_u:7_4: tāṃ dharmatāṃ sākṣātkṛtya dhārayitvā yadyadeva bhāṣante,
S06bsu049_u:7_5: yadyadeva deśayanti, yadyadeva upadiśanti, yadyadevodīrayanti, yadyadeva [Vaidya_3] prakāśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:7_7: tathāgatadharmadeśanāyā eva āyuṣman śāriputra eṣa niṣyandaḥ yatte kulaputrā upadiśantastāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na virodhayanti /
S06bsu049_u:8_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena bhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - pratibhātu te subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya yathā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ niryāyuriti /
S06bsu049_u:8_2: katamasyaitadbhagavan dharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti? nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaduta bodhisattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:8_3: tamapyahaṃ bhagavan dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi yaduta prajñāpāramitā nāma /
S06bsu049_u:8_4: so 'haṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ vā bodhisattvadharmaṃ vā avindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan,
S06bsu049_u:8_5: prajñāpāramitāmapyavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi? api tu khalu punarbhagavan sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne upadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:8_7: na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati, notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:9_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāvayatā evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā asau śikṣyamāṇastenāpi bodhicittena na manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:10_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā acittatā,
S06bsu049_u:10_1: tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā? śāriputra āha - na hyetadāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:11_0: subhūtirāha - sacedāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:11_1: api nu te yukta eṣa paryanuyogo bhavati yadāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha - asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti? evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kā punareṣā āyuṣman subhūte acittatā? subhūtirāha - avikārā āyuṣman śāriputra avikalpā acittatā /
S06bsu049_u:12_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhvāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:12_1: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi /
S06bsu049_u:13_1: avirahitaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:13_2: śrāvakabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva [Vaidya_4] prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:13_4: pratyekabuddhabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:13_6: bodhisattvabhūmāv api śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:13_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabodhisattvadharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:13_10: anuttarāyām api samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:13_12: tatkasya hetoḥ? ihaiva hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vistareṇa sarvabuddha dharmā upadiṣṭāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:14_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo 'haṃ bhagavan etadeva bodhisattvanāmadheyaṃ na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:14_1: prajñāpāramitām api na vedmi nopalabhe na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:14_2: so 'haṃ bhagavan etadeva bodhisattvanāmadheyamavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan prajñāpāramitām api avindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ bodhisattvaṃ katamasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi? etadeva bhagavan kaukṛtyaṃ syāt,
S06bsu049_u:14_3: yo 'haṃ vastvavindan anupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan nāmadheyamātreṇa āyavyayaṃ kuryāṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:14_4: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstad api nāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam /
S06bsu049_u:14_6: evaṃ tannāmadheyaṃ na sthitaṃ nāsthitaṃ na viṣṭhitaṃ nāviṣṭhitam /
S06bsu049_u:14_7: sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:14_9: na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati, notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:14_10: adhimucyate 'dhyāśayena avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:14_12: susthito 'sthānayogena / punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā na rūpe sthātavyaṃ na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06bsu049_u:14_13: na vijñāne sthātavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? sacedrūpe tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:14_16: sacedvijñāne tiṣṭhati, vijñānābhisaṃskāre carati, na carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:14_17: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi abhisaṃskāre caran prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:14_20: aparipūrayamāṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ na niryāsyati [Vaidya_5] sarvajñatāyāmaparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhṇan /
S06bsu049_u:14_21: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi aparigṛhītaṃ prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:14_24: yaś ca rūpasyāparigrahaḥ, na tadrūpam / evaṃ yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:14_25: yo vijñānasyāparigrahaḥ, na tadvijñānam / sāpi prajñāpāramitā aparigṛhītā /
S06bsu049_u:14_26: evaṃ hyatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
S06bsu049_u:14_27: ayaṃ ca bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvadharmāparigṛhīto nāma samādhirvipulaḥ puraskṛtaḥ apramāṇaniyato 'sādhāraṇaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:14_29: na hi nimittato grahītavyā / sacennimittato grahītavyā abhaviṣyat,
S06bsu049_u:14_31: tatra hi śreṇikaḥ parivrājakaḥ sarvajñajñāne adhimucya śraddhānusārī prādeśikena jñānenāvatīrṇaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:14_33: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:14_34: na vijñānaṃ parigṛhṇīte / nāpi tatra prītisukhena tajjñānaṃ samanupaśyati /
S06bsu049_u:14_45: so 'tra sarvatra śraddhānusārī sarvajñajñāne dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya evamadhimukta iti /
S06bsu049_u:14_48: yaṃ gṛhṇīyānmuñcedvā / sa nirvāṇam api na manyate / iyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā yadrūpaṃ na parigṛhṇīte /
S06bsu049_u:14_50: yadvijñānaṃ na parigṛhṇīte / na cāntarā parinirvāti, aparipūrṇairdaśabhistathāgatabalaiścaturbhistathāgatavaiśāradyairaṣṭādaśabhiś ca āveṇikairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:14_51: tasmādiyam api bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā veditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:15_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evamupaparīkṣitavyamevamupanidhyātavyam - katamaiṣā prajñāpāramitā? kasya caiṣā prajñāpāramitā? kiṃ yo dharmo na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:15_1: sā prajñāpāramiteti? sacedevamupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ evamupanidhyāyan nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:15_3: na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati, notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:16_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā veditavyaḥ? yadā rūpameva virahitaṃ rūpasvabhāvena,
S06bsu049_u:16_1: evaṃ yadā vedanaiva saṃjñaiva saṃskārā eva,
S06bsu049_u:17_0: [Vaidya_6] evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - etametadāyuṣman śāriputra evam etat /
S06bsu049_u:18_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:18_1: sa niryāsyati sarvajñatāyām? āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evametadāyuṣman śāriputra,
S06bsu049_u:18_2: evam etat / yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tra śikṣiṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:18_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? ajātā hyanirjātā hyāyuṣman śāriputra sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:18_5: evaṃ carata āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatā āsannībhavati /
S06bsu049_u:18_9: evaṃ ca punarāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran sarvajñatāyā āsannībhavati /
S06bsu049_u:19_1: nimitte carati / sacedrūpanimitte carati, nimitte carati / sacedrūpaṃ nimittamiti carati,
S06bsu049_u:19_2: nimitte carati / sa cedrūpasyotpāde carati, nimitte carati / sacedrūpasya nirodhe carati, nimitte carati / sacedrūpasya vināśe carati, nimitte carati / sacedrūpaṃ śūnyamiti carati, nimitte carati / ahaṃ carāmīti carati, nimitte carati / ahaṃ bodhisattva iti carati, nimitte carati / ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati /
S06bsu049_u:19_4: sacedvijñāne carati, nimitte carati / sacedvijñānanimitte carati, nimitte carati sacedvijñānaṃ nimittamiti carati,
S06bsu049_u:19_5: nimitte carati / sacedvijñānasyotpāde carati, nimitte carati / sacedvijñānasya nirodhe carati,
S06bsu049_u:19_8: nimitte carati / ahaṃ carāmīti carati, nimitte carati / ahaṃ bodhisattva iti carati, nimitte carati / ahaṃ bodhisattva iti hyupalambha eva sa carati /
S06bsu049_u:19_10: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatīti,
S06bsu049_u:19_11: nimitta eva sa carati / ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'nupāyakuśalo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:20_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathaṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
S06bsu049_u:20_1: na rūpanimitte carati, na rūpaṃ nimittamiti carati, na rūpasyotpāde carati, na rūpasya nirodhe [Vaidya_7] carati,
S06bsu049_u:20_2: na rūpasya vināśe carati, na rūpaṃ śūnyamiti carati, nāhaṃ carāmīti carati, nāhaṃ bodhisattva iti carati /
S06bsu049_u:20_3: evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:20_4: sacenna vijñāne carati, na vijñānanimitte carati, na vijñānaṃ nimittamiti carati,
S06bsu049_u:20_5: na vijñānasyotpāde carati, na vijñānasya nirodhe carati,
S06bsu049_u:20_6: na vijñānasya vināśe carati, na vijñānaṃ śūnyamiti carati,
S06bsu049_u:20_7: nāhaṃ carāmīti carati, nāhaṃ bodhisattva iti carati /
S06bsu049_u:20_9: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati, sa prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatīti /
S06bsu049_u:20_12: na carāmīti nopaiti, carāmi ca na carāmi ceti nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:20_13: naiva carāmi na na carāmīti nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:20_14: cariṣyāmīti nopaiti, na cariṣyāmīti nopaiti, cariṣyāmi ca na cariṣyāmi ceti nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:20_19: anenaiva samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:21_0: buddhānubhāvena āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha - vyākṛto 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:21_2: sa tam api samādhiṃ na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:21_3: na ca tena samādhinā manyate - ahaṃ samāhitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:21_4: ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpatsye, ahaṃ samādhiṃ samāpadye, ahaṃ samādhisamāpannaḥ, iti, evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:22_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamenāyuṣman subhūte samādhinā viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairvyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? śakyaḥ sa samādhirdarśayitum? subhūtirāha - no hīdamāyuṣman śāriputra /
S06bsu049_u:22_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? tam api hi sa kulaputraḥ samādhiṃ na jānāti,
S06bsu049_u:22_2: na saṃjānīte / āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman subhūte vadasi? āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte ityāyuṣman śāriputra vadāmi /
S06bsu049_u:22_3: tatkasya hetorna jānāti na saṃjānīte? avidyamānatvena tasya samādhestaṃ samādhiṃ na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:22_4: atha khalu bhagavān āyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:22_5: evametatsubhūte, evam etat / yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvena te pratibhāti,
S06bsu049_u:22_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:23_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo [Vaidya_8] mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:24_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ katamasmin dharme śikṣate? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasmiṃściddharme śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:24_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi te śāriputra dharmāstathā saṃvidyante yathā bālapṛthagjanā aśrutavanto 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:24_2: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - kathaṃ tarhi te bhagavan saṃvidyante? bhagavānāha - yathā śāriputra na saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:24_6: te tān kalpayitvā dvayorantayoḥ saktāḥ tān dharmānna jānanti na paśyanti /
S06bsu049_u:24_8: kalpayitvā dvāvantāvabhiniviśante abhiniviśya tannidānamupalambhaṃ niśritya atītān dharmān kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:24_9: anāgatān dharmān kalpayanti, pratyutpannān dharmān kalpayanti te kalpayitvā nāmarūpe 'bhiniviṣṭāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:24_11: te tānasaṃvidyamānān sarvadharmān kalpayanto yathābhūtaṃ mārgaṃ na jānanti na paśyanti /
S06bsu049_u:24_13: na budhyante bhūtakoṭim / tena te bālā iti saṃjñāṃ gacchanti /
S06bsu049_u:24_15: na khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā kaṃciddharmamabhiniviśante /
S06bsu049_u:25_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate? bhagavānāha - evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyām api na śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:25_1: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmeṣu śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:25_2: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:26_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan evaṃ paripṛcchet - kimayaṃ māyāpuruṣāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣiṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:26_2: sarvajñatāyāṃ niryāsyatīti? tasya bhagavan evaṃ paripṛcchataḥ kathaṃ nirdeṣṭavyaṃ syāt? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tena hi subhūte tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:26_3: yathā te kṣamate, tathā vyākuryāḥ / sādhu bhagavannityāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S06bsu049_u:26_4: bhagavānetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte anyā sā māyā,
S06bsu049_u:26_5: anyattadrūpam, anyā sā māyā, anyā sā vedanā / anyā sā saṃjñā, anye te saṃskārāḥ / anyā sā māyā, anyattadvijñānam? subhūtirāha - na hyetadbhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:26_6: na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadrūpam /
S06bsu049_u:26_7: rūpameva bhagavan māyā, māyaiva rūpam / na hi bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyā sā vedanā,
S06bsu049_u:26_8: anyā sā saṃjñā anye te saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:26_9: vedanā saṃjñā [Vaidya_9] saṃskārā eva bhagavan māyā,
S06bsu049_u:26_11: na bhagavan anyā sā māyā anyattadvijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:27_0: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte atraiṣāṃ saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ pañcasūpādānaskandheṣu yaduta bodhisattva iti? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:27_1: evametatsugata / tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñapāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena māyāpuruṣeṇeva śikṣitavyaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:27_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? sa eva hi bhagavan māyāpuruṣo dhārayitavyo yaduta pañcopādānaskandhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:27_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ rūpamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:27_4: yacca rūpaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:27_5: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamā vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārā uktāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:27_6: tathā hi bhagavan māyopamaṃ vijñānamuktaṃ bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:27_7: yacca vijñānaṃ tatṣaḍindriyaṃ te pañca skandhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:27_8: mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:27_9: bhagavānāha - yadi subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pāpamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:27_11: atha cetsubhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kalyāṇamitrahastagatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:28_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni? bhagavānāha - ya enaṃ pāramitāsu avavadanti anuśāsati /
S06bsu049_u:28_5: imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:28_6: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - imāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyānīti /
S06bsu049_u:28_8: tatra bodhisattva iti bhagavan kaḥ padārtha? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - apadārthaḥ subhūte bodhisattvapadārthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:28_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saktatāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:28_10: sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nubodhanārthena asaktatāyāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:28_11: bodhyarthena tu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
S06bsu049_u:28_13: kena kāraṇena bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate? bhagavānāha - mahataḥ sattvarāśermahataḥ sattvanikāyasya agratāṃ kārayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:29_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - mamāpi bhagavan pratibhātiyenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
S06bsu049_u:29_1: bhagavānāha - pratibhātu te śāriputra yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
S06bsu049_u:29_2: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - mahatyā ātmadṛṣṭyāḥ sattvadṛṣṭyāḥ jīvadṛṣṭyāḥ pudgaladṛṣṭyāḥ [Vaidya_10] bhavadṛṣṭyāḥ vibhavadṛṣṭyāḥ ucchedadṛṣṭyāḥ śāśvatadṛṣṭyāḥ svakāyadṛṣṭyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:29_5: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mamāpi bhagavan pratibhāti yenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva ityucyate /
S06bsu049_u:29_6: bhagavānāha - pratibhātu te subhūte yasyedānīṃ kālaṃ manyase /
S06bsu049_u:29_8: yad api tadbhagavan bodhicittaṃ sarvajñatācittamanāsravaṃ cittamasamaṃ cittaṃ asamasamaṃ cittamasādhāraṇaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:29_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tatsarvajñatācittamanāsravamaparyāpannaṃ tat,
S06bsu049_u:29_13: tenārthena bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:30_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kena kāraṇena āyuṣman subhūte tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ? subhūtirāha - acittatvādāyuṣman śāriputra tatrāpi citte asakto 'paryāpannaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:31_0: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittam? subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā vidyate vā upalabhyate vā? śāriputra āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:31_1: subhūtirāha - tadyadi āyuṣman śāriputra tatra acittatāyāmastitā vā nāstitā vā na vidyate vā nopalabhyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:31_2: tatkathamāyuṣmān śāriputra evamāha - asti taccittaṃ yaccittamacittamiti? śāriputra āha - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:31_3: yathāpi nāma tvaṃ bhagavatā araṇāvihāriṇāmagratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭo nirdiśasi /
S06bsu049_u:32_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
S06bsu049_u:32_3: tasmātsa mahāsattvo mahāsattva iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:33_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃnaddha iti yadidaṃ bhagavannucyate,
S06bsu049_u:33_1: kiyatā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho bhavati ? bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - aprameyā mayā sattvāḥ parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:33_3: na ca te santi yairye parinirvāpayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:33_5: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:33_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmataiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ māyādharmatāmupādāya syāt /
S06bsu049_u:33_7: yathāpi nāma subhūte dakṣo māyākaro vā māyākārāntevāsī vā caturmahāpathe mahāntaṃ janakāyamabhinirmimīte /
S06bsu049_u:33_9: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tatra kenacitkaściddhato vā mṛto vā nāśito vā antarhito vā? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:33_10: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bodhisattvo [Vaidya_11] mahāsattvo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayati /
S06bsu049_u:33_11: na ca sa kaścitsattvo yaḥ parinirvṛto yena ca parinirvāpito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:33_12: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ nirdeśamevaṃ nirdiśyamānaṃ śrutvā notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:33_13: iyatā ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddho veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:34_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu049_u:34_1: tathā asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:34_3: evam etat / asaṃnāhasaṃnaddho batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:34_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? akṛtā hi subhūte sarvajñatā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā /
S06bsu049_u:35_1: evametatsugata / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan rūpamabaddhamamuktam /
S06bsu049_u:35_2: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / tathā hi bhagavan vijñānamabaddhamamuktam /
S06bsu049_u:36_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - rūpamāyuṣman subhūte abaddhamamuktamiti vadasi /
S06bsu049_u:36_1: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānamāyuṣman subhūte abaddhamamuktamiti vadasi /
S06bsu049_u:36_2: rūpatathatāpi āyuṣman subhūte abaddhā amukteti vadasi /
S06bsu049_u:36_5: atha katamattadāyuṣman subhūte rūpaṃ yadrūpamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi? evaṃ katamā sā vedanā,
S06bsu049_u:36_6: katamā sā saṃjñā, katame te saṃskārāḥ? katamattadāyuṣman subhūte vijñānaṃ yadvijñānamabaddhamamuktamiti vadasi? katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte rūpatathatā yā rūpatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi? evaṃ katamā sā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā? katamā sā āyuṣman subhūte vijñānatathatā yā vijñānatathatāpyabaddhā amukteti vadasi? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ pūrṇaṃ maitrāyaṇīputrametadavocat - yadāyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam /
S06bsu049_u:36_8: yā māyāpuruṣasya saṃjñā, ye māyāpuruṣasya saṃskārāḥ / yadāyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya vijñānaṃ tadabaddhamamuktam /
S06bsu049_u:36_9: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya rūpatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
S06bsu049_u:36_10: evaṃ yā māyāpuruṣasya vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā /
S06bsu049_u:36_11: yā āyuṣman pūrṇa māyāpuruṣasya vijñānatathatā sā abaddhā amuktā /
S06bsu049_u:36_14: ayaṃ sa bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya mahāyānasaṃprasthitasya mahāyānasamārūḍhasya mahāsaṃnāho 'saṃnāhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:37_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - evaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo [Vaidya_12] mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaḥ san mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:37_1: katamacca tanmahāyānam? kathaṃ vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ? kuto vā tanmahāyānaṃ niryāsyati? kena vā tanmahāyānaṃ saṃprasthitam? kva vā tanmahāyānaṃ sthāsyati? ko vā anena mahāyānena niryāsyati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāyānamiti subhūte aprameyatāyā etadadhivacanam /
S06bsu049_u:37_3: yad api subhūte evaṃ vadasi - kathaṃ vā tatsaṃprasthito veditavyaḥ? kuto vā tanmahāyānaṃ niryāsyati? kena vā tanmahāyānaṃ saṃprasthitam? kva vā tanmahāyānaṃ sthāsyati? ko vā anena mahāyānena niryāsyatīti? pāramitābhiḥ saṃprasthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:37_7: na kenāpi saṃprasthitam / na kvacitsthāsyati / api tu sthāsyati sarvajñatāyāmasthānayogena /
S06bsu049_u:37_8: nāpi kaścittena mahāyānena niryāto nāpi niryāsyati nāpi niryāti /
S06bsu049_u:37_10: yena ca niryāyāt, ubhāvetau dharmau na vidyete nopalabhyete /
S06bsu049_u:37_11: evamavidyamāneṣu sarvadharmeṣu katamo dharmaḥ katamena dharmeṇa niryāsyati? evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāyānasaṃnaddho mahāyānasaṃprasthito mahāyānasamārūḍho bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:38_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāyānaṃ mahāyānamiti bhagavannucyate /
S06bsu049_u:38_3: evameva bhagavan asmin yāne aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmavakāśaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:38_4: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāyānamidaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
S06bsu049_u:38_5: naivāsyāgamo dṛśyate, naivāsya nirgamo dṛśyate, nāpyasya sthānaṃ saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:38_6: evamasya bhagavan mahāyānasya naiva pūrvānta upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:38_7: nāpyaparānta upalabhyate, nāpi madhya upalabhyate / atha samaṃ bhagavaṃstadyānam /
S06bsu049_u:38_9: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:38_10: evametatsubhūte, evam etat / evaṃ mahāyānamidaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
S06bsu049_u:39_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputro bhagavantametadavocat - ayaṃ bhagavan subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśo 'dhīṣṭo mahāyānamupadeṣṭavyaṃ manyate /
S06bsu049_u:39_1: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - nāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ vyatikramya mahāyānamavocam /
S06bsu049_u:39_5: api nu khalu punarbhagavan pūrvāntato bodhisattvo nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:39_8: tatkasya hetornopaiti? rūpāparyantatayā hi bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā,
S06bsu049_u:39_9: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / [Vaidya_13] vijñānāparyantatayā hi bodhisattvāparyantatā veditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:39_12: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ bodhisattva iti nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:39_14: evaṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ bodhisattvadharmamanupalabhamāno nāhaṃ bhagavan taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yasyaitannāmadheyaṃ yaduta bodhisattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:39_17: so 'haṃ bhagavan sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ taṃ dharmamanupalabhamāno 'samanupaśyan katamaṃ dharmaṃ katamena dharmeṇa katamasmin dharme 'vavadiṣyāmi anuśāsiṣyāmi? buddha iti bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etat /
S06bsu049_u:39_23: evamasvabhāvānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamattadrūpaṃ yadagrāhyamanabhinirvṛttam? katame te vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ? katamattadvijñānaṃ yadagrāhyamanabhinirvṛttam? evameteṣāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ yā asvabhāvatā,
S06bsu049_u:39_24: sā anabhinirvṛttiḥ / yā ca sarvadharmāṇāmanabhinirvṛttirna te dharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:39_25: tatkimanabhinirvṛttimanabhinirvṛttyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadiṣyāmyanuśāsiṣyāmi? na cānyatra bhagavan anabhinirvṛttitaḥ sarvadharmā vā buddhadharmā vā bodhisattvadharmā vā upalabhyante,
S06bsu049_u:39_26: yo vā bodhāya caret / sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ deśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:39_27: nāsya vipṛṣṭhībhavati mānasaṃ na bhagnapṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:39_28: evaṃ veditavyam - caratyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:39_32: tatkasya hetoḥ? yasmin hi samaye bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ imān dharmān prajñāpāramitāyāṃ vyupaparīkṣate,
S06bsu049_u:39_36: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:39_37: na vijñānamupaiti, na vijñānamupagacchati, na vijñānasyotpādaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:39_39: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /
S06bsu049_u:39_43: yatpunaretaducyate rūpamiti, advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā / evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:39_44: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
S06bsu049_u:39_49: advayastaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā / evaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvākāraṃ sarvadharmān vyupaparīkṣamāṇaḥ tasmin samaye na rūpamupaiti,
S06bsu049_u:39_52: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:39_56: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi yo rūpasyānutpādo na tadrūpam /
S06bsu049_u:39_60: yatpunaretaducyate rūpamiti, advayasyaiṣā gaṇanā kṛtā / evaṃ tathā hi yo vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:39_61: tathā hi yo vijñānasyānutpādo na tadvijñānam,
S06bsu049_u:40_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tena hi yathāhamāyuṣmataḥ subhūterbhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi,
S06bsu049_u:40_2: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ kiṃ bodhisattvo duṣkaracārikāṃ carati? yāni vā tāni sattvānāṃ kṛtaśo duḥkhānyutsahate pratyanubhavitum? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ duṣkaracārikāṃ carantam nāpi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo duṣkarasaṃjñayā carati /
S06bsu049_u:40_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi āyuṣman śāriputra duṣkarasaṃjñāṃ janayitvā śakyo 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kartum /
S06bsu049_u:40_5: sarvasattvānāmantike mātṛsaṃjñāṃ pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ kṛtvā strīpuruṣeṣu /
S06bsu049_u:40_6: evametāḥ saṃjñāḥ kṛtvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvacārikāṃ carati /
S06bsu049_u:40_7: tasmānmātṛsaṃjñā pitṛsaṃjñā putrasaṃjñā duhitṛsaṃjñā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattvānāmantike yāvadātmasaṃjñā utpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:40_8: yathā ātmā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:40_9: evaṃ sarvasattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvaduḥkhebhyo mocayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:40_10: evaṃ ca sarvasattveṣu saṃjñā utpādayitavyā - mayaite sarvasattvā na parityaktavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:40_12: na ca mayaiteṣu cittapradoṣa utpādayitavya antaśaḥ śataśo 'pi chidyamāneneti /
S06bsu049_u:40_13: evaṃ hi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittamutpādayitavyam sacedevaṃcitto vihariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:40_14: na duṣkarasaṃjñī cariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī vihariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:40_15: punaraparamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - yathā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvamātmā na vidyate nopalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:40_16: evaṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvadharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /
S06bsu049_u:40_18: sacedevaṃcittaścariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī cariṣyati, na duṣkarasaṃjñī vihariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:40_19: yadapyāyuṣman śāriputra evamāha - anutpādo bodhisattvo iti /
S06bsu049_u:41_0: śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattva evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:41_1: utāho bodhisattvadharmā apyanutpādaḥ? subhūtirāha - bodhisattvadharmā api āyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ śāriputra āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvadharmā evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:41_2: utāho sarvajñatāpyanutpādaḥ? subhūtirāha - sarvajñatāpyāyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:41_4: utāho sarvajñatādharmā apyanutpādaḥ? āha - sarvajñatādharmā apyāyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:41_5: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte sarvajñatādharmā evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:41_6: utāho pṛthagjano 'pyanutpādaḥ? āha - pṛthagjano 'pyāyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:41_7: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte pṛthagjana evānutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:41_8: utāho pṛthagjanadharmā apyanutpādaḥ? āha - pṛthagjanadharmā āpyāyuṣman śāriputra anutpādaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:41_9: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo 'pyanutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:41_13: nanvāyuṣman subhūte anuprāptaiva ayatnena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvajñatā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:41_14: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - nāhamāyuṣman śāriputra anutpannasya dharmasya prāptimicchāmi,
S06bsu049_u:41_15: nāpyabhisamayam / nāpyanutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate /
S06bsu049_u:41_16: āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte anutpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate,
S06bsu049_u:41_17: utāho utpannena dharmeṇa anutpannā prāptiḥ prāpyate? āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anutpanno dharma utpannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:41_18: utāho anutpanna eva dharmo 'nutpannaḥ? āha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte utpāda eva dharmo 'nutpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:41_19: utāho anutpādo dharma utpādaḥ? āha - utpādo dharmo 'nutpādo dharma ityāyuṣman śāriputra na pratibhāti jalpitum /
S06bsu049_u:41_20: āha - anutpādo 'pi te āyuṣman subhūte pratibhāti jalpitum /
S06bsu049_u:42_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - dhārmakathikānāmāyuṣmān subhūtiragratāyāṃ sthāpitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:42_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hyāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro yato yata eva paripraśnīkriyate,
S06bsu049_u:42_2: tatastata eva niḥsarati, dharmatāyāś ca na calati, tāṃ ca dharmatāṃ na virodhayati /
S06bsu049_u:42_3: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - dharmataiṣā āyuṣman śāriputra bhagavataḥ śrāvakāṇāmaniśritadharmāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:42_5: tatastata eva niḥsaranti, dharmatāṃ ca na virodhayanti,
S06bsu049_u:42_8: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:42_9: katamaiṣā sarvadharmāniśritapāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām? subhūtirāha - prajñāpāramitaiva āyuṣman śāriputra sārvayānikī,
S06bsu049_u:42_11: iti hi yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmevaṃ deśyamānāyāmevamupadiśyamānāyāṃ na bhavati cittasya avalīnatvam,
S06bsu049_u:42_12: na bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam, na bhavati dhaṃdhāyitatvam, na bhavati cittasyānyathātvam,
S06bsu049_u:42_13: veditavyamayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti /
S06bsu049_u:43_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:43_1: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati? yadi hyāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito manasikāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:43_3: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte avirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:43_5: yadi ca āyuṣman subhūte manasikāreṇāvirahito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:43_7: evaṃ sati sarvasattvā apyavirahitā bhaviṣyanti prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:43_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvasattvā api hyavirahitā manasikāreṇa viharanti /
S06bsu049_u:44_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu āyuṣman śāriputra /
S06bsu049_u:44_1: api tu upālapsye tvā / artha eva tvāyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhūtapadābhidhānena parigṛhītaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:44_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? sattvāsvabhāvatayā āyuṣman śāriputra manasikārāsvabhāvatā veditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:44_8: anena āyuṣman śāriputra evaṃrūpeṇa manasikāreṇa icchāmi bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ viharantamanena vihāreṇeti /
S06bsu049_u:49_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt catvāriṃśatā trāyastriṃśatkāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
S06bsu049_u:49_1: catvāraś ca lokapālā viṃśatyā cāturmahārājakāyikairdevaputrasahasraiḥ sārdham /
S06bsu049_u:49_3: pañca ca śuddhāvāsānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇānyabhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:50_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - imānyārya subhūte saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi asyāṃ parṣadi saṃnipatitāni saṃniṣaṇṇāni āryasya subhūterantikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śrotukāmāni bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmupadeśamavavādānuśāsanīṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:50_2: kathaṃ śikṣitavyam, kathaṃ yogamāpattavyam? sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tena hi kauśika upadekṣyāmi te buddhānubhāvena buddhatejasā buddhādhiṣṭhānena /
S06bsu049_u:50_5: na te bhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
S06bsu049_u:50_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? baddhasīmāno hi te saṃsārasrotasaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:50_7: abhavyā hi te punaḥ punaḥ saṃsaraṇāya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayitum /
S06bsu049_u:50_11: viśiṣṭebhyo hi dharmebhyo viśiṣṭatamā dharmā adhyālambitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:51_0: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu049_u:51_3: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kṛtajñairasmābhirbhagavan bhagavato bhavitavyaṃ nākṛtajñaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:51_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? paurvakāṇāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike 'smadarthe bhagavān yathā brahmacaryaṃ bodhāya caran pūrvaṃ bodhisattvabhūta eva san,
S06bsu049_u:51_7: evaṃ bhagavan asmābhir api bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigrahītavyā anuparivārayitavyāśca,
S06bsu049_u:51_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? asmābhir api hi bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuparigṛhītā anuparivāritāśca,
S06bsu049_u:52_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - tena hi kauśika śṛṇu,
S06bsu049_u:52_1: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06bsu049_u:52_2: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te yathā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_3: śūnyatāyāṃ kauśika tiṣṭhatā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_4: tena hi kauśika [Vaidya_18] bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhena bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_5: na rūpe sthātavyam / na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:52_6: na vijñāne sthātavyam / na cakṣuṣi sthātavyam / na rūpe sthātavyam / na cakṣurvijñāne sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_11: na śrotravijñāne, yāvanna manovijñāne / na manaḥsaṃsparśe, na manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_13: nābdhātau, na tejodhātau, na vāyudhātau, nākāśadhātau, na vijñānadhātau sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_16: na mārgāṅgeṣu sthātavyam / na srotaāpattiphale sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_17: na sakṛdāgāmiphale, na anāgāmiphale, nārhattve sthātavyam / na pratyekabuddhatve sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_18: na buddhatve sthātavyam / iti hi rūpamiti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_19: iti hi vedaneti, saṃjñeti, saṃskārā iti / iti hi vijñānamiti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_20: iti hi cakṣuriti, yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedaneti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_21: iti hi pṛthivīdhāturiti, yāvadvijñānadhāturiti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_26: iti hi sakṛdāgāmiphalamiti, anāgāmiphalamiti, arhattvamiti na sthātavyam / iti hi pratyekabuddhatvamiti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_29: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ nityamanityamiti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_31: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ sukhaṃ duḥkhamiti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_33: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ śūnyamaśūnyamiti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_37: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ śubhamaśubhamiti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_39: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ śūnyamupalabhyate veti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_44: srotaāpannāḥ saptakṛto bhavaparamā iti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_46: sakṛdāgāmyapariniṣṭhitattvātsakṛdimaṃ lokamāgamya duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_47: anāgāmī dakṣiṇīya iti na sthātavyam anāgāmī anāgamya imaṃ lokaṃ tatraiva parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_49: arhannihaiva anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_51: pratyekabuddho 'tikramya śrāvakabhūmimaprāpya buddhabhūmiṃ parinirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:52_53: buddho 'tikramya [Vaidya_19] pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya śrāvakabhūmimatikramya pratyekabuddhabhūmimaprabheyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvāpya aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhatvaniyatān kṛtvā buddhabhūmau sthitvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvāsyati ityevamapyanena na sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:53_0: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhavat - yadi buddho 'tikramya pṛthagjanabhūmimatikramya śrāvakabhūmimatikramya pratyekabuddhabhūmimaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmarthaṃ kṛtvā aprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni sattvakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi parinirvāpya aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhasamyaksaṃbuddhatvaniyatān kṛtvā buddhabhūmau sthitvā buddhakṛtyaṃ kṛtvā anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau buddhaparinirvāṇena parinirvāsyati ityevamapyanena na sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:53_2: kathaṃ śikṣitavyamiti? atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena āyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra kva tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ? āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - na kvacidāyuṣman subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:53_3: tatkasya heto? apratiṣṭhitamānaso hi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:53_4: sa naiva saṃskṛte dhātau sthito nāpyasaṃskṛte dhātau sthito na ca tato vyutthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:54_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evameva āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:54_1: evaṃ śikṣitavyam - yathā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho na kvacitsthito nāsthito na viṣṭhito nāviṣṭhitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:54_4: tathā śikṣiṣye iti, yathā tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti,
S06bsu049_u:54_5: tathā śikṣiṣye iti, yathā tathāgatasthānaṃ tathā sthāsyāmīti susthito 'sthānayogeneti evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyamevaṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:54_6: evaṃ hi śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo viharatyanena prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa avirahitaścānena manasikāreṇeti /
S06bsu049_u:55_0: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāṃciddevaputrāṇāmetadabhūt - yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣabhāṣitāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni,
S06bsu049_u:55_2: na punaridaṃ vijñāyate yatsubhūtiḥ sthaviro bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayatyupadiśati /
S06bsu049_u:55_3: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmimamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - na vijñāyate na vijñāyate idaṃ devaputrāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:56_0: atha khalu teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ punarevaitadabhūt - uttānīkariṣyati bata ayamāryasubhūtiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:56_3: sūkṣmātsūkṣmataram / gambhīrādgambhīrataramāryasubhūtiḥ praviśati deśayati bhāṣata iti /
S06bsu049_u:56_4: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena punar api teṣāmeva devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate [Vaidya_20] sma - tena hi devaputrāḥ yaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptukāmaḥ srotaāpattiphale sthātukāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:56_5: sa nemāṃ kṣāntimanāgamya....peyālam / yaḥ sakṛdāgābhiphalaṃ prāptukāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:56_9: sa nemāṃ kṣāntimanāgamya..... / yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prāptukāmo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau sthātukāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:57_0: atha khalu punar api teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāmetadabhavat - kiṃrūpā asya āryasubhūterdhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ? atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbuddhānubhāvena teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - māyānirmitasadṛśā hi devaputrā mama dhārmaśravaṇikā eṣṭavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:57_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te naiva śroṣyanti na ca sākṣātkariṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:58_0: atha khalu te devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - kiṃ punarārya subhūte māyopamāste sattvā na te māyā? evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtistān devaputrānetadavocat - māyopamāste devaputrāḥ sattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:58_2: iti hi māyā ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram,
S06bsu049_u:58_3: iti hi svapnaś ca sattvāś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:58_9: arhann api arhattvam api māyopamaṃ svapnopamam /
S06bsu049_u:58_14: atha khalu devaputrā āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocan - samyaksaṃbuddho 'pyārya subhūte māyopamaḥ svapnopama iti vadasi? samyaksaṃbuddhatv api māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi? subhūtirāha - nirvāṇam api devaputrā māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadāmi,
S06bsu049_u:58_15: kiṃ punaranyaṃ dharmam / te devaputrā āhuḥ - nirvāṇamapyārya subhūte māyopamaṃ svapnopamamiti vadasi? āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - tadyadi devaputrā nirvāṇādapyanyaḥ kaściddharmo viśiṣṭataraḥ syāt,
S06bsu049_u:58_17: iti hi devaputrā māyā ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:58_18: iti hi svapnaś ca nirvāṇaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:59_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:59_1: āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākoṣṭhilaḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākātyāyanaḥ, āyuṣmāṃś ca mahākāśapaḥ, anye ca mahāśrāvakā anekairbodhisattvasahasraiḥ sārdhamāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayante sma - ke 'syā āyuṣman subhūte prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti? atha khalvāyuṣmānānandastān sthavirānetadavocat - te khalvāyuṣmanto veditavyā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā [Vaidya_21] mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:59_2: dṛṣṭisaṃpannā vā pudgalāḥ, arhanto vā kṣīṇāsravāḥ, ye 'syāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ pratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:60_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthavirastān sthavirānetadavocat - nāsyā āyuṣmantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyāḥ kecitpratyeṣakā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:60_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi - atra na kaściddharmaḥ sūcyate,
S06bsu049_u:60_7: tathaivāsyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā evaṃ nirdiśyamānāyā na kaścitpratyeṣako bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:61_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - asya dharmaparyāyasya āryeṇa subhūtinā bhāṣyamāṇasya pūjārthaṃ yannvahaṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āryaṃ subhūtimabhyavakireyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:61_1: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasyāṃ velāyāṃ puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimabhyavākirat /
S06bsu049_u:61_2: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ sthavirasya śakraṃ devānāmindramanuvyāharaṇāyaitadabhūt - na khalu punarimāni puṣpāṇi mayā trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pracaranti dṛṣṭapūrvāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:61_6: manomayānyetāni puṣpāṇīti / atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataḥ subhūteścetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - anirjātānyetānyārya subhūte puṣpāṇi /
S06bsu049_u:61_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi manonirjātāni kānicitpuṣpāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:61_9: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yattvaṃ kauśika evaṃ vadasi - anirjātānyetāni puṣpāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:61_12: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyamāryaḥ subhūtiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:61_14: tāṃ ca na virodhayati, tāṃ cottānīkaroti, tāmeva copadiśati / atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmataṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametadārya subhūte,
S06bsu049_u:61_15: evam etat / evaṃ cātra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyaṃ yathā āryasubhūtirupadiśati /
S06bsu049_u:61_16: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika,
S06bsu049_u:61_17: evam etat / evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:61_18: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na srotaāpattiphale śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:61_19: na sakṛdāgāmiphale, na anāgāmiphale, nāhartve śikṣate, na pratyekabuddhatve śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:61_20: na buddhatve śikṣate / yo nāsu bhūmiṣu śikṣate, sa buddhatve sarvajñatve vā śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:61_25: na parihāṇāya / evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:61_27: na parihāṇāya / yo na rūpasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:61_28: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:61_29: yo na vijñānasya vivṛddhaye śikṣate na parihāṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:61_30: sa na rūpasya parigrahāya śikṣate notsargāya /
S06bsu049_u:61_31: [Vaidya_22] evaṃ sa na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:61_37: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:61_39: evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:62_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:62_2: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:62_4: evaṃ śikṣamāṇa āyuṣmān subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:63_1: evam etat / ya āyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kasyaciddharmasya parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:63_3: sa na sarvajñatāyā api parigrahāya śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:63_7: evaṃ cāyuṣman śāriputra śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:64_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - prajñāpāramitā ārya śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyāḥ? śāriputra āha - prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena āyuṣmataḥ subhūteḥ parivartādgaveṣitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:64_1: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kasyaiṣa ārya śāriputra anubhāvo veditavyaḥ? kasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate? āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika anubhāvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:64_2: tathāgatasyaitadadhiṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate /
S06bsu049_u:64_3: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - kasyaiṣo 'nubhāvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:64_4: kasyaitadanuṣṭhānaṃ veditavyaṃ yadāryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate iti? tathāgatasyaiṣa kauśika anubhāvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:64_6: yad api kauśika evaṃ vadasi - prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kuto gaveṣitavyeti? prajñāpāramitā kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na rūpādgaveṣitavyā nāpyanyatra rūpādgaveṣitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:64_7: evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārebhyaḥ na vijñānādgaveṣitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:64_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi na rūpaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:64_11: evaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:65_0: evamukte śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - mahāpāramiteyamārya subhūte yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:65_5: evam etat / mahāpāramiteyaṃ kauśika yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:65_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpamahattayā hi kauśika mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:65_10: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānamahattayā hi kauśikamahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:65_12: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānāpramāṇatayā kauśika apramāṇapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñapāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:65_14: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānāparimāṇatayā kauśika aparimāṇapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñapāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:65_16: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānānantatayā kauśika anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:66_2: kathaṃ punaḥ kauśika ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā? sarvadharmāṇāṃ hi kauśika yato nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:66_4: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:66_6: na teṣāmanto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vā upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:66_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:66_10: vijñānasya hi kauśika nānto na madhyaṃ na paryavasānamupalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:66_11: anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa ārambaṇānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:67_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi sattvasyānto vā madhyaṃ vā paryavasānaṃ vopalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:67_3: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kathamāyuṣman subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā? sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - na hi kauśika gaṇanāyogena vā gaṇanābahutvena vā sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:68_0: śakra āha - kathaṃ tarhīdānīmārya subhūte sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta [Vaidya_24] prajñāpāramitā? sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkaṃ manyase kauśika katamasyaitaddharmasyādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti? śakra āha - naitadārya subhūte dharmasyādhivacanaṃ na adharmādhivacanaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:68_4: anārambaṇametannāmadheyaṃ prakṣiptaṃ yaduta sattvaḥ sattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:68_5: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase kauśika kācidatra sattvaparidīpanā kṛtā? śakra āha - no hīdamārya subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:68_6: subhūtirāha - yatra kauśika na kācitsattvaparidīpanā kṛtā,
S06bsu049_u:68_7: tatra kā sattvānantatā? sacetkauśika tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho 'nantavijñaptighoṣeṇa gambhīranirghoṣeṇa svareṇa gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān api vitiṣṭhamānaḥ sattvaḥ sattva iti vācaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06bsu049_u:68_8: api nu tatra kaścitsattva utpanno va utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:68_9: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā? śakra āha - no hīdamārya subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:68_11: subhūtirāha - anenāpi kauśika paryāyeṇa evaṃ sattvānantatayā anantapāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:68_12: evaṃ ca punaḥ kauśika sattvānantatayā prajñāpāramitānantatā veditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:69_0: atha khalu sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇāstrirudānamudānayanti sma - aho dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:69_1: aho dharmaḥ, aho dharmasya dharmatā / yastathāgatasya prādurbhāvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:69_2: sa āryeṇa subhūtinā sthavireṇa subhāṣiteneha sūcyate deśyate prakāśyate prabhāvyate /
S06bsu049_u:69_3: tathāgataṃ taṃ vayaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadyāgreṇa dhārayiṣyāmo yo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:69_4: yo 'pi ca anena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:70_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān sendrakān sabrahmakān saprajāpatikān sarṣinaranārīgaṇānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:70_1: evam etat / yadāhaṃ devaputrā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike dīpavatyāṃ rājadhānyāmantarāyaṇamadhyagato 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā avirahito 'bhūvam,
S06bsu049_u:70_2: tadāhaṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani asaṃkhyeyaiḥ kalpaiḥ śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyānāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti /
S06bsu049_u:70_3: atha khalu te devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:70_4: paramāścaryaṃ sugata / yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñatāyā āhārikā anuparigrāhikā ceti /
S06bsu049_u:75_0: atha khalu bhagavān ye tatra devaputrāḥ parṣadi saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāścābhūvan,
S06bsu049_u:75_2: tān devaputrān saṃnipatitān saṃniṣaṇṇāṃś ca viditvā,
S06bsu049_u:75_3: tāś ca sarvāścatasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāś ca viditvā,
S06bsu049_u:75_4: kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān brahmakāyikāṃś ca devaputrān ābhāsvarāṃś ca parīttaśubhāṃś ca akaniṣṭhāṃś ca devaputrān sākṣiṇaḥ sthāpayitvā,
S06bsu049_u:75_5: śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān mahābrahmapramukhāṃś ca brahmakāyikān devaputrānābhāsvarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - yo hi kaściddevaputrāḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:75_6: na tasya māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraprekṣiṇyo 'vatāragaveṣiṇyo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:75_7: nāpi tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:75_8: nāpi sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:76_0: punaraparaṃ devaputrāḥ ye devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:76_1: yaiś ca devaputrairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā nodgṛhītā na dhāritā na vācitā na paryavāptā na pravartitā,
S06bsu049_u:76_2: te devaputrāstaṃ kulaputra vā kuladuhitaraṃ vā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:76_3: tasya ca kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasyāntikācchroṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:76_4: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:76_5: na ca khalu punardevaputrāstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇato dhārayato vācayataḥ paryavāpnuvataḥ pravartayamānasya araṇyagatasya vā vṛkṣamūlagatasya vā śūnyāgāragatasya vā abhyavakāśagatasya vā pathi gatasya vā utpathagatasya vā aṭavīgatasya vā mahāsamudragatasya vā tatra tatropasaṃkrāmato vā caṃkramyamāṇasya vā sthitasya vā niṣaṇṇasya vā vipannasya vā bhayaṃ vā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:77_0: atha khalu catvāro mahārājāno bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yadimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yānatraye sattvān vinayati,
S06bsu049_u:77_2: vayaṃ bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:77_3: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:78_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - aham api bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:78_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:79_0: brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmakāyikairdevaputrairbhagavantametadavocat - aham api bhagavaṃstasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:79_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:80_0: [Vaidya_26] atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yadimāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imān yato dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān pratilabhate parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:80_1: kiṃ punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika,
S06bsu049_u:80_2: evam etat / prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kauśika udgṛhītāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā udgṛhītā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:80_3: punaraparaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhītāyāṃ dhāritāyāṃ vācitāyāṃ paryavāptāyāṃ pravartitāyāṃ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti /
S06bsu049_u:80_4: tān kauśik sarvān śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru,
S06bsu049_u:80_5: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavanniti śakro devānāmindro bhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S06bsu049_u:80_6: bhagavānetadavocat - tatra kauśika ye mama dharmaṃ vigrahītavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:80_7: vivaditavyaṃ maṃsyante, virodhayitavyaṃ maṃsyante, teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāmutpannotpannā vigrahā vivādā virodhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:80_8: punarevāntardhāsyanti, na sthāsyanti / teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:80_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetatkauśika bhavati - ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:80_11: na sthāsyanti / teṣāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ na te 'bhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:80_12: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:80_13: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇāti dhārayati vācayati paryavāpnoti pravartayati deśayati upadiśati uddiśati svādhyāyati /
S06bsu049_u:80_14: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika maghī nāmauṣadhī sarvaviṣapraśamanī /
S06bsu049_u:80_15: tatra āśīviṣeṇa jantunā bubhukṣitena āhārārthinā āhāragaveṣiṇā kaścideva prāṇakajāto janturdṛṣṭo bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:80_17: atha sa prāṇakajāto yena sā madhī nāmauṣadhī tenopasaṃkramet,
S06bsu049_u:80_18: tenopasaṃkramya tiṣṭhet / atha sa āśīviṣastasyā oṣadhyā gandhenaiva pratyudāvarteta /
S06bsu049_u:80_19: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasyā oṣadhyā bhaiṣajyaguṇaḥ sa tādṛśo yastasyāśīviṣasya tadviṣamabhibhavati /
S06bsu049_u:80_20: evaṃ balavatī hi sā oṣadhī / evameva kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā va imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:80_21: tasya kauśika yāni tānyutpannotpannānyadhikaraṇāni vigrahā vivādā virodhā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:80_22: te prajñāpāramitāyāstejasā balena sthāmataḥ prajñāpāramitābalādhānena kṣipraṃ tata evoparaṃsyanti upaśamiṣyanti antardhāsyanti na vivardhiṣyante /
S06bsu049_u:80_23: yato yata evotpatsyante, tatra tatraiva nirotsyante antardhāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:80_25: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā hi rāgādīnāṃ yāvannirvāṇagrāhasyopaśamayitrī,
S06bsu049_u:80_26: na vivardhiketi / catvāraś ca tasya mahārājānaḥ [Vaidya_27] śakraś ca devānāmindro brahmā ca sahāpatiḥ sarve ca buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāś ca rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:80_27: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyatiḥ uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:80_28: ayaṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇaḥ parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:81_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:81_2: mṛduvacanaś ca bhaviṣyati, mitavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati, aprakīrṇavacanaś ca bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:81_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi taṃ prajñāpāramitā paridamayati,
S06bsu049_u:81_6: prajñāpāramitā pariṇamayati, na krodhaṃ vardhayati, na mānaṃ vardhayati / sa nopanāhaṃ parigṛhṇāti, na vyāpādaṃ parigṛhṇāti, nānuśayaṃ dhārayati / evaṃ carato 'sya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā smṛtirmaitrī cotpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:81_11: tatra śikṣitukāmaḥ, krodhasya vaśaṃ gaccheyam / ityevaṃ sa kṣiprameva smṛtiṃ pratilabhate /
S06bsu049_u:81_12: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:81_13: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:81_14: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yatheyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paridamanāya pratyupasthitā anunāmāya bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām /
S06bsu049_u:82_0: bhagavānāha - punaraparaṃ kauśika ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:82_1: sacetkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmevamudgṛhṇan dhārayan vācayan paryavāpnuvan pravartayan deśayan upadiśayan uddiśan svādhyāyan saṃgrāme vartamāne saṃgrāmaśirasi samārūḍhaḥ syāt /
S06bsu049_u:82_2: tasya saṃgrāmamavatarato vā avatīrṇasya vā atikrāmato vā saṃgrāmamadhyagatasya vā tiṣṭhato vā niṣaṇṇasya vā asthānametatkauśika anavakāśo yattasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ manasi kurvato vā udgṛhṇato vā dhārayato vā vācayato vā paryavāpnuvato vā pravartayato vā deśayato vā upadiśato vā uddiśato vā svādhyāyato vā jīvitāntarāyo vā bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:82_4: naitatsthānaṃ vidyate / sacetpunastasya kaścitkauśika tatra śastraṃ vā daṇḍaṃ vā loṣṭaṃ vā anyadvā kṣipet,
S06bsu049_u:82_5: naitattasya śarīre nipatet / tatkasya hetoḥ? mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:82_11: tatkasya hetoḥ? atra hi kauśika [Vaidya_28] vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā nātmavyābādhāya cetayate,
S06bsu049_u:82_12: na paravyābādhāya cetayate, nobhayavyābādhāya cetayate / atra hi kauśika vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06bsu049_u:82_14: tena so 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvānāṃ cittāni vyavalokayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:82_15: tatkasya hetoḥ? atra hi kauśika vidyāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na tatkiṃcidasti,
S06bsu049_u:82_16: yanna prāptaṃ vā na jñātaṃ vā na sākṣātkṛtaṃ vā syāt /
S06bsu049_u:82_18: ayam api kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇaḥ parigṛhīto bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:82_19: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:83_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika yatreyaṃ prajñāpāramitā antaśo likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṃgamaṃ sthāpayitvā na satkariṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:83_1: nodgrahīṣyate, na dhārayiṣyate, na vācayiṣyate, na paryavāpsyate, na pravartayiṣyate, na deśayiṣyate, nopadekṣyate, noddekṣyate, na svādhyāsyate, na tatra kauśika sattvānāṃ manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā avatārārthiko 'vatāragaveṣī avatāraṃ lapsyate sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam /
S06bsu049_u:83_2: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
S06bsu049_u:84_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika tadyathāpi nāma ye bodhimaṇḍagatā vā bodhimaṇḍaparisāmantagatā vā bodhimaṇḍābhyantaragatā vā bodhivṛkṣamūlagatā vā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā,
S06bsu049_u:84_1: tiryagyonigatānapyupādāya, yāvanna te śakyā manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā viheṭhayituṃ vā vyāpādayituṃ vā āveśayituṃ vā sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam /
S06bsu049_u:84_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? tatra hi atītānāgatapratyutpannāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbuddhā abhisaṃbhotsyante abhisaṃbudhyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:84_4: evameva kauśika yatra kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyati upadekṣyati uddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:84_5: tatra hi kauśika sattvā na śakyā manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā viheṭhayituṃ vā vyāpādayituṃ vā āveśayituṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:84_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? anayaiva hi kauśika prajñāpāramitayā pṛthivīpradeśaḥ sattvānāṃ caityabhūtaḥ kṛto vandanīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo 'rcanīyo 'pacāyanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:84_8: trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ layanaṃ parāyaṇaṃ kṛto bhaviṣyati tatropagatānāṃ sattvānām /
S06bsu049_u:84_9: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti /
S06bsu049_u:85_0: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā sthāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:85_2: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet,
S06bsu049_u:85_3: yaś ca [Vaidya_29] tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya śarīrāṇi stūpeṣu pratiṣṭhāpayet parigṛhṇīyāt dhārayeddhā,
S06bsu049_u:85_5: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet,
S06bsu049_u:85_6: katarastayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - tena hi kauśika tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:85_7: yathā te kṣamate, tathā vyākuryāḥ / tatkiṃ manyase kauśika yo 'yaṃ tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya sarvajñatātmabhāvo 'bhinirvartitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:85_8: sa katamasyāṃ pratipadi śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvajñatā pratilabdhā abhisaṃbuddhā? evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - ihaiva bhagavan bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ sarvajñatā pratilabdhā abhisaṃbuddhā /
S06bsu049_u:85_9: bhagavānāha - tasmāttarhi kauśika nānenātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhena tathāgatastathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:85_10: sarvajñatāyāṃ tu pratilabdhāyāṃ tathāgatastathāgata iti saṃkhyāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:85_12: prajñāpāramitānirjātaiṣā / eṣa ca kauśika tathāgatasyātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyanirjātaḥ san sarvajñajñānāśrayabhūto bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:85_13: enaṃ hyāśrayaṃ niśritya sarvajñajñānasya prabhāvanā bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:85_17: ityevaṃ sarvajñajñānahetuko 'yamātmabhāvaśarīrapratilambhaḥ sarvajñajñānāśrayabhūtatvātsarvasattvānāṃ caityabhūto vandanīyaḥ satkaraṇīyo gurukaraṇīyo mānanīyaḥ pūjanīyo 'rcanīyo 'pacāyanīyaḥ saṃvṛtto bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:85_18: evaṃ ca mama parinirvṛtasyāpi sataḥ eṣāṃ śarīrāṇāṃ pūjā bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:85_19: tasmāttarhi kauśika yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ vā kṛtvā sthāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:85_20: enāṃ ca divyābhiḥ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet,
S06bsu049_u:85_21: ayameva kauśika tayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet /
S06bsu049_u:85_22: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvajñajñānasya hi kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:85_23: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ pustakagatāyāṃ vā satkāraṃ gurukāraṃ mānanāṃ pūjanāmarcanāmapacāyanāṃ pūjāṃ ca vividhāṃ kuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:85_25: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvajñajñānasya hi kauśika tena pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:86_0: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - ya ime bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na likhiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:86_2: na vācayiṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na pravartayiṣyanti na deśayiṣyanti nopadekṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:86_4: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhirna satkariṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:86_5: na gurukariṣyanti, na [Vaidya_30] mānayiṣyanti, na pūjayiṣyanti, nārcayiṣyanti, nāpacāyiṣyanti, kiṃ nu te bhagavan na jñāsyanti evaṃ mahārthikā bhagavatoktā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyatīti? kiṃ nu te bhagavan na vetsyanti - evaṃ mahānuśaṃsā evaṃ mahāphalā evaṃ mahāvipākā bhagavatoktā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjā kṛtā bhaviṣyatīti? na ca te vedayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:86_6: uta jñāsyanti vetsyanti, vedayiṣyanti, na ca punaḥ śraddhāsyanti? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase kauśika kiyantaste jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā te buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:86_8: ye saṃghe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ? evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - alpakāste bhagavan jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:86_12: evam etat / alpakāste jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyā ye buddhe 'vetya prasādena samanvāgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:86_21: tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya taṃ cittotpādaṃ bṛṃhayanti /
S06bsu049_u:86_22: tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya upabṛṃhayitvā ca ārabdhavīryā viharanti /
S06bsu049_u:86_25: tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmāvavatiṣṭhante /
S06bsu049_u:86_26: tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
S06bsu049_u:86_27: tebhyo 'pyalpebhyo 'lpatarakāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranto ghaṭamānā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
S06bsu049_u:86_28: te te kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya anyeṣāmadhyāśayasaṃpannānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇānāṃ ghaṭamānānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupadiśanti ca uddiśanti /
S06bsu049_u:86_29: te codgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti paryavāpnuvanti pravartayanti upadeśayanti upadiśanti uddiśanti svādhyāyanti /
S06bsu049_u:86_30: tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:86_31: bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ, satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayanti arcayanti apacāyanti /
S06bsu049_u:86_32: santi khalu punaḥ kauśika aprameyā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:86_35: teṣāṃ khalu punaḥ kauśika aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ bodhāya caratām api yadyeko vā dvau vā avinivartanīyāyāṃ [Vaidya_31] bodhisattvabhūmāvavatiṣṭheyātām /
S06bsu049_u:86_36: tatkasya hetoḥ? durabhisaṃbhavā hi kauśika anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirhīnavīryaiḥ kusīdairhīnasattvairhīnacittairhīnasaṃjñairhīnādhimuktikairhīnaprajñaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:86_37: tasmāttarhi kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā kṣipraṃ cānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā sukhaṃ abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā paripraṣṭavyā /
S06bsu049_u:86_38: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa evaṃ jñāsyati - atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caran śikṣitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:86_40: eṣo 'smākaṃ śāsteti / tiṣṭhato vā kauśika parinirvṛtasya vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ prajñāpāramitaiva pratisartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:86_41: tasmāttarhi kauśika yaḥ kaścitkulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya pūjāyai koṭiśaḥ saptaratnamayāṃstathāgatadhātugarbhān stūpān kārayet /
S06bsu049_u:86_42: kārayitvā ca tān yāvajjīvaṃ divyaiḥ puṣpair divyair dhūpair divyair gandhair divyair mālyair divyair vilepanair divyaiś cūrṇair divyair vastrair divyaiś chatrair divyair dhvajair divyābhir ghaṇṭābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:86_44: ca divyābhiḥ pūjābhiḥ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet,
S06bsu049_u:86_45: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha - bahu bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:86_46: bahu sugata / bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:86_47: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya adhyāśayataḥ śṛṇuyādudgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayetparyavāpnuyātpravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśet svādhyāyet,
S06bsu049_u:86_49: arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāt, manasānvavekṣeta, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:86_50: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayet sthāpayet saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:86_51: mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
S06bsu049_u:86_52: tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:86_53: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayet,
S06bsu049_u:86_54: ayameva tataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:86_55: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika ayaṃ jambūdvīpaḥ saptaratnamayānāṃ tathāgatadhātugarbhāṇāṃ stūpānāṃ paripūrṇaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:86_57: teṣāmekaikaḥ sattva ekaikaṃ saptaratnamayaṃ tathāgatadhātugarbhaṃ stūpaṃ kārayet,
S06bsu049_u:86_60: bahuvidhābhiś ca divyābhi, pūjābhiḥ, satkuryāt gurukuryāt mānayet pūjayet arcayet apacāyet,
S06bsu049_u:86_61: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu te sarvasattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ? śakra āha - bahu bhagavana,
S06bsu049_u:86_62: bahu sugata / bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:86_63: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya adhyāśayataḥ śṛṇuyādudgṛhṇīyāddhārayet vācayet paryavāpnuyāt pravartayet deśayet upadiśet uddiśet svādhyāyet,
S06bsu049_u:86_65: arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāt, manasānvavekṣeta, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta,

S06bsu049_u:86_123: ekaikaś ca sattvastān sarvān stūpān kārayet,
