S06bsu049_u:87_1: evametatsugata / prajñāpāramitāṃ hi bhagavan satkurvatā gurukurvatā mānayatā pūjayatā arcayatā apacāyatā kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto buddhajñānaparijñāteṣu sarvalokadhātuṣu atyantatayā satkṛtā gurukṛtā mānitāḥ pūjitā arcitā apacāyitāś ca bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:87_2: tiṣṭhantu khalu punarbhagavan anena paryāyeṇa trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:87_3: ye 'pi te bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:87_4: tatra ekaikaḥ sattvaḥ ekaikaṃ saptaratnamayaṃ tathāgatadhātugarbhaṃ stūpaṃ kārayet,
S06bsu049_u:87_5: ekaikaś ca sattvastān sarvān stūpān kārayet,
S06bsu049_u:87_6: kārayitvā ca tān pratiṣṭhāpya kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā sarvavādyaiḥ sarvagītaiḥ sarvanṛtyaiḥ sarvatūryatālāvacarairdivyaiḥ sarvapuṣpaiḥ sarvadhūpaiḥ sarvagandhaiḥ sarvamālyaiḥ sarvavilepanaiḥ sarvacūrṇaiḥ sarvavastrairdivyābhiḥ sarvacchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiḥ samantācca sarvadīpamālābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:87_7: bahuvidhābhiś ca divyamānuṣikībhiḥ sarvapūjābhiḥ satkuryādgurukuryānmānayet pūjayedarcayedapacāyet,
S06bsu049_u:87_8: ayameva tebhyaḥ sa bhagavan sarvasattvebhya kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:87_9: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya adhyāśayataḥ śṛṇuyādudgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt pravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśet svādhyāyet,
S06bsu049_u:87_11: arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāt, manasānvavekṣeta, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:87_12: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayetsthāpayetsaddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:87_13: mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca anugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
S06bsu049_u:87_15: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayet /
S06bsu049_u:87_16: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - evametatkauśika,
S06bsu049_u:87_17: evam etat / bahutaraṃ sa kauśika kulaputra vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:87_18: aprameyaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:87_19: asaṃkhyeyaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:87_20: acintyaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:87_21: atulyaṃ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:87_22: aparimāṇaṃ sa kauśika [Vaidya_36] kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:87_23: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi kauśika tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:87_25: tasmāttarhi kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya adhyāśayataḥ śṛṇuyādudgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayetparyavāpnuyātpravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśet,
S06bsu049_u:87_27: arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāt, manasānvavekṣeta, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:87_28: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayetsthāpayetsaddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:87_29: mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca anugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
S06bsu049_u:87_30: tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:87_32: asya kauśika puṇyābhisaṃskārasya asau pūrvakastathāgatadhātugarbhaḥ saptaratnamayaḥ stūpasaṃskārajapuṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:87_33: sahasratamīmapi, śatasahasratamīmapi, koṭītamīmapi, koṭīśatatamīmapi, koṭīsahasratamīmapi, koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi, koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:87_34: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:88_0: atha khalu yāni tāni catvāriṃśaddevaputrasahasrāṇi śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa sārdhaṃ saṃnipatitāni tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitānyabhūvan,
S06bsu049_u:88_1: tāni śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocan - udgṛhṇīṣva mārṣa prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:88_11: atha khalu bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - udgṛhāṇa tvaṃ kauśika prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:88_20: tatkasya heto? yadā hi kauśika asurāṇāmevaṃrūpāḥ samudācārā utpatsyante - devāṃstrāyastriṃśān yodhayiṣyāma iti,
S06bsu049_u:88_22: tadā tvaṃ kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhareḥ,
S06bsu049_u:88_23: svādhyāyeḥ, evaṃ teṣāmasurāṇāṃ te samudācārāḥ punarevāntardhāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:89_0: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāvidyeyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:89_8: evam etat / mahāvidyeyaṃ kauśika yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:89_15: tatkasya hetoḥ?imāṃ hi kauśika vidyāmāgamya paurvakāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:89_16: yaduta prajñāpāramitām / ye 'pi te kauśika bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:89_18: te 'pi kauśika imāmeva vidyāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:89_19: ye 'pi kecitkauśika etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanto 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante,
S06bsu049_u:89_20: te 'pi kauśika imāmeva vidyāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante yaduta prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:89_21: aham api kauśika imāmeva vidyāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho yaduta prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:89_22: imāmeva kauśika vidyāmāgamya daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathā loke prabhāvyante,
S06bsu049_u:89_31: yadāpi kauśika tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loke notpadyante,
S06bsu049_u:89_32: tadāpi kauśika bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ pūrvaśrutena prajñāpāramitāniṣyandena ye upāyakauśalyasamanvāgatā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:89_33: te 'pi kauśika sattvānāmanukampakāḥ anukampāmupādāya imaṃ lokamāgamya daśa kuśalān karmapathān loke prabhāvayanti,
S06bsu049_u:89_38: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika candramaṇḍalamāgamya sarvā oṣadhīḥ tārā yathābalaṃ yathāsthāmamavabhāsayanti,
S06bsu049_u:89_40: evameva kauśika tathāgatasyārhataṃ samyaksaṃbuddhasya atyayena saddharmasyāntardhāne tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanutpādāt yā kāciddharmacaryā samacaryā asamacaryā kuśalacaryā loke prajñāyate prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:90_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇaṃtāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ manasi kurvatāṃ samanvāharatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā tannidānaṃ bahavo dṛṣṭadhārmikā guṇāḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:90_1: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - katamaiḥ punarbhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmikairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca bhaviṣyanti ? bhagavānāha - na te kauśika kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:90_2: na viṣeṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na śastreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:90_3: nāgninā kālaṃ kariṣyati, nodakena kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na daṇḍena kālaṃ kariṣyanti, na paripakrameṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:90_4: utpannotpannāścaiṣāmupadravā rājato vā rājaputrato vā rājamantrito vā rājamahāmātrato vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharatāṃ vā svādhyāyatāṃ vā punarevāntardhāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:90_5: teṣāṃ ca enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ punaḥ punaḥ samanvāharatāṃ vā svādhyāyatāṃ vā ye tatropasaṃkrāmeyuravatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo rājāno vā rājaputrā vā rājamantriṇo vā rājamahāmātrā vā,
S06bsu049_u:90_6: na te 'vatāraṃ lapsyante yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:90_7: upasaṃkrāntānāṃ ca teṣāṃ rājñāṃ vā rājaputrāṇāṃ vā rājamantriṇāṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:90_11: tatkasya hetoḥ? iyaṃ hi kauśika prajñāpāramitā sarvasattvānāmantike maitropasaṃhāreṇa maitracittatayā karuṇopasaṃhāreṇa karuṇacittatayā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu049_u:90_13: teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ vā manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:90_14: te 'pi teṣāṃ kauśika avatāraṃ na lapsyante sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākam /
S06bsu049_u:91_0: atha khalvanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmupālambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ śataṃ tasyāṃ velāyāṃ yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:91_1: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro dūrata eva āgacchatastānanyatīrthyān parivrājakān dṛṣṭvā teṣāṃ cittāni vyavalokya evaṃ cintayāmāsa - ime khalu anyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā upālambhābhiprāyā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmanti sma /
S06bsu049_u:91_2: yannvahaṃ yāvanmātro mayāṃ bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśa udgṛhītaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:91_6: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro yāvanmātro bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśaḥ udgṛhītaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:91_8: svādhyāyati sma, pravartayati sma / atha te 'nyatīrthāḥ parivrājakā dūrāddūrataraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva dvāreṇa tenaiva mārgeṇa punareva niṣkrāntāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:91_9: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhūt [Vaidya_39] - kimatra kāraṇaṃ yena ime 'nyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā dūrāddūrataraṃ bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tenaiva dvāreṇa tenaiva mārgeṇa punareva niṣkrāntāḥ? atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - śakreṇa śāriputra devānāmindreṇa teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmupālambhābhiprāyāṇāṃ cittāni vyavalokya iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā smṛtyā samanvāhṛtā svādhyāyitā pravartitā,
S06bsu049_u:91_10: teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāṃ vigrahītukāmānāṃ vivaditukāmānāṃ virodhayitukāmānāṃ nivartanārtham,
S06bsu049_u:91_11: yathā asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā ete 'nyatīrthyāḥ parivrājakā nopasaṃkrāmeyuriti,
S06bsu049_u:91_14: tatkasya hetoḥ? nāhaṃ śāriputra teṣāmanyatīrthyānāṃ parivrājakānāmekasyāpi śuklaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:91_15: sarve te śāriputra upālambhābhiprāyāḥ pratihatacittā upasaṃkramitukāmā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:92_0: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasya etadabhūt - imāstathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya catasraḥ parṣadaḥ saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣaṇṇāstathāgatasya saṃmukhībhūtāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:92_1: ime ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ saṃmukhībhūtāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:92_4: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃścaturaṅgabalakāyamabhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:92_5: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyāṃścaturaṅgabalakāyamabhinirmāya yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:92_7: nāyaṃ rājño bimbisārasya caturaṅgasya balakāyasya vyūhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:92_12: samanubaddho dīrgharātraṃ māraḥ pāpīyān bhagavato 'vatāraprekṣī avatāragaveṣī,
S06bsu049_u:92_14: yannvahamimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāhareyaṃ svādhyāyeyaṃ pravartayeyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:92_15: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma svādhyāyati sma pravartayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:92_16: yathā yathā ca śakro devānāmindra imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ smṛtyā samanvāharati sma svādhyāyati sma pravartayati sma,
S06bsu049_u:92_17: tathā tathā māraḥ pāpīyāṃstenaiva mārgeṇa punareva pratyudāvṛttaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:93_0: atha khalu trāyastriṃśatkāyikā devaputrā divyāni māndārapuṣpāṇyabhinirmāya vihāyasā antarīkṣagatā yena bhagavāṃstenābhyavakiranti sma,
S06bsu049_u:93_1: yena bhagavāṃstena tāni divyāni māndāravapuṣpāṇyabhiprakiranti sma,
S06bsu049_u:93_2: evaṃ codānamudānayanti sma - cirasya bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ manuṣyāṇāmupāvṛtteti /
S06bsu049_u:93_3: punareva ca divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenābhyavakiranti sma,
S06bsu049_u:93_4: abhiprakiranti sma / evaṃ cāvocan - ye kecidbhagavan sattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyante bhāvayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:93_6: na teṣāṃ māro vā mārakāyikā vā devatā avatāraṃ lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:93_7: na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena [Vaidya_40] samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:93_9: śrutva codgrahīṣyanti, dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:93_13: kaḥ punarvādo ye enāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:93_14: tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, tathāgataparyupāsitāste bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:93_15: tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi sarvajñatā gaveṣitavyā yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:93_16: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan yāni kānicidratnāni mahāratnāni,
S06bsu049_u:93_19: evameva bhagavan sarvajñatāmahāratnaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ prajñāpāramitāmahāsamudrādgaveṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:93_21: evam etat / atonirjātaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatāmahāratnaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitāmahāsamudrāt /
S06bsu049_u:94_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - na bhagavan dānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06bsu049_u:94_2: na śīlapāramitāyāḥ, na kṣāntipāramitāyāḥ, na vīryapāramitāyāḥ / na bhagavan dhyānapāramitāyā varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06bsu049_u:94_4: api tu prajñāpāramitāyā evaikasyā bhagavān varṇaṃ bhāṣate,
S06bsu049_u:94_6: bhagavānāha evametadānanda, evam etat / prajñāpāramitāyā evāhamānanda varṇaṃ bhāṣe nāmadheyaṃ ca parikīrtayāmi,
S06bsu049_u:94_7: nānyāsāṃ pāramitānām / tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā hi ānanda pūrvaṃgamā pañcānāṃ pāramitānām /
S06bsu049_u:94_8: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ dānaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ dānapāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate? āyuṣmānānanda āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:94_9: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase ānanda apariṇāmitaṃ śīlamapariṇāmitā kṣāntirapariṇāmitaṃ vīryamapariṇāmitaṃ dhyānam? tatkiṃ manyase ānanda apariṇāmitā prajñā sarvajñatāyāṃ prajñāpāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate? ānanda āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:94_10: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase tvamānanda acintyā sā prajñā yā kuśalamūlāni sarvajñatāpariṇāmena pariṇāmayati? ānanda āha - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:94_11: evametatsugata / acintyā sā bhagavan prajñā, paramācintyā sā bhagavan prajñā,
S06bsu049_u:94_12: yā kuśalamūlāni sarvajñatāpariṇāmena pariṇāmayati bhagavānāha - tasmāttarhi ānanda paramatvātsā prajñā pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate,
S06bsu049_u:94_13: yayā sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmitāni kuśalamūlāni pāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhante /
S06bsu049_u:94_14: tasmāttarhi ānanda sarvajñatāpariṇāmitakuśalamūlatvātprajñāpāramitā pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyikā /
S06bsu049_u:94_15: anena yogena antargatāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmeva ānanda ṣaṭpāramitāparipūrṇādhivacanametadyaduta prajñāpāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:94_16: tasmāttarhi ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parikīrtitāyāṃ sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parikīrtitā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:94_17: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda mahāpṛthivyāṃ bījāni prakīrṇāni sāmagrīṃ labhamānāni virohanti /
S06bsu049_u:94_20: evameva ānanda prajñāpāramitāsaṃgṛhītāḥ pañca pāramitāḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pratiṣṭhante /
S06bsu049_u:94_23: tasmāttarhi ānanda prajñāpāramitaiva pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyakā /
S06bsu049_u:95_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - na tāvadime bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ sarve guṇāḥ parikīrtitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:95_1: yān guṇān sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parigṛhṇīte prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvā upadiśya uddiśya svādhyāyya /
S06bsu049_u:95_2: atha hi mayā yo bhagavato 'ntikādasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pradeśa udgṛhītaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:95_3: sa pravartitaḥ / bhagavānāha - sādhu sādhu kauśika /
S06bsu049_u:95_4: na khalu punaḥ kauśika kevalaṃ yaḥ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:95_6: yo 'pi kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati sthāpayiṣyati saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:95_7: mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
S06bsu049_u:95_8: tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati apacāyiṣyati puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:95_9: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:95_10: tasyāpyahaṃ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā enān dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān vadāmi /
S06bsu049_u:96_0: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - aham api bhagavaṃstasyāpi kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:96_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā dhārayiṣyati sthāpayiṣyati saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:96_2: mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
S06bsu049_u:96_3: tāṃ caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati apacāyiṣyati puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:96_4: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:96_5: kaḥ punarvādo yaḥ enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhiṣyati udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati satkariṣyati gurukariṣyati mānayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati arcayiṣyati apacāyiṣyati puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:96_6: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:97_1: tasya khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svādhyāyato bahūni devaputraśatānyupasaṃkramiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:97_3: te ca devaputrā dharmaṃ śṛṇvantastasya dharmabhāṇakasya pratibhānamupasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:97_4: yadāpi sa dharmabhāṇako na jalpitukāmo bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:97_5: tadāpi tasya te devaputrāstenaiva dharmagauraveṇa pratibhānamupasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:97_6: yathā tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bhāṣitumeva chando bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:97_7: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:97_8: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:98_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇasya catasṝṇāṃ parṣadāmagrato nāvalīnacittatā bhaviṣyati - mā khalu māṃ kaścitparyanuyuñjīta upālambhābhiprāya iti /
S06bsu049_u:98_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasya prajñāpāramitā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:98_2: sa upālambhān api prajñāpāramitāvihārī na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:98_6: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā anena paryāyeṇa na kaścitparyanuyogo bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:98_7: sa ca notrasiṣyati, na saṃtrasiṣyati, na saṃtrāsamāpatsyate / imān api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:98_8: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:99_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā priyo bhaviṣyati mātāpitṝṇāṃ mitrāmātyajñātisālohitaśramaṇabrāhmaṇānāṃ hitānāṃ ca,
S06bsu049_u:99_1: pratibalaś ca bhaviṣyati, śaktaś ca bhaviṣyati utpannotpannānāṃ parapravādināṃ sahadharmeṇa nigrahāya,
S06bsu049_u:99_3: imān api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:99_4: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:100_0: yatra khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṃgamaṃ sthāpayiṣyati pūjayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:100_1: tatra kauśika ye keciccāturmahārājakāyikeṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_3: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:100_4: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryāvāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya [Vaidya_43] svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:100_5: evaṃ ye kecitkauśika trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_7: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:100_8: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśya uddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:100_9: ye 'pi kecitkauśika yāmeṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_11: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:100_12: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:100_13: ye 'pi kecitkauśika tuṣiteṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_15: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:100_16: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:100_17: ye 'pi kecitkauśika nirmāṇaratiṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_19: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:100_20: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:100_21: ye 'pi kecitkauśika paranirmitavaśavartiṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_23: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:100_24: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:100_25: evaṃ ye 'pi kecitkauśika rūpāvacareṣu deveṣu devaputrā yāvanto brahmaloke brahmakāyikā devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_27: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyanti uddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:100_28: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:100_29: mā te 'tra kauśika evaṃ bhūdyathā brahmakāyikā eveti /
S06bsu049_u:100_30: yathā brahmakāyikāḥ, evaṃ ye 'pi kecitkauśika brahmapurohiteṣu deveṣu [Vaidya_44] devaputrā.
S06bsu049_u:100_31: .........peyālam / evaṃ ye 'pi kecitkauśika mahābrahmāsu parīttābheṣvapramāṇābheṣvābhāsvareṣu parīttasubheṣvapramāṇaśubheṣu śubhakṛtsneṣvanabhrakeṣu puṇyaprasaveṣu bṛhatphaleṣvasaṃjñisattveṣvabṛheṣvatapeṣu sudṛśeṣu sudarśaneṣu /
S06bsu049_u:100_32: ye 'pi kecitkauśika akaniṣṭheṣu deveṣu devaputrā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_34: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:100_35: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:100_36: evaṃ ca kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā cittamutpādayitavyam - ye keciddaśasu dikṣu aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyā amanuṣyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_37: te itaḥ pustakātprajñāpāramitāṃ paśyantu vandantāṃ namaskurvantu udgṛhṇantu dhārayantu paryavāpnuvantu pravartayantu deśayantu upadiśantu uddiśantu svādhyāyantu /
S06bsu049_u:100_38: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvā upadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva svabhavanāni gacchantu - teṣāmidaṃ dharmadānameva dattaṃ bhavatviti /
S06bsu049_u:100_39: mā te 'tra kauśika evaṃ bhūt - ye asminneva cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_40: te eva kevalaṃ tatrāgantavyaṃ maṃsyanta iti /
S06bsu049_u:100_42: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:100_44: te 'pi tatrāgatya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakagatāṃ prekṣiṣyante vandiṣyante namaskariṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:100_45: prekṣya vanditvā namaskṛtyodgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya punareva prakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:100_46: tasya khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā gṛhaṃ vā layanaṃ vā prāsādo vā surakṣito bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:100_47: na ca tasya kaścidviheṭhako bhaviṣyati sthāpayitvā pūrvakarmavipākena /
S06bsu049_u:100_48: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigrahīṣyati - yatra hi nāma evaṃ mahaujaskā devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā āgantavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:101_0: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ punarbhagavan sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā evaṃ jānīyāt - iha devā vā nāgā vā yakṣā vā gandharvā vā asurā vā garuḍā vā kinnarā vā mahoragā va manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā āgacchanti imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotuṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ namaskartumudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayituṃ deśayitumupadeṣṭumuddeṣṭuṃ svādhyātumiti? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - sacetkauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatra udāramavabhāsaṃ saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:101_1: niṣṭhā tena kulaputreṇa vā [Vaidya_45] kuladuhitrā vā tatra gantavyā - iha devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā gandharvo vā asuro vā garuḍo vā kinnaro vā mahorago vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā āgata iti,
S06bsu049_u:101_2: upasaṃkrānta iti / punaraparaṃ sacetkauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatra amānuṣaṃ gandhaṃ ghrāsyatyanāghrātapūrvam,
S06bsu049_u:101_3: ghrātvā ca tadgandhaṃ niṣṭhā tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tatra gantavyā - iha devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā gandharvo vā asuro vā garuḍo vā kinnaro vā mahorago vā manuṣyo vā amanuṣyo vā āgata iti,
S06bsu049_u:102_0: punaraparaṃ sacetkauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatra amānuṣaṃ gandhaṃ ghrāsyati anāghrātapūrvam,
S06bsu049_u:102_1: ghrātvā ca tadgandhaṃ niṣṭhā tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā tatra gantavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:102_2: - iha devo vā nāgo vā yakṣo vā gandharvo vā asuro vā garuḍo va kinnaro vā mahorago vā manuṣyo vā[amanuṣyo vā]āgata iti,
S06bsu049_u:102_3: upasaṃkrānta iti / punaraparaṃ sacetkauśika kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā caukṣasamudācāro bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:102_4: śucisamudācāro bhaviṣyati, tasya tayā caukṣasamudācāratayā śucisamudācāratayā te devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā āgantavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:102_5: ye ca tatra devanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā āgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:102_6: te tasya tayā caukṣasamudācāratayā śucisamudācāratayā āttamanaskāḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasyajātā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:102_7: yāś ca tatra alpaujaskā alpaujaskā devatā adhyuṣitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:102_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? teṣāmeva hi mahaujaskānāṃ mahaujaskānāṃ devānāṃ nāgāna yakṣāṇāṃ gandharvāṇāmasurāṇāṃ garuḍānāṃ kinnarāṇāṃ mahoragāṇāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ mamanuṣyāṇāṃ vā śriyaṃ ca tejaś ca gauravaṃ ca asahamānā eva tā alpaujaskā alpaujaskā devatā tato 'pakramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:102_10: yathā yathā khalu punaḥ kauśika te mahaujaskā mahaujaskā devā nāgā yakṣā gandharvā asurā garuḍāḥ kinnarā mahoragā manuṣyā amanuṣyā vā abhīkṣṇamupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:102_11: tathā tathā sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā prasādabahulo bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:102_12: imam api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikaṃ guṇaṃ parigrahīṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:102_13: tena khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tasya dharmanetrīsthānasya parisāmantake 'śuciracaukṣasamudācāro na pracārayitavyaḥ tasyāṃ gurugauravatāparipūrimupādāya /
S06bsu049_u:103_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na kāyaklamatho na cittaklamatha utpatsyate /
S06bsu049_u:103_2: sukhaṃ ca prakramiṣyati, suptaś ca san na pāpakān svapnān drakṣati,
S06bsu049_u:103_4: stūpāneva drakṣyati, bodhisattvāneva drakṣyati, tathāgataśrāvakāneva drakṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:103_7: bodhivṛkṣāneva drakṣyati, teṣu ca tathāgatānevārhataḥ [Vaidya_46] samyaksaṃbuddhānabhisaṃbudhyamānān drakṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:103_9: bahūṃś ca bodhisattvāneva drakṣyati imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ saṃgāyamānān prajñāpāramitāsaṃgītiratān - evaṃ sarvajñatā parigrahītavyā,
S06bsu049_u:103_12: udāraṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmabhisaṃbodhiśabdaṃ śroṣyati - amuṣyāṃ diśi amuṣmin digbhāge amuṣmin lokadhātau amuko 'sau nāmnā tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakāṇāṃ śatairbahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakasahasrair bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakaśatasahasrair bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakakoṭībhir bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakakoṭīśatair bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakakoṭīsahasraiḥ bahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakakoṭīśatasahasrairbahubhirbodhisattvaśrāvakakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto dharmaṃ deśayatīti /
S06bsu049_u:103_13: yaś ca khalu punaḥ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imānevaṃrūpān svapnān drakṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:103_14: sa sukhameva svapsyati, sukhaṃ ca pratibhotsyate, ojaḥprakṣiptaṃ ca kāyaṃ sukhaṃ ca pratisaṃvedayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:103_18: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika bhikṣoryogācārasya samādhervyutthitasya manasikārapariṣyanditena cittena na balavatyāhāre gṛddhirbhavati,
S06bsu049_u:103_20: evameva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā na balavatyāhāre gṛddhirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:103_22: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetatkauśika bhavati - yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitābhāvanāyogānuyuktatvāttasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā tathā hyasya amanuṣyāḥ kāye oja upasaṃhartavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:103_23: imān api sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā dṛṣṭadhārmikān guṇān parigṛhṇāti /
S06bsu049_u:104_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā pūjāpūrvaṃgamaṃ sthāpayet pūjayennodgṛhṇīyānna dhārayenna vācayenna paryavāpnuyāt na pravartayenna deśayennopadiśennoddiśenna svādhyāyet,
S06bsu049_u:104_1: ayameva tataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:104_2: yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya adhyāśayataḥ śṛṇuyādudgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayetparyavāpnuyātpravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśetsvādhyāyet,
S06bsu049_u:104_4: arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāt, manasānvavekṣeta, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:104_5: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayetsthāpayetsaddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:104_6: mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
S06bsu049_u:104_8: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayet,
S06bsu049_u:104_9: ayameva tataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:104_10: tasmāttarhi kauśika imān dṛṣṭadhārmikān viśiṣṭān guṇān parigṛhītukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā iyameva prajñāpāramitā abhiśraddhātavyā [Vaidya_47] avakalpayitavyā adhibhoktavyā /
S06bsu049_u:104_11: prasannacittena bodhāya cittamutpādya satkṛtya adhyāśayena śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā,
S06bsu049_u:104_13: arthato vivaritavyā, manasānvavekṣitavyā, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta /
S06bsu049_u:104_14: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā sthāpayitavyā pūjayitavyā saddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:104_15: mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cānugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
S06bsu049_u:104_16: arthikānāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca saṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:104_17: mama ca pareṣāṃ ca kalyāṇasattvānāṃ buddhanetrīmahācakṣuravaikalyatā bhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:104_18: sadā ca satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:104_19: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ pūjayitavyeti /
S06bsu049_u:109_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindramāmantrayate sma - sacetkauśika ayaṃ te jambūdvīpaḥ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīyeta,
S06bsu049_u:109_2: tata ekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo 'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ katamaṃ tvaṃ kauśika bhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāḥ? śakra āha - sacenme bhagavan ayaṃ jambūdvīpaḥ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ dīyeta,
S06bsu049_u:109_4: tata ekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo 'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām /
S06bsu049_u:109_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? uktaṃ hyetadbhagavatā - dharmakāyā buddhā bhagavantaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:109_8: mā khalu punarimaṃ bhikṣavaḥ satkāyaṃ kāyaṃ manyadhvam /
S06bsu049_u:109_10: eṣa ca tathāgatakāyo bhūtakoṭiprabhāvito draṣṭavyo yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:109_13: api tu khalu punarbhagavan itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto nirjātāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante /
S06bsu049_u:109_14: tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayaiva prajñāpāramitayā pūjitayā teṣām api tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇā pūjā kṛtā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:109_16: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sudharmāyāṃ devasabhāyāmahaṃ yasmin samaye divye svake āsane niṣaṇṇo bhavāmi,
S06bsu049_u:109_19: atha tasmin samaye yanmamāsanaṃ tatra devaputrā mama gauraveṇa tadāsanaṃ namaskṛtya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya punareva prakrāmanti /
S06bsu049_u:109_20: tatkasya hetoḥ? iha hi kila āsane niṣadya śakro devānāmindro devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatīti /
S06bsu049_u:109_24: na tu tāni pratyayabhūtāni, na kāraṇabhūtāni jñānasyotpādāya /
S06bsu049_u:109_25: evameva bhagavan sarvajñajñānahetukā tathāgataśarīreṣu pūjā kṛtā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:109_26: tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām /
S06bsu049_u:109_29: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvātpūjāṃ labhante /
S06bsu049_u:109_30: tiṣṭhatu khalu punarbhagavan ayaṃ jambūdvīpastathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:109_33: tiṣṭhatu bhagavan dvisāhasro madhyamo lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:109_35: eko bhāgaḥ kṛtvā sthāpyeta, iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dvitīyo bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta /
S06bsu049_u:109_36: anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorekatareṇa bhāgena pravāryamāṇo 'nayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoryaste bhāgo 'bhipretastamekaṃ bhāgaṃ gṛhāṇeti,
S06bsu049_u:109_40: api tu khalu punarbhagavaṃstāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitāni pūjāṃ labhante /
S06bsu049_u:109_43: tasmāttarhi bhagavan anayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorimāmevāhaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāṃ parigṛhṇīyām /
S06bsu049_u:109_44: na khalu punar me bhagavaṃsteṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam /
S06bsu049_u:109_46: api tu khalu punarbhagavan itaḥ prajñāpāramitāto nirjātāni tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante yaduta prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:109_47: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan anarghaṃ maṇiratnamebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ syāt /
S06bsu049_u:109_49: tatra tatra manuṣyā vā amanuṣyā vā avatāraṃ na labheran /
S06bsu049_u:109_50: yatra yatra vā amanuṣyagṛhītaḥ kaścidbhavet puruṣo vā strī vā,
S06bsu049_u:109_51: tatra tatra tasmin maṇiratne praveśitamātre so 'manuṣyastato 'pakrāmet /
S06bsu049_u:109_52: vātenāpi bādhyamānasya dhamyamāne śarīre tanmaṇiratnaṃ sthāpyeta /
S06bsu049_u:109_53: tasya taṃ vātaṃ nigṛhṇīyāt, na vivardhayet, upaśamayet / pittenāpi dahyamāne śarīre sthāpyeta /
S06bsu049_u:109_55: na vivardhayet, upaśamayet / śleṣmaṇāpi parigṛddhe sarvato bādhyamāne śarīre sthāpyeta,
S06bsu049_u:109_57: na vivardhayet, upaśamayet / sāṃnipātikenāpi vyādhinā duḥkhitasya śarīre sthāpyeta,
S06bsu049_u:109_58: tasya tam api sāṃnipātikaṃ vyādhiṃ nigṛhṇīyāt,
S06bsu049_u:109_59: na vivardhayet, upaśamayet / andhakāratamisrāyāṃ ca rātrāvapyavabhāsaṃ kuryāt /
S06bsu049_u:109_60: uṣṇe cāpi vartamāne yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe sthāpyeta,
S06bsu049_u:109_62: śīte cāpi vartamāne yasmin pṛthivīpradeśe sthāpyeta,
S06bsu049_u:109_67: sthāpitaṃ vā bhavet, te 'pyāśīviṣāste ca kṣudrajantavastato 'pakrāmeyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:109_68: sacedbhagavan strī vā puruṣo vā āśīviṣeṇa daṣṭo bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:109_69: tasya tanmaṇiratnaṃ daśyeta, tasya sahadaṃśanenaiva maṇiratnasya tadviṣaṃ pratihanyeta vigacchet /
S06bsu049_u:109_70: ebhiścānyaiś ca bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:109_71: yeṣām api keṣāṃcidbhagavan akṣiṣvarbudaṃ vā timiraṃ vā akṣirogo vā paṭalaṃ vā bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:109_73: teṣāṃ sthāpitamātreṇaiva te 'kṣidoṣā nirghātaṃ praśamaṃ gaccheyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:109_74: etaiś ca anyaiś ca bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:109_75: yatra codake sthāpyeta, tadapyudakamekavarṇaṃ kuryātsvakena varṇena /
S06bsu049_u:109_77: tadudakaṃ pāṇḍarīkuryāt / evaṃ sacennīlena pītena lohitena māñjiṣṭhena eteṣāmanyeṣāṃ vā nānāprakārāṇāṃ vastrāṇāmanyatamena vastreṇa tanmaṇiratnaṃ veṣṭayitvā vā baddhvā vā udake prakṣipyeta,
S06bsu049_u:109_78: tena tena vastrarāgeṇa tattatsvabhāvavarṇaṃ tadudakaṃ kuryāt /
S06bsu049_u:109_80: ebhir api bhagavan evaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgataṃ tanmaṇiratnaṃ bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:110_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānandaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kiṃ punaḥ kauśika devaloka [Vaidya_50] eva tāni maṇiratnāni santi,
S06bsu049_u:110_1: uta jāmbūdvīpakānām api manuṣyāṇāṃ tāni maṇiratnāni santi? śakra āha - deveṣvāryānanda tāni maṇiratnāni santi /
S06bsu049_u:110_2: api tu khalu punarjāmbudvīpakānām api manuṣyāṇāṃ maṇiratnāni santi /
S06bsu049_u:110_3: tāni tu gurukāṇi alpāni parīttāni guṇavikalāni,
S06bsu049_u:110_5: tatteṣāṃ divyānāṃ maṇiratnānāṃ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopayānti,
S06bsu049_u:110_6: sahasratamīmapi, śatasahasratamīmapi, koṭītamīmapi, koṭīśatatamīmapi, koṭīsahasratamīmapi, koṭīśatasahasratamīmapi, koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopayānti,
S06bsu049_u:110_7: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamante nopayānti /
S06bsu049_u:110_8: yāni khalu punardeveṣu, tāni laghūni sarvākāraguṇaparipūrṇāni /
S06bsu049_u:110_9: yatra ca karaṇḍake tanmaṇiratnaṃ prakṣiptaṃ bhavati utkṣiptaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:110_10: tata uddhṛte 'pi tasmin maṇiratne karaṇḍakāt spṛhaṇīya eva sa karaṇḍako bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:110_12: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyā ete guṇāḥ sarvajñajñānasya ca /
S06bsu049_u:110_13: yena parinirvṛtasyāpi tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi pūjāṃ labhante - sarvajñajñānasyemāni tathāgataśarīrāṇi bhājanabhūtānyabhūvanniti /
S06bsu049_u:110_14: yathā ca bhagavan sarvalokadhātuṣu buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmadeśanā prajñāpāramitānirjātatvātpūjyā,
S06bsu049_u:110_16: yathā ca bhagavan rājapuruṣo rājānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:110_17: evaṃ sa dharmabhāṇako dharmakāyānubhāvānmahato janakāyasya akutobhayaḥ pūjyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:110_18: yathā ca dharmadeśanā dharmabhāṇakāś ca pūjāṃ labhante,
S06bsu049_u:110_20: tasmāttarhi bhagavan tiṣṭhatu trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātustathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇaścūlikābaddhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:110_22: te 'pi sarve tathāgataśarīrāṇāṃ paripūrṇāścūlikābaddhā eko bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta,
S06bsu049_u:110_23: iyaṃ ca prajñāpāramitā likhitvā dvitīyo bhāgaḥ sthāpyeta /
S06bsu049_u:110_24: tatra cenmāṃ bhagavan kaścideva pravārayedanyatareṇa bhāgena,
S06bsu049_u:110_25: pravāryamāṇo 'nayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayoḥ - yaste bhāgo 'bhipretaḥ tamekaṃ bhāgaṃ parigṛhṇīṣveti,
S06bsu049_u:110_26: tatra imāmevāhaṃ bhagavaṃstayordvayorbhāgayoḥ sthāpitayorbhāgaṃ gṛhṇīyāṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:110_27: na khalu punarbhagavan mama teṣu tathāgataśarīreṣvagauravam /
S06bsu049_u:110_29: api tu khalu punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitāparibhāvitā sarvajñatā,
S06bsu049_u:110_31: tasmāttarhi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pūjitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pūjā kṛtā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:111_0: punaraparaṃ bhagavan ye 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavanta etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:111_1: tān dharmatayā draṣṭukāmena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
S06bsu049_u:112_1: evam etat / ye 'pi te kauśika abhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:112_2: te 'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:112_3: [Vaidya_51] ye 'pi te kauśika bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:112_4: te 'pi kauśika imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
S06bsu049_u:112_5: ye 'pi te kauśika etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:112_6: te 'pi kauśika buddhā bhagavantaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:112_7: aham api kauśika etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ imāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:113_0: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:113_1: sarvasattvānāṃ hi bhagavaṃstathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaścittacaritāni samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati /
S06bsu049_u:113_3: evam etat / tathā hi kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:113_4: tena sarvasattvānāṃ cittacaritāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ samyak prajānāti saṃpaśyati /
S06bsu049_u:114_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmeva bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati nānyāsu pāramitāsu? bhagavānāha - sarvāsu kauśika ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati /
S06bsu049_u:114_1: api tu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva atra pūrvaṃgamā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānaṃ vā dadataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:114_2: śīlaṃ vā rakṣataḥ, kṣāntyā vā saṃpādayamānasya, vīryaṃ vā ārabhamāṇasya, dhyānaṃ vā samāpadyamānasya, dharmān vā vipaśyataḥ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitaivātra pūrvaṃgamā /
S06bsu049_u:114_3: na ca kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ viśeṣaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:114_5: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jambudvīpe nānāvṛkṣā nānāvarṇā nānāsaṃsthānā nānāpatrā nānāpuṣpā nānāphalā nānārohapariṇāhasaṃpannāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:114_6: na ca teṣāṃ vṛkṣāṇāṃ chāyāyā viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā prajñāyate,
S06bsu049_u:114_7: api tu chāyā chāyetyevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gacchati,
S06bsu049_u:114_8: evameva kauśika āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāmupāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmitānāṃ sarvajñatāpariṇāmitānāṃ na viśeṣaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:114_10: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mahāguṇasamanvāgateyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:119_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya adhyāśayataḥ śṛṇuyādudgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt pravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśetsvādhyāyet,
S06bsu049_u:119_2: arthamasyā vivṛṇuyāt, manasānvavekṣeta, yathādhikayā ca prajñayā atra parimīmāṃsāmāpadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:119_3: antaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā dhārayetsthāpayetsaddharmacirasthitihetoḥ - mā buddhanetrīsamucchedo bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:119_4: mā saddharmāntardhānam / bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ ca anugrahopasaṃhāraḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati netryavaikalyeneti /
S06bsu049_u:119_5: evamimaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā evaṃmahārthikā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:119_13: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ yo vā anyaḥ saṃpūjya parasmai cārthikāya chandikāya kulaputrāya kuladuhitre vā yācamānāya dadyādupanāmayenniryātayetparityajet,
S06bsu049_u:119_15: katarastayorbhagavan kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet - yo vā parityāgabuddhiryo vā na parityāgabuddhiḥ? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - tena hi kauśika tvāmevātra pratiprakṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:119_16: yathā te kṣamate vyākuryāḥ / tatkiṃ manyase kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatasya parinirvṛtasya śarīraṃ satkṛtya paricareddhārayet satkuryādgurukuryānmānayet pūjayedarcayedapacāyet svayameva /
S06bsu049_u:119_17: yo vā anyaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgataśarīraṃ svayaṃ ca satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet,
S06bsu049_u:119_19: dadyāt saṃvibhajet vaistārikī pūjā bhaviṣyatīti sattvānāṃ cānukampāmupādāya /
S06bsu049_u:119_20: katarastayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet? kiṃ yaḥ svayaṃ ca pūjayet parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeddadyāt saṃvibhajet,
S06bsu049_u:119_21: kiṃ vā yaḥ svayameva pratyātmaṃ pūjayet? śakra āha - yo bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svayaṃ ca tathāgataśarīraṃ satkuryādgurukuryānmānayetpūjayedarcayedapacāyet,
S06bsu049_u:119_22: parebhyaś ca vistareṇa saṃprakāśayeddadyātsaṃvibhajet vaistārikī pūjā bhaviṣyatīti sattvānāṃ cānukampāmupādāya,
S06bsu049_u:119_23: ayamevānayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ kuladuhitrorvā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:119_25: evam etat / evametatkauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā pustakagatāṃ kṛtvā udgṛhṇīyāddhārayedvācayet paryavāpnuyāt pravartayeddeśayedupadiśeduddiśetsvādhyāyet,
S06bsu049_u:119_26: parasmai cārthikāya chandikāya kulaputrāya kuladuhitre vā yācamānāya dadyādupanāmayenniryātayetparityajedantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā /
S06bsu049_u:119_27: ayameva kauśika tayordvayoḥ kulaputrayoḥ [Vaidya_53] kuladuhitrorvā parānugrahakaraḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parityāgabuddhistannidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:120_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatra bhājanībhūtāḥ kulaputrā vā kuladuhitaro vā syuḥ asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:120_1: tatra tatra gatvā tebhyaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dadyāt saṃvibhāgaṃ kuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:120_2: ayameva kauśika tataḥ kulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet /
S06bsu049_u:121_0: punaraparaṃ kauśika yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā ye jambūdvīpe sattvāstān sarvān daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayet pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:121_1: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha - bahu bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:121_2: bahu sugata / bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06bsu049_u:121_3: yaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate,
S06bsu049_u:121_4: avakalpayannavakalpayate, adhimuñcannadhimucyate, prasannacittaḥ prasannacittāya adhyāśayasaṃpanno 'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya bodhisattvāya adhyāśayena dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:121_5: antaśo likhanāyāpi vācanāyāpyakilāsitayā saṃpādayet - udyukto 'muṃ grāhayet saṃdarśayet samādāpayet samuttejayet saṃpraharṣayet,
S06bsu049_u:121_6: vācā neṣyati vineṣyati, arthamasyā asmai saṃprakāśayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:121_8: nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva /
S06bsu049_u:121_9: atra hi tvaṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /
S06bsu049_u:121_10: abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye 'bhivineṣyasi yaduta bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:121_11: ayaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā parityāgabuddhyā tataḥ paurvakātkulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet /
S06bsu049_u:121_12: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ kauśika jambūdvīpe sarvasattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:121_13: etena kauśika paryāyeṇa ye 'pi te kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sattvāḥ,

S06bsu049_u:146_0: bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06bsu049_u:146_1: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantaśaḥ pustakagatām api kṛtvā abhiśraddadhadabhiśraddadhate,
S06bsu049_u:146_3: adhyāśayasaṃpanno 'dhyāśayasaṃpannāya bodhāya cittamutpādya samutpāditabodhicittāya bodhisattvāyādhyāśayena dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:146_5: adyukto 'muṃ grāhayiṣyati, saṃdarśayiṣyati samādāpayiṣyati samuttejayiṣyati saṃpraharṣayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:146_9: nirvicikitsaṃ kariṣyati, evaṃ cainaṃ vakṣyati - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra asminneva bodhisattvamārge śikṣasva - atra hi tvaṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ kṣipramevānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /
S06bsu049_u:146_10: abhisaṃbudhya ca aparimitaṃ sattvadhātumanuttare upadhisaṃkṣaye 'bhivineṣyasi yaduta bhūtakoṭiprabhāvanatāyāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:146_11: evaṃ ca vācaṃ bhāṣeta - eteṣāmeva tvaṃ kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhava yaduta prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktānāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:146_13: tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi kauśika pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prabhāvyate /
S06bsu049_u:146_14: evaṃ cāsya utsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyasi - yathā yathā hi tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣiṣyase,
S06bsu049_u:146_15: tathā tathā tvamanupūrveṇa buddhadharmāṇāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyasi,
S06bsu049_u:146_17: atra hi tvaṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaścaran vyāyacchamānaḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ prabhāvayiṣyasi,
S06bsu049_u:147_1: teṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittaṃ samutpādayet,
S06bsu049_u:147_2: yaścānyaḥ kaścitkauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ sarveṣāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya tebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dadyāt /
S06bsu049_u:147_3: yo vā kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā avinivartanīyāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā upanāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:147_5: yogamāpatsyate / atraiva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vipulatāṃ gataḥ paripūrayiṣyati buddhadharmāniti /
S06bsu049_u:147_6: ayaṃ tasmātpaurvakātkulaputrataḥ kuladuhitṛto vā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet /
S06bsu049_u:147_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? niyatameṣo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:147_8: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:147_10: teṣām api sarveṣāṃ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayet /
S06bsu049_u:147_11: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:147_12: yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:147_13: teṣām api sarveṣāṃ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayet /
S06bsu049_u:147_14: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:147_15: yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:147_16: teṣām api sarveṣāṃ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayet /
S06bsu049_u:147_17: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:147_19: teṣām api sarveṣāṃ [Vaidya_66] kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayet /
S06bsu049_u:147_20: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:147_21: yāvantaḥ kauśika gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:147_22: teṣām api sarveṣāṃ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayet /
S06bsu049_u:147_23: yaścānyaḥ kaścitkauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā teṣāṃ sarveṣāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādya tebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dadyāt /
S06bsu049_u:147_24: yo vā kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā avinivartanīyāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:147_26: yogamāpatsyate / evamasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhūyasyā mātrayā bhāvanāṃ vṛddhiṃ virūḍhiṃ vipulatāṃ paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:147_27: ayaṃ kauśiaka tataḥ paurvakātkulaputrataḥ kuladuhitṛto vā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet /
S06bsu049_u:147_28: tatkasya hetoḥ? niyatameṣo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kariṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:148_2: tebhyaḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet /
S06bsu049_u:148_3: yaś ca tebhyaḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:148_5: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha - bahu bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:148_6: bahu sugata / saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum /
S06bsu049_u:148_7: gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyam api upanisāpi upaniṣad api bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum /
S06bsu049_u:149_0: bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06bsu049_u:149_1: yasteṣāmavinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kṣiprataramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:149_2: upanāmayet, sārthāṃ savyañjanāmupadiśet, iha ca tān prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadedanuśiṣyāt tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika jāmbūdvīpakebhyaḥ sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:149_5: tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:149_7: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:149_8: yāvantaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:149_10: tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā [Vaidya_67] dadyādupanāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:149_12: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:149_13: yāvantaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sattvāḥ,

S06bsu049_u:149_17: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:149_20: tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:149_22: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ kauśika trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvebhyo 'vinivartanīyebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmupanāmya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:149_23: yāvantaḥ kauśika gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:149_25: tebhyo 'pi kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:149_27: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasavet? śakra āha - bahu bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:149_28: bahu sugata / saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum /
S06bsu049_u:149_29: gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyam api upanisāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum /
S06bsu049_u:150_0: bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro va kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet,
S06bsu049_u:150_1: yasteṣāmavinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ kṣiprataramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmebhya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pustakalikhitāṃ kṛtvā dadyādupanāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:150_2: sārthāṃ savyañjanāmupadiśet, iha ca tān prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadedanuśiṣyāt /
S06bsu049_u:150_4: sa evaṃ vadet - ahameteṣāṃ kṣiprataramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsya iti /
S06bsu049_u:150_5: yastaṃ kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā kṣiprābhijñataraṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmavavadedanuśiṣyāt,
S06bsu049_u:150_6: ayaṃ tataḥ paurvakātkulaputrātkuladuhiturvā sakāśādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavet /
S06bsu049_u:151_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - yathā yathā bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:151_4: teṣāṃ tān kārān kṛtān mahāphalān karoti mahānuśaṃsān /
S06bsu049_u:151_6: [Vaidya_68] tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetadbhagavan bhavati - yadbodhisattvo mahāsattva āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:152_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kauśika yastvaṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmutsāhaṃ dadāsi anugṛhṇīṣe anuparivārayasi /
S06bsu049_u:152_1: evaṃ ca kauśika tvayā karaṇīyam - ya āryaśrāvakaḥ sarvasattvānāmanugrahaṃ kartukāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:152_2: sa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvutsāhaṃ vardhayati anugṛhṇīte 'nuparivārayati,
S06bsu049_u:152_3: evametatkaraṇīyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? ataḥprasūtā hi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:152_4: yadi hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā etadbodhicittaṃ notpādayeran,
S06bsu049_u:152_5: na caite bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau śikṣeran,
S06bsu049_u:152_6: na ṣaṭpāramitāsu śikṣeran, aśikṣamāṇā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ nābhisaṃbudhyeran /
S06bsu049_u:152_7: yasmāttarhi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvaśikṣāyāmāsu ṣaṭpāramitāsu śikṣante,
S06bsu049_u:157_0: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthaviramāmantrayate sma - yacca khalu punaḥ ārya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu,
S06bsu049_u:157_3: idameva tato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu agramākhyāyate,
S06bsu049_u:158_0: evamukte āyupyān subhūtiḥ sthaviraṃ maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yatpunarayaṃ maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśadiśi loke sarvataḥ sarvatra gatayā aprameyāprameyeṣu asaṃkhyeyāsaṃkhyeṣu aparimāṇāparimāṇeṣu acintyācintyeṣu anantāparyanteṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu atīte 'dhvani ekaikasyāṃ diśi ekaikasmiṃstrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau aprameyāprameyāṇāyāmasaṃkhyeyāsaṃkhyeyānāmaparimāṇāparimāṇānāmacintyācintyānāmanantāparyantānāmanupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāṃ paryāttabāṣpāṇāṃ marditakaṇṭakānāṃ svapahṛtabhārāṇāmanuprāptasvakārthānāṃ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanānāṃ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittānāṃ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptānāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:158_1: etasminnantare yasteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaśca,
S06bsu049_u:158_6: yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:158_13: yā ca daśabalapāramitā, yaś ca caturvaiśāradyaparamasukhaparipūrṇo 'dhigamaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:158_16: dharmolkāpragrahaṇam, dharmabherīsaṃpratāḍanam, dharmaśaṅkhaprapūraṇam, dharmaśaṅkhapravyāharaṇam, dharmakhaḍgapraharaṇam, dharmavṛṣṭipravarṣaṇam, dharmayajñayajanam, dharmadānena sarvasattvasaṃtarpaṇam,
S06bsu049_u:158_17: dharmadānasaṃpravāraṇam, ye ca tatra dharmadeśanāsu buddhadharmeṣu pratyekabuddhadharmeṣu [Vaidya_70] śrāvakadharmeṣu vā vinītāḥ śikṣitā adhimuktā niyatāḥ saṃbodhiparāyaṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:158_19: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:158_20: teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni,
S06bsu049_u:158_21: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtāḥ pratyekabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:158_28: teṣāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ bhikṣuṇīnāṃ upāsakānāmupāsikānām,
S06bsu049_u:158_31: yaiś ca tatra teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dharmaṃ deśayatāṃ devairnāgairyakṣairgandharvairasurairgaruḍaiḥ kinnarairmahoragairmanuṣyāmanuṣyairvā yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni,
S06bsu049_u:158_32: yaiś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvāpayatām api kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni,
S06bsu049_u:158_33: yaiś ca tatra teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānām api kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni,
S06bsu049_u:158_34: buddhaṃ ca bhagavantamāgamya dharmaṃ cāgamya saṃghaṃ cāgamya manobhāvanīyāṃś ca pudgalānāgamya teṣāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ yāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:158_35: tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ niravaśeṣāniravaśeṣamanavaśeṣamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā agrayā anumodanayā anumodeta,
S06bsu049_u:158_36: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttarayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta /
S06bsu049_u:158_37: evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /
S06bsu049_u:158_40: api nu tāni vastūni tāni vā ārambaṇāni te vā ākārāstathopalabhyeran yathā nimittīkaroti? evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - na tāni bhadanta subhūte vastūni tāni vā ārambaṇāni te vā ākārāstathopalabhyante yathā nimittīkaroti /
S06bsu049_u:158_41: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yadi so 'saṃvidyamānaṃ vastu asaṃvidyamānamārambaṇamārambaṇīkuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:158_42: nimittīkuryāt tatkathamasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso na bhavet? tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā
S06bsu049_u:158_43: hi rāgo 'pyasaṃvidyamānaṃ vastu anitye nityamiti duḥkhe sukhamiti anātmanyātmeti aśubhe śubhamiti vikalpya saṃkalpya utpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:158_45: athāpi yathā vastu yathā ārambaṇaṃ yathā ākārastathā bodhistathā cittam,
S06bsu049_u:158_47: yadi ca yathā vastu yathā ārambaṇaṃ yathā ākārastathā bodhistathā cittam,
S06bsu049_u:158_48: tatkatamairvastubhiḥkatamairārambaṇaiḥ katamairākāraiḥ katamaṃ cittamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati? katamadvā anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu kva anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati?
S06bsu049_u:159_0: [Vaidya_71] atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - nedamārya subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyaṃ nopadeṣṭavyam /
S06bsu049_u:159_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? yad api hi syāttasya śraddhāmātrakaṃ premamātrakaṃ prasādamātrakaṃ gauravamātrakam,
S06bsu049_u:159_3: avinivartanīyasyedamārya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyamupadeṣṭavyam /
S06bsu049_u:159_4: yo vā kalyāṇamitropastabdho sattvo mahāsattvo bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:159_5: so 'tra nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate na vipatsyati na viṣādamāpatsyate,
S06bsu049_u:159_7: na bhagnapṛṣṭhīkariṣyati, notrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsamāpatsyate /
S06bsu049_u:159_8: evaṃ ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:160_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - yena maitreya cittenānumodya yatpariṇāmayati,
S06bsu049_u:160_2: tatkatamattaccittaṃ yena pariṇāmayati anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye? katamadvā taccittamanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu yatpariṇāmayatyanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye? kathaṃ vā śakyaṃ cittena cittaṃ pariṇāmayituṃ yadā dvayościttayoḥ samavadhānaṃ nāsti,
S06bsu049_u:161_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - mā khalvārya subhūte navayānasaṃprasthitā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante? kathaṃ cārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tadanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayitavyam? kathaṃ ca anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu parigṛhṇatā anumodanāsahagataṃ cittaṃ pariṇāmayatā tadanumodanāsahagataṃ cittaṃ suparigṛhītaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:162_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamārabhya maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamadhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamāmantrayate sma - iha maitreya bodhisattvo mahāsattvasteṣāmatītānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāṃ paryāttabāṣpāṇāṃ marditakaṇṭakānāmapahṛtabhārāṇāmanuprāptasvakārthānāṃ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanānāṃ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittānāṃ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramitāprāptānāṃ daśasu dikṣu aprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ekaikasyāṃ diśi ekaikasmiṃś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau aprameyāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānāṃ yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:162_1: etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kuśalamūlāni pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni,
S06bsu049_u:162_2: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ kuśalamūlābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:162_3: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:162_4: [Vaidya_72] yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:162_6: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣitā adhimuktāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:162_7: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvāvyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:162_9: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtāḥ pratyekabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:162_10: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:162_13: yaiś ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni,
S06bsu049_u:162_16: yaiś ca tiryagyonigatair api sattvaiḥ sa dharmaḥ śrutaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:162_18: yaiś ca teṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāpayatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni,
S06bsu049_u:162_20: tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodeta /
S06bsu049_u:162_21: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayate,
S06bsu049_u:162_22: pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati?
S06bsu049_u:163_0: evamukte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - sacedārya subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati,
S06bsu049_u:163_2: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:163_3: yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti /
S06bsu049_u:163_4: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:163_6: taccittaṃ saṃjānīte idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:163_7: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:163_9: taccittamevaṃ saṃjānīte, evaṃ samanvāharati / taccittaṃ samanvāhriyamāṇameva kṣīṇaṃ kṣīṇamityevaṃ saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:163_12: yenāpi cittena pariṇāmyate, tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā /
S06bsu049_u:163_17: sacedevaṃ pariṇāmayati, samyakpariṇāmayati, na mithyā pariṇāmayati / evaṃ ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pariṇāmayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:164_0: punaraparam ārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena yathā atītānāmevamanāgatānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ [Vaidya_73] yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06bsu049_u:164_3: etasminnantare yāni teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:164_4: yaś ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaḥ samādhiskandhaḥ prajñāskandho vimuktiskandho vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:164_5: yā ca hitaiṣitā, yā ca mahāmaitrī, yā ca mahākaruṇā, ye ca aprameyāsaṃkhyeyā buddhaguṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:164_6: ye ca te buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:164_7: ye ca tasmin dharme śikṣiṣyante 'dhimokṣayiṣyanti pratiṣṭhāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:164_8: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vyākariṣyanti anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:164_10: yāṃś ca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyekabuddhayānikān pudgalān vyākariṣyanti pratyekabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:164_11: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlāni, yāni ca śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ dānamayāni kuśalamūlāni śīlamayāni kuśalamūlāni bhāvanāmayāni kuśalamūlāni,
S06bsu049_u:164_14: ye ca tasmin dharme pṛthagjanāḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:164_16: ye ca tiryagyonigatā api sattvāstaṃ dharmaṃ śroṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:164_18: ye ca sattvāsteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvāyatsu parinirvṛteṣu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:164_20: tāni sarvāṇyekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumoditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:164_21: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kathaṃ na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati? sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati,
S06bsu049_u:164_23: evaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:164_24: sa yathā taccittaṃ na saṃjānīte idaṃ cittamiti,
S06bsu049_u:164_25: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:164_26: atha yena cittena yatpariṇāmayati taccittaṃ saṃjānīte - idaṃ taccittamiti cittasaṃjñī bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:164_27: evaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya saṃjñāviparyāsaścittaviparyāso dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:164_28: sacetpunarbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaccittaṃ pariṇāmayati taccittamevaṃ saṃjānīte evaṃ samānvāharati,
S06bsu049_u:164_32: yenāpi cittena pariṇāmyate, tasyāpi cittasya saiva dharmatā /

S06bsu049_u:165_0: [Vaidya_74] punaraparamārya subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ chinnavartmanāṃ chinnavartmanīnāṃ chinnaprapañcabhavanetrīkāṇāmaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu trisāhasra mahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyamāṇānāṃ yāpayatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante,

S06bsu049_u:166_23: yaiś ca sattvaisteṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu parinirvṛteṣu parinirvāsyatsu parinirvāyatsu ca kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:166_25: tāni sarvāṇyakato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamagrayā anumodanayā anumodeta,
S06bsu049_u:166_26: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā asamayā asamasamayā anumodanayā anumodeta /
S06bsu049_u:166_27: evamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayāmīti vācaṃ bhāṣeta - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /
S06bsu049_u:166_28: tasya kathaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati? sacetpariṇāmayan evaṃ samanvāharati - te dharmāḥ kṣīṇā niruddhā vigatā vipariṇatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:166_29: sa ca dharmo 'kṣayo yatra pariṇāmyate ityevaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ [Vaidya_76] samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:166_32: evaṃ bhadantaṃ subhūte pariṇāmayato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na saṃjñāviparyāso na cittaviparyāso na dṛṣṭiviparyāso bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:166_33: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāṃ nābhiniviśate /
S06bsu049_u:166_34: sacetpunarevaṃ saṃjānīte - na cittaṃ cittaṃ jānāti,
S06bsu049_u:166_35: na dharmo dharmaṃ jānāti, ity api pariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye /
S06bsu049_u:166_39: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa tāṃ pariṇāmanāmabhiniviśate /
S06bsu049_u:166_40: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - so 'pi puṇyābhisaṃskāro viviktaḥ śāntaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:166_41: yadapyanumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tad api viviktaṃ śāntamiti pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:166_42: sacedevam api na saṃjānīte - sarvasaṃskārāḥ śāntā viviktā iti,
S06bsu049_u:166_43: evamiyaṃ tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitā yad api tatteṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ parinirvṛtānāṃ kuśalamūlam /
S06bsu049_u:166_45: yenāpi tatpariṇāmitaṃ tad api tajjātikaṃ tallakṣaṇaṃ tannikāyaṃ tatsvabhāvam /
S06bsu049_u:166_47: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi buddhā bhagavanto nimittayogena pariṇāmanāmabhyanujānanti /
S06bsu049_u:166_51: yacca nopalabhyate tannaiva nimittaṃ na viṣayaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:166_52: sacedevaṃ nimittīkaroti, na samanvāharati na pariṇāmayatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:166_53: atha smṛtivaikalyena na nimittīkaroti na samanvāharati na manasi karoti smṛtivaikalyādanavabodhādvā,
S06bsu049_u:166_56: na ca nimittīkaroti, evaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ bhavati tatkuśalamūlaṃ bodhisattvena mahāsattvenānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:166_57: evamatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitavyam - idaṃ tadbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopāyakauśalaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:166_59: sa āsannaḥ sarvajñatāyāḥ / atra copāyakauśalaṃ śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā abhīkṣṇaṃ śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā paripraśnīkartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:166_60: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi prajñāpāramitāmanāgamya śakyeyamaśrutavatā prajñāpāramitāpariṇāmanākriyā praveṣṭum /
S06bsu049_u:166_61: tatra ya evaṃ vadet - śakyamanāgamya prajñāpāramitāṃ tatpuṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumiti,
S06bsu049_u:166_63: tatkasya hetoḥ? niruddhā hi te ātmabhāvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:166_64: niruddhā hi te saṃskārāḥ, śāntā viviktā virahitā upalabdhinaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:166_65: api tu khalu punaḥ sa pudgalo nimittīkṛtya vikalpya ca yathābhūtamayathābhūte yathābhūtasaṃjñī upalambhamanupalambhe pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:166_66: tasya kuśalamūlaṃ buddhā bhagavanta evaṃ pariṇāmitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau nābhyanujānanti /
S06bsu049_u:166_67: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣa eva hi tasya [Vaidya_77] mahānupalambho bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:166_68: yatsa parinirvāṇam api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ nimittīkaroti vikalpayati ca /
S06bsu049_u:166_70: na copalambhasaṃjñinastathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ pariṇāmanāṃ mahārthakarīṃ vadanti /
S06bsu049_u:166_71: tatkasya hetoḥ? saviṣaḥ saśalyo hyeṣaḥ pariṇāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:166_72: tadyathāpi nāma praṇītaṃ bhojanaṃ saviṣaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:166_73: kiṃ cāpi tadvarṇataś ca gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś ca abhilaṣaṇīyaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:166_74: api tu khalu punaḥ saviṣatvātparivarjanīyaṃ bhavati paṇḍitānām,
S06bsu049_u:166_75: na paribhogāya / tadeva bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:166_76: tasya tadbhojanaṃ paribhuñjānasya varṇatasya gandhataś ca rasataś ca sparśataś ca svādeṣu sukhakaraṃ pariṇāme cāsya duḥkhavipākaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:166_78: maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham / evameva ārya subhūte ihaike durgṛhītena durupalakṣitena duḥsvādhyātena subhāṣitasyārthamajānānā yathābhūtamarthamanavabudhyamānā evamavavadiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:166_79: evamanuśāsiṣyanti - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandham /
S06bsu049_u:166_80: teṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ yaistatra teṣvatītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu buddheṣu bhagavatsu kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:166_81: yāvacca saddharmo nāntarhito nāntardhāsyati nāntardadhāti ca,
S06bsu049_u:166_82: etasminnantare teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvatprathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvacca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ yāvacca anupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau parinirvṛtānām,
S06bsu049_u:166_83: ye ca tairbuddhairbhagavadbhirbodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:166_84: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:166_85: ye ca pratyekabuddhayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca pratyekabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:166_86: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:166_87: ye ca śrāvakayānikāḥ pudgalā vyākṛtā vyākariṣyante vyākriyante ca śrāvakabodhau,
S06bsu049_u:166_88: teṣāṃ ca yāni kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni avaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:166_89: yāni ca pṛthagjanānāmaprameyāsaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvalokadhātuṣu tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:166_90: evaṃ sa pariṇāmo nimittayogena pariṇāmyamāno viṣatvāya saṃpravartate,
S06bsu049_u:166_95: kathaṃ punaranena śikṣitavyam? kathamatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kuśalamūlaṃ parigrahītavyam? kathaṃ ca parigṛhītaṃ suparigṛhītaṃ bhavati? kathaṃ ca pariṇāmayitavyam? kathaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? ihānena bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā tathāgatamanabhyākhyātukāmena evaṃ tatsarvaṃ kuśalamūlamanumoditavyamevaṃ pariṇāmayitavyaṃ yathā te [Vaidya_78] tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā buddhajñānena buddhacakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇam /
S06bsu049_u:166_96: yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate tathā anumode tatkuśalamūlam,
S06bsu049_u:166_97: yathā ca te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā abhyanujānanti pariṇāmyamānaṃ tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:166_98: tathāhaṃ pariṇāmayāmīti / evamanumodamāna evaṃ pariṇāmayan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'naparāddho bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:166_99: buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ samyaktvānumoditaṃ pariṇāmitaṃ ca bhavati tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye,
S06bsu049_u:166_101: evaṃ cāsya pariṇāmo nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati adhyāśayena adhimuktyā pariṇāmayataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:167_0: punaraparaṃ bodhisattvayānikena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ pariṇāmayitavyam - yacchīlaṃ yaḥ samādhiryā prajñā yā vimuktiryadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tadyathā aparyāpannaṃ kāmadhātau aparyāpannaṃ rūpadhātau aparyāpannamārūpyadhātau nāpyatītaṃ na anāgataṃ na pratyutpannam /
S06bsu049_u:167_4: so 'pi dharmo 'paryāpannaḥ / sacedevamadhimuñcati, evaṃ pariṇāmayatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinaṣṭaḥ pariṇāmo bhavatyaparyāpanno nirviṣaḥ pariṇāmo mahāpariṇāmo dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ paripūrṇaḥ suparipūrṇo bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:167_6: mithyā pariṇāmayati / tatra yo 'yaṃ pariṇāmo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06bsu049_u:167_7: anayā dharmadhātupariṇāmanayā yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti,
S06bsu049_u:167_8: yathā cābhyanujānanti tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmitamevaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatīti,
