S06bsu049_u:167_10: evaṃ ca pariṇāmitaṃ supariṇāmitaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:168_0: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:168_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hyayaṃ subhūte pariṇāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_5: asyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ yathā buddhā bhagavanto jānanti paśyanti,
S06bsu049_u:168_6: tatkuśalamūlaṃ yajjātikaṃ yannikāyaṃ yādṛśaṃ yatsvabhāvaṃ yallakṣaṇaṃ yayā dharmatayā saṃvidyate,
S06bsu049_u:168_7: tathā anumode / yathā ca abhyanujānanti, tathāhaṃ pariṇāmayāmīti / atra yaḥ puṇyaskandho yaś ca gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_8: tān sarvān kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā daśasu kuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu samādāpayetpratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:168_9: tasya yaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ, tato 'yameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajaḥ puṇyaskandho 'gra ākhyāyate,
S06bsu049_u:168_10: śreṣṭha ākhyāyate, jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate, vara ākhyāyate, pravara ākhyāyate, praṇīta ākhyāyate, uttama ākhyāyate, anuttama ākhyāyate, niruttama ākhyāyate, asama ākhyāyate, asamasama ākhyāyate / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvān daśasu kuśaleṣu [Vaidya_79] karmapatheṣu pratiṣṭhāpya puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_11: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_12: te sarve caturṇāṃ dhyānānāṃ lābhino bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_14: tato 'yameva bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pariṇāmanāsahagataḥ puṇyaskandho 'gra ākhyāyate,
S06bsu049_u:168_15: śreṣṭha ākhyāyate, jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate, vara ākhyāyate, pravara ākhyāyate, praṇīta ākhyāyate, uttama ākhyāyate, anuttama ākhyāyate, niruttama ākhyāyate, asama ākhyāyate, asamasama ākhyāyate / tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ caturdhyānaniṣpādanasaṃbhūtaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_16: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_18: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu caturapramāṇalābhināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_19: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_21: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu caturārūpyasamāpattilābhināṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_22: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_24: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu pañcābhijñānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_25: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu srotaāpannā bhaveyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:168_26: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ srotaāpannānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_27: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_29: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ sakṛdāgāmināṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_30: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_32: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāmanāgāmināṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_33: yāvantaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ te sarve arhanto bhaveyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:168_34: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāmarhatāṃ puṇyaskandhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_35: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_37: tiṣṭhatu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ pratyekabuddhānāṃ puṇyaskandhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_38: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_39: te sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:168_40: ye sarve anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu ye sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_43: etena paryāyeṇa tān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ parikalpya tāṃś ca sarvabodhisattvānekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānupatiṣṭheccīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:168_45: evamekaikasteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanena paryāyeṇa dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:168_47: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ? subhūtirāha - bahu bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:168_48: bahu sugata / aprameyaṃ bhagavan, aprameyaṃ sugata / saṃkhyāpi bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum,
S06bsu049_u:168_49: gaṇanāpi upamāpi aupamyam api upanisāpi upaniṣad api bhagavaṃstasya puṇyaskandhasya na sukarā kartum /
S06bsu049_u:168_50: sacedbhagavan rūpī bhavet, sa puṇyaskandho gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣv api trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu na māyet /
S06bsu049_u:169_1: evam etat / yatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto 'nena dharmadhātupariṇāmena tatkuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:169_2: puṇyaṃ prasavati / asya subhūte puṇyaskandhasya dharmadhātupariṇāmajasya asau pūrvaka upalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:169_3: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:169_4: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:169_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāmupalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ subahv api dānaṃ dattaṃ subahvity api parisaṃkhyātaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:170_0: atha khalu cāturmahārājakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ viṃśatisahasrāṇi prāñjalīni namasyanti bhagavantametadavocan - mahāpariṇāmo 'yaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ kuśalamūlapariṇāmaḥ sarvajñatāyai,
S06bsu049_u:170_1: yatra hi nāma teṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāvantaṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāramabhibhavati /
S06bsu049_u:170_2: atha khalu trāyastriṃśakāyikānāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ śatasahasrāṇi divyapuṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇavarṣairdivyai ratnavarṣairdivyaiś ca vastravarṣairbhagavantamabhyavākirannabhiprākiran /
S06bsu049_u:170_3: divyaiśchatrairdivyairdhvajairdivyābhirghaṇṭābhirdivyābhiḥ patākābhiḥ samantācca divyadīpamālābhirbahuvidhābhiś ca divyābhiḥ pūjābhirbhagavantaṃ satkurvanti sma,
S06bsu049_u:170_4: gurukurvanti sma mānayanti sma pūjayanti sma arcayanti sma apacāyanti sma,
S06bsu049_u:170_6: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - mahāpariṇāmo batāyaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yo 'yaṃ dharmadhātupariṇāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:170_7: yatra hi nāma tatteṣāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ dānamayaṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraskandhamabhibhavati yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītatvādasya mahāpariṇāmasya /
S06bsu049_u:170_8: evamanyebhyo 'pi devanikāyebhyo devaputrā āgatya [Vaidya_81] bhagavantaṃ parameṇa satkāreṇa parameṇa gurukāreṇa paramayā mānanayā paramayā pūjanayā paramayā arcanayā paramayā apacāyanayā satkṛtya gurukṛtya mānayitvā pūjayitvā arcayitvā apacāyya evameva śabdamudīrayanti sma,
S06bsu049_u:170_9: ghoṣamanuśrāvayanti sma / evaṃ peyālena kartavyam / yāmāstuṣitā nirmāṇaratayaḥ paranirmitavaśavartino brahmakāyikā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:170_10: te 'pyevamevāñjaliṃ kṛtvā bhagavantaṃ namasyanta etadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadayaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītānāṃ kuśalamūlapariṇāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:170_11: yasteṣāmupalambhasaṃjñināṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tāvaccirarātrasaṃcitamam api tathā mahāvistarasamudānītam api puṇyaskandhamabhibhavati /
S06bsu049_u:171_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān śuddhāvāsakāyikān devaputrānādīn kṛtvā sarvāṃstān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - tiṣṭhatu khalu punardevaputrā gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāmanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitānāmanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pratilambhāya dānaṃ dadatāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ anena paryāyeṇa,
S06bsu049_u:171_1: ye 'pi te devaputrā anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:171_2: te 'pi sarve anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau praṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā bodhāya cittamutpādya anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sarvaiḥ sukhasparśavihārairekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:171_3: evaṃ sarve 'pi yāvatte copalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:171_4: etena paryāyeṇa tān sarvasattvānekaikaṃ parikalpya tāṃś ca sarvabodhisattvānekaiko bodhisattvo yāvatsarve te bodhisattvā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhantastān sarvasattvāṃścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sarvaiḥ sukhasparśavihārairupatiṣṭheyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:171_6: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvapratyekabuddhaśrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ yaiś ca tatra anyair api sattvaiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitānyavaropayiṣyante 'varopyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:171_7: tatsarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamagrayā anumodanayā anumodate /
S06bsu049_u:171_8: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodanayā anumodate /
S06bsu049_u:171_9: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati - anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakaṃ bhavatviti /
S06bsu049_u:171_10: asyānumodanāpariṇāmanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastunaḥ so 'pi paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:171_11: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:171_12: saṃkhyām api kalām api [Vaidya_82] gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:171_13: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te bodhisattvāḥ sarve 'pyupalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadati /
S06bsu049_u:172_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhisattvapratyekabuddhaśrāvakasaṃghānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ yannāma kuśalamūlaṃ tatsarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā /
S06bsu049_u:172_1: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodate iti /
S06bsu049_u:172_2: tatra kiyatā bhagavan agrānumodanā bhavati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadi subhūte bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'tītāgatapratyutpannān gṛhṇīte na manyate nopalabhate na kalpayati na vikalpayati na paśyati na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:172_5: nātra kaściddharma utpanno nāpi kaściddharma utpatsyate nāpi kaściddharma utpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:172_6: nāpi kaściddharmo niruddho nāpi kaściddharmo nirutsyate nāpi kaściddharmo nirudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:172_7: ityevametān dharmānupaparīkṣya yathaiṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā tathānumodate /
S06bsu049_u:172_9: iyatā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya agrā anumodanā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:172_10: asya subhūte kuśalamūlapariṇāmasya teṣāṃ paurvakāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāmupalambhasaṃjñināmupalambhadṛṣṭikāṇāṃ taddānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:172_11: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:172_12: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:173_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ dānamanumoditukāmena śīlamanumoditukāmena kṣāntimanumoditukāmena vīryamanumoditukāmena dhyānamanumoditukāmena prajñāmanumoditakāmena evamanumoditavyam - yathā vimuktistathā dānam,
S06bsu049_u:173_1: yathā vimuktistathā śīlaṃ, yathā vimuktistathā kṣāntiḥ, yathā vimuktistathā vīryam, yathā vimuktistathā dhyānam, yathā vimuktistathā prajñā, yathā vimuktistathā vimuktijñānadarśanam,
S06bsu049_u:173_6: yathā vimuktistathā teṣāṃ śrāvakā ye parinirvṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_7: yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye 'tītā niruddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_8: yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye 'nāgatā anutpannāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_9: yathā vimuktistathā te dharmā ye etarhi pratyutpannā vartamānāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_10: yathā vimuktistathā te 'tītā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_11: yathā vimuktistathā te 'nāgatā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_12: yathā vimuktistathā te pratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantasteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_13: ye etarhyaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:173_17: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyaṃ [Vaidya_83] samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi apariṇāmanāyogena asaṃkrāntito 'viṃnāśata iti /
S06bsu049_u:173_18: iyatā subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya agrā anumodanā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:173_19: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte te 'pi ye 'nyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_20: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthāya anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvānāṃ bodhāya cittamutpādya sarve 'pyekaiko bodhisattvaḥ ekaikasmai bodhisattvāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyādupalambhasaṃjñī cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sarvasukhasparśavihārairupatiṣṭhan,
S06bsu049_u:173_21: anena paryāyeṇa sarve 'pi te sarvebhya upatiṣṭhantaḥ upalambhasaṃjñino dānaṃ dadyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:173_22: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_24: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kāyasucaritaṃ vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritamupalambhasaṃjñinaḥ śīlaṃ samādāya varteran /
S06bsu049_u:173_25: anena paryāyeṇa sarve 'pi te bodhisattvā ekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kāyasucaritaṃ vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritamupalambhasaṃjñī śīlaṃ samādāya varteta /
S06bsu049_u:173_26: etena paryāyeṇa sarve 'pi te bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ śīlaṃ samādāya varteran /
S06bsu049_u:173_27: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhān sarvasattvānāṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate 'grayā anumodanayā /
S06bsu049_u:173_28: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintayā anumodanayā anumodate /
S06bsu049_u:173_29: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:173_30: asya subhūte anumodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvāna śīlamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:173_31: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:173_32: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:173_33: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ śīlaṃ samādāya vartanta iti /
S06bsu049_u:173_34: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_35: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kāyasucaritaṃ vāksucaritaṃ manaḥsucaritaṃ śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_36: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_38: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhanto 'nyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu [Vaidya_84] trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvairekaiko bodhisattva ākruṣṭo 'bhihataḥ paribhāṣitaḥ samāna eva,
S06bsu049_u:173_39: sarve 'pi te upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya varteran,
S06bsu049_u:173_40: yāvatsarve te bodhisattvāḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya vartamānāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_41: etena paryāyeṇa sarve te bodhisattvā ekaiko bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānanyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvairākruṣṭo 'bhihataḥ paribhāṣitaḥ samānaḥ upalambhasaṃjñī kṣāntiṃ samādāya varteta /
S06bsu049_u:173_42: evaṃ sarve 'pi te sarvairākruṣṭā abhihatāḥ paribhāṣitāḥ samānā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya varteran /
S06bsu049_u:173_43: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlaskandhaṃ samādhiskandhaṃ prajñāskandhaṃ vimuktiskandhaṃ vimuktijñānadarśanaskandhaṃ teṣāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ
S06bsu049_u:173_44: ca śrāvakāṇāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhān sarvasattvānāṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ sarvamekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā /
S06bsu049_u:173_45: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttamayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintayā anumodanayā anumodate /
S06bsu049_u:173_46: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:173_47: asya subhūte anumodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau paurvakāṇāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ kṣāntisahagataḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:173_48: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:173_49: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:173_50: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñinaḥ kṣāntiṃ samādāya vartante /
S06bsu049_u:173_51: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvāḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:173_52: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃprasthāya anyeṣvanyeṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvairākruṣṭā abhihatāḥ paribhāṣitāḥ samānāḥ upalambhasaṃjñino gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān kṣāntiṃ samādāya vartamānāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:173_53: ye subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_55: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhantaścaṃkramābhirūḍhā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān aviṣīdanto 'nabhībhūtāḥ styānamiddhenopalambhasaṃjñino vīryaṃ samādāya varteran /
S06bsu049_u:173_56: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhān [Vaidya_85] sarvasattvānāṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannānān kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārān sarvānekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā /
S06bsu049_u:173_57: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodanayā anumodate /
S06bsu049_u:173_58: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:173_59: asya subhūte anumodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ vīryamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:173_60: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:173_61: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:173_62: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te bodhisattvāḥ sarve 'pyupalambhasaṃjñino vīryaṃ samādāya vartante /
S06bsu049_u:173_63: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sarvasattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_64: anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhantaścaṃkramābhirūḍhā gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān aviṣīdanto 'nabhibhūtāḥ styānamiddhenopalambhasaṃjñino vīryaṃ samādāya vartamānāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:173_65: ye 'pi te subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:173_67: te sarve 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃprasthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānupalambhasaṃjñinaścatvāri dhyānāni samāpadyeran /
S06bsu049_u:173_68: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nayā prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ sarveṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca pratyekabuddhānāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhāṃsteṣāṃ ca śrāvakāṇāṃ śīlasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaskandhān sarvasattvānāṃ ca atītānāgatapratyutpannān kuśalamūlābhisaṃskārān sarvānekato 'bhisaṃkṣipya pīṇḍayitvā tulayitvā niravaśeṣya niravaśeṣamanumodate agrayā anumodanayā /
S06bsu049_u:173_69: śreṣṭhayā jyeṣṭhayā varayā pravarayā praṇītayā uttamayā anuttamayā niruttarayā uttarottarayā asamayā asamasamayā apratisamayā acintyayā anumodanayā anumodate /
S06bsu049_u:173_70: anumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ puṇyatriyāvastu anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:173_71: asya subhūte anumodanāsahagatasya puṇyakriyāvastuno 'sau paurvaka aupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caturdhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:173_72: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti,
S06bsu049_u:173_73: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:173_74: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te bodhisattvā upalambhasaṃjñino dhyānāni samāpadyante iti /
S06bsu049_u:178_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - sarvajñajñānapariniṣpattirbhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:178_3: evametadyathā vadasi / śāriputra āha - avabhāsakarī bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:178_16: pañcacakṣuḥparigrahaṃ kṛtvā sarvasattvānāṃ mārgadarśayitrī bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:178_25: svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāmupādāya mātā bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:178_32: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam? kathaṃ manasi kartavyā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā? kathaṃ bhagavan namaskartavyā prajñāpāramitā? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - yathā śāriputra śāstari,
S06bsu049_u:178_34: tathaiva manasi kartavyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā yathā śāstā /
S06bsu049_u:178_35: tathaiva namaskartavyā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā yathā śāstā /
S06bsu049_u:179_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - kuto nu bateyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā? kiṃnidānā bateyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā? atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kuta iyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā? kiṃnidānā bateyamāryasya śāriputrasya pṛcchā jātā? evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'numodanāsahagataṃ puṇyakriyāvastu sarvajñatāyāṃ pariṇāmayaṃsteṣāṃ paurvakāṇāmaupalambhikānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ yaś ca [Vaidya_87] dānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:179_1: yaś ca śīlamayo yaś ca kṣāntimayo yaś ca vīryamayo yaś ca dhyānamayaḥ puṇyābhisaṃskāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:179_3: api nu khalu punaḥ kauśika prajñāpāramitaiva pūrvaṃgamā pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvajñatāmārgāvatārāya /
S06bsu049_u:179_4: tadyathāpi nāma kauśika jātyandhānāṃ śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā śatasahasraṃ vā apariṇāyakamabhavyaṃ mārgāvatārāya,
S06bsu049_u:179_5: abhavyaṃ grāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā gantum,
S06bsu049_u:179_6: evameva kauśika dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntivīryaṃ dhyānaṃ ca prajñāpāramitānāmadheyaṃ labhate /
S06bsu049_u:179_9: kutaḥ punaḥ sarvajñatāmanuprāpsyati? yadā punaḥ kauśika dānaṃ śīlaṃ kṣāntirvīyaṃ dhyānaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāparigṛhītaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:179_11: tadā hyāsāṃ cakṣuḥpratilambho bhavati pañcānāṃ pāramitānāṃ sarvajñatāmārgāvatārāya sarvajñatānuprāptaye /
S06bsu049_u:180_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - rūpasya śāriputra abhinirhāro draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:180_5: evamabhinirhāreṇa pañcānāṃ skandhānāmabhinirhāraḥ prajñāpāramitāyā abhinirhāro 'bhinirhāra ityucyate /
S06bsu049_u:181_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - evamabhinirhāreṇa abhinirhṛtā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā katamaṃ dharmamarpayati? bhagavānāha - evamabhinirhṛtā śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamarpayati /
S06bsu049_u:181_3: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kimiyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatām api nārpayati? bhagavānāha - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - kimiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā sarvajñatām api nārpayatīti? na yathopalambhastathā arpayati,
S06bsu049_u:181_4: na yathā nāma tathārpayati, na yathābhisaṃskārastathārpayati /
S06bsu049_u:181_5: śakra āha - kathaṃ tarhi bhagavannarpayati? bhagavānāha - yathā kauśika nārpayati tathārpayati /
S06bsu049_u:181_6: śakra āha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:182_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - sacedevam api bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo saṃjñāsyate,
S06bsu049_u:182_6: evam etat / astyeṣa subhūte paryāyo yena [Vaidya_88] paryāyeṇa dūrīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
S06bsu049_u:182_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte paridīpitāyāṃ na rūpaṃ paridīpitaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:182_11: na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:183_0: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:183_1: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte katamena paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā? sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - na bhagavan rūpaṃ mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:183_3: evaṃ na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:183_7: tāny api na balīkaroti na durbalīkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:183_8: na saṃkṣipati na vikṣipati / yāpi sā sarvajñatā, tām api na mahatkaroti nālpīkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:183_9: na saṃkṣipati na vikṣipati / tatkasya hetoḥ? asaṃkṣiptāvikṣiptā hi bhagavan sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:183_10: sacedevam api bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:183_13: kiṃ punarevaṃ saṃjānānaḥ - evamahaṃ sarvajñajñānasamanvāgata sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:183_15: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hyeṣa prajñāpāramitāniṣyando ya imān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti sattvopalambhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:183_25: anena bhagavan paryāyeṇa mahāpāramiteyaṃ yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:184_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhimokṣayiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati na dhandhāyiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:184_2: kiyacciracaritāvī ca sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:184_3: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmarthataś ca dharmataś ca arthanayataś ca dharmanayataś ca anugamiṣyati anubhotsyate 'nubodhayiṣyati ca? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo lokadhātubhyaścyuto buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchya ihopapanno veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:184_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaḥ kaścicchāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo lokadhātubhyaścyuto buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchaya [Vaidya_89] ihopapanno bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:184_5: sa imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ śṛṇuyāt,
S06bsu049_u:184_6: imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā atra śāstṛsaṃjñāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmutpādayet - śāstā me saṃmukhībhūt iti,
S06bsu049_u:184_9: satkṛtya śṛṇoti, kathāṃ nopacchinatti / ciracaritāvī sa śāriputra tathārūpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:184_10: bahubuddhaparyupāsitaḥ sa śāriputra tathārūpo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:185_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - śakyā punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣyayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā? iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:185_1: iha vā sā prajñāpāramitā, amutra vā sā prajñāpāramitā, anena vā ākāreṇa liṅgena nimitteneti śakyā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:185_2: neyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā skandhaśo vā dhātuśo vā āyatanaśo vā śakyā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:185_4: atyantaviviktatvātsubhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ na śakyā prajñāpāramitā nirdeṣṭuṃ vā śrotuṃ vā upalakṣayituṃ vā samanvāhartuṃ vā upapādayituṃ vā upadhārayituṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:185_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? skandhadhātvāyatanameva hi subhūte śūnyaṃ viviktaṃ śāntam /
S06bsu049_u:185_7: iti hi prajñāpāramitā ca skandhadhātvāyatanaṃ ca advayametadadvaidhīkāraṃ śūnyatvādviviktatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:185_9: sā prajñāpāramitetyucyate / yadā na bhavati saṃjñā samajñā prajñaptirvyavahāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:186_0: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - kiyacciracaritāvī sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyo ya iha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyate? bhagavānāha - vibhajya vyākaraṇīyametatsubhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmindriyādhimātratayā /
S06bsu049_u:186_1: syātkhalu punaḥ subhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvā bahūni buddhaśatāni bahūni buddhasahasrāṇi bahūni buddhaśatasahasrāṇi dṛṣṭvā teṣāmantike brahmacaryaṃ caritvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na śraddadhyurnādhimuñceyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:186_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? pūrvam api teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantikādasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmagauravatā abhūt /
S06bsu049_u:186_7: te tatonidānaṃ dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitena ācitena upacitena etarhy api gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmapakrāmanti /
S06bsu049_u:186_8: agauravatayā aśraddadhānā anadhimuñcanto na kāyena na cittena sāmagrīṃ dadati /
S06bsu049_u:186_9: te sāmagrīmadadānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ na jānanti na paśyanti na budhyante na vedayante /
S06bsu049_u:186_11: aśraddadhānā na śṛṇvanti / [Vaidya_90] aśṛṇvanto na jānanti /
S06bsu049_u:186_12: ajānanto na paśyanti / apaśyanto na budhyante / abudhyamānā dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma kurvanti,
S06bsu049_u:186_14: te tena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitena ācitena upacitena duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ karmābhisaṃskariṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:186_15: tena te duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāṃ pratyākhyāsyanti pratikṣepsyanti pratikrokṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:186_17: asyāḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pratyākhyānena pratikṣepeṇa pratikrośena atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratyākhyātā bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:186_18: pratikṣiptā bhavati, pratikruṣṭā bhavati / te svasaṃtānānupahatya dagdhāḥ pareṣāmapyalpabuddhikānāmalpaprajñānāmalpapuṇyānāmalpakuśalamūlānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śraddhāmātrakasamanvāgatānāṃ premamātrakasamanvāgatānāṃ prasādamātrakasamanvāgatānāṃ chandamātrakasamanvāgatānāmādikarmikāṇāmabhavyarūpāṇāṃ tad api śraddhāmātrakaṃ premamātrakaṃ prasādamātrakaṃ chandamātrakaṃ vicchandayiṣyanti vivecayiṣyanti vivartayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:186_21: evaṃ te ātmasaṃtānānupahatya vivecya parasaṃtānānapyupahatya vivecya prajñāpāramitāmabhyākhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:186_27: evaṃ teṣāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:186_28: te sattvānāṃ hitasukhopacchedakriyayā mahānirayavipākasaṃvartanīyaṃ karma upaceṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:186_29: te anenaivaṃrūpeṇa karmābhisaṃskāreṇopasthāpitena samutthāpitena dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyena duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena karmaṇā bahūni varṣaśatāni bahūni varṣasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣaśatasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīśatāni bahūni varṣakoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi mahānirayeṣūpapatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:186_31: teṣāṃ tathā suciraṃ mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:186_33: tatra te kṣepsyante / te teṣu mahānireyaṣu upapatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:186_34: te tatra vikṣiptāsteṣu mahānirayeṣūpapannāḥ samānāstatrāpi mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkramiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:186_35: teṣāṃ tatrāpi mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi punareva tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:186_36: te tasyāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanyāṃ prādurbhūtāyāṃ tataścyutāḥ samānāḥ punareva anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye mahānirayāstatra kṣepsyante /
S06bsu049_u:186_39: teṣāṃ tatrāpi suciraṃ mahānirayānmahānirayaṃ saṃkrāmatāṃ tatrāpi tathaiva tejaḥsaṃvartanī prādurbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:186_40: te tasyāṃ tejaḥsaṃvartanyāṃ prādurbhūtāyāṃ punareva tataścyutāstenaiva akṣīṇena sāvaśeṣeṇa karmaṇā ihaiva lokadhātau punaḥ kṣepsyante /
S06bsu049_u:186_42: te punareva tāni mahānirayeṣu mahānti mahānirayaduḥkhāni [Vaidya_91] pratyanubhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:187_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - pañca bhagavan ānantaryāṇi karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni asya manoduścaritasya vāgduścaritasya ca na prativarṇikāny api na anurūpāṇy api na pratirūpāṇy api bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:187_2: evam etat / pañcānantaryāṇi śāriputra karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitānyasya manoduścaritasya ca vāgduścaritasya ca na prativarṇikāny api na anurūpāṇy api na pratirūpāṇy api asya karmaṇaḥ kṛtasya saṃcitasya ācitasya upacitasya /
S06bsu049_u:187_3: ye kecidimāṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:187_8: te svasaṃtānān saviṣān kṛtvā parasaṃtānān saviṣān kariṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:187_10: svayaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā anavabudhyamānāḥ parān api grāhayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:187_13: kutastaiḥ saha saṃvāsaṃ kuto vā lābhasatkāraṃ kutaḥ sthānam? tatkasya hetoḥ? dharmadūṣakā hi te śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:187_15: kṛṣṇānirjātikāḥ kṛṣṇāhijātikāste śāriputra tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:187_16: teṣāṃ śāriputra tathārūpāṇāṃ pudgālānāṃ ye śrotavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:187_19: ime te śāriputra dharmadūṣakāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:187_20: śāriputra āha - na bhagavatā tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamākhyātam /
S06bsu049_u:187_21: bhagavānāha - tiṣṭhatu śāriputra tasya pudgalasya tatropapannasya mahānirayagatasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam /
S06bsu049_u:187_22: tatkasya hetoḥ? mā tathārūpasya pudgalasya tadātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ śrutvā uṣṇaṃ rūdhiraṃ mukhādāgacchet,
S06bsu049_u:187_23: maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet, maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkhamāgāḍhamābādhaṃ spṛśet,
S06bsu049_u:187_24: dahyeta vā, śokaśalyo vā asyāviśet, mahāprapātaṃ vā prapatet, upaśuṣyeta vā mlāyeta vā / maiva mahāpratibhayaṃ tasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇamaśrauṣīdyasyeme doṣāḥ saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:188_0: na bhagavānāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyāvakāśaṃ karoti - iyattasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:188_1: dvitīyakam api tṛtīyakamapyāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ākhyātu me bhagavāṃstasya pudgalasyātmabhāvasya pramāṇam /
S06bsu049_u:188_2: paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyatianena vāṅbhanaḥkarmaṇā kṛtena saṃcitenopacitenopacitena evaṃ mahāntaṃ mahānirayeṣvātmabhāvaṃ parigṛhṇīteti /
S06bsu049_u:188_3: bhagavānāha - eṣa eva śāriputra paścimāyā janatāyā ālokaḥ kṛto bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:188_4: yadanena vāṅbhanoduścaritena akuśalena karmābhisaṃskāreṇa abhisaṃskṛtena saṃcitenācitenopacitena iyacciraduḥkhaṃ pratyanubhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:188_5: yā etasyaiva śāriputra duḥkhasyāprameyatā bahuduḥkhatā [Vaidya_92] vyākhyātā,
S06bsu049_u:188_6: eṣa eva śuklāṃśikasya kulaputrasya kuladuhiturvā saṃvego bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:188_7: tataḥ sa tebhyo dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyebhyaḥ karmabhyo vinivṛtya puṇyābhisaṃskārameva kuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:188_8: jīvitahetor api saddharmaṃ na pratikṣepsyati - mā bhūdasmākam api tādṛśairduḥkhai samavadhānamiti /
S06bsu049_u:189_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - susaṃvṛtakāyakarmavākkarmamanaskarmaṇā bhagavan kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:189_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? yatra hi nāma bhagavan evaṃrūpeṇa vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
S06bsu049_u:189_2: katamena punarbhagavan karmaṇā iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
S06bsu049_u:189_3: bhagavānāha - evaṃrūpeṇa subhūte vāgdurbhāṣitena iyān mahāpuṇyaskandhaḥ prasūyate /
S06bsu049_u:189_4: ihaiva te subhūte mohapuruṣāḥ svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:189_5: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūṣayitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:189_6: pratikṣeptavyāṃ maṃsyante, pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante / prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca pratibādhitāyāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhabodhiḥ pratibādhitā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:189_7: buddhabodhau pratibādhitāyāmatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā pratibādhitā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:189_10: tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghe 'pi pratibādhite evaṃ tasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ triratnātparibāhyabhāvo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:190_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ko 'tra bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yatsa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate? bhagavānāha - mārādhiṣṭhito vā subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:190_1: duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyena vā karmaṇā gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu nāsya śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:190_2: nāsya prasādaḥ / ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ pāpābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgataḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pratibādhiṣyate /
S06bsu049_u:190_3: punaraparaṃ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā pāpamitrahastagato vā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:190_4: anabhiyukto vā bhaviṣyati, skandhābhiniviṣṭo vā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:190_5: ātmotkarṣī pareṣāṃ paṃsako doṣāntaraprekṣī vā bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:190_6: ebhirapi subhūte caturbhirākāraiḥ sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:190_7: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāṃ pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyate iti /
S06bsu049_u:195_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - duradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena kuśalamūlavirahitena pāpamitrahastagatena /
S06bsu049_u:195_2: evam etat / duradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena parīttakuśalamūlena durmedhasā anarthikena alpaśrutena hīnaprajñena pāpamitropastabdhena aśuśrūṣaṇāparipṛcchakajātīyena kuśaleṣu dharmeṣvanabhiyuktena /
S06bsu049_u:196_0: subhūtirāha - kiyadgambhīrā bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā duradhimocatayā? bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ subhūte abaddhamamuktam /
S06bsu049_u:196_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? pūrvāntāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte rūpam /
S06bsu049_u:196_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? aparāntāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte rūpam /
S06bsu049_u:196_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? pratyutpannāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte pratyutpannaṃ rūpam /
S06bsu049_u:196_13: tatkasya hetoḥ? pūrvāntāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte vijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:196_15: tatkasya hetoḥ? aparāntāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte vijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:196_17: tatkasya hetoḥ? pratyutpannāsvabhāvaṃ hi subhūte pratyutpannaṃ vijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:197_1: paramaduradhimocā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena /
S06bsu049_u:197_4: paramaduradhimocā subhūte prajñāpāramitā anabhiyuktena anavaropitakuśalamūlena pāpamitrahastagatena māravaśagatena kusīdena hīnavīryeṇa muṣitasmṛtinā duṣprajñena /
S06bsu049_u:197_6: sā phalaviśuddhiḥ, yā phalaviśuddhiḥ, sā rūpaviśuddhiḥ / iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:197_7: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito rūpaviśuddhī rupaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:197_8: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / yā subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiḥ, sā phalaviśuddhiḥ, yā phalaviśuddhiḥ sā vijñānaviśuddhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:197_9: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiś ca phalaviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:197_10: iti hi subhūte phalaviśuddhito vijñānaviśuddhirvijñānaviśuddhitaḥ phalaviśuddhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:197_11: punaraparaṃ subhūte yā rūpaviśuddhiḥ sā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:197_13: iti hi subhūte rūpaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:197_16: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / yā subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiḥ sā sarvajñatāviśuddhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:197_18: iti hi subhūte vijñānaviśuddhiś ca sarvajñatāviśuddhiś ca advayametadadvaidhīkāramabhinnamacchinnam /
S06bsu049_u:198_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:198_16: āha - na jānāti na saṃjānīte bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:198_18: āha - kiṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte? bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:198_20: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ śāriputra prajñāpāramitā na jānāti na saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:198_22: āha - prajñāpāramitā bhagavan sarvajñatāyā nāpakāraṃ karoti,
S06bsu049_u:198_24: āha - prajñāpāramitā bhagavan na kaṃciddharmaṃ parigṛhṇāti,
S06bsu049_u:198_26: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ātmaviśuddhito bhagavan rūpaviśuddhiḥ? bhagavānāha - atyantaviśuddhatvātsubhūte /
S06bsu049_u:198_29: āha - ātmaviśuddhito bhagavan phalaviśuddhiḥ? bhagavānāha - atyantaviśuddhatvātsubhūte /
S06bsu049_u:198_31: āha - ātmaviśuddhito bhagavan na prāptirnābhisamaya? bhagavānāha - atyantaviśuddhatvātsubhūte /
S06bsu049_u:198_32: āha - ātmāparyantatayā bhagavan rūpāparyatantā? bhagavānāha - atyantaviśuddhatvātsubhūte /
S06bsu049_u:198_33: āha - ātmāparyantatayā bhagavan vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskāravijñānāparyantatā? bhagavānāha - atyantaviśuddhatvātsubhūte /
S06bsu049_u:198_34: āha - ya evamasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhagavan avabodhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:198_36: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - sā khalu punariyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā nāpare tīre,
S06bsu049_u:198_37: na pare tīre, nāpyubhayamantareṇa viprakṛtā sthitā /
S06bsu049_u:199_0: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - evam api bhagavan saṃjñāsyate bodhisattvo mahāsattvo riñciṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkariṣyatīmāṃ prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:199_3: evam etat / tatkasya hetoḥ? nāmato 'pi hi subhūto saṅgo nimittato 'pi saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:199_4: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā svākhyātā sunirdiṣṭā supariniṣṭhitā,
S06bsu049_u:199_5: yatra hi nāma bhagavatā ime 'pi saṅgā ākhyātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:199_6: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katame te āyuṣman subhūte saṅgāḥ? subhūtirāha - rūpamāyuṣman śāriputra śūnyamiti saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:199_7: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānamāyuṣman śāriputra śūnyamiti saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:199_9: saṅgaḥ / anāgateṣu dharmeṣvanāgatā dharmā iti saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:199_10: saṅgaḥ / pratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu pratyutpannā dharmā iti saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:199_11: saṅgaḥ / iyantaṃ puṇyaskandhaṃ prasūyate bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalaḥ prathamena cittotpādeneti saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:199_12: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamena ārya subhūte paryāyeṇa saṅgaḥ? subhūtirāha - sacetkauśika tadbodhicittaṃ saṃjānīte - idaṃ tatprathamaṃ bodhicittamiti,
S06bsu049_u:199_14: na ca cittaprakṛtiḥ śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā mahāyānasaṃprasthitena /
S06bsu049_u:199_15: tasmāttarhi kauśika paraṃ saṃdarśayatā samādāpayatā samuttejayatā saṃpraharṣayatā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau bhūtānugamena saṃdarśayitavyaṃ samādāpayitavyaṃ samuttejayitavyaṃ saṃpraharṣayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:199_16: evamātmānaṃ ca na kṣiṇoti, buddhānujñātayā ca samādāpanayā paraṃ samādāpayati sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā /
S06bsu049_u:200_0: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmate subhūtaye sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu049_u:200_2: tena hi subhūte anyān api sūkṣmatarān saṅgānākhyāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:200_3: tān śṛṇu, sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S06bsu049_u:200_4: bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavan ityāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S06bsu049_u:201_0: bhagavānetadavocat - iha subhūte śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ nimittato manasi karoti /
S06bsu049_u:201_2: tāvantaḥ saṅgāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? nimittato hi subhūte saṅgaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:201_3: iti hi so 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ ye anāsravā dharmāstānanumode ityanumodya anumodanāsahagataṃ kuśalamūlamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmīti pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:201_4: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06bsu049_u:201_5: na sā atītā vā anāgatā vā pratyutpannā vā /
S06bsu049_u:201_7: sā tryadhvanirmuktā / yā tryadhvanirmuktā, na sā śakyā pariṇāmayituṃ na nimittīkartuṃ nārambaṇīkartum /
S06bsu049_u:203_2: sā prajñāpāramitā / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte akṛtāḥ sarvadharmāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenābhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:203_3: subhūtirāha - tasmāttarhi bhagavan sarvadharmā anabhisaṃbuddhāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena? bhagavānāha - tathāhi subhūte prakṛtyaiva na te dharmāḥ kiṃcit /
S06bsu049_u:203_4: yā ca prakṛtiḥ, sā aprakṛtiḥ, yā ca prakṛtiḥ, sā prakṛtiḥ sarvadharmāṇāmekalakṣaṇatvādyaduta alakṣaṇatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:203_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte dve dharmaprakṛtī /
S06bsu049_u:203_9: sā aprakṛtiḥ, yā ca aprakṛtiḥ, sā prakṛtiḥ / evametāḥ subhūte sarvāḥ saṅgakoṭyo vivarjitā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:204_3: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:204_5: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā na cittena jñātavyā na cittagamanīyā /
S06bsu049_u:205_0: āha - tena hi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kathaṃ caritavyam? bhagavānāha - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caranna rūpe carati,
S06bsu049_u:205_1: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ sacenna vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:205_2: sacenna vijñāne carati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / sacedrūpamanityamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:205_3: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / sacedvijñānamanityamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:205_4: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / sacedrūpaṃ śūnyamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:205_5: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / sacedvijñānaṃ śūnyamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:205_6: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / sacedrūpamapratipūrṇaṃ pratipūrṇamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:205_7: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / yā ca rūpasyāpratipūrṇatā pratipūrṇatā vā,
S06bsu049_u:205_8: na tadrūpam / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / sacedvijñānamapratipūrṇaṃ pratipūrṇamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:205_9: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / yā ca vijñānasyāpratipūrṇatā pratipūrṇatā vā,
S06bsu049_u:206_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadevaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sasaṅgatā ca asaṅgatā ca khyātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:206_1: bhagavānāha - rūpaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti subhūte na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_2: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti subhūte na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_3: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / cakṣuḥ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_5: evaṃ yāvanmanaḥsaṃsparśajā vedanā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_6: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / pṛthivīdhātuḥ sasaṅgo 'saṅga iti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_7: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / yāvadvijñānadhātuḥ sasaṅgo 'saṅga iti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_8: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / dānapāramitā sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_9: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:206_11: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā balāni vaiśāradyāni pratisaṃvido aṣṭādaśāveṇikā buddhadharmāḥ sasaṅgāsaṅgā iti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_12: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / srotaāpattiphalaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_13: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalamanāgāmiphalamarhattvaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_14: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / pratyekabuddhatvaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_15: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / buddhatvaṃ sasaṅgamasaṅgamiti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_16: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / sarvajñatāpi subhūte sasaṅgāsaṅgeti na carati,
S06bsu049_u:206_17: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:206_18: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:206_19: na vijñāne saṅgaṃ janayati / na cakṣuṣi saṅgaṃ janayati / yāvanna manaḥsaṃsparśajāyāṃ vedanāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati /
S06bsu049_u:206_23: na śīlapāramitāyāṃ na kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ na vīryapāramitāyāṃ na dhyānapāramitāyāṃ na prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:206_24: na bodhipakṣeṣu dharmeṣu, na baleṣu, na vaiśāradyeṣu, na pratisaṃvitsu, nāṣṭādaśasvāveṇikeṣu buddhadharmeṣu saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:206_26: na sakṛdāgāmiphale na anāgāmiphale na arhattve saṅgaṃ janayati,
S06bsu049_u:206_30: tatkasya hetoḥ? asaktā abaddhā amuktā asamatikrāntā hi subhūte sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:206_31: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvasaṅgasamatikramāya bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
S06bsu049_u:207_3: adeśyamānāpi na parihīyate / deśyamānāpi na vardhate / adeśyamānāpi na vardhate / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:207_4: evametatsubhūte, evam etat / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhannākāśasya varṇaṃ bhāṣeta,
S06bsu049_u:207_5: nākāśasya vṛddhirbhavet / abhāṣyamāṇe 'pi varṇe naivākāśasya parihānirbhavet /
S06bsu049_u:207_6: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte māyāpuruṣo bhāṣyamāṇe 'pi varṇe nānunīyate na saṃkliśyate,
S06bsu049_u:207_8: na saṃkliśyate / evameva subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06bsu049_u:208_0: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayan na saṃsīdati notplavate /
S06bsu049_u:208_1: atra ca nāma yogamāpadyate, na ca pratyudāvartate / ākāśabhāvanaiṣā bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitābhāvanā /
S06bsu049_u:208_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? ākāśena sārdhaṃ sa bhagavan saṃnaddhukāmo yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ badhnāti /
S06bsu049_u:208_6: śūro bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ sattvānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhukāmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:208_9: mahāvīryapāramitāsaṃnāhaprāptaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo ya ākāśasamānāṃ dharmadhātusamānāṃ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyate /
S06bsu049_u:209_0: atha khalvanyatamo bhikṣuryena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai /
S06bsu049_u:209_1: tathā hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā na kaṃciddharmamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:210_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya ārya subhūte atra prajñāpāramitāyāmeva yogamāpatsyate,
S06bsu049_u:210_1: kva sa yogamāpatsyate? subhūtirāha - ākāśe sa kauśika yogamāpatsyate,
S06bsu049_u:211_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - ājñāpayatu bhagavān /
S06bsu049_u:211_1: tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ karomi ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dhārayati /
S06bsu049_u:211_2: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ kauśika taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ kariṣyasi? śakra āha - no hīdamārya subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:211_3: subhūtirāha - evaṃ kauśika sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:211_6: lapsyante 'sya avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo manuṣyāś ca amanuṣyāś ca avatāram /
S06bsu049_u:211_7: api ca kauśika ākāśasya sa rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta,
S06bsu049_u:211_8: yo bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhātavyāṃ manyeta prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:211_9: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika pratibalastvaṃ pratiśrutkāyā rakṣāvaraṇagupti saṃvidhātum? śakra āha - na hyetadārya subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:211_10: subhūtirāha - evameva kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran viharan pratiśrutkopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti parijānāti /
S06bsu049_u:211_11: sa ca tānna manyate, na samanupaśyati, na jānāti na saṃjānīte / te ca dharmā na vidyante na saṃdṛśyante na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante iti viharati /
S06bsu049_u:212_0: atha khalu buddhānubhāvena ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau catvāro mahārājānaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:212_1: sarve ca śakrā devendrāḥ, sarve ca mahābrahmāṇaḥ, sahāpatiś ca mahābrahmā, te sarve yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:212_2: [Vaidya_99] upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte 'tiṣṭhan /
S06bsu049_u:212_4: sarve ca śakrā devendrāḥ, sarve ca brahmakāyikā devā mahābrahmāṇaśca,
S06bsu049_u:212_5: sahāpatiś ca mahābrahmā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhasahasraṃ samānvāharanti sma /
S06bsu049_u:212_6: ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padairebhirevākṣaraiḥ subhūtināmadheyaireva bhikṣubhiriyameva prajñāpāramitopadiṣṭā,
S06bsu049_u:212_8: tatrāpi śakrā eva devendrāḥ paripṛcchanti sma,
S06bsu049_u:212_9: paripraśnayanti sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe iyameva prajñāpāramitā bhāṣitā /
S06bsu049_u:212_10: maitreyo 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe enāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate iti /
S06bsu049_u:217_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramiteti bhagavan nāmadheyamātram etat /
S06bsu049_u:217_2: vāgvastveva nāmetyucyate / sāpi prajñāpāramitā na vidyate nopalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:217_3: yathaiva nāma, tathaiva prajñāpāramitā / yathā prajñāpāramitā tathā nāma /
S06bsu049_u:217_5: kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya ebhireva nāmabhiḥ ebhireva padaiḥ ebhirevākṣaraiḥ asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tathā hi subhūte maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ nityaṃ nānityaṃ na rūpaṃ baddhaṃ na muktam,
S06bsu049_u:217_7: evaṃ nā vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān /
S06bsu049_u:217_8: na vijñānaṃ nityaṃ nānityam, na vijñānaṃ baddhaṃ na muktam,
S06bsu049_u:217_10: anena subhūte kāraṇena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya ebhireva nāmabhirebhireva padavyañjanairasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate /
S06bsu049_u:218_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - pariśuddhā bateyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā? bhagavānāha - rūpaviśuddhitaḥ subhūte pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:218_1: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaviśuddhitaḥ subhūte pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:218_6: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānanirupalepāparigrahatayā subhūte pariśuddhā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:219_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - sulabdhā bata lābhāsteṣāṃ bhagavan kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca,
S06bsu049_u:219_2: prāgeva ya udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:219_4: na śrotrarogo na ghrāṇarogo na jihvārogo na kāyarogo bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:219_5: na dhandhāyitatā bhaviṣyati, na te viṣamāparihāreṇa kālaṃ kariṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:219_6: bahūni caiṣāṃ devatāsahasrāṇi pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:219_7: aṣṭamīṃ caturdaśīṃ pañcadaśīṃ ca sa dharmabhāṇakaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā yatra yatra prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:219_10: evam etat / bahūni subhūte tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā devatāsahasrāṇi [Vaidya_101] pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhāni bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:219_11: bahūni ca devatāsahasrāṇi tatrāgamiṣyanti sarvāṇi dharmaśravaṇārthikāni /
S06bsu049_u:219_12: tāni ca rakṣāvaraṇaguptiṃ saṃvidhāsyanti tasya dharmabhāṇakasya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇasya /
S06bsu049_u:219_13: tatkasya hetoḥ? sadevamānuṣāsurasya hi subhūte lokasya prajñāpāramitā anuttaraṃ ratnam /
S06bsu049_u:219_14: ato 'pi subhūte kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:219_15: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bahavo 'ntarāyā bhaviṣyanti asyā gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā likhyamānāyā udgṛhyamāṇāyā dhāryamāṇāyā vācyamānāyāḥ paryavāpyamānāyāḥ pravartyamānāyā upadiśyamānāyā uddiśyamānāyāḥ svādhyāyyamānāyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:219_16: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bahupratyarthikāni mahāratnāni bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:219_18: anuttaraṃ cedaṃ subhūte mahāratnaṃ lokasya yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:219_24: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte sarve te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante /
S06bsu049_u:219_27: tathā hi subhūte rūpanirupalepatayā anupalipteyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:219_28: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānanirupalepatayā subhūte anupalipteyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:219_29: sacedevam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:219_30: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / sā khalu punariyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā na kasyaciddharmasyāveśikā vā niveśikā vā saṃdarśikā vā nidarśikā vā āvāhikā vā nirvāhikā vā /
S06bsu049_u:220_0: atha khalu saṃbahulāni devaputrasahasrāṇi antarīkṣe kilakilāprakṣveḍitena cailavikṣepānakārṣuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:220_1: dvitīyaṃ batedaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ jambūdvīpe paśyāma iti cāvocan /
S06bsu049_u:220_2: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtiṃ sthavirametadavocat - nedaṃ subhūte dvitīyaṃ dharmacakrapravartanaṃ nāpi kasyaciddharmasya pravartanaṃ vā nivartanaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:221_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavaṃstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06bsu049_u:221_1: yasyāsaṅgatā sarvadharmeṣu, yo 'sāvanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmo na ca kaṃciddharmamabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:221_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi kaściddharmo ya upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:221_5: yo vā dharmaḥ sūcyate / nāpi kaściddharmaṃ pravartayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:221_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? atyantānabhinirvṛttā hi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:221_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? ādyanabhinirvṛttā hi bhagavan sarvadharmāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:222_1: evam etat / na hi subhūte śūnyatā pravartate vā nivartate vā /
S06bsu049_u:222_2: nāpi subhūte ānimittaṃ pravartate vā nivartate vā /
S06bsu049_u:222_3: nāpi subhūte apraṇihitaṃ pravartate vā nivartate vā /
S06bsu049_u:222_4: yā subhūte evaṃ deśanā, iyaṃ sā sarvadharmāṇāṃ deśanā /
S06bsu049_u:222_6: nāpi kenacicchrutā, nāpi kenacitpratīcchitā, nāpi kenacitsākṣātkṛtā, nāpi kenacitsākṣātkriyate, nāpi kenacitsākṣātkariṣyate /
S06bsu049_u:222_7: nāpyanayā dharmadeśanayā kaścitparinirvṛto nāpi parinirvāsyati nāpi parinirvāti /
S06bsu049_u:223_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - asatpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan ākāśasattāmupādāya /
S06bsu049_u:228_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - pūrvajinakṛtādhikārāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca bhaviṣyanti bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:228_3: kaḥ punarvādo ya enāmevaṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:228_4: udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:228_5: tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante / na te avaramātrakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:228_7: paripṛṣṭāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāśca te buddhā bhagavanto bhaviṣyanti kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiścaināmeva prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:228_10: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:228_11: tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante / bahubuddhāvaropitakuśalamūlāste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:228_12: ya etasyāmeva gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante na saṃleṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:228_15: na bhagnapṛṣṭhīkariṣyanti, notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:229_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ caitasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya bhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan ihaivaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā abhiśraddadhadavakalpayannadhimucya prasannacitto bodhāya cittamutpādya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:229_1: tathatvāya śikṣiṣyate, tathatvāya pratipatsyate, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyate, yathāvinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā sa dhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:229_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? gambhīrā bhagavan iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:229_3: na hi bhagavan parīttakuśalamūlenāparipṛcchakajātīyena aśrutvā buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃmukhībhāvataḥ pūrvamacaritavatā ihaiveyamevaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā adhimoktuṃ śakyā /
S06bsu049_u:229_5: pūrvāntato'pi bhagavaṃstaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā /
S06bsu049_u:229_7: na hi bhagavan acaritavadbhiḥ pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śakyā adhimoktum /
S06bsu049_u:229_8: ye'pi ca pratikṣepsyanti enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇām,
S06bsu049_u:229_9: te'pyevaṃ veditavyāḥ - pūrvāntato'pyebhiriyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyamāṇā pratikṣiptā /
S06bsu049_u:229_10: tathā hyeṣāmasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāsti śraddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:229_11: nāsti kṣāntirnāsti rucirnāsti cchando nāsti vīryaṃ [Vaidya_105] nāstyapramādo nāstyadhimuktiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:229_12: na caibhiḥ pūrvaṃ buddhā bhagavanto buddhaśrāvakā vā paripṛṣṭāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:230_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - gambhīrā ārya śāriputra prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:230_1: kimatrāścaryaṃ syādyadasyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pūrvamacaritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nādhimucyeta? atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - namaskaromi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyai /
S06bsu049_u:230_5: evametat / sarvajñajñānasya sa kauśika namaskāraṃ karoti yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyai namaskāraṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:230_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? atonirjātā hi kauśika buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:231_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthito bhavati? kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kauśika /
S06bsu049_u:231_1: sādhu khalu punastvaṃ kauśika yastvaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamenamarthaṃ paripraṣṭavyaṃ paripraśnīkartavyaṃ manyase /
S06bsu049_u:231_3: iha kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:231_4: rūpamiti na tiṣṭhati / yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rūpe na tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:231_5: rūpamiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ rūpe yogamāpadyate / evaṃ vedanāyāṃ saṃjñāyāṃ saṃskāreṣu /
S06bsu049_u:231_6: vijñāne na tiṣṭhati, vijñānamiti na tiṣṭhati / yataḥ kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vijñāne na tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:231_7: vijñānamiti na tiṣṭhati, evaṃ vijñāne yogamāpadyate / rūpamiti kauśika na yojayati,
S06bsu049_u:231_9: evaṃ rūpamiti na tiṣṭhati / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānamiti kauśika na yojayati,
S06bsu049_u:232_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:232_5: evametat / rūpaṃ gambhīramiti śāriputra na tiṣṭhati /
S06bsu049_u:232_6: yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:232_7: evaṃ rūpe yogamāpadyate / evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ śāriputra gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati /
S06bsu049_u:232_8: yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:232_9: evaṃ vijñāne yogamāpadyate / rūpaṃ śāriputra gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate [Vaidya_106] /
S06bsu049_u:232_10: yataḥ śāriputra rūpaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:232_12: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ śāriputra gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:232_13: yataḥ śāriputra vijñānaṃ gambhīramiti na yogamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:233_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā avinivartanīyasya vyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato bhāṣitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:233_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? sa hi bhagavan na kāṅkṣiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:233_2: na vicikitsiṣyati na dhaṃdhāyiṣyati na vivadiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:234_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sacetpunarārya śāriputra avyākṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purata iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāṣyeta,
S06bsu049_u:234_1: ko doṣo bhavet? evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputraḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - dūrataḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:234_2: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlaḥ sa kauśika bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:234_3: yo'vyākṛta imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:234_4: śrutvā ca notrasiṣyati na saṃtrasiṣyati na saṃtrāsamāpatsyate /
S06bsu049_u:234_5: na cedānīmasau cireṇa vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:234_7: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo naikaṃ vā dvau vā trīn vā tathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānatikramiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:234_9: api tu tānārāgayiṣyati, ārāgayitvā tāṃstathāgatānarhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānna virāgayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:235_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - dūrataḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:235_1: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ / paripakvakuśalamūlo hi bhagavan sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:235_2: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:235_3: kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:236_1: evametat / dūrataḥ sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva āgato veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:236_2: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ / paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:236_3: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:236_4: kaḥ punarvādo'tra yaḥ śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:237_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - pratibhāti me bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:237_2: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan yo'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā svapnāntaragato'pi bodhimaṇḍe niṣīdet,
S06bsu049_u:237_3: veditavyametadbhagavan, ayaṃ bodhisattvo [Vaidya_107] mahāsattva āsanno'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:237_4: evameva bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:237_5: kaḥ punarvādaḥ śrutvā codgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayituṃ deśayituṃ upadeṣṭuṃ uddeṣṭuṃ svādhyāpanāya /
S06bsu049_u:237_8: vyākariṣyantyenaṃ buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:237_9: cirayānasaṃprasthitaḥ paripakvakuśalamūlo hi sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:237_11: kaḥ punarvādo'tra bhagavan yaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:237_12: tatkasya hetoḥ? bhūyastvena hi bhagavan dharmavyasanasaṃvartanīyaiḥ sattvāḥ karmopacayairavihitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:237_13: teṣāṃ bhūyastvena asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cittāni pratikūlāni bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:237_14: cittāni parivellayiṣyanti / na hyanupacitakuśalamūlāḥ sattvā asyāṃ bhūyastvena bhūtakoṭyāṃ praskandanti prasīdanti /
S06bsu049_u:237_15: upacitakuśalamūlāḥ khalu punaste bhagavan sūpacitakuśalamūlāḥ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:237_17: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan puruṣo yojanaśatikādaṭavīkāntārād dviyojanaśatikādvā triyojanaśatikādvā caturyojanaśatikādvā pañcayojanaśatikādvā daśayojanaśatikādvā aṭavīkāntārānniṣkrāmet /
S06bsu049_u:237_18: sa niṣkramya paśyetpūrvanimittāni gopālakān vā paśupālakān vā sīmā vā ārāmasaṃpado vā vanasaṃpado vā,
S06bsu049_u:237_19: tato'nyāpi va nimittāni, yairnimittairgrāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamo va sūcyeta /
S06bsu049_u:237_20: tasya tāni pūrvanimittāni dṛṣṭaivaṃ bhavati - yathemāni pūrvanimittāni dṛśyante,
S06bsu049_u:237_21: tathā āsanno me grāmo vā nagaraṃ vā nigamo vā iti /
S06bsu049_u:237_22: sa āśvāsaprāpto bhavati / nāsya bhūyaścoramanasikāro bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:237_23: evameva bhagavan yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate,
S06bsu049_u:237_26: nāpi tenotrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na bhetavyaṃ śrāvakabhūmervā pratyekabuddhabhūmervā /
S06bsu049_u:237_27: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi asyemāni pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante yadutemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:238_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan iha kaścideva puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ draṣṭukāmo bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:238_2: yathā yathā ca sa gacchenmahāsamudraṃ darśanāya,
S06bsu049_u:238_3: tathā tathā sacetpaśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā [Vaidya_108] parvatanimittaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:238_4: tenaivaṃ veditavyaṃ dūre tāvadito mahāsamudra iti /
S06bsu049_u:238_5: sacenna bhūyaḥ paśyetstambaṃ vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvataṃ vā parvatanimittaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:238_6: tenaivaṃ veditavyam - abhyāsanna ito mahāsamudra iti /
S06bsu049_u:238_8: na mahāsamudrasyābhyantare kaścitstambo vā stambanimittaṃ vā parvato vā parvatanimittaṃ veti /
S06bsu049_u:238_9: kiṃcāpi sa na mahāsamudraṃ sākṣātpaśyati cakṣuṣā,
S06bsu049_u:238_10: atha ca punaḥ sa niṣṭhāṃ gacchati - abhyāsanno'smi mahāsamudrasya,
S06bsu049_u:238_12: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvenemāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvatā veditavyam - kiṃcāpyahaṃ taistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairna saṃmukhaṃ vyākṛtaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:238_14: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hyenāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labhate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:238_15: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan vasante pratyupasthite śīrṇaparṇapalāśeṣu nānāvṛkṣeṣu nānāpallavāḥ prādurbhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:238_16: pallaveṣu prādurbhūteṣvāttamanaskā bhavanti jāmbūdvīpakā manuṣyāḥ tāni pūrvanimittāni vaneṣu dṛṣṭvā nacirādvanapuṣpāṇi ca phalāni ca prādurbhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:238_17: tatkasya heto? tathā hi imāni pūrvanimittāni stambeṣu dṛśyanta iti /
S06bsu049_u:238_18: evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo labhate imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:238_20: tadā paripakvakuśalaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ - tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlenopanāmiteyaṃ tasmai gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:238_22: tāḥ pramuditā bhavanti prītisaumanasyajātāḥ - paurvakāṇāmapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimānyeva pūrvanimittānyabhūvannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhervyākaraṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:238_23: nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:238_24: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan strī gurviṇī gurugarbhā /
S06bsu049_u:238_25: tasyā yadā kāyo veṣṭate, adhimātraṃ vā kāyaklamatho jāyate,
S06bsu049_u:238_27: alpāhārā ca bhavati / alpastyānamiddhā ca bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:238_28: alpabhāṣyā ca bhavati / alpasthāmā ca bhavati / vedanābahulā ca bhavati / krandantī ca bahulaṃ viharati /
S06bsu049_u:238_29: na ca saṃvāsaśīlā bhavati / paurvakeṇāyoniśomanasikāreṇāsevitena niṣevitena bhāvitena bahulīkṛtena imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāyena vedanāṃ pratyanubhavāmīti,
S06bsu049_u:238_30: tadā veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan - yathāsyāḥ pūrvanimittāni saṃdṛśyante,
S06bsu049_u:238_31: tathā nacireṇa bateyaṃ strī prasoṣyate iti /
S06bsu049_u:238_32: evameva bhagavan yadā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyeyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā upavartate darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya śravaṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:238_34: arthikatayā cotpadyate, tadā veditavyamidaṃ bhagavan - nacireṇa batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākaraṇaṃ pratilapsyate'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:239_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sādhu sādhu śāriputra /
S06bsu049_u:239_2: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsuparigṛhītāśca suparīttāśca suparīnditāśca ime bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena /
S06bsu049_u:239_3: bhagavānāha - tathā hi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bahujanahitāya [Vaidya_109] pratipannā bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:240_0: subhūtirāha - iha bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ kathaṃ prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati? bhagavānāha - yadi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran na rūpasya vṛddhiṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:240_1: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:240_3: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / na rūpasya parihāṇiṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:240_4: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ na vedanāyā na saṃjñāyā na saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:240_6: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / dharmaṃ na samanupaśyati, carati prajñāpāramitāyām / adharmamapi na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:240_7: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evamasya prajñāpāramitābhāvanā paripūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:241_2: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānaṃ hi subhūte acintyam /
S06bsu049_u:241_4: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ vedanāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānamacintyamityapi subhūte na saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:242_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ko'tra bhagavan adhimokṣayiṣyati evaṃgambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - yaḥ śāriputra caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyām,
S06bsu049_u:242_2: āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - kathaṃ bhagavan caritāvī bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:242_3: kathaṃ caritāvīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate? bhagavānāha - iha śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balāni na kalpayati,
S06bsu049_u:242_4: vaiśāradyāni na kalpayati, buddhadharmānapi na kalpayati,
S06bsu049_u:242_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? balāni hi śāriputra acintyāni,
S06bsu049_u:242_8: sarvadharmā apyacintyāḥ / evaṃ caritāvī śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kvaciccarati,
S06bsu049_u:242_9: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ sa caritāvītyucyate, caritāvīti nāmadheyaṃ labhate /
S06bsu049_u:243_0: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:243_3: āścaryaṃ bhagavan syādyadenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca bahavo'ntarāyā utpadyeran /
S06bsu049_u:243_5: evametat / bahavaḥ subhūte antarāyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca [Vaidya_110] bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:243_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate'ntarāyaṃ kartum /
S06bsu049_u:243_7: tatra śīghraṃ likhatā sacenmāsena vā māsadvayena vā māsatrayeṇa vā likhyeta,
S06bsu049_u:243_8: likhitavyaiva bhavet / sacetsaṃvatsareṇa tato vāpareṇa likhitā bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:243_9: tathāpi likhitavyaiva khalu punaḥ subhūte bhavati tena kulaputreṇa kuladuhitrā vā iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:243_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati yanmahāratnānāṃ bahavo'ntarāyā utpadyante /
S06bsu049_u:244_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - iha bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ pravartyamānāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyān bahuprakāramautsukyamāpatsyate,
S06bsu049_u:244_2: bhagavānāha - kiṃcāpi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānudyogamāpatsyate antarāyakarmaṇaḥ asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ dhāryamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamānāyāṃ pravartyamānāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ ca,
S06bsu049_u:244_3: atha ca punarna prasahiṣyate'cchidrasamādānasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntarāyaṃ kartum /
S06bsu049_u:245_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāṃ likhatāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate antarāyakaraṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:245_1: tadā kathametarhi bhagavan kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca? kasya cānubhāvena bhagavaṃste kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - buddhānāṃ śāriputra bhagavatāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmanubhāvena te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
S06bsu049_u:245_2: tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante / tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi śāriputra dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā,
S06bsu049_u:245_3: ye te'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:245_4: te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāhariṣyanti parigrahīṣyanti bhāṣyamāṇāmudgṛhyamāṇāṃ dhāryamāṇāṃ vācyamānāṃ paryavāpyamānāṃ pravartyamānāṃ deśyamānāmupadiśyamānāmuddiśyamānāṃ svādhyāyyamānāṃ likhyamānāṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:245_5: ye caināṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraścodgrahīṣyanti [Vaidya_111] dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti ca,
S06bsu049_u:245_6: tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, tāṃśca te buddhā bhagavantaḥ samanvāhariṣyanti parigrahīṣyanti ca /
S06bsu049_u:245_7: na hi śāriputra buddhasamanvāhṛtānāṃ buddhaparigṛhītānāṃ ca kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca śakyamantarāyaṃ kartum /
