S06bsu049_u:246_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ye'pi te bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
S06bsu049_u:246_1: tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, sarve te bhagavan buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhaparigraheṇa ca imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
S06bsu049_u:247_1: evametat / sarve te śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā buddhānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānena buddhaparigraheṇa ca imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
S06bsu049_u:247_2: tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante / jñātāste śāriputra tathāgatena /
S06bsu049_u:247_6: ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
S06bsu049_u:247_7: tathatvāya ca śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, śrutvo udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya likhitvā tathatvāya śikṣamāṇāstathatvāya pratipadyamānāstathatvāya yogamāpadyamānā āsannībhaviṣyantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:247_9: ye'pi śāriputra enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhitvā dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:247_13: te na tathatvāya śikṣamāṇā na tathatvāya pratipadyamānā na tathatvāya yogamāpadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ sthāsyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:247_16: te'pi tathāgatena dṛṣṭāḥ / te'pi tathāgatena vyavalokitā buddhacakṣuṣā /
S06bsu049_u:247_17: teṣāmapi śāriputra mahārthiko mahānuśaṃso mahāphalo mahāvipākaśca sa pariśramaḥ parispandaśca bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:247_18: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi prajñāpāramitā paramārthopasaṃhitā sarvadharmāṇāṃ yathābhūtaprativedhāya pratyupasthitā sarvasattvānām /
S06bsu049_u:247_19: [Vaidya_112] ime khalu punaḥ śāriputra ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntāstathāgatasyātyayena dakṣiṇāpathe pracariṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:247_22: navamaṇḍaprāpte dharmavinaye saddharmasyāntardhānakālasamaye samanvāhṛtāste śāriputra tathāgatena kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca /
S06bsu049_u:247_23: tasmin kāle ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:248_0: śāriputra āha - iyamapi bhagavan prajñāpāramitā evaṃgambhīrā paścime kāle paścime samaye vaistārikī bhaviṣyatyuttarasyāṃ diśi uttare digbhāge? bhagavānāha - ye tatra śāriputra uttarasyāṃ diśyuttare digbhāge imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā atra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpatsyante,
S06bsu049_u:248_1: te vaistārikīṃ kariṣyati / cirayānasaṃprasthitāste śāriputra bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:248_2: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:249_0: śāriputra āha - kiyantaste bhagavan bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti uttarasyāṃ diśi uttare digbhāge,
S06bsu049_u:249_1: bahava utāho alpakāḥ? ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyanti udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:249_2: tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante? bhagavānāha - bahavaste śāriputra subahavaḥ uttarāpathe uttarasyāṃ diśyuttare digbhāge bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:249_3: kiṃcāpi śāriputra bahavaste, tebhyo'pi bahubhyo'lpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:249_4: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti likhiṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:249_5: tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante, tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante, prajñāpāramitāyāṃ ca bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāvaleṣyante na saṃleṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:249_8: na bhagnapṛṣṭhīkariṣyanti, notrasiṣyanti na saṃtrasiṣyanti na saṃtrāsamāpatsyante,
S06bsu049_u:249_12: pūjitāśca taiḥ paurvakāstathāgatā arhanta samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca bodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:249_16: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi teṣāṃ [Vaidya_113] kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca mayaiva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktaiva kathā kṛtā /
S06bsu049_u:249_17: teṣāṃ jātivyativṛttānāmapi eta eva sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ samudācārā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:249_21: teṣu ca susthitāḥ samāhitāśca bhaviṣyanti asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:249_23: kutaḥ punaranyaiḥ sattvaiḥ, yaduta cchandato vā mantrato vā /
S06bsu049_u:249_24: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma taddṛḍhasthāmatvādanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:249_25: te ca kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca śrutvā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudāraṃ prītiprāmodyaprasādaṃ pratilapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:249_26: bahujanasya ca te kuśalamūlānyavaropayiṣyanti yadutānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:249_27: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśca mamāntike saṃmukhaṃ vāgbhāṣitā - bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranto vayamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprabhāvayiṣyāmaḥ saṃbodhaye pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
S06bsu049_u:249_29: tatkasya hetoḥ? anumoditaṃ hi śāriputra mayā teṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca cittena cittaṃ vyavalokya yairiyaṃ vāgbhāṣitā - bodhāya caranto vayaṃ bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyāmaḥ saṃdarśayiṣyāmaḥ samādāpayiṣyāmaḥ samuttejayiṣyāmaḥ saṃpraharṣayiṣyāmaḥ saṃprabhāvayiṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:249_32: evaṃ ca te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraśca udārādhimuktikā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:249_34: yatra saṃmukhībhūtāstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:249_35: tatra saṃmukhībhūtānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantikātpunarevaināṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vistareṇa śroṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:249_36: teṣvapi te buddhakṣetreṣu bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatāni bahūni prāṇikoṭīsahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīśatasahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇikoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāṇi anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti saṃprabhāvayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:250_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadidaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣu nāsti kiṃcidadṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā avijñātaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:250_1: na sa kaściddharmo yo na jñāto na sa kāciccaryā sattvānāṃ yā na vijñātā,
S06bsu049_u:250_2: yatra hi nāma anāgatānāmapi bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātā bodhicchandikānāmadhyāśayasaṃpannānāmārabdhavīryāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:250_3: [Vaidya_114] ye tasmin kāle imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyanti upadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
S06bsu049_u:250_4: ye ca tasmin kāle āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ sarvasattvānāmarthāya udyogamāpadya anveṣiṣyante paryeṣiṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:250_5: gaveṣiṣyante, teṣāṃ ca kulaputrānāṃ kṛladuhitṝṇāṃ ca anveṣamāṇānāṃ paryeṣamāṇānāṃ kecidgaveṣamāṇā bodhisattvā lapsyante,
S06bsu049_u:250_6: kecinna lapsyante, kecidagaveṣayanto'pi lapsyante enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:250_7: kimatra bhagavan kāraṇam? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - evametacchāriputra,
S06bsu049_u:250_8: evametat / nāsti kiṃcittathāgatasya atītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣvadṛṣṭaṃ vā aśrutaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā avijñātaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:250_9: tasmin khalu punaḥ śāriputra kāle tasmin samaye kecidbodhisattvā mārgayamāṇā paryeṣamāṇā gaveṣamāṇā api lapsyante imāṃ prajñāpāramitām /
S06bsu049_u:250_11: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tairbodhisattvairmahāsattvairiyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato'pi anikṣiptadhurairmārgitā ca paryanviṣṭā ca /
S06bsu049_u:250_12: te tenaiva pūrvakeṇa kuśalamūlacchandena enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmamārgayanto'pi aparyeṣamāṇā api agaveṣayanto'pi lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:250_13: yānyapi ca tato'nyānyapi sūtrāṇi enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmabhivadanti,
S06bsu049_u:250_14: tāni caiṣāṃ svayamevopagamiṣyanti upapatsyante upanaṃsyante ca /
S06bsu049_u:250_15: tatkasya hetoḥ? evametacchāriputra bhavati - ya enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nikṣiptadhuro mārgayati ca paryeṣate ca,
S06bsu049_u:250_16: sa jātivyativṛtto'pi janmāntaravyativṛtto'pi enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsyate /
S06bsu049_u:250_17: tato'nyāni ca sūtrāṇi prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni tasya svayamevopagamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:251_0: evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - ime eva kevalaṃ bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāḥ sūtrāntā upapatsyante upanaṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:251_1: nānye? bhagavānāha - ye cānye'pi śāriputra gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:251_2: te'pi teṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca svayamevopapatsyante svayamevopanaṃsyante ca /
S06bsu049_u:251_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetacchāriputra bhavati - ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau prasthāpayiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti prabhāvayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:251_5: avinivartanīyān kariṣyanti, svayaṃ ca tatra śikṣiṣyante, teṣāṃ śāriputra jātivyativṛttānāmapi ime gambhīrā gambhīrā anupalambhapratisaṃyuktāḥ śūnyatāpratisaṃyuktāḥ ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāśca sūtrāntāḥ svayamevopagamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:256_0: atha khalu āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - guṇā ime bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ kulaputrāṇāṃ kuladuhitṝṇāṃ ca bhagavatā parikīrtitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:256_1: kecitpunarbhagavaṃsteṣāmantarāyā utpatsyante? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - bahūni subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarmāṇyantarāyakarāṇyutpasyante /
S06bsu049_u:256_2: subhūtirāha - kiyadrūpāṇi bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ bahūni mārakarmāṇyantarāyakarāṇyutpatsyante? bhagavānāha - teṣāṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ cireṇa pratibhānamutpatsyate /
S06bsu049_u:256_4: tad api ca pratibhānaṃ jāyamānameva vikṣepsyate /
S06bsu049_u:256_12: smṛtiṃ na pratilapsyante / idam api subhūte mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:256_21: na vayamatra gādhaṃ nāsvādaṃ labhāmahe ityutthāyāsanātprakramiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:256_25: na no 'tra grāmasya vā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā nāmadheyaṃ parigṛhītaṃ yatra no janma,
S06bsu049_u:256_26: na no 'tra nāma gotraṃ vā gṛhītam,
S06bsu049_u:256_32: tairyāvadbhiścittotpādaistathā tathā tāvataḥ kalpān saṃsārasya punaḥ punaḥ parigrahīṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:256_34: tatkasmāt? imāṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāmaśṛṇvanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvā laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu na nirjāyante /
S06bsu049_u:256_35: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:256_36: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya ye te sūtrāntā naiva sarvajñajñānasyāhārikāstān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:256_37: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:256_38: yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte na laukikalokottareṣu śikṣitukāmā na laukikalokottareṣu dharmeṣu niryātukāmā iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na śikṣante /
S06bsu049_u:256_40: evaṃ te parīttabuddhayo laukikalokottarāṇāṃ yathābhūtaparijñāyā mūlaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya praśākhāmadhyālambitavyāṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:256_41: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kukkuraḥ svāmino 'ntikātpiṇḍāṃśchorayitvā karmakarasyāntikātkavalaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ manyeta,
S06bsu049_u:256_43: pudgalāḥ, ye imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvajñajñānasya mūlaṃ chorayitvā śākhāpatrapalālabhūte śrāvakapratyekabuddhayāne [Vaidya_116] sāraṃ vṛddhatvaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:256_44: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:256_45: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi te 'lpabuddhayo jñāsyanti - prajñāpāramitā āhārikā sarvajñajñānasyeti /
S06bsu049_u:256_46: te prajñāpāramitāṃ vivarjya utsṛjya chorayitvā tato 'nye sūtrāntā ye śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti,
S06bsu049_u:256_50: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yathā śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante /
S06bsu049_u:256_51: kathaṃ ca subhūte śrāvakayānikāḥ pratyekabuddhayānikā vā pudgalāḥ śikṣante? teṣāṃ subhūte evaṃ bhavati - ekamātmānaṃ damayiṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:256_54: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:256_55: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ śikṣitavyam - ātmānaṃ ca tathatāyāṃ sthāpayiṣyāmi sarvalokānugrahāya,
S06bsu049_u:256_59: na ca tairmantavyam / tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo hastinamapaśyan hastino varṇasaṃsthāne paryeṣeta /
S06bsu049_u:256_60: so 'ndhakāre hastinaṃ labdhvā yena prakāśaṃ tenopanidhyāyeta /
S06bsu049_u:256_63: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ purūṣo bhavet? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:256_64: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:256_65: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmajānānā aparipṛcchantastāṃ chorayitvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakabhūmimabhivadanti,
S06bsu049_u:256_68: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:256_69: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ratnārthikaḥ puruṣo mahāsamudraṃ dṛṣṭvā nāvagāheta,
S06bsu049_u:256_73: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte - api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:256_74: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte tathārūpāste bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:256_75: ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvāpyanavagāhamānā avijānantastakṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:256_82: pratyekabodhiṃ prāpnuyāmiti, dṛṣṭa eva dharme anupādāya āsravebhyaścittaṃ vimocya parinirvāpayāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:256_85: tatkasya hetoḥ? mahāyānasaṃprasthitā hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:256_87: tatkasya hetoḥ? lokapariṇāyakā hi bhavanti te satpuruṣā lokārthakarāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:256_89: ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte aparipakvakuśalamūlāḥ parīttakubuddhikā mṛdukādhyāśayā bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:256_90: te ṣaṭpāramitāpratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntānajānānā anavabuddhyamānā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ chorayitvā ye te sūtrāntāḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmimabhivandanti,
S06bsu049_u:256_92: idam api subhūte mārakarma veditavyaṃ teṣāṃ tathārūpāṇāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānām tadyathāpi nāma subhūte palagaṇḍo vā palagaṇḍāntevāsī vā vaijayantasya prāsādasya pramāṇena prāsādaṃ kartukāmo nirmātukāmaḥ syāt /
S06bsu049_u:256_96: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte vaijayantaprāsādapramāṇaṃ prāsādaṃ kartukāmena nirmātukāmena sūryācandramasorvimānātpramāṇaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:256_97: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:256_98: ye prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:256_99: ye te sūtrāntā evamabhivadanti - ekamātmānaṃ damayiṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:256_104: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te paṇḍitajātīyāḥ bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:256_105: bhagavānāha - idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:256_106: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rājānaṃ ca cakravartinaṃ bhraṣṭukāmo bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:256_108: dṛṣṭvā ca īdṛśo rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ceti nimittaṃ gṛhītvā koṭṭarājaṃ paśyet /
S06bsu049_u:256_109: sa tasya koṭṭarājasya varṇaṃ saṃsthānaṃ teja ṛddhiṃ ca nimittaṃ ca gṛhītvā apratibalo viśeṣagrahaṇaṃ prati evaṃ vadet - īdṛśa eva sa rājā cakravartī varṇena saṃsthānena tejasā ṛddhyā ca nimittena ceti /
S06bsu049_u:256_110: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyo yaścakravartinaṃ koṭṭarājena samīkartavyaṃ manyeta? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:256_111: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:256_112: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā prajñāpāramitāmutsṛjya śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntaiḥ sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:256_113: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:256_114: na khalu punarahaṃ subhūte ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktaiḥ sūtrāntairbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvajñatāṃ paryeṣitavyāṃ vadāmi /
S06bsu049_u:256_115: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte yattathāgatena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmupāyakauśalyamākhyātam,
S06bsu049_u:256_116: tatrāśikṣitvā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na niryāsyatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:256_117: tatkasya hetoḥ? [Vaidya_118] dhandhako hyanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu bodhisattvasamudāgamaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:256_118: tasmāttarhi subhūte tathāgata enāmanuśaṃsāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ paśyan anekaparyāyeṇa bodhisattvān mahāsattvānasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati saṃniveśayati pratiṣṭhāpayati - evaṃ bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā bhaveyuranuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:256_119: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvāḥ pratibhānti,
S06bsu049_u:256_120: ye avinivartanīyayānaṃ mahāyānamavāpya samāsādya punareva tadvivarjya vivartya hīnayānaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:256_121: bhagavānāha - tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bubhukṣitaḥ puruṣaḥ śatarasaṃ bhojanaṃ labdhvā hitavipākaṃ sukhavipākaṃ yāvadāyuḥparyantaṃ kṣutpipāsānivartakam,
S06bsu049_u:256_123: ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ labdhvā śatarasaṃ bhojanamutsṛjya vivarjya taṃ ṣaṣṭikodanaṃ paribhoktavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:256_124: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣaḥ paṇḍitajātīyo bhavet? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:256_125: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:256_126: ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā prajñāpāramitāṃ labdhvā prajñāpāramitāṃ riñciṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:256_130: chorayitvā prajñāpāramitāṃ dūrīkṛtya tataḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānapratisaṃyuktān sūtrāntān paryeṣitavyān maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:256_133: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:256_134: bhagavānāha - idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:256_135: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo 'nardhyaṃ maṇiratnaṃ labdhvā alpārdhyeṇa alpasāreṇa maṇiratnena sārdhaṃ samīkartavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:256_136: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa paṇḍitajātīyaḥ puruṣo veditavyaḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:256_137: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani eke bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:256_138: ya idaṃ gambhīraṃ prabhāsvaraṃ prajñāpāramitāratnaṃ labdhvā śrutvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānena samīkartavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:256_139: śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmau ca sarvajñatāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:256_140: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu paṇḍitajātīyāste bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:256_141: bhagavānāha - idam api subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:256_142: punaraparaṃ subhūte asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāsyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāmantaśo likhyamānāyām api bahūni pratibhānānyutpatsyante,
S06bsu049_u:256_144: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:257_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - śakyā punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā likhitum? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ sūbhūte /
S06bsu049_u:257_1: ye kecitsubhūte prajñāpāramitāṃ lipyakṣarairlikhitvā prajñāpāramitā likhiteti maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:257_3: anakṣareti vā, idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:258_0: [Vaidya_119] punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ deśamanasikārā utpatsyante,
S06bsu049_u:258_8: bhayamanasikārā utpatsyante, strīmanasikārā utpatsyante, puruṣamanasikārā utpatsyante,
S06bsu049_u:258_16: cailamanasikārā utpatsyante, śayanāsanamanasikārā jīvitamanasikārā itikartavyatāmanasikārā rāgamanasikārā dveṣamanasikārā mohamanasikārā ṛtumanasikārā sukālamanasikārā duṣkālamanasikārā gītamanasikārā vādyamanasikārā nṛtyamanasikārā kāvyanāṭaketihāsamanasikārāḥ śāstramanasikārā vyavahāramanasikārā hāsyamanasikārā lāsyamanasikārāḥ śokamanasikārā āyāsamanasikārā ātmamanasikārāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:258_17: ityetāṃścānyāṃś ca subhūte manasikārān māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃhariṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmudgṛhyamāṇāyāṃ vācyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāmantaśo likhyamānāyāmantarāyaṃ kariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:258_21: punaraparaṃ subhūte utpatsyante rājamanasikārāḥ kumāramanasikārāhastimanasikārā aśvamanasikārā rathamanasikārā gulmadarśanamanasikārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:258_22: idam api subhūte teṣāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:258_23: punaraparaṃ subhūte utpatsyante agnimanasikārā icchāmanasikārā dhanadhānyasamṛddhimanasikārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:258_24: idam api subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:259_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmutpatsyante lābhasatkāracīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārāṇāmantarāyā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāmantaśo likhatāṃ lābhasatkāraślokasvādāścittotpīḍā vā /
S06bsu049_u:260_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmimāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇānāṃ deśayatāmupadiśatāmuddiśatāṃ svādhyāyatāmantaśo likhatāṃ ye te gambhīrā gambhīrāḥ sūtrāntā bhaviṣyanti śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyuktāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:260_1: tān māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣaṇopasaṃkramya upasaṃhariṣyati - iha śikṣasva,
S06bsu049_u:260_2: idaṃ likha, idamuddiśa, idaṃ svādhyāya, itaḥ sarvajñatā niṣpatsyate iti /
S06bsu049_u:260_3: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upāyakuśalena tebhyaḥ spṛhotpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:260_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? kiṃ cāpi subhūte teṣu sūtrānteṣu śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitāni bhāṣitāni,
S06bsu049_u:260_5: [Vaidya_120] na khalu punarupāyakauśalyaṃ tatra bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākhyātam /
S06bsu049_u:260_7: te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitavyāṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:260_8: te imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ riñcitvā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmipratisaṃyukteṣu sūtrānteṣu upāyakauśalyaṃ paryeṣitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:260_9: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:261_1: dharmabhāṇakaś ca kilāsī bhaviṣyati na dharmaṃ deśayitukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:261_2: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:261_3: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca akilāsī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāṃ dātukāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:261_4: dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca kilāsī vā bahukṛtyo vā bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:261_5: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:261_6: punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaśchandiko bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītukāmo dhārayitukāmo vācayitukāmaḥ paryavāptukāmaḥ pravartayitukāmo 'ntaśo likhitukāmo 'pi bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:261_7: gatimāṃś ca matimāṃś ca smṛtimāṃś ca bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:261_8: dharmabhāṇakaścānyaddeśāntaraṃ kṣepsyate noddhaṭṭitajño vā na vā vipañcitajñaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:261_9: anabhijño vā bhaviṣyati / iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāmantaśaḥ likhyamānāyām /
S06bsu049_u:261_10: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:261_11: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca akilāsī bhaviṣyatyabhijño dātukāmo vācayitukāma imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
S06bsu049_u:261_12: dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca deśāntaraṃ prasthito bhaviṣyati noddhaṭṭitajño vā na vā vipañcitajño 'nabhijño vā bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:261_13: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:261_14: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca āmiṣaguruko lābhasatkāracīvaraguruko bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:261_15: dhārmaśravaṇikāś ca alpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto 'rthaṃ vā na dātukāmo bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:261_16: iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ likhyamānāyām /
S06bsu049_u:261_17: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:261_18: punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca śrāddho bhaviṣyati imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrotukāmo 'rthamavaboddhukāmo 'rthaṃ dātukāmo 'rthaṃ parityaktukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:261_19: dharmabhāṇakaś ca aśrāddho bhaviṣyati alpeccho vā na vā bhāṣitukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:261_21: punaraparaṃ subhūte dhārmaśravaṇikaś ca śrāddho bhaviṣyati śrotukāmo 'rthamavaboddhukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:261_22: dharmabhāṇakasya ca tāni sūtrāṇi dharmāntarāyikatayā na saṃbhaviṣyanti nāvatariṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:261_24: iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgṛhṇatāṃ dhārayatāṃ vācayatāṃ paryavāpnuvatāṃ pravartayatāmantaśo likhatām /
S06bsu049_u:261_25: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:261_26: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇakaś ca bhāṣitukāmo bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:261_28: iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītuṃ [Vaidya_121] dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitumantaśo likhitum /
S06bsu049_u:261_29: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:261_31: kāyaguruko bhaviṣyati / sa tena middhagurukatvena samanvāgataḥ kāyaklamathena samanvāgato na śrotukāmo bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:261_33: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:261_35: kāyaguruko bhaviṣyati / sa tena middhagurukatvena samanvāgataḥ kāyaklamathena samanvāgato na bhāṣitukāmo bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:261_37: iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati likhanāya vācanāya paryavāptaye vā /
S06bsu049_u:261_38: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:262_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ kaścideva tatrāgatya nirayāṇāmavarṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:262_4: evaṃduḥkhā tiryagyoniḥ, evaṃduḥkhaḥ pretaviṣayaḥ, evaṃduḥkhā āsurāḥ kāyāḥ, evaṃduḥkhāḥ saṃskārāḥ / ihaiva duḥkhasyāntaḥ karaṇīya iti /
S06bsu049_u:262_5: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:263_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ vā kaścideva tatrāgatya devānāṃ varṇaṃ bhāṣiṣyate - evaṃsukhitā devāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:263_1: evaṃsukhāḥ svargāḥ, evaṃ kāmadhātau kāmāḥ sevitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:263_4: tad api ca sarvaṃ prajñatā vimṛśya sarvaiva duḥkhopapattiriti /
S06bsu049_u:263_5: uktaṃ hīdaṃ bhagavatā - acchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakamapyahaṃ bhikṣavo bhavābhinirvṛttiṃ na varṇayāmi /
S06bsu049_u:263_6: sarvaṃ hi saṃskṛtamanityaṃ sarvaṃ bhayāvagataṃ duḥkhaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukaṃ śūnyaṃ sarvadharmā anātmānaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:263_7: tadevaṃ sarvamaśāśvatamanityaṃ duḥkhaṃ vipariṇāmadharmakaṃ viditvā paṇḍitairihaiva srotaāpattiphalaṃ prāptavyam,
S06bsu049_u:263_9: ihaivārhattvaṃ prāptavyam / mā no bhūyastābhiḥ saṃpattivipattibhirduḥkhabhūyiṣṭhābhiḥ samavadhānaṃ bhūditi /
S06bsu049_u:263_11: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:264_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye 'pi te bhikṣavo dharmabhāṇakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:264_3: te 'pi dharmabhāṇakā evaṃ vakṣyanti - ye māmanuvartsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:264_5: ye māṃ nānuvartsyanti, tebhyo na dāsyāmīti / evaṃ te kulaputrāḥ kuladuhitaraś ca arthikatayā chandikatayā dharmagauraveṇa taṃ dharmabhāṇakamanuvartsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:264_6: na cāvakāśaṃ dāsyanti, sa ca dharmabhāṇaka āmiṣakiṃcitkābhilāṣī,
S06bsu049_u:264_7: te ca na dātukāmāḥ / sa ca tena tena gamiṣyati, yena yena durbhikṣaś ca ayogakṣemaś ca jīvitāntarāyaś ca bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:264_8: te ca dhārmaśravaṇikāḥ parebhyaḥ śroṣyanti - asau pradeśo [Vaidya_122] durbhikṣaś ca ayogakṣemaś ca /
S06bsu049_u:264_10: sa ca dharmabhāṇakastān kulaputrānevamabhivyāhariṣyati - amuṣmin kulaputrāḥ pradeśe durbhikṣabhayam /
S06bsu049_u:264_11: kaccitkulaputrā yūyamāgamiṣyatha mā paścādvipratisāriṇo bhaviṣyatha durbhikṣabhayaṃ praviṣṭāḥ? evaṃ te tena dharmabhāṇakena sūkṣmeṇopāyena pratikṣepsyate /
S06bsu049_u:264_12: te ca nirviṇṇarūpā evaṃ jñāsyanti - pratyākhyānanimittānyetāni,
S06bsu049_u:264_15: iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ śikṣyamāṇāyāṃ deśyamānāyāmupadiśyamānāyāmuddiśyamānāyāṃ svādhyāyyamānāyām /
S06bsu049_u:264_16: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:265_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte dharmabhāṇako yena jantubhayaṃ yena vyālabhayaṃ yenāmanuṣyabhayaṃ tena saṃprasthito bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:265_1: sa tena caran viharan yena vyālakāntāraṃ sarīsṛpakāntāraṃ corakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāraṃ durbhikṣakāntāraṃ tena prakramiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:265_2: sa tān dhārmaśravaṇikānevaṃ vakṣyati - yatkhalu kulaputrā jānīdhvaṃ yasmin pradeśe jantubhayaṃ vyālabhayaṃ kravyādabhayaṃ sarīsṛpakāntāraṃ corakāntāraṃ pānīyakāntāraṃ durbhikṣakāntāraṃ tena vayaṃ saṃprasthitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:265_3: jānīdhvaṃ kulaputrāḥ - śakyatha yūyametāni duḥkhāni pratyanubhavitum? evaṃ tān sūkṣmeṇopāyena pratyākhyāsyati /
S06bsu049_u:265_6: ayam api subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāmantarāya utpatsyate uddiśyamānāyāḥ svādhyāyyamānāyāḥ yāvallikhyamānāyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:265_7: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena visāmagrīmārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:266_2: sa tayā abhīkṣṇāvalokanatayā bahukṛtyatayā tān dhārmaśravaṇikān pratyākhyāsyati - asti tāvanme kiṃcidavalokayitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:266_4: iyam api subhūte tatra visāmagrī bhaviṣyati prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyām /
S06bsu049_u:266_5: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:267_0: iti hi subhūte māraḥ pāpīyāṃstaistaiḥ prakāraistathā tathā ceṣṭiṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:267_2: na dhārayiṣyati, na vācayiṣyati, na paryavāpsyati, na pravartayiṣyati, na deśayiṣyati, nopadekṣyati, noddekṣyati, na svādhyāsyati, na lekhayiṣyati, na likhiṣyati / tasmāttarhi subhūte yāvanto 'ntarāyā visāmagryāṃ saṃvartante,
S06bsu049_u:267_3: tāni sarvāṇi bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarmāṇīti boddhavyāni,
S06bsu049_u:268_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kimatra bhagavan kāraṇaṃ yadiha māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ mahāntamudyogamāpatsyate? tathā tathā copāyena ceṣṭiṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:268_1: yathemāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ [Vaidya_123] na kaścidudgrahīṣyati na dhārayiṣyati na vācayiṣyati na paryavāpsyati na pravartayiṣyati na deśayiṣyati nopadekṣyati noddekṣyati na svādhyāsyati na lekhayiṣyati na likhiṣyati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi subhūte buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:268_4: prahīṇakleśānāṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ na labhate /
S06bsu049_u:268_6: ataḥ sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyāṃ mahatā saṃvegena mahāntamudyogamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:268_8: yathā na kaścidimāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ likhedvā paryavāpnuyādveti /
S06bsu049_u:269_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣepsyati /
S06bsu049_u:269_1: evaṃ ca navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ kulaputrā vivecayiṣyanti naiṣā prajñāpāramitā yāmāyuṣmantaḥ śṛṇvanti /
S06bsu049_u:269_3: iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā / ityevaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān saṃśayaṃ prakṣepsyati /
S06bsu049_u:269_4: evaṃ ca punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇāgatya bhedaṃ prakṣipya navayānasaṃprasthitān bodhisattvānalpabuddhikān mandabuddhikān parīttabuddhikānandhīkṛtānavyākṛtānanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau saṃśayaṃ pātayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:269_5: te saṃśayaprāptā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nodgrahīṣyanti na dhārayiṣyanti na vācayiṣyanti na paryavāpsyanti na pravartayiṣyanti na deśayiṣyanti nopadekṣyanti noddekṣyanti na svādhyāsyanti na lekhayiṣyanti na likhiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:269_6: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:270_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣūnnirmāya buddhaveṣeṇāgatya evaṃ mārakarmopasaṃhariṣyati - yo bodhisattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu carati,
S06bsu049_u:270_1: sa bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti / sa śrāvako bhavati, na bodhisattvo yathāyaṃ bodhisattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:270_2: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:271_0: evaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānevamādikāni subahūni anyāny api mārakarmāṇyutpādayiṣyati asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ likhyamānāyāṃ paryavāpyamāṇāyām /
S06bsu049_u:271_3: na bhaktavyāni / ārabdhavīryeṇa smṛtimatā saṃprajānatā ca bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:272_6: evameva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ prāyeṇa bahavo 'ntarāyā utpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:272_16: na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ na deśayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyām api maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:273_1: evam etat / mārādhiṣṭhitāste subhūte bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:273_2: navayānasaṃprasthitāś ca te subhūte bodhisattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:273_7: na ca teṣāmudārodāreṣu dharmeṣu cittaṃ prakramiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:273_9: na dhārayitavyāṃ na vācayitavyāṃ na paryavāptavyāṃ na pravartayitavyāṃ nopadeṣṭavyāṃ noddeṣṭavyāṃ na svādhyātavyāṃ na lekhayitavyāmantaśo na likhitavyām api maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:274_2: atha ca subhūte ya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahītavyāṃ maṃsyante dhārayitavyāṃ vācayitavyāṃ paryavāptavyāṃ pravartayitavyāmupadeṣṭavyāmuddeṣṭavyāṃ svādhyātavyāṃ lekhayitavyāmantaśo likhitavyām api maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:274_4: buddhaparigraheṇodgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti lekhayiṣyantyantaśo likhiṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:274_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? māro 'pi hyatra pāpīyān mahāntamudyogamāpatsyate antarāyakaraṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:279_0: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - tadyathāpi nāma subhūte striyā bahavaḥ putrā bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:279_1: pañca vā daśa vā viṃśatirvā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:279_2: sarve te māturglānāyā udyogamāpadyeran - kathamasmākaṃ māturjīvitāntarāyo na bhavediti,
S06bsu049_u:279_8: na cāsyā asparśavihāraḥ amanaāpaḥ kāye utpadyeta /
S06bsu049_u:279_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? etayā hi vayaṃ janitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:279_10: duṣkarakārikaiṣā asmākaṃ jīvitasya dātrī lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:279_11: iti te putrāstāṃ mātaraṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ sudhṛtāṃ dhārayeyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:279_12: sugopāyitāṃ gopāyeyuḥ, sukelāyitāṃ kelāyeyuḥ - mā khalvasyāḥ kācidduḥkhā vedanā duḥkho vā sparśa utpadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:279_13: cakṣuṣo vā śrotrato vā ghrāṇato vā jihvāto vā kāyato vā manasto vā vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā daṃśato vā maśakato vā sarīsṛpato vā manuṣyato vā amanuṣyato vā āpātato vā utpātato vā aniṣṭanipātaḥ śarīre nipatet /
S06bsu049_u:279_14: evaṃ te putrāstāṃ mātaraṃ sarvasukhopadhānaiḥ samanvāhṛtya kelāyeyurmamāyeyurgopāyeyuḥ - eṣāsmākaṃ mātā janayitrī,
S06bsu049_u:279_16: lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrīti / evameva subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ samanvāharanti /
S06bsu049_u:279_17: ye 'pi te likhanti udgṛhṇanti dhārayanti vācayanti paryavāpnuvanti pravartayanti deśayantyupadiśantyuddiśanti svādhyāyanti,
S06bsu049_u:279_18: sarve te tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyānubhāvena adhiṣṭhānena samanvāhāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:279_19: ye 'pi te 'nyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya,
S06bsu049_u:279_20: hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S06bsu049_u:279_25: kimityasyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā bhāṣyamāṇāyā likhyamānāyāḥ śikṣyamāṇāyā māraḥ pāyīyān mārakāyikā vā devatā antarāyaṃ na kuryuriti /
S06bsu049_u:279_26: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ kelāyanti mamāyanti gopāyanti /
S06bsu049_u:279_27: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi mātā janayitrī tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānām /
S06bsu049_u:279_28: asyāḥ sarvajñatāyā darśayitrī lokasya ca saṃdarśayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:279_29: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:279_30: prajñāpāramitā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya sarvajñajñānasya janayitrī darśayitrī,
S06bsu049_u:279_32: atonirjātā hi subhūte tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:279_33: ye 'pi kecitsubhūte atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:279_34: te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:279_35: ye 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ [Vaidya_126] samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06bsu049_u:279_36: te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
S06bsu049_u:279_37: ye 'pi te subhūte etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā daśadiśi loke tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti bahujanahitāya bahujanasukhāya lokānukampāyai mahato janakāyasyārthāya,
S06bsu049_u:279_38: hitāya sukhāya devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca,
S06bsu049_u:279_40: te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:279_41: aham api subhūte etarhi tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:279_42: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ janayitrī,
S06bsu049_u:280_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrīti,
S06bsu049_u:280_1: kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī? katamaś ca bhagavan lokastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairākhyātaḥ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - pañca subhūte skandhāḥ tathāgatena loka ityākhyātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:280_2: katame pañca? yaduta rūpaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:280_3: ime subhūte pañca skandhāstathāgatena loka ityākhyātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:281_0: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavaṃstathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitayā pañca skandhā darśitāḥ? kiṃ vā bhagavan prajñāpāramitayā darśitam? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - na lujyante na pralujyante iti subhūte pañca skandhā loka iti tathāgatānāṃ prajñāpāramitayā darśitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:281_1: tatkasya hetoḥ na lujyante na pralujyante iti darśitāḥ? śūnyatāsvabhāvā hi subhūte pañca skandhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:281_2: asvabhāvatvāt / na ca subhūte śūnyatā lujyate vā pralujyate vā /
S06bsu049_u:281_3: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:281_4: na ca subhūte ānimittaṃ vā apraṇihitaṃ vā anabhisaṃskāro vā anutpādo vā abhāvo vā dharmadhāturvā lujyate vā pralujyate vā /
S06bsu049_u:281_5: evamiyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhata samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:282_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:282_2: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:282_3: asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? sattvāsvabhāvatayā subhūte aprameyāḥ sattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:282_4: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāḥ sattvā asaṃkhyeyāḥ sattvā iti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:282_5: yāny api tāni subhūte aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ cittacaritāni,
S06bsu049_u:282_6: tāny api subhūte tathāgataḥ sattvāsadbhāvatayaiva prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:282_7: evaṃ khalu subhūte prajñāpāramitāmāgamya tathāgato 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyāṇyasaṃkhyeyāni cittacaritāni ca yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:282_8: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:283_0: [Vaidya_127] punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:283_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? sa saṃkṣepaṃ kṣayataḥ kṣayaṃ ca akṣayato yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:283_2: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkṣiptāni cittāni saṃkṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:284_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:284_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? dharmatātaḥ subhūte tāni cittāni vikṣiptāni /
S06bsu049_u:284_2: alakṣaṇāni hi tāni cittāni akṣīṇānyavikṣīṇānyavikṣiptāni tāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:284_3: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatā imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ vikṣiptāni cittāni vikṣiptāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:285_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānyaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:285_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyākṣayāṇi cittāni aprameyākṣayāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? tasya subhūte tathāgatasyādhiṣṭhitaṃ bhavati taccittam,
S06bsu049_u:285_4: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāmaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānyaprameyākṣayāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:286_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkliṣṭāni cittāni saṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:286_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkliṣṭāni cittāni saṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? asaṃkleśasaṃkliṣṭāni subhūte tāni cittāni asaṃketāni /
S06bsu049_u:286_2: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ saṃkliṣṭāni cittāni saṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:287_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānyasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:287_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānyasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? prakṛtiprabhāsvarāṇi subhūte tāni cittāni /
S06bsu049_u:287_2: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ [Vaidya_128] prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānyasaṃkliṣṭāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:288_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ līnāni cittāni līnāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:288_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ līnāni cittāni līnāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? anālayalīnāni subhūte tāni cittāni /
S06bsu049_u:288_2: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ līnāni cittāni līnāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:288_3: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ pragṛhītāni cittāni pragṛhītāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:288_4: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ pragṛhītāni cittāni pragṛhītāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? agrāhyāṇi subhūte tāni cittāni pragrahītavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:288_5: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ pragṛhītāni cittāni pragṛhītāni cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:289_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sāsravāṇi cittāni sāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:289_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sāsravāṇi cittāni sāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? asvabhāvāni subhūte tāni cittāni asatsaṃkalpāni /
S06bsu049_u:289_2: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sāsravāṇi cittāni sāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:290_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmanāsravāṇi cittānyanāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:290_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmanāsravāṇi cittānyanāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? abhāvagatikāni subhūte tāni cittāni anābhogāni /
S06bsu049_u:290_2: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmanāsravāṇi cittānyanāsravāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:291_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarāgāṇi cittāni sarāgāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:291_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarāgāṇi cittāni sarāgāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti? yā subhūte cittasya sarāgatā,
S06bsu049_u:291_3: yā cittasya yathābhūtatā, na sā cittasya sarāgatā / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāṃ sarāgāṇi cittāni sarāgāṇi cittānīti yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /

S06bsu049_u:313_20: śāśvataścāśāśvata ātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_21: naiva śāśvato nāśāśvata ātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_22: antavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_23: anantavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_24: antavāṃś ca anantavāṃścātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_25: naivāntavān nānantavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_27: antavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_28: anantavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_29: antavāṃś ca anantavāṃścātmā avalokaś ca idameva [Vaidya_134] satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_30: naivāntavān nānantavānātmā avalokaś ca idameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_31: sa jīvastaccharīramidameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_32: anyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramidameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi rūpagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_34: sa jīvastaccharīramidameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_35: anyo jīvo 'nyaccharīramidameva satyaṃ mohamanyaditi vijñānagatam etat /
S06bsu049_u:313_36: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāsaṃkhyeyānāṃ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ tānyunmiñjitanimiñjitāni rūpaniśritāni vijñātāni bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:314_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmamasaṃkhyeyānāṃ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ tānyunmiñjitanimiñjitāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:314_2: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgato rūpaṃ jānāti? tathā subhūte tathāgato rūpaṃ jānāti,
S06bsu049_u:314_3: yathā tathatā / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgato rūpaṃ jānāti /
S06bsu049_u:314_6: kathaṃ ca subhūte tathāgato vijñānaṃ jānāti? tathā subhūte tathāgato vijñānaṃ jānāti,
S06bsu049_u:314_7: yathā tathatā / evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgato vijñānaṃ jānāti /
S06bsu049_u:314_8: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgata imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya aprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ tānyunmiñjitanimiñjitāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānāti /
S06bsu049_u:314_9: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatastathāgatatathatayā ca skandhatathatayā ca unmiñjitanimiñjitatathatayā ca tathatāṃ prajñapayati /
S06bsu049_u:314_11: saiva lokasyāpi tathatā / tatkasya hetoḥ? uktaṃ hyetatsubhūte tathāgatena - pañca skandhā loka iti saṃjñātāḥ iti /
S06bsu049_u:314_13: sā lokatathatā / yā lokatathatā, sā sarvadharmatathatā / yā sarvadharmatathatā, sā srotaāpattiphalatathatā / yā srotaāpattiphalatathatā, sā sakṛdāgāmiphalatathatā / yā sakṛdāgāmiphalatathatā, sā anāgāmiphalatathatā / yā anāgamiphalatathatā, sā arhattvaphalatathatā / yā arhattvaphalatathatā, sā pratyekabuddhatvatathatā /
S06bsu049_u:314_14: yā pratyekabuddhatvatathatā, sā tathāgatatathatā / iti hi tathāgatatathatā ca skandhatathatā ca sarvadharmatathatā ca sarvāryaśrāvakapratyekabuddhatathatā ca ekaivaiṣā tathatā anekabhāvābhāvāpagatā anekatvādanānātvādakṣayatvādavikāratvādadvayatvādadvaidhīkāratvāt /
S06bsu049_u:314_15: evameṣā subhūte tathatā tathāgatena prajñāpāramitāmāgamya abhisaṃbuddhā /
S06bsu049_u:314_16: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:314_17: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgato 'sya lokasya lokaṃ saṃdarśayati /
S06bsu049_u:314_18: evaṃ cāsya lokasya darśanaṃ bhavati - evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:314_19: evaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatastathatāmabhisaṃbudhya lokasya tathatāṃ jānāti,
S06bsu049_u:314_20: avitathatāṃ jānāti, ananyatathatāṃ jānāti / evaṃ ca subhūte tathāgatastathatāmabhisaṃbuddhaḥ saṃstathāgata ityucyate /
S06bsu049_u:315_1: ato bhagavaṃstathatāto buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ prabhāvyate prakāśyate /
S06bsu049_u:315_2: ko 'tra bhagavan anyo 'dhimokṣyate 'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'rhan vā paripūrṇasaṃkalpo dṛṣṭisaṃpanno vā pudgalaḥ? tathā hi bhagavan imāni sthānāni paramagambhīrāṇi tathāgatenābhisaṃbudhya ākhyātāni /
S06bsu049_u:315_4: evam etat / paramagambhīrāṇīmāni sthānāni tathāgatenābhisaṃbudhya ākhyātāni /
S06bsu049_u:316_0: atha khalu śakradevendrapramukhāḥ kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā brahmakāyikānāṃ ca viṃśatidevaputrasahasrāṇi yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte tasthuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:316_1: ekāntasthitāś ca te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - gambhīrā bhagavan dharmāḥ prakāśyante /
S06bsu049_u:316_2: kathaṃ bhagavan atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante? bhagavānāha - śūnyamiti devaputrā atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante /
S06bsu049_u:316_3: ānimittamiti apraṇihitamiti devaputrā atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante /
S06bsu049_u:316_4: anabhisaṃskāra iti anutpāda iti anirodha iti asaṃkleśa iti avyavadānamiti abhāva iti nirvāṇamiti dharmadhāturiti tathateti devaputrā atra lakṣaṇāni sthāpyante /
S06bsu049_u:316_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? aniśritāni hi devaputrā etāni lakṣaṇāni /
S06bsu049_u:316_12: naitāni lakṣaṇāni devairvā nāgairvā manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā sthāpitāni /
S06bsu049_u:316_13: naitāni lakṣaṇāni sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena śakyāni cālayitum /
S06bsu049_u:316_14: tatkasya hetoḥ? sadevamānuṣāsuro 'pi hi loka etallakṣaṇa eva /
S06bsu049_u:316_16: yo devaputrā evaṃ vadet - idamākāśaṃ kenāpi sthāpitamiti,
S06bsu049_u:316_17: api nu sa devaputrāḥ samyagvadan vadet? evamukte kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - na bhagavan ākāśaṃ kenacitsthāpitam /
S06bsu049_u:316_18: tatkasya hetoḥ? asaṃskṛtatvādbhagavan ākāśasya nākāśaṃ kenacitsthāpitam /
S06bsu049_u:316_19: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān kāmāvacarān rūpāvarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:317_0: [Vaidya_136] atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrāṇi bhagavan imāni lakṣaṇāni tathāgatenābhisaṃbuddhāni /
S06bsu049_u:317_4: evam etat / evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:317_5: yathā subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imāṃ dharmaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupaniśritya viharanti,
S06bsu049_u:317_10: prajñāpāramitaivaiṣā subhūte dharmāṇāṃ dharmateti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ satkurvanti gurukurvanti mānayanti pūjayantyarcayantyapacāyanti /
S06bsu049_u:317_11: tatkasya hetoḥ? ato hi subhūte prajñāpāramitātastathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarvajñatāyāḥ prabhāvanā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:317_12: kṛtajñāḥ kṛtavedinaś ca tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:317_13: yatkhalu subhūte samyagvadanto vadeyuḥ - kṛtajñaḥ kṛtavedīti,
S06bsu049_u:317_14: tattathāgataṃ hi te samyagvadanto vadanti - kṛtajñaḥ kṛtavedīti /
S06bsu049_u:317_15: yatkhalu subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho yena yena yānenāgataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:317_19: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā /
S06bsu049_u:317_20: punaraparaṃ subhūte tathāgatena sarvadharmā akṛtā akṛtā ityabhisaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:317_23: iyam api subhūte tathāgatasya kṛtajñatā kṛtaveditā draṣṭavyā /
S06bsu049_u:317_24: prajñāpāramitāṃ hyāgamya subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya evaṃ sarvadharmeṣu jñānaṃ pravṛttam /
S06bsu049_u:317_25: anenāpi subhūte paryāyeṇa prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:318_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:318_1: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte,
S06bsu049_u:318_4: evametatsubhūte, evam etat / sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:318_5: kathaṃ subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ? sarvadharmā hi subhūte śūnyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:318_7: evaṃ hi subhūte sarvadharmā ajānakā apaśyakāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:318_9: evam api subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī rūpasyādṛṣṭatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:318_11: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:319_0: [Vaidya_137] subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan rūpasyādṛṣṭatā bhavati? kathaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām? kathaṃ bhagavan vijñānasyādṛṣṭatā bhavati? bhagavānāha - yadi subhūte na rūpārambaṇaṃ vijñānamutpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:319_9: evaṃ hi subhūte lokastathāgatena dṛṣṭo bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:319_10: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmasya lokasya saṃdarśayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:319_11: kathaṃ ca subhūte prajñāpāramitā lokaṃ saṃdarśayati? iti lokaḥ śūnya iti lokaṃ sūcayati,
S06bsu049_u:319_12: evaṃ prajñāpayati, evaṃ lokaṃ saṃdarśayati / iti loko 'cintya iti, lokaḥ śānta iti, loko vivikta iti lokaviśuddhyā lokaṃ sūcayati /
S06bsu049_u:324_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:324_4: evam etat / mahākṛtyeneyaṃ subhūte prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu049_u:324_6: kathaṃ ca subhūte acintyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? acintyaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam /
S06bsu049_u:324_7: evaṃ hi subhūte acintyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu049_u:324_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi cittaṃ vā cetanā vā caitasiko vā atra dharmaḥ pravartate /
S06bsu049_u:324_10: kathaṃ ca subhūte atulyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? na śakyaṃ subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ cintayituṃ vā tulayituṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:324_11: evaṃ hi subhūte atulyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu049_u:324_12: kathaṃ ca subhūte aprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? aprameyaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam /
S06bsu049_u:324_13: evaṃ hi subhūte aprameyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu049_u:324_14: kathaṃ ca subhūte asaṃkhyeyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? asaṃkhyeyaṃ hi subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ buddhatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam /
S06bsu049_u:324_15: evaṃ hi subhūte asaṃkhyeyakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu049_u:324_16: kathaṃ ca subhūte asamasamakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? nāsti subhūte tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya svayaṃbhuvaḥ sarvajñasya samaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:324_17: kutaḥ punaruttaraḥ? evaṃ hi subhūte asamasamakṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā /
S06bsu049_u:325_0: sthaviraḥ subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavaṃstathāgatatvamevācintyamatulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam? evaṃ buddhatvameva svayaṃbhūtvameva sarvajñatvameva atulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam,
S06bsu049_u:325_1: utāho rūpamapyacintyamatulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam? evaṃ vedanāpi saṃjñāpi saṃskārā apiḥ? vijñānamapyacintyamatulyamaprameyamasaṃkhyeyamasamasamam,
S06bsu049_u:325_2: utāho sarvadharmā apyacintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte,
S06bsu049_u:325_6: evaṃ sarvadharmā api subhūte acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:325_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpasya hi subhūte yā dharmatā,
S06bsu049_u:325_8: na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā dharmā na tulanā /
S06bsu049_u:325_11: na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā dharmā na tulanā /
S06bsu049_u:325_13: na tatra cittaṃ na cetanā na caitasikā dharmā na tulanā /
S06bsu049_u:325_21: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:325_23: vijñānasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:325_24: sarvadharmāṇām api hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:325_25: kena kāraṇena subhūte rūpasya pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate? kena kāraṇena vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām? kena kāraṇena subhūte vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate? kena kāraṇena subhūte sarvadharmāṇām api pramāṇaṃ na prajñāyate? rūpasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate /
S06bsu049_u:325_27: vijñānasya hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate /
S06bsu049_u:325_28: sarvadharmāṇām api hi subhūte pramāṇaṃ na vidyate /
S06bsu049_u:325_29: kena kāraṇena subhūte rūpasya pramāṇaṃ na vidyate? evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām? kena kāraṇena subhūte vijñānasya pramāṇaṃ na vidyate? kena kāreṇena subhūte sarvadharmāṇām api pramāṇaṃ na vidyate? apramāṇatvātsubhūte sarvadharmāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:325_39: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api tu astyākāśasya samo vā gaṇanā vā pramāṇaṃ vā tulyaṃ vā cittaṃ vā caitasikā vā dharmāḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:325_40: bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte anena paryāyeṇa sarvadharmā api acintyā atulyā aprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:325_44: evamaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamā iti subhūte samasaṃkhyāpramāṇoparamatvādaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā asamasamāstathāgatadharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:325_45: ākāśasamāsaṃkhyeyāprameyatayā asamasamā asaṃkhyeyā aprameyā ete dharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:325_53: asyāṃ khalu punaracintyatāyāmatulyatāyāmaprameyatāyāmasaṃkhyeyatāyāmasamasamatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ pañcānāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāya āsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
S06bsu049_u:325_54: viṃśateś ca bhikṣuṇīśatānām anupādāya āsravebhyaś cittāni vimuktāni,
S06bsu049_u:325_57: viṃśatyā ca bodhisattvairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhābhūt /
S06bsu049_u:325_58: te ca bhagavatā ihaiva bhadrakalpe vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:325_59: ye 'pi te upāsakā upāsikāś ca yeṣāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,
S06bsu049_u:326_0: [Vaidya_140] atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:326_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? atra hi subhūte sarvajñatā samāyuktā,
S06bsu049_u:326_8: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte rājñaḥ kṣatriyasya mūrdhābhiṣiktasya janapadasthāmavīryaprāptasya yāni tāni rājakṛtyāni,
S06bsu049_u:326_9: yāni ca nagarakṛtyāni, yāni ca janapadakṛtyāni, sarvāṇi tāni amātyasamāyuktāni bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:326_11: evameva subhūte ye kecidbuddhadharmā vā pratyekabuddhadharmā vā śrāvakadharmā vā,
S06bsu049_u:326_14: anena subhūte paryāyeṇa mahākṛtyeneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā rūpasyāparigrahāya anabhiniveśāya /
S06bsu049_u:327_0: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan sarvajñatāyā aparigrahāyānabhiniveśāya prajñāpāramitā pratyupasthitā? bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvamarhattvaṃ yatra parigrahaṃ vā abhiniveśaṃ vā kuryāḥ? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:327_1: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yaṃ parigṛhṇīyāmabhiniveśeyaṃ vā arhattvamiti /
S06bsu049_u:327_3: evam etat / aham api subhūte tathāgatatvaṃ na samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:327_4: so 'haṃ subhūte tathāgatatvamasamanupaśyan na parigṛhṇāmi nābhiniveśe /
S06bsu049_u:327_6: subhūtirāha - sarvajñatāpi bhagavan aparigrahā anabhiniveśeti? mā bhagavan navayānasaṃprasthitāḥ parīttakuśalamūlā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imaṃ nirdeśaṃ śrutvā utrasiṣuḥ saṃtrasiṣuḥ saṃtrāsamāpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:327_7: api tu khalu punarbhagavan ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā hetusaṃpannāḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā dīrgharātrāvaropitakuśalamūlā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:327_8: ta imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:328_0: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:328_1: durdṛśā duranubodhā / pūrvajinakṛtādhikārā dīrgharātrāvaropitakuśalamūlāste bhagavan sattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:328_4: te sarve śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā careyuḥ yaśceha gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmekadivasam api kṣāntiṃ rocayedgaveṣeta cintayettulayedupaparīkṣeta upanidhyāyet,
S06bsu049_u:328_6: evamukte bhagavāṃstān kāmāvacarān [Vaidya_141] rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayāmāsa - yadi devaputrāḥ kaścideva kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāt,
S06bsu049_u:328_8: na tveva teṣāṃ śraddhānusāribhūmau kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā caratām /
S06bsu049_u:328_9: atha khalu te kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - mahāpāramiteyaṃ bhagavan yaduta prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:328_10: ityuktvā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā abhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato 'ntikād gamiṣyāma ityārocya prakrāntāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:333_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimucyate nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate nāvatiṣṭhate na dhandhāyati na vicikitsati na kāṅkṣati,
S06bsu049_u:333_2: sa bhagavan kutaścyutvā kutropapannaḥ? bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahaśravaṇenaiva asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāmadhimokṣyate nāvaleṣyate na saṃleṣyate nāvasthāsyate na dhandhāyiṣyati na vicikitsiṣyati na kāṅkṣiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:333_7: chandaṃ janayiṣyatyudgrahītuṃ dhārayituṃ vācayituṃ paryavāptuṃ pravartayitum,
S06bsu049_u:333_9: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte taruṇavatsā gaurnotsṛjati vatsam,
S06bsu049_u:333_10: evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattva enāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā tāvanna prahāsyati dharmabhāṇakaṃ yāvadasyeyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kāyagatā vā bhaviṣyati pustakagatā vā,
S06bsu049_u:333_11: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo manuṣyebhya eva cyuto manuṣyeṣvevopapannaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:334_0: subhūtirāha - syādbhagavan etaireva guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ? bhagavānāha - syātsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyebhyo buddhakṣetrebhyo 'nyān buddhān bhagavataḥ paryupāsya paripṛcchya paripraśnīkṛtya tebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:334_2: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastuṣitebhyo devebhyaścyuta ihopapannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:334_4: yena maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paryupāsitaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ paripṛcchitaḥ paripraśnīkṛtaḥ imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmārabhya,
S06bsu049_u:334_6: yena khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntata iyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā śrutā,
S06bsu049_u:334_7: na tu paripṛṣṭā bhavet, na paripṛcchitā na paripraśnīkṛtā,
S06bsu049_u:334_8: tasya punar api manuṣyeṣvevopapannasya asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam,
S06bsu049_u:334_9: bhavati dhandhāyitatvam, bhavati cittasyāvalīnatā, veditavyametatsubhūte, ayaṃ bodhisattvaḥ pūrvāntato 'pyaparipṛcchakajātīyo 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:334_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi asyāṃ asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bhavati kāṅkṣāyitatvam,
S06bsu049_u:335_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte yena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ gambhīrā prajñāpāramitā pūrvāntato 'pi śrutā bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:335_1: paryupāsitā paripṛṣṭā paripṛcchitā paripraśnīkṛtā ca bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:335_2: ekaṃ vā dinaṃ dve vā trīṇi vā catvāri vā pañca vā dināni,
S06bsu049_u:335_4: saṃhriyate ca, punarevāsaṃhāryā ca bhavati paripṛcchayā /
S06bsu049_u:335_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati - yena pūrvaṃ na saṃparipṛṣṭā bhavatīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:335_7: na cānuvartitā bhavati, tasya kaṃcitkālaṃ chando 'nuvartate asyāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śravaṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:335_13: navena yānenāgataḥ sa bodhisattvastāṃ śraddhāṃ taṃ prasādaṃ taṃ chandaṃ prahāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:335_14: yadutaināṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ nānugrahīṣyati nānuvartiṣyate nānuparivārayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:335_15: tasya dvayorbhūmyoranyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
S06bsu049_u:335_16: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ te tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā na gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:335_18: veditavyam etat - aprāptā evaite pāramudake kālaṃ kariṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:335_19: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mahāsamudragatāyāṃ nāvi bhinnāyāṃ tatra kāṣṭhaṃ vā gṛhṇanti phalakaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:335_24: evameva subhūte yo bodhisattvaḥ śraddhāmātrakeṇa prasādamātrakeṇa premamātrakeṇa chandamātrakeṇa samanvāgataḥ sa ca prajñāpāramitāṃ nādhyālambate,
S06bsu049_u:335_26: aprāpta eva sarvajñatāṃ śrāvakatve pratyekabuddhatve vā sthāsyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:335_27: yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmasti śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:335_28: asti kṣāntiḥ, asti ruciḥ, asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ, astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ, asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum,
S06bsu049_u:335_30: evaṃ teṣāṃ sā śraddhā sā kṣāntiḥ sā rūciḥ sa cchandaḥ tadvīryaṃ so 'pramādaḥ sādhimuktiḥ so 'dhyāśayaḥ sa tyāgaḥ tadgauravaṃ sā prītiḥ tatprāmodyaṃ sa prasādaḥ tatprema sā anikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:335_31: te ca prajñāpāramitāṃ prāpya sarvajñatāyāṃ sthāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:335_32: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī va puruṣo vā aparipakvena ghaṭenodakaṃ parivahet,
S06bsu049_u:335_34: kṣiprameva paribhetsyate, pravileṣyate iti / tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma tadaparipakvatvāddhaṭasya,
S06bsu049_u:335_36: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti rūciḥ asti chandaḥ asti vīryam astyapramādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:335_38: asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:335_39: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca aparigṛhīto bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:335_40: veditavyametatsubhūte ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyata iti /
S06bsu049_u:335_41: kaś ca subhūte bodhisattvasyāntarā vyadhvani vyavasādaḥ - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā? tadyathāpi nāma subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā suparipakvena ghaṭena nadīto vā sarasto vā taḍāgato vā udapānādvā tato 'nyebhyo vā udakādhārebhya udakaṃ parivahet,
S06bsu049_u:335_42: tasya tadudakaṃ parivahato veditavyametatsubhūte svastinā [Vaidya_144] anantarāyeṇa ayaṃ ghaṭo gṛhaṃ gamiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:335_44: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:335_46: asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti premaḥ astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:335_47: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca parigṛhīto bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:335_48: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani vyavasādamāpatsyate /
S06bsu049_u:335_50: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte duṣprajñajātīyaḥ puruṣaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvamanākoṭitāmaparikarmakṛtāṃ cirabandhanabaddhāmudake 'vatārya samāropitabhāṇḍāṃ paripūrṇāṃ bhārārtāmabhirūḍhaḥ syāt,
S06bsu049_u:335_55: evaṃ sa sārthavāho 'nupāyakuśalo dauṣprajñena mahatā arthaviyogena samanvāgato bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:335_57: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:335_58: asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ astyadhyāśayaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:335_60: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:335_61: veditavyametatsubhūte aprāpta evāyaṃ bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñatāratnākaramantarā saṃsatsyati,
S06bsu049_u:335_65: kā punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya antarā vyadhvani saṃsīdanā? yaduta śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
S06bsu049_u:335_66: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte paṇḍitajātīyaḥ sārthavāhaḥ sāmudrikāṃ nāvaṃ subaddhāṃ bandhayitvā svākoṭitāmākoṭayitvā suparikarmakṛtāṃ kṛtvā udake 'vatārya bhāṇḍamāropya pūrṇāṃ kṛtvā samaṃ yojayitvā yuktena vātenābhipretāṃ diśamanupūrveṇa gacchet,
S06bsu049_u:335_69: mahālābhena cāyaṃ sārthavāhaḥ saṃyokṣyate yaduta laukikai ratnairiti /
S06bsu049_u:335_70: evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā asti kṣāntiḥ asti ruci chandaḥ asti vīryam,
S06bsu049_u:335_72: astyādhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum,
S06bsu049_u:335_73: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena cāvirahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:335_74: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
S06bsu049_u:335_75: na vyavasādamāpatsyate, sthāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:335_76: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetatsubhūte bhavati - yato 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:335_77: asti kṣāntiḥ, asti ruciḥ, asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ astyadhyāśayaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:335_78: asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti [Vaidya_145] asti prītiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:335_79: asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:335_80: ete cāsya dharmāḥ prajñāpāramitayā parigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena cāvirahitā na śrāvakabhūmiṃ na pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā pratipatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:335_81: api tu yena sarvajñatā, tenaite dharmā abhimukhāḥ saṃprasthitāḥ tato 'syā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhisaṃbodhāya bhaviṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:335_82: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:335_83: tasya kaścideva śarīre vyādhirutpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā /
S06bsu049_u:335_84: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣo 'parigṛhīto mañcāduttiṣṭhet? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:335_85: bhagavānāha - sacetpunaḥ subhūte sa puruṣo mañcāduttiṣṭhet,
S06bsu049_u:335_86: atha ca punarna pratibalo 'rdhakrośāntaram api prakramitum /
S06bsu049_u:335_87: sa tayā jarayā tena ca vyādhinā kṣapito yady api mañcāduttiṣṭhet,
S06bsu049_u:335_89: evameva subhūte kiṃcāpi bodhisattvasya asti śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:335_90: asti kṣāntiḥ, asti ruciḥ, asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ, astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ, asti prāmodyam, asti prema, astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:335_91: sa ca prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:335_93: atha ca punaḥ subhūte evaṃ veditavyam - ayaṃ bodhisattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
S06bsu049_u:335_94: vyavasādamāpatsyate, yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:335_95: tatkasya hetoḥ? yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītatvādupāyakauśalyena ca virahitatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:335_96: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte sa eva puruṣo jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ saviṃśativarṣaśatiko jātyā bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:335_97: tasya śarīre kaścideva vyādhirūtpadyeta vātato vā pittato vā śleṣmato vā saṃnipātato vā,
S06bsu049_u:335_98: sa ca mañcāduttiṣṭhet / tamenaṃ dvau balavantau puruṣau vāmadakṣiṇābhyāṃ pārśvābhyāṃ svadhyālambitamadhyālambya suparigṛhītaṃ parigṛhya evaṃ vadetām - gaccha tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa yenākāṅkṣasi yāvaccākāṅkṣasi gantum,
S06bsu049_u:335_101: yatra tvayā gantavyamiti / evameva subhūte yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya asti śraddhā,
S06bsu049_u:335_102: asti kṣāntiḥ, asti ruciḥ asti chandaḥ, asti vīryam, astyapramādaḥ, astyadhimuktiḥ, astyadhyāśayaḥ, asti tyāgaḥ, asti gauravam, asti prītiḥ, asti prāmodyam, asti prasādaḥ, asti prema astyanikṣiptadhuratā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum,
S06bsu049_u:335_105: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā vyadhvani saṃsatsyati,
S06bsu049_u:335_106: na vyavasādamāpatsyate, pratibalo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatsthānamanuprāptuṃ yadutānuttaraṃ samyaksaṃbodhisthānamiti /
S06bsu049_u:340_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - ādikarmikeṇa bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - iha subhūte ādikarmikeṇa bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitukāmena kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:340_3: tānyeva cāsya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:340_4: evaṃ cāsmai prajñāpāramitāyā arthamupadekṣyanti - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra dānapāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyasva,
S06bsu049_u:340_5: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyāṃ kṣāntipāramitāyāṃ vīryapāramitāyāṃ dhyānapāramitāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyasva /
S06bsu049_u:340_8: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:340_9: evaṃ mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārebhyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:340_10: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vijñānataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:340_11: tatkasya hetoḥ? aparāmṛṣṭā hi kulaputra sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:340_12: evaṃ yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra śīlaṃ rakṣasi.
S06bsu049_u:340_16: yadyadeva tvaṃ kulaputra prajñāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoṣi,
S06bsu049_u:340_18: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ rūpataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:340_19: evaṃ mā vedanāto mā saṃjñāto mā saṃskārebhyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:340_20: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vijñānataḥ parāmṛkṣaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:340_21: tatkasya hetoḥ? aparāmṛṣṭā hi kulaputra sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:340_22: mā ca tvaṃ kulaputra śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā spṛhāṃ kārṣīriti /
S06bsu049_u:340_23: evaṃ hi subhūte ādikarmiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nupūrveṇa kalyāṇamitraiḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmavatārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:341_2: evaṃrūpaṃ dānamāgamya, evaṃrūpaṃ śīlam, evaṃrūpāṃ kṣāntim, evaṃrūpaṃ vīryam, evaṃrūpaṃ dhyānam, evaṃrūpāṃ prajñāmāgamya svādhīne 'pi parinirvāṇe necchanti parinirvātum /
S06bsu049_u:341_3: api tu paramaduḥkhitaṃ sattvadhātumabhisamīkṣya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmāḥ saṃsārānnotrasyanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_5: evam etat / duṣkarakārakāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ye lokahitāya saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:341_7: lokasya trāṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ, lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ, lokasya layanaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ, lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:341_8: lokasya dvīpāṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ, lokasyālokā bhaviṣyāmaḥ, lokasya pariṇāyakā bhaviṣyāma,
S06bsu049_u:341_11: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti? yāni tāni subhūte saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni lokasya,
S06bsu049_u:341_14: vīryamārabhante / evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya trāṇaṃ bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_15: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santo lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhavanti? ye subhūte sattvā jātidharmiṇo jarādharmiṇo vyādhidharmiṇo maraṇadharmiṇaḥ śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsadharmiṇaḥ sattvāḥ tān sarvān jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsebhyaḥ parimocayanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_16: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya śaraṇaṃ bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_17: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanti? yatsubhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ sattvebhyo 'śleṣāya dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_18: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanati /
S06bsu049_u:341_19: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan aśleṣo bhavati? bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte rūpasyāsaṃbandhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:341_20: sa rūpasyāśleṣaḥ / yo rūpasyāśleṣaḥ, sa rūpasyāsaṃbandhaḥ / yo rūpasyāsaṃbandhaḥ, sa rūpasyānutpādo 'nirodhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:341_21: yo rūpasyānutpādo 'nirodhaḥ, sa rūpasyāśleṣaḥ / yo rūpasyāśleṣaḥ, ayaṃ rūpasyāsaṃbandhaḥ, ayaṃ rūpasyāśleṣaḥ / evaṃ vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:341_23: sa vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ / yo vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ, sa vijñānasyāsaṃbandhaḥ / yo vijñānasyāsaṃbandhaḥ, sa vijñānasyānutpādo 'nirodhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:341_25: sa vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ / yo vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ ayaṃ vijñānasyāsaṃbandhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:341_26: ayaṃ vijñānasyāśleṣaḥ / evaṃ hi subhūte sarvadharmā asaṃśliṣṭā asaṃbaddhā iti jñānadarśanādaśleṣo bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:341_27: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya layanaṃ bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_28: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti? yatsubhūte rūpasya pāraṃ na tadrūpam /
S06bsu049_u:341_29: yathā ca subhūte pāraṃ tathā rūpam /
S06bsu049_u:341_32: yathā ca subhūte pāraṃ tathā vijñānam /
S06bsu049_u:341_33: yathā ca subhūte rūpam, evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:341_36: evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ vijñānaṃ pāraṃ tathā sarvadharmāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:341_37: nanu bhagavan bodhisattvairmahāsattvairabhisaṃbuddhā evaṃ bhavanti sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:341_38: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hyatra bhagavan kaścidvikalpaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:341_40: evam etat / yattatpāraṃ na tatra kaścidvikalpaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:341_42: idam api subhūte paramaduṣkaraṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06bsu049_u:341_44: na ca sākṣātkurvanti, na cāvalīyante - evamasmābhirete dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:341_45: evaṃ ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya enān dharmān deśayiṣyāmaḥ prakāśayiṣyāma ityupanidhyāyanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_46: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya parāyaṇaṃ bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_47: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ [Vaidya_148] santo lokasya dvīpā bhavanti? tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ye pradeśā udakaparicchinnā bhavanti nadīṣu vā mahodadhiṣu vā,
S06bsu049_u:341_48: te ucyante dvīpā iti / evameva subhūte pūrvāntāparāntaparicchinnaṃ rūpam /
S06bsu049_u:341_53: etacchāntam, etatpraṇītam, etatparinirvāṇam, etadyathāvat, etadaviparītam / evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya dvīpā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_54: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santo lokasya ālokā bhavanti? iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo dīrgharātramavidyāṇḍakośapaṭalaparyavanaddhānāṃ sattvānāṃ tamobhibhūtānāṃ prajñayā avabhāsayantaḥ sarvājñānatamondhakāraṃ vidhunvanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_55: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya ālokā bhavanti /
