S06bsu049_u:341_56: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya pariṇāyakā bhavanti? iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo rūpasya prakṛtyanutpādānirodhāya dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_65: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya pariṇāyakā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_66: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya gatirbhagavanti? iha subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya ākāśagatikaṃ rupamiti dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_69: evameva subhūte sarvadharmā ākāśagatikā anāgatikā agatikā ākāśasamāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:341_71: evameva subhūte sarvadharmā anāgatā āgatā ākṛtā avikṛtā anabhisaṃskṛtā asthitā asaṃsthitā avyavasthitā anutpannā aniruddhā ākāśakalpatvādavikalpāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:341_72: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā subhūte rūpasya śūnyatā,
S06bsu049_u:341_73: na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:341_76: na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:341_78: na sā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:341_79: tatkasya hetoḥ? śūnyatāgatikā hi subhūte sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:341_118: ataś ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhā santa ākāśagatikāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S06bsu049_u:341_119: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo lokasya gatirbhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:342_0: subhūtirāha - ke bhagavan imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmājñāsyanti? bhagavānāha - ye subhūte caritāvino bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti paurvakāṇāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike paripakvakuśalamūlāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:342_1: te subhūte bodhisattvā veditavyāḥ ye imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmājñāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:342_2: subhūtirāha - kiṃsvabhāvā bhagavaṃste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:342_3: ye imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāmājñāsyanti? bhagavānāha - vainayikaviviktasvabhāvaste subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:343_0: subhūtirāha - kiṃ bhagavan evaṃgatikā eva te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti? enāmeva gatimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānāmenāmeva gatiṃ deśayiṣyanti? evaṃ te sattvānāṃ gatirbhaviṣyanti? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte,
S06bsu049_u:343_1: evam etat / evaṃgatikā eva te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:343_2: enāmeva gatimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānām enāmeva gatiṃ deśayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:343_4: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāḥ santo 'prameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ gatirbhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:344_0: subhūtirāha - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yenāyaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:344_2: evam etat / duṣkarakārakaḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yenāyaṃ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ - aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:344_3: sa khalu punarayaṃ subhūte [Vaidya_150] saṃnāho bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya na rūpasaṃbaddho na rūpasyārthāya saṃbaddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:344_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmāsaṃnaddho batāyaṃ subhūte saṃnāho bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya /
S06bsu049_u:345_0: subhūtirāha - asya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ mahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ gambhīrārāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratastrīṇi sthānāni na pratikāṅkṣitavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:345_1: katamāni trīṇi? yaduta śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā buddhabhūmirvā /
S06bsu049_u:345_2: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - katamaṃ tvaṃ subhūte arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyannevaṃ vadasi - asya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratastrīṇi sthānāni na pratikāṅkṣitavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:345_3: katamāni trīṇi? yaduta śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā buddhabhūmirveti? asthānaṃ subhūte hyetadanavakāśo 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhasya evaṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
S06bsu049_u:345_4: api tu buddhabhūmirevāsya pratikāṅkṣitavyā yenāyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:346_1: sā na kenacidbhāvayitavyā / tāṃ hi na kaścidbhāvitavān, nāpi kaścidbhāvayati, nāpi kaścidbhāvayiṣyati, nāpiṃ kiṃcidbhāvayitavyam, na kvacidbhāvayitavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kaściddharmaḥ pariniṣpannaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:347_1: evam etat / ato hi subhūte gambhīrāyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya upaparīkṣitavyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ - kaccitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ nābhiniveśaṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:347_3: kaccidbodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parasya śraddhayā gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:347_4: kaccitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na vipṛṣṭhībhavati notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:347_5: na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati na dhandhāyate avagāhate 'dhimucyate 'bhinandati prajñāpāramitāyā darśanaṃ śravaṇaṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:347_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:348_0: [Vaidya_151] subhūtirāha - yo bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:348_1: katamena bhagavan ākāreṇa tena prajñāpāramitā vyavacāritā bhavati? bhagavānāha - sarvajñatānimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā vyavacāritā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:348_2: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan sarvajñatānimnā saṃtatirvyavacāritā bhavati? bhagavānāha - ākāśanimnayā subhūte saṃtatyā ākāśapravaṇayā ākāśaprāgbhārayā subhūte saṃtatyā sarvajñatānimnā saṃtatirvyavacāritā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:348_3: yā khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvajñatānimnayā saṃtatyā vyavacāraṇā,
S06bsu049_u:348_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? aprameyā hi subhūte sarvajñatā,
S06bsu049_u:348_8: na tadrūpaṃ na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānaṃ na prāptirnābhisamayo nādhigamo na mārgo na mārgaphalaṃ na jñānaṃ na vijñānaṃ notpattirna vināśo notpādo na vyayo na nirodho na bhāvanā na vibhāvanā,
S06bsu049_u:348_9: nāpi kenacitkṛtaṃ nāpi kutaścidāgataṃ nāpi kvacid gacchati nāpi kvaciddeśe nāpi kvacitpradeśe sthitam,
S06bsu049_u:348_12: yā ca aprameyatā, na sā śakyā kenacidabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:348_13: na rūpeṇa na vedanayā na saṃjñayā na saṃskārairna vijñānena na dānapāramitayā na śīlapāramitayā na kṣāntipāramitayā na vīryapāramitayā na dhyānapāramitayā na prajñāpāramitayā śakyā abhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:348_14: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpameva hi subhūte sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:348_18: śīlapāramitaiva kṣāntipāramitaiva vīryapāramitaiva dhyānapāramitaiva prajñāpāramitaiva hi subhūte sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:349_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputrairbrahmāpi sahāpatiḥ sārdhaṃ rūpāvacarairdevaputrairyena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:349_1: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasābhivandya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya ekānte tasthau /
S06bsu049_u:349_2: ekānte sthitaś ca śakro devendraḥ kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:349_6: idamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhamātrasya bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya alpotsukatāyāṃ cittamavanataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām /
S06bsu049_u:350_0: evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ kāmāvacarāṃś ca devaputrān brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:350_1: evam etat / gambhīrā bateyaṃ devaputrāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:350_5: idamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyatastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya [Vaidya_152] anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhamātrasya bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya alpotsukatāyāṃ cittamavanataṃ na dharmadeśanāyām - gambhīro batāyaṃ mayā dharmo 'bhisaṃbuddha iti,
S06bsu049_u:350_6: yatra na kaścidabhisaṃbuddho na kaścidabhisaṃbhotsyate na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:351_0: evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ kāmāvacarāś ca devaputrāḥ brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:351_2: anugrahāya ca bhagavan dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmo deśyate /
S06bsu049_u:356_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - sarvadharmānupalambho batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmo deśyate /
S06bsu049_u:356_2: apratihatalakṣaṇo batāyaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ ākāśasamatayā sarvapadānupalabdhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:357_0: atha khalu devānāmindro brahmā sahāpatiste ca kāmāvacarā rūpāvacarāś ca devaputrā bhagavantametadavocan - anujāto batāyaṃ bhagavan bhagavataḥ śrāvaka āryasubhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:357_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan yaṃ yameva ayamāryasubhūtiḥ sthaviro dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06bsu049_u:358_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindraṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca sahāpatiṃ tāṃś ca kāmāvacarān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - yaddevaputrā evaṃ vadatha - anujāto 'yaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatasyeti /
S06bsu049_u:358_8: sā sarvadharmatathatā / yā sarvadharmatathatā, sā tathāgatatathatā / yā ca tathāgatatathatā, yā ca sarvadharmatathatā, saiva subhūteḥ sthavirasya tathatā /
S06bsu049_u:358_10: ato 'nujātastathāgatasya / sāpi ca tathatā atathatā / tāṃ tathatāmanujātaḥ / evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:358_14: avikalpā nirvikalpā, evaṃ hi subhūtitathatā avikārā nirvikārā,
S06bsu049_u:358_15: avikalpā nirvikalpā / evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastayā tathatayā avikāro nirvikāro 'vikalpo nirvikalpastathāgatasyānujātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:358_16: yathā ca tathāgatatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā,
S06bsu049_u:358_17: na kvacitpratihanyate, evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā avikārā nirvikārā avikalpā nirvikalpā,
S06bsu049_u:358_18: na kvacitpratihanyate / tatkasya hetoḥ? yā ca tathāgatatathatā,
S06bsu049_u:358_19: yā ca sarvadharmatathatā, ekaivaiṣā tathatā advayādvaidhīkārā advayatathatā /
S06bsu049_u:358_20: na kvacittathatā, na kutaścittathatā, na kasyacittathatā / yataḥ sā na kasyacittathatā, tataḥ sā tathatā advayādvaidhīkārā advayatathatā /
S06bsu049_u:358_22: yā ca akṛtatathatā, na sā kadācinna tathatā / yataś ca [Vaidya_154] sā na kadācinna tathatā,
S06bsu049_u:358_27: evameva ca tathāgatatathatayābhinirmitaḥ subhūtiśceti dvayamapyaluptametadabhinnaṃ bhedakānupalabdhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:358_32: na sā kasyacinna tathatā / saiva sā tathatā sarvadharmatathatā /
S06bsu049_u:358_36: yathā tathāgatatathatā nātītā na anāgatā na pratyutpannā,
S06bsu049_u:358_37: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā nātītā nānāgatā na pratyutpannā /
S06bsu049_u:358_38: evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastāṃ tathatāmanujātastathāgatamanujāta ityucyate /
S06bsu049_u:358_47: iti hi subhūtitathatā ca atītānāgatapratyutpannatathatā ca tathāgatatathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:358_48: evaṃ sarvadharmatathatā ca subhūtitathatā ca advayametadadvaidhīkāram /
S06bsu049_u:358_51: iyaṃ sā tathatā, yayā tathatayā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ san tathāgata iti nāmadheyaṃ labhate /
S06bsu049_u:358_52: asyāṃ khalu punastathātagatathatāyāṃ nirdiśyamānāyāmiyaṃ mahāpṛthivī tasyāṃ velāyāṃ ṣaḍvikāramaṣṭādaśamahānimittamakampat,
S06bsu049_u:358_53: prākampat, saṃprākampat, acalat prācalat saṃprācalat, avedhat prāvedhat saṃprāvedhat,
S06bsu049_u:358_54: araṇat prāraṇat saṃprāraṇat, akṣubhyat prākṣubhyat saṃprākṣubhyat,
S06bsu049_u:358_56: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthavirastān devaputrānāmantrayate sma - evaṃ hi devaputrāḥ subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:359_0: punaraparaṃ subhūtiḥ sthaviro na rūpamanujāto na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān na vijñānamanujāto na srotaāpattiphalamanujāto na sakṛdāgāmiphalaṃ na anāgāmiphalaṃ na arhattvaphalamanujāto na pratyekabuddhatvamanujāto na buddhatvamanujātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:359_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te dharmā na saṃvidyante nopalabhyante yairanujāyeta,
S06bsu049_u:359_2: ye cānujāyeran / evaṃ hi subhūtiḥ sthavirastathāgatamanujātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:360_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīracaryeyaṃ bhagavan yaduta tathatā /
S06bsu049_u:360_2: evam etat / [Vaidya_155] gambhīracaryeyaṃ śāriputra yaduta yathatā /
S06bsu049_u:360_3: asmin khalu punastathatānirdeśe nirdiśyamāne trayāṇāṃ bhikṣuśatānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni,
S06bsu049_u:360_4: pañcānāṃ ca bhikṣuṇīśatānāṃ virajo vigatamalaṃ dharmeṣu dharmacakṣurviśuddham,
S06bsu049_u:360_5: pañcabhiś ca devaputrasahasraiḥ pūrvaparikarmakṛtairanutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06bsu049_u:361_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputrasteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni viditvā bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ kaḥ pratyayo yadeteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmanupādāyāsravebhyaścittāni vimuktāni? bhagavānāha - etaiḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaiḥ pañcabuddhaśatāni paryupāsitāni,
S06bsu049_u:361_1: sarvatra ca dānaṃ dattaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣityaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpāditaṃ vīryamārabdhaṃ dhyānānyutpāditāni /
S06bsu049_u:361_2: te khalu punarime prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītā upāyakauśalyena ca virahitā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:361_3: kiṃcāpi śāriputra eteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāmasti mārgaḥ śūnyatā vā ānimittacaryā vā apraṇihitamanasikāratā vā,
S06bsu049_u:361_5: śrāvakabhūmau nirjātāḥ, na buddhabhūmau / tadyathāpi nāma śāriputra pakṣiṇaḥ śakuneryojanaśatiko vā dviyojanaśatiko vā triyojanaśatiko vā caturyojanaśatiko vā pañcayojanaśatiko vā ātmabhāvo bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:361_6: sa trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu vartamāno jambūdvīpamāgantavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:361_7: sa khalu punaḥ śāriputra pakṣī śakunirajātapakṣo vā bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:361_8: śīrṇapakṣo vā bhavet, chinnapakṣo vā bhavet / sa trāyastriṃśato devanikāyādātmānamutsṛjet - iha jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhāsyāmīti manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:361_9: atha tasya pakṣiṇaḥ śakunestataḥ patataḥ ākāśe antarīkṣe sthitasya antarā cittasyaivaṃ bhavet - aho batāhaṃ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭheyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:361_10: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakuniḥ pratibalaḥ punareva trāyastriṃśeṣu deveṣu pratiṣṭhātum? āyuṣmān śāriputra āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:361_11: bhagavānāha - sacetpunarevaṃ cintayet - aho batāhamakṛto 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭheyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:361_12: tatkiṃ manyase śāriputra api nu sa pakṣī śakunirakṛto 'nupahato jambūdvīpe pratiṣṭhet? śāriputra āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:361_13: kṛtaś ca sa bhagavan upahataś ca bhavejjambūdvīpe ca patitaḥ san maraṇaṃ vā nigacchet maraṇamātrakaṃ vā duḥkham /
S06bsu049_u:361_14: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetadbhagavan bhavati - yadasya mahāṃścātmabhāvo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:362_1: evam etat / kiṃ cāpi śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittānyutpādya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:362_2: śīlaṃ rakṣet, kṣāntyā saṃpādayet, vīryamārabheta, dhyānāni, samāpadyeta, mahaccāsya prasthānaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:362_4: sacedayaṃ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhīta upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:362_5: evaṃ śrāvakabhūmiṃ vā pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ vā patati /
S06bsu049_u:363_0: [Vaidya_156] punaraparaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tacchīlaṃ taṃ samādhiṃ tāṃ prajñāṃ tāṃ vimuktiṃ tadvimuktijñānadarśanaṃ samanvāharati,
S06bsu049_u:363_1: ādhārayati nimittayogena, na sa tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ śīlaṃ na jānāti na paśyati /
S06bsu049_u:363_2: na samādhiṃ na prajñāṃ na vimuktiṃ na vimuktijñānadarśanaṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ jānāti,
S06bsu049_u:363_3: na paśyati / so 'jānannapaśyan śūnyatāyāḥ śabdaṃ śṛṇoti /
S06bsu049_u:363_5: taṃ śabdaṃ nimittīkṛtya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayitumicchati /
S06bsu049_u:363_6: tato veditavyam etat - sthāsyatyayaṃ śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau veti /
S06bsu049_u:363_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ hyetacchāriputra bhavati - yatprajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:364_0: śāriputra āha - yathāhaṃ bhagavan bhagavato bhāṣitasyārthamājānāmi - yo bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ upāyakauśalyena ca virahitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:364_1: kiṃcāpi sa bahunāpi puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaś ca bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:364_3: tasmāttarhi bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
S06bsu049_u:364_6: evam etat / yaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:364_8: kiṃcāpi sa bahunā puṇyasaṃbhāreṇa yuktaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahitaś ca bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:364_10: tasmāttarhi śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyā,
S06bsu049_u:365_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sārdhaṃ kāmāvacarairdevaputraiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:365_1: brahmāpi sahāpatiḥ rūpāvacarairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:365_4: atha khalu bhagavāṃstān śakradevendrapramukhān kāmāvacarān devaputrān sahāpatimahābrahmapramukhān rūpāvacarāṃś ca devaputrānāmantrayate sma - evametaddevaputrāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:366_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:366_2: kathaṃ bhagavan durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ? paramadurabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhum,
S06bsu049_u:366_3: yatra na kaścidabhisaṃbudhyate? tatkasya hetoḥ? śūnyatvādbhagavan sarvadharmāṇām /
S06bsu049_u:366_4: na sa kaściddharmaḥ saṃvidyate yo dharmaḥ śakyo 'bhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:366_6: yasyāpi bhagavan dharmasya prahāṇāya dharmo deśyate,
S06bsu049_u:366_9: yaccābhisaṃboddhavyam, yaś ca jānīyāt, yacca jñātavyam, [Vaidya_157] sarva ete dharmāḥ śūnyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:366_10: anenāpi bhagavan paryāyeṇa mamaivaṃ bhavati - svabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhuṃ na durabhisaṃbhaveti /
S06bsu049_u:366_11: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - asaṃbhavatvātsubhūte durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:367_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - śūnyamityanenāpyāyuṣman subhūte paryāyeṇa durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:367_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hyāyuṣman subhūte ākāśasyaivaṃ bhavati - ahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti /
S06bsu049_u:367_3: evaṃ ca āyuṣman subhūte ime dharmā abhisaṃboddhavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:367_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? ākāśasamā hyāyuṣman subhūte sarvadharmāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:367_5: yadi cāyuṣman subhūte svabhisaṃbhavā bhavedanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:367_6: na tvevaṃ gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivarterannanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:367_7: yasmāttarhyāyuṣman subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopamā bodhisattvā vivartante 'nuttarayāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:367_8: tasmādāyuṣman subhūte evaṃ vijñāyate - durabhisaṃbhavā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:368_0: evamukte āyuṣman subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? śāriputra āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_1: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_2: yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_3: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_4: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyo 'nyatra vijñānāt sa dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_5: yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_6: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā rūpatathatā,
S06bsu049_u:368_7: sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_8: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā,
S06bsu049_u:368_9: yā vijñānatathatā, sā vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_10: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_11: yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_12: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_14: yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_15: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_16: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānamabhisaṃbudhyate anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_17: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman [Vaidya_158] śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_18: yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_19: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_20: anyatra vijñānātsa dharmaḥ, yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_21: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā anuttarāṃ saṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_22: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_23: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_24: yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_25: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_27: yo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_28: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_29: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārā vijñānaṃ boddhavyamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_30: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_31: yo boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_32: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_33: anyatra vijñānātsa dharmaḥ yo boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_34: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra rūpatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_35: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā vijñānatathatā boddhavyā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_36: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra rūpatathatāyāḥ sa dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_37: yo boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_38: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra anyatra vedanātathatāyāḥ saṃjñātathatāyāḥ saṃskāratathatāyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_40: yo boddhavyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_41: subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatā vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_42: subhūtirāha - tatkiṃ manyase āyuṣman śāriputra tathatāyāṃ sa dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_43: yo vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_44: subhūtirāha - tatkatamaḥ punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa dharmo yo vivartate anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? yastasyāmeva dharmatāyāṃ sthitaḥ sarvadharmāsthānayogena? katamo vā punaḥ sa śāriputra dharmo yā tathatā? kaccidvā punarāyuṣman śāriputra tathatā vivartiṣyate? āha - no hīdamāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:368_45: subhūtirāha - evamāyuṣman śāriputra satyataḥ sthitito 'nupalabhyamānānāṃ sarvadharmāṇāṃ katamaḥ sa dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_46: yo vivartiṣyate anuttarayāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ? evamukte āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ [Vaidya_159] subhūtimetadavocat - yayā dharmanayajātyā āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviro nirdiśati,
S06bsu049_u:368_47: tayā na sa kaściddharmo yo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:368_48: ye ca khalu punarime āyuṣman subhūte trayo bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāstathāgatenākhyātāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:368_50: ekameva hi yānaṃ bhavati yaduta buddhayānaṃ bodhisattvayānaṃ yathā āyuṣmataḥ subhūternirdeśaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:369_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān pūrṇo maitrāyaṇīputra āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra āyuṣmān subhūtiḥ sthaviraḥ ekam api bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchati śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:369_2: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punastvamāyuṣman subhūte ekam api bodhisattvaṃ nābhyupagacchasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā? subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra yā tathatāyāstathatā,
S06bsu049_u:369_3: tatra tathatāyāmekam api bodhisattvaṃ samanupaśyasi śrāvakayānikaṃ vā pratyekabuddhayānikaṃ vā mahāyānikaṃ vā? śāriputra āha - na hyetadāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:369_5: prāgeva bodhisattvaḥ / subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarāyuṣman śāriputra tathatā ekenāpyākāreṇopalabhyate? āha - na hyetadāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:369_6: subhūtirāha - kaccitpunastvamāyuṣman śāriputra tathatāyāmekam api bodhisattvadharmaṃ samanupaśyasi? āha - na hyetadāyuṣman subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:369_7: subhūtirāha - evamāyuṣman śāriputra satyataḥ sthititastasya bodhisattvadharmasyānupalabhyamānasya kutastavaivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ śrāvakayānikaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:369_8: ayaṃ pratyekabuddhayānikaḥ, ayaṃ mahāyānika iti? evameteṣāmāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvānāṃ tathatāyāṃ pravibhāvyamānānāmaviśeṣatāṃ nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ śrutvā yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na pṛṣṭhībhavati,
S06bsu049_u:369_9: veditavyam etat - niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:370_0: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:370_1: evametatsubhūte, evam etat / pratibhāti te subhūte yathāpi nāma tathāgatānubhāvena buddhādhiṣṭhānenedaṃ vadasi /
S06bsu049_u:370_2: evameteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ tathatāyāṃ pravibhāvyamānānāmaviśeṣatāṃ nirviśeṣatāṃ nirnānākaraṇatāṃ śrutvā yasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate na pṛṣṭhībhavati,
S06bsu049_u:370_3: veditavyam etat - niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:370_4: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro bhagavantametadavocat - katamayā bhagavan bodhyā niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ? bhagavānāha - anuttarayā śāriputra samyaksaṃbodhyā niryāsyatyayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:371_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - anuttarāyāṃ bhagavan samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ sthātavyaṃ kathaṃ śikṣitavyam? bhagavānāha - anuttarāyāṃ subhūte samyaksaṃbodhau niryātukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvasattveṣu samaṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:371_10: sarvasattveṣu mātṛsaṃjñāmupasthāya pitṛsaṃjñāṃ putrasaṃjñāṃ duhitṛsaṃjñāṃ copasthāpya pare ālambitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:371_11: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmantike sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:371_14: dānaṃ dātavyaṃ śīlaṃ rakṣitavyaṃ kṣāntyā saṃpādayitavyaṃ vīryamārabdhavyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpattavyaṃ prajñāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaṃ,
S06bsu049_u:371_16: anyeṣām api tatra samādāpakena tadvarṇavādinā tatsamanujñena ca bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:371_17: evaṃ satyeṣu yāvadbodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntau sattvaparipācane ca sthitvā anyeṣām api tatra samādāpakena tadvarṇavādinā tatsamanujñena ca bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:371_18: tasyaivaṃ spṛhayata evaṃ śikṣamāṇasya anāvaraṇaṃ rūpaṃ yāvaddharmasthitiranāvaraṇā bhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:376_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - avinivartanīyasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ke ākārāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:376_1: kāni liṅgāni, kāni nimittāni? kathaṃ vā bhagavan vayaṃ jānīyāma ayamavinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti? bhagavānāha - yā ca subhūte pṛthagjanabhūmiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:376_2: yā ca śrāvakabhūmiḥ, yā ca pratyekabuddhabhūmiḥ, yā ca buddhabhūmiḥ, iyaṃ tathatābhūmirityucyate /
S06bsu049_u:376_3: sarvāścaitāstathatāyā advayā advaidhīkārā avikalpā nirvikalpā iti tāṃ tathatāṃ tāṃ dharmatāmavataranti /
S06bsu049_u:376_4: tathatāyāṃ sthitastathatāṃ na kalpayati na vikalpayati,
S06bsu049_u:376_5: evamavatarati / evamavatīrṇo yathātathatāṃ śrutvāpi tato 'pi cāpakramya na kāṅkṣati na vimatiṃ karoti,
S06bsu049_u:376_6: na vicikitsati, naivamiti na dhandhāyati, api tu evametattathataivetyadhimuñcatyavagāhate,
S06bsu049_u:376_10: ebhiḥ subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:377_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nānyeṣāṃ śramaṇānāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ vā mukhamullokayati - ime bhagavantaḥ śramaṇā brāhmaṇā vā jñeyaṃ jānanti,
S06bsu049_u:377_1: dṛśyaṃ paśyantīti / na cānyān devānnamaskaroti, na cānyebhyo devebhyaḥ puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā dātavyaṃ manyate,
S06bsu049_u:377_3: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:377_4: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāpāyeṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:378_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate /
S06bsu049_u:378_23: evaṃ khalu subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svayaṃ ca daśakuśalān karmapathān samādāya vartate,
S06bsu049_u:378_24: parān api ca daśakuśaleṣu karmapatheṣu saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati pratiṣṭhāpayati dṛḍhīkaroti /
S06bsu049_u:378_25: sa svapnāntaragato 'pi daśakuśalān karmapathānekaikato vā bāhulyato vā sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ nādhyāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:378_26: cittenāpi na samudācarati / tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svapnāntaragatasyāpi daśakuśalāḥ karmapathā āmukhībhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:378_27: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:379_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yaṃ yaṃ dharmaṃ paryavāpnoti,
S06bsu049_u:379_1: dadāti ca, taṃ taṃ evaṃcittaḥ paryavāpnoti,
S06bsu049_u:379_2: dadāti ca - imamahaṃ dharmaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya paryavāpnomi dadāmi ca,
S06bsu049_u:379_3: hitāya sukhāya ca / iti caiṣa bhavatu, anayā dharmadeśanayā dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ paripūryantāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:379_5: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:380_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na kāṅkṣati,
S06bsu049_u:380_1: na vimatiṃ karoti, na vicikitsati na dhandhāyati,
S06bsu049_u:380_2: hitavacanaś ca bhavati, mitavacanaś ca bhavati, snigdhavacanaś ca bhavati, alpastyānamiddhaś ca bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:380_3: niranuśayaś ca bhavati / so 'bhikrāman vā pratikrāman vā na bhrāntacitto 'bhikrāmati vā,
S06bsu049_u:380_7: sukhamevotkṣipati, sukhaṃ nikṣipati / na ca sahasā pādaṃ bhūmerutkṣipati,
S06bsu049_u:380_8: na ca sahasā pādaṃ bhūmau nikṣipati,
S06bsu049_u:380_10: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śarīre cīvaraparibhogo na yūkilo bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:380_12: alpābādhaś ca bhavati / alpādīnavaś ca bhavati / yāni khalu punaranyeṣāṃ sattvānāmaśītiḥ kṛmikulasahasrāṇi kāye saṃbhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:380_13: tāni tasya kāye sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na saṃbhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:380_14: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tasya tāni kuśalamūlāni sarvalokābhyudgatāni bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:381_0: yathā yathā ca tasya tāni kuśalamūlāni vivardhante,
S06bsu049_u:381_1: tathā tathā sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kāyapariśuddhiṃ ca parigṛhṇīte,
S06bsu049_u:381_4: subhūtirāha - kā punarbhagavaṃstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittapariśuddhirveditavyā? [Vaidya_163] bhagavānāha - yathā yathā subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāni kuśalamūlāni vivardhante,
S06bsu049_u:381_5: tathā tathā sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścittālpakṛtyatāṃ ca parigṛhṇīte,
S06bsu049_u:381_6: cittāśāṭhyatāṃ ca cittāmāyāvitāṃ ca cittākuṭilatāṃ cittāvaṅkatāṃ ca parigṛhṇīte,
S06bsu049_u:381_7: yayā ca subhūte cittapariśuddhyā śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmimatikrānto bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:381_8: iyaṃ subhūte tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittapariśuddhirveditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:381_9: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:382_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na lābhasatkāraślokaguruko bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:382_3: na ca gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu saṃsīdati /
S06bsu049_u:382_4: sthirabuddhiś ca bhavati, gambhīrabuddhiś ca bhavati, satkṛtya ca parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti /
S06bsu049_u:382_5: yaṃ ca satkṛtya parato dharmaṃ śṛṇoti,
S06bsu049_u:382_12: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ avinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:383_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānaṣṭau mahānirayānabhinirmāya tatra ekaikasmin mahāniraye bahūni bodhisattvaśatāni bahūni bodhisattvasahasrāṇi bahūni bodhisattvaśatasahasrāṇyabhinirmāya avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vadet - ye tathāgatena avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyākṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:383_5: pratiniḥsṛja / kiṃ te buddhatvena? evaṃ tvaṃ na nirayeṣūpapatsyase /
S06bsu049_u:383_7: sacedevam api bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati,
S06bsu049_u:383_10: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:384_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān śramaṇaveṣeṇa avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati - yadetattvayā pūrvaṃ śrutaṃ tatpratideśaya,
S06bsu049_u:384_5: yadetattvayedānīṃ śrutam, naitadbuddhavacanam / kavikṛtaṃ kāvyam etat / yatpunaridamahaṃ bhāṣe, etadbuddhabhāṣitam, etadbuddhavacanamiti / etacchrutvā sacedbodhisattvaḥ kṣubhyati calati,
S06bsu049_u:384_9: sacetpunaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na kṣubhyati na calati,
S06bsu049_u:384_10: śrutvāpi cemāṃ vācaṃ mārasya pāpīyasaḥ dharmatāmeva pratisarati,
S06bsu049_u:384_13: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte arhan bhikṣuḥ kṣīṇāsravo na parasya śraddhayā gacchati dharmatāyāṃ pratyakṣakārī /
S06bsu049_u:384_15: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'navamardanīyaḥ śrāvakayānikaiḥ pudgalaiḥ pratyekabuddhayānikaiś ca /
S06bsu049_u:384_17: śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā niyato bhavati sarvajñatāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiparāyaṇaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:384_18: sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā avinivartanīyadhātau sthito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:384_19: tadā aparapraṇeyo bhavati / ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:385_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya kaścidevaṃ vakṣyatisaṃsāracārikaiṣā,
S06bsu049_u:385_1: naiṣā bodhisattvacārikā / ihaiva tvaṃ duḥkhasyāntaṃ kuru /
S06bsu049_u:385_4: kutaḥ punastvamanyamātmabhāvaṃ parigrahītavyaṃ manyase iti vā /
S06bsu049_u:385_5: sacedevam api na kṣubhyati na calati,
S06bsu049_u:385_6: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyān svayamevaṃ vakṣyati - icchasi tvaṃ draṣṭuṃ tān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān yairgaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān buddhā bhagavantaḥ pratyupasthitāścīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:385_8: gaṅgānadīvālukopamā eva buddhā bhagavantaḥ paryupāsitāḥ paripṛṣṭāḥ paripraśnīkṛtāś ca asyaiva bodhisattvayānasyārthāya kathaṃ bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sthātavyamiti? yathā ca bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:385_10: tathāpi sthitvā tathā caritvā tathaiva yogamāpadya adyāpi taireva tāvanna anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā /
S06bsu049_u:385_11: tathā avavādānuśāsanyāṃ sthitaistathā śikṣamāṇaiḥ sarvajñatā nānuprāptā /
S06bsu049_u:385_12: kutaḥ punastvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimanuprāpsyasīti? sacedevam api na kṣubhyati na calati,
S06bsu049_u:385_13: taṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃstasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe bhikṣūnabhinirmāyaivaṃ vakṣyati - ete bhikṣavo 'rhantaḥ kṣīṇāsravāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:385_16: kutaḥ punastvamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimanuprāpsyatīti? sacetkhalu punarevam api bhāṣyamāṇe evaṃ nirdiśyamāne bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ na kṣubhyati na calati,
S06bsu049_u:385_18: sacedbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cittaṃ parataḥ śrutvaivaṃ vivekapadāni dharmatāyā na parihīyate,
S06bsu049_u:385_21: tāni ca sarvāṇi mārakarmāṇi tathā saṃjānāti - asthānaṃ subhūte anavakāśaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:385_22: yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā caran pāramitāsu na sarvajñatāmanuprāpnuyāt - [Vaidya_165] asthānametadanavakāśo yattathā caratastathā śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yathā tathāgatairākhyātaṃ tayā caryayā avirahitasya ebhiḥ pāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairviharato māraḥ pāpīyānnāvatāraṃ lapsyate /
S06bsu049_u:385_24: parataś ca śrutvā vivekapadāni na parihīyate,
S06bsu049_u:385_28: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:386_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpasaṃjñāmabhisaṃskāroti,
S06bsu049_u:386_1: na rūpasaṃjñāmutpādayati / evaṃ na vedanāsaṃjñāṃ na saṃjñāsaṃjñāṃ na saṃskārasaṃjñām /
S06bsu049_u:386_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svalakṣaṇaśūnyairdharmairbodhisattvanyāmāvakrāntaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:386_5: tam api dharmaṃ nopalabhate nābhisaṃskāroti notpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:386_6: tata ucyate anutpādajñānakṣāntiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīya iti /
S06bsu049_u:386_7: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:387_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vicchandayiṣyati - ākāśasamaiṣā yaduta sarvajñatā /
S06bsu049_u:387_4: yaccābhisaṃboddhavyam, yaś ca ājānīyāt, yacca ājñātavyam / sarvatra te dharmā ākāśasamāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:387_5: nirarthakaṃ tvaṃ vihanyase / mārakarmairvaitatparidīpitaṃ yaduta anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃboddhavyeti,
S06bsu049_u:387_6: naitadbuddhabhāṣitamiti / tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā evaṃ jñātavyamevaṃ samanvāhartavyamevaṃ veditavyam - mārakarmaivaitat,
S06bsu049_u:387_7: yeyaṃ vivecanatā / evaṃ cintayitvā tatra dṛḍhacittena bhavitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:387_9: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:388_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūminirvṛttaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ pravṛtto bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:388_2: tathā dvitīyaṃ tathā tṛtīyaṃ tathā caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:388_4: dhyānaparijayaṃ ca karoti, dhyānāni ca samāpadyate, na ca dhyānavaśenopapadyate /
S06bsu049_u:388_6: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:389_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nāmaguruko bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:389_6: smṛtimānevābhikrāmati, smṛtimāneva pratikrāmati / sacetso 'gāramadhyāvasati, nāsya bhavatyadhimātraḥ kāmeṣu kāmābhiṣvaṅgo vā abhiprāyo vā /
S06bsu049_u:389_9: tadyathāpi subhūte caurakāntāramadhyagataḥ puruṣaḥ āhārakṛtyaṃ kurvannutrastasaṃjñyevāhāraṃ kuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:389_10: gamanasaṃjñyevāhāraṃ kuryāt, kadā nu khalu nāma ahamitaścaurakāntārādatikrānto bhaviṣyāmītyevaṃsaṃjñī aviśrabdhamāhāramāharati /
S06bsu049_u:389_11: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā agāramadhyāvasanto yān yāneva kāmān paribhuñjate,
S06bsu049_u:389_12: tāṃstānanarthikā eva agṛddhā eva asaktā eva kāmān paribhuñjate /
S06bsu049_u:389_13: anarthikā eva ca te bhavanti priyarūpasātarūpaiḥ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:389_17: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi taiḥ satpuruṣairmahāpuruṣairatipuruṣaiḥ puruṣapravaraiḥ puruṣaśobhanaiḥ puruṣarṣabhaiḥ puruṣodāraiḥ puruṣaśauṭīraiḥ puruṣapuṃgavaiḥ puruṣadhuryaiḥ puruṣapadmaiḥ puruṣapuṇḍarīkaiḥ puruṣājāneyaiḥ puruṣanāgaiḥ puruṣasiṃhaiḥ puruṣadamyasārathibhiḥ sarvasattvāḥ paramasukhe niyojayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:389_18: evaṃ hi subhūte agāramadhyāvasanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvā yathāpi nāma prajñāpāramitābalādhānaprāptatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:389_19: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgatā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:390_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya vajrapāṇirmahāyakṣo nityānubaddho bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:390_1: sa durdharṣo bhavati, anatikramaṇīyaś ca bhavati manuṣyairvā amanuṣyairvā,
S06bsu049_u:390_2: durāsadaḥ sarvasattvānām / sa na vikṣiptacitto bhavati, na vikalendriyo bhavati, paripūrṇaindriyaś ca bhavati nāparipūrṇendriyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:390_5: tāni sarvāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ na prayojayati /
S06bsu049_u:390_7: na vigrahavivādaśīlaḥ / ṛjudṛṣṭikaś ca bhavati / nātmotkarṣī na parapaṃsakaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:390_8: sa ebhiścānyaiś ca guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:390_9: sa na striyaṃ na ca puruṣaṃ vyākaroti - putro vā te bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:390_10: duhitā vā te bhaviṣyatīti / tasyaivamādikā evaṃrūpā ādeyatādoṣā na bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:390_11: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:391_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni yairākārairyairliṅgairyairnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo veditavyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:391_2: te punaḥ katame? tadyathā - na te skandhāyatanadhātupratītyasamutpādayogānuyogamanuyuktā viharanti,
S06bsu049_u:391_25: na bhedavarṇavādinaḥ / mitrakāmāś ca te bhavanti, nāmitrakāmāḥ / dharmavādinaś ca te bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:391_26: nādharmavādinaḥ / te tathāgatadarśanamevākāṅkṣanta ākāṅkṣanti anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:391_29: evaṃ te avirahitā bhavanti tathāgatadarśanena tathāgataparyupāsanena tathāgataparyupasthānena ca /
S06bsu049_u:392_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kāmāvacarebhyo devebhyaścyutā rūpāvacarebhya ārūpyāvacarebhyo vā devebhyaścyutāḥ santaḥ ihaiva madhyadeśe jambūdvīpe pratyājāyante /
S06bsu049_u:392_2: kāvyeṣu kovidāḥ, mantreṣu kovidāḥ, vidyāsu kovidāḥ, śāstreṣu kovidāḥ, nimitteṣu kovidāḥ, dharmārthakovidāḥ / alpakāḥ pratyantajanapadeṣu pratyājāyante,
S06bsu049_u:392_7: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:393_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - avinivartanīyo vāham,
S06bsu049_u:393_1: na vāhamavinivartanīya iti / nāsyaivaṃ vicikitsotpadyate, na cāsya saṃśayo bhavati, svasyāṃ bhūmau nāpyasya saṃsīdanā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:393_2: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte srotaāpannaḥ srotaāpattiphale svakāyāṃ bhūmau na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati /
S06bsu049_u:393_3: na cāsya saṃśayo bhavati / svasyāṃ bhūmau nāpyasya saṃsīdanā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:393_6: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣa ānantaryakārī ānantaryacittena avirahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:393_7: yāvanmaraṇāvasthāyām, na taccittaṃ śaknoti prativinodayituṃ [Vaidya_168] vā viṣkambhayituṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:393_9: evameva subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyacittaṃ sthitaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:393_11: sadevamānuṣāsureṇāpi lokena na śakyaṃ cālayituṃ vā kampayituṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:393_14: tasya svasyāṃ bhūmau niṣkāṅkṣasya nirvicikitsasya jātivyativṛttasyāpi na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittaṃ votpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:393_16: abhisaṃbhotsye evāhamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ svasyāṃ bhūmau sthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:393_17: aparapraṇeyo bhavati, anavamardanīyaś ca bhavati svasyāṃ bhūmau /
S06bsu049_u:393_18: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi sa sthito 'saṃhāryeṇa cittena asaṃhāryeṇa jñānena samanvāgato bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:393_22: na tava te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni vā saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:393_24: kiṃ vātra tvaṃ carasīti? sacetpunarbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyathā cittaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:393_25: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ bodhisattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
S06bsu049_u:393_26: sacetpunarevaṃ samanvāharati - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhaveṣamabhinirmāyopasaṃkrāntaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:393_28: nāyaṃ tathāgataḥ / yathoktaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena tathā tannānyathā /
S06bsu049_u:393_29: sacedevaṃ pratyavekṣate, evaṃ samanvāharati - māro batāyaṃ pāpīyān buddhādhiṣṭhānaṃ kṛtvā māṃ vivecayitukāmo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodhita iti /
S06bsu049_u:393_30: sacenmāraḥ pratyudāvartate, veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:393_32: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ime ākārā imāni liṅgāni imāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:393_34: addhā batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛtaḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:393_36: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hyasya te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:393_38: ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:394_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśaḥ ātmaparityāgam api karoti,
S06bsu049_u:394_2: tasmādbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyaḥ saddharmaparigrahāya paramudyogamāpadyate atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ premṇā ca gauraveṇa ca /
S06bsu049_u:394_3: dharmakāyā buddhā bhagavanta iti dharme prema ca gauravaṃ copādāya [Vaidya_169] saddharmaparigrahaṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:394_5: pratyutpannānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva saddharmaparigrahaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:394_6: anāgatānām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmeṣa eva saddharmaparigrahaḥ - aham api tatra teṣāmanāgatānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ saṃkhyāṃ gaṇanāṃ praviṣṭa iti,
S06bsu049_u:394_9: sa imamapyarthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan saddharmaparigrahasya kṛtaśa ātmaparityāgam api karoti,
S06bsu049_u:394_11: na ca tatra saṃsīdati, na ca kausīdyamāpadyate / ebhir api subhūte ākārairebhirliṅgairebhirnimittaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:395_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati,
S06bsu049_u:395_1: na vicikitsati / subhūtirāha - kiṃ tathāgatasyaiva bhagavan dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati,
S06bsu049_u:395_2: na śrāvakasya? bhagavānāha - śrāvakasyāpi subhūte dharmaṃ deśayato na kāṅkṣati na vicikitsati /
S06bsu049_u:395_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā /
S06bsu049_u:395_5: śṛṇvaṃś ca na kāṅkṣati, na vicikitsati / ebhiḥ subhūte guṇaiḥ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:395_6: imāny api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ākāraliṅganimittāni veditavyānyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:400_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan mahāguṇasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:400_4: evam etat / tatkasya hetoḥ? avinivartanīyena hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anantamaparyantaṃ jñānaṃ pratilabdhamasaṃhāryaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:401_0: subhūtirāha - pratibalo bhagavan avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpānākārān liṅgāni nimittāni nirdeṣṭum /
S06bsu049_u:401_1: ata eva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni sūcayitavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:401_2: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte yastvaṃ gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānānyārabhya nigamayitukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:401_4: ānimittasya apraṇihitasya anabhisaṃskārasya anutpādasya ajāterabhāvasya virāgasya nirodhasya nirvāṇasya vigamasyaitatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ yaduta gambhīramiti /
S06bsu049_u:402_0: subhūtirāha - eteṣāmeva bhagavan kevalametaddharmāṇāmadhivacanaṃ na punaḥ sarvadharmāṇām? bhagavānāha - sarvadharmāṇāmapyetatsubhūte adhivacanaṃ yaduta gambhīramiti /
S06bsu049_u:402_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte gambhīram /
S06bsu049_u:402_4: kathaṃ ca subhūte rūpaṃ gambhīram? kathaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ? kathaṃ ca subhūte vijñānaṃ gambhīram? yathā subhūte tathatā,
S06bsu049_u:402_5: tathā gambhīraṃ rūpam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:402_6: yathā subhūte tathatā, tathā gambhīraṃ vijñānam / tatra subhūte yathā rūpatathatā,
S06bsu049_u:402_7: tathā gambhīraṃ rūpam / yathā vedanātathatā saṃjñātathatā saṃskāratathatā /
S06bsu049_u:402_9: tathā gambhīraṃ vijñānam / yatra subhūte na rūpam, iyaṃ rūpasya gambhīratā / yatra subhūte na vedanā na saṃjñā na saṃskārā na vijñānam,
S06bsu049_u:403_0: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena rūpataś ca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sucitam /
S06bsu049_u:403_2: yāvatsūkṣmeṇopāyena vijñānataś ca nivārito nirvāṇaṃ ca sūcitam /
S06bsu049_u:403_3: bhagavānāha - imāni subhūte gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktāni yaścintayiṣyanti tulayiṣyati upanidhyāsyati - evaṃ mayā sthātavyaṃ yathā prajñāpāramitāyāmājñaptam /
S06bsu049_u:403_6: tathā saṃpādayamānastathopanidhyāyaṃstathopaparīkṣamāṇastathā prayujyamānastathā ghaṭamānastathā vyāyacchamāna ekadivasamapyatra yogamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:403_7: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenaikadivasena kiyatkarma karoti? tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣo rāgacarito vitarkacaritaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:403_8: tasya puruṣasya rāgacaritasya vitarkacaritasya striyā abhirūpayā prāsādikayā darśanīyayā saha saṃketaḥ kṛto bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:403_9: sā khalu punaḥ strī [Vaidya_171] paraparigṛhītā bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:403_11: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte kiṃpratisaṃyuktāstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran? subhūtirāha - strīpratisaṃyuktā eva bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya vitarkāḥ pravarteran - iyamāgacchati,
S06bsu049_u:403_12: iyamāgatā / tayā sārdhamevaṃ kariṣyāmi, evaṃ ramiṣyāmi, evaṃ krīḍiṣyāmi, evaṃ pravicārayiṣyāmīti / bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya kiyanto vitarkā utpadyeran? subhūtirāha - bahavo bhagavan divasasyātyayena tasya puruṣasya vitarkā utpadyeran /
S06bsu049_u:403_13: bhagavānāha - yāvantaḥ subhūte tasya puruṣasya divasasyātyayena vitarkā utpadyeran,
S06bsu049_u:403_14: iyataḥ subhūte kalpān bodhisattvo mahāsattvaśchorayati vipṛṣṭhīkaroti saṃsārādvyantīkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:403_15: ya iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yathājñaptaṃ yathākhyātaṃ yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ tiṣṭhati śikṣate pratipadyate upanidhyāyati yogamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:403_16: tāṃś ca doṣān vivarjayati, yairdoṣairbodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:403_17: evaṃ hi subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyogamanuyuktaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:403_20: yaś ca prajñāpāramitāvirahito bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:403_21: ayameva tato viśiṣyate yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamekadivasam api prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:404_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpannebhyo dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:404_5: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathopadiṣṭaṃ yathoddiṣṭaṃ yathānirdiṣṭaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ tathaiva yogamāpadyeta ekadivasam api /
S06bsu049_u:404_6: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvadbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:405_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:405_3: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikārādvyutthāya dharmaṃ deśayet,
S06bsu049_u:405_4: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:406_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:406_4: yaś ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihārī tato manasikāradvyutthāya dharmadānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:406_5: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:407_0: [Vaidya_172] punaraparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpāṃstiṣṭhan srotaāpanneṣu yāvatsamyaksaṃbuddheṣu dānaṃ dadyāt pratiṣṭhāpayet,
S06bsu049_u:407_2: ārabdhavīryaḥ san dhyāneṣu bodhipakṣeṣu ca dharmeṣu yogamāpadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:407_4: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:407_5: ayameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastataḥ paurvakādbodhisattvādbahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:408_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:409_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānaṃ datvā prajñāpāramitoktena pariṇāmena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayet,
S06bsu049_u:409_1: pariṇāmya ca pratisaṃlāne na punareva yogamāpadyeta /
S06bsu049_u:409_2: yaś ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathā dharmadānameva dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:409_4: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na tāvatpuṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:409_5: yāvadya evaṃ dharmadānaṃ dadad bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratisaṃlāne ca punareva yogamāpadyamānaḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītastatpratisaṃlānamavirahitaṃ karoti prajñāpāramitayā,
S06bsu049_u:409_6: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:410_0: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan abhisaṃskāro vikalpa ityuktaṃ bhagavatā,
S06bsu049_u:410_1: tadā kathaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavatītyucyate? bhagavānāha - so 'pīdānīṃ subhūte puṇyābhisaṃskāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ śūnyaka ityevākhyāyate,
S06bsu049_u:410_2: riktaka ityevākhyāyate, tucchaka ityevākhyāyate, asāraka ityevākhyāyate / yathā yathā khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmān pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:410_3: tathā tathā subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā /
S06bsu049_u:410_4: yathā yathā ca subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'virahito bhavati prajñāpāramitayā,
S06bsu049_u:411_0: subhūtirāha - aprameyasya ca bhagavan asaṃkhyeyasya ca kiṃ nānākaraṇaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:411_1: kaḥ prativiśeṣo vā? bhagavānāha - aprameyamiti subhūte yatra pramāṇānyuparamante /
S06bsu049_u:411_2: asaṃkhyeyamiti subhūte yanna śakyaṃ saṃkhyayāpi kṣapayitum /
S06bsu049_u:412_2: syādbhagavan paryāyo yadvijñānamaprameyaṃ bhavet? bhagavānāha - yatsubhūtirevamāha - syādbhagavan paryāyo yadrūpamaprameyaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:412_8: subhūtirāha - kasya punarbhagavan etadadhivacanamaprameyamiti? bhagavānāha - śūnyatāyāḥ subhūte etadadhivacanamaprameyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:413_0: [Vaidya_173] subhūtirāha - kiṃ śūnyatāyā eva bhagavan kevalametadadhivacanamaprameyamiti,
S06bsu049_u:413_2: nānyeṣāṃ dharmāṇām? bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte nanu mayā sarvadharmāḥ śūnyā ityākhyātāḥ? subhūtirāha - śūnyā eva bhagavan sarvadharmāstathāgatenākhyātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:413_4: akṣayā api te / yā ca śūnyatā, aprameyatāpi sā / tasmāttarhi subhūte eṣāṃ dharmāṇāmarthato viśeṣo vā nānākaraṇaṃ vā nopalabhyate /
S06bsu049_u:413_5: abhilāpā ete subhūte tathāgatenākhyātāḥ abhilapitāḥ - aprameyamiti vā,
S06bsu049_u:413_6: asaṃkhyeyamiti vā, akṣayamiti vā, śūnyamiti vā, ānimittamiti vā, apraṇihitamiti vā, anabhisaṃskāra iti vā, anutpāda iti vā, ajātiriti vā abhāva iti vā, virāga iti vā, nirodha iti vā, nirvāṇamiti vā / deśanābhinirhāranirdeśa eṣa subhūte tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenākhyātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:414_0: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadiyaṃ tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sarvadharmāṇāṃ dharmatā deśitā,
S06bsu049_u:414_5: evam etat / sarvadharmā api subhūte anabhilāpyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:414_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? yā ca subhūte sarvadharmāṇāṃ śūnyatā,
S06bsu049_u:414_7: na sā śakyā abhilapitum / subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anabhilapyasyārthasya vṛddhirvāsti,
S06bsu049_u:414_8: parihāṇirvā vidyate? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:414_10: dānapāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:414_11: evaṃ śīlapāramitāyā api, kṣāntipāramitāyā api, vīryapāramitāyā api, dhyānapāramitāyā api, prajñāpāramitāyā api bhagavan na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:414_12: sacedbhagavan āsāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ na vṛddhirna parihāṇiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:414_13: kathaṃ bhagavan vivardhamānānāṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ balena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? kathaṃ ca anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherabhyāsannībhavati? na ca bhagavan apratipūrayan pāramitāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'bhyāsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:414_15: evam etat / na khalu punaḥ subhūte pāramitārthasya kācidvṛddhirvāsti parihāṇirvā vidyate /
S06bsu049_u:414_16: api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dānapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:414_18: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dānapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:414_19: sa dānaṃ dadat tān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:415_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ śīlapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:415_2: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta śīlapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:415_3: sa śīlaṃ samādāya vartamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:416_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ kṣāntipāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:416_2: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta kṣāntipāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:416_3: sa kṣāntyā saṃpādayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:417_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayata upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ vīryapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:417_2: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta vīryapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:417_3: sa vīryamārabhamāṇastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:418_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ dhyānapāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:418_2: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta dhyānapāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:418_3: sa dhyānāni samāpadyamānastān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:419_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayataḥ upāyakuśalasya naivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:419_2: api tu khalu punarasyaivaṃ bhavati - nāmadheyamātrametadyaduta prajñāpāramiteti /
S06bsu049_u:419_3: sa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayaṃstān manasikārāṃstāṃścittotpādāṃstāni ca kuśalamūlāni anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayati /
S06bsu049_u:420_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kā punareṣā bhagavan anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ? bhagavānāha - tathataiṣā subhūte anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:420_2: vā, parihīyate vā / sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvastatpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairabhīkṣṇaṃ bahūlaṃ viharati,
S06bsu049_u:420_5: evaṃ khalu subhūte anabhilapyasyārthasya na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
S06bsu049_u:420_7: evaṃ sarvadharmāṇām api subhūte na vṛddhirna parihāṇirbhavati /
S06bsu049_u:420_8: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhirevaṃrūpairmanasikārairviharan āsannībhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:425_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kiṃ punarbhagavan prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:425_1: utāho paścimacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? paurvako bhagavaṃścittotpādaḥ paścimakena cittotpādena asamavahitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:425_3: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalamūlānāmupacayo bhavati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tailapradyotasya jvalato 'rciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā,
S06bsu049_u:425_4: utāho paścimābhinipātenārciṣā sā vartirdagdhā? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:425_5: na hi bhagavan arciṣā prathamābhinipātena sā vartirdagdhā /
S06bsu049_u:425_6: na ca prathamābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā /
S06bsu049_u:425_7: na ca bhagavan paścimābhinipātenārciṣā sā vartirdagdhā,
S06bsu049_u:425_8: na ca paścimābhinipātamanāgamya arciṣā sā vartirdagdhā /
S06bsu049_u:425_9: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sā vartirdagdhā? subhūtirāha - dagdhā bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:425_10: dagdhā sugata / bhagavānāha - evameva subhūte na ca prathamacittotpādena bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:426_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - gambhīro 'yaṃ bhagavan pratītyasamutpādaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:426_1: na ca nāma bhagavan prathamacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:426_2: na ca nāma prathamacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:426_3: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādenaiva bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:426_4: na ca nāma paścimacittotpādamanāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:426_5: na ca nāma taiścittotpādairna cānyatra tebhyaścittotpādebhyo 'bhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:427_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yaccittaṃ niruddham,
S06bsu049_u:427_1: api nu tatpunarutpatsyate? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_3: api nu tannirodhadharmi? āha - nirodhadharmi bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_5: api nu tannirotsyate? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_7: api nu tannirodhadharmi? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_9: api nu tannirotsyate? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_11: [Vaidya_176] api nu tannirotsyate? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_12: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmaḥ prakṛtyā svabhāvaniruddha eva,
S06bsu049_u:427_13: sa dharmo nirotsyate? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_14: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā dharmāṇāṃ dharmatā sā nirotsyate? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_15: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā? āha - tathaiva bhagavan sthāsyati yathā tathatā /
S06bsu049_u:427_16: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yadi tathaiva sthāsyati yathā tathatā,
S06bsu049_u:427_17: tadā mā kuṭasthā bhūt? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_18: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte gambhīrā tathatā? āha - gambhīrā bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_19: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase tathatāyāṃ cittam? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_20: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte cittaṃ tathatā? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_21: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte anyattathatāyāścittam? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_22: bhagavānāha - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tathatām? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_23: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ya evaṃ carati sa gambhīre carati? āha - yo bhagavan evaṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:427_24: sa na kvaciccarati / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hyasya te samudācārā na pravartante,
S06bsu049_u:427_25: na samudācaranti / bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:427_26: sa kva carati? āha - carati bhagavan paramārthe /
S06bsu049_u:427_27: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramārthe carati,
S06bsu049_u:427_28: sa nimitte carati? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_29: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu tasya nimittamavibhāvitam? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:427_30: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato nimittaṃ vibhāvitaṃ bhavati? subhūtirāha - na sa bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ prayujyate - kathamahaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ carannihaiva nimittaprahāṇamanuprāpnuyāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:427_33: tacca nimittaṃ jānāti, yallakṣaṇaṃ yannimittamānimitte ca parijayaṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:428_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - ya āyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragatastrīṇi vimokṣamukhāni bhāvayati - śūnyatāmānimittamapraṇihitaṃ ca,
S06bsu049_u:428_1: api nu tasya prajñāpāramitā vivardhate? subhūtirāha - sacedāyuṣman śāriputra divasabhāvanayā vivardhate,
S06bsu049_u:428_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpo hi āyuṣman śāriputra svapnaś ca divasaścokto bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:428_4: sacedāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitālābhī divase divase prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:428_5: tato 'sya prajñāpāramitābhyāsataḥ svapnāntaragatasyāpi bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāvaipulyena bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:428_6: śāriputra āha - yatpunarāyuṣman subhūte strī vā puruṣo vā svapnāntaragataḥ karma śubhamaśubhaṃ vā karoti,
S06bsu049_u:428_7: kiṃ bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā? subhūtirāha - yathā svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā uktā bhagavatā,
S06bsu049_u:428_8: tathā na tasya karmaṇo bhavatyācayo vā upacayo vā /
S06bsu049_u:428_9: atha punarāyuṣman śāriputra sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:428_10: [Vaidya_177] bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā /
S06bsu049_u:428_11: kathaṃ ca āyuṣman śāriputra vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati? sacetsvapnāntaragataḥ prāṇātipātaṃ kṛtvā prativibuddhaḥ sannevaṃ vikalpayati - aho hataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:428_12: sādhu hataḥ, suṣṭhu hataḥ, mayā hataḥ, ityevaṃ vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:428_13: śāriputra āha - sacedāyuṣman subhūte sa puruṣaḥ prativibuddhaḥ san vikalpayan hatasaṃjñāmutpādayati - aho hataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:428_14: sādhu hataḥ, suṣṭhu hataḥ, mayā hata iti, bhavati tasya karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā? buddho bhagavān api vikalpayan kṣayasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:428_15: tasyāpi karmaṇa ācayo vā upacayo vā bhavet? subhūtirāha - no hīdamāyuṣman śāriputra /
S06bsu049_u:428_17: tadyathāpi nāma ākāśameva āyuṣman śāriputra nānārambaṇaṃ karmotpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:428_21: na anārambaṇam / dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñāteṣvāyuṣman śāriputra dharmeṣu buddhiḥ pravartate /
S06bsu049_u:428_24: tasmāttarhi āyuṣman śāriputra sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā,
S06bsu049_u:428_26: śāriputra āha - yadāyuṣman subhūte sarvārambaṇāni viviktāni ākhyātāni bhagavatā,
S06bsu049_u:428_27: tadā kasmādāyuṣman subhūte sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate na anārambaṇā? subhūtirāha - nimittīkṛtya āyuṣman śāriputra vidyamānamevārambaṇamārambaṇīkṛtya sārambaṇaiva cetanotpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:428_29: nimittam api viviktam / evamavidyāpratyayāḥ saṃskārā api viviktāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:429_0: śāriputra āha - yadāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:429_2: pariṇāmitaṃ kiṃ taddānaṃ vaktavyam? subhūtirāha - ayamāyuṣman śāriputra maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃmukhībhūtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:429_4: eṣo 'trārthe kāyasākṣī / eṣa praṣṭavyaḥ / eṣa enamarthaṃ visarjayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:429_5: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ayamāyuṣman maitreya subhūtiḥ sthavira evamāha - mayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:429_8: atha khalu maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yadāyuṣmān subhūtirevamāha - ayaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:429_10: kiṃ punarāyuṣman subhūte yadetannāmadheyaṃ maitreya iti? etadenamarthaṃ visarjayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:429_11: uta rūpaṃ visarjayiṣyati, uta vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ, atha vijñānaṃ visarjayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:429_12: utāho varṇo visarjayiṣyati, atha saṃsthānaṃ visarjayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:429_13: utāho yā rūpasya śūnyatā, sā visarjayiṣyati? evaṃ yā vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārāṇām,
S06bsu049_u:429_15: sā visarjayiṣyati? yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte rūpasya śūnyatā,
S06bsu049_u:429_18: yā khalu punarāyuṣman subhūte vijñānasya śūnyatā,
S06bsu049_u:429_21: yo dharmo visarjayet / tamapyahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:429_22: yo dharmo visarjayitavyaḥ / tamapyahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:429_23: yena dharmeṇa visarjayet / tamapyahaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:430_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputro maitreyaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kaccitpunarāyuṣman maitreya tvayā ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:430_1: yathainān vācā bhāṣase? maitreya āha - na mayā āyuṣman śāriputra ete dharmā evaṃ sākṣātkṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:430_2: yathainān vācā bhāṣe / evamapyahamenānāyuṣman śāriputra dharmānna vedmi,
S06bsu049_u:430_3: nopalabhe, na samanupaśyāmi, yathā vācā bhāṣe, cittena vā cintayāmi / api tu khalu punarāyuṣman śāriputra na kāyena spṛśyeta,
S06bsu049_u:430_4: na vācā bhāṣyeta, na manasā samanvāhriyeta / evaṃsvabhāvāḥ sarve dharmā asvabhāvatvāt /
S06bsu049_u:430_5: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ śāriputrasyaitadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:430_6: yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritāvī nirdiśati /
S06bsu049_u:431_0: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputramāmantrayate sma - kutaste śāriputra etadabhūt - gambhīraprajño batāyaṃ maitreyo bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti? samanupaśyasi tvaṃ śāriputra taṃ dharmaṃ yena dharmeṇa samanvāgato 'rhanniti prabhāvyate? śāriputra āha - na hyetadbhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:431_1: bhagavānāha - evameva śāriputra bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ dharmo vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:431_6: sa carannotrasyati, na saṃtrasyati, na saṃtrāsamāpadyate / labdhabalādhānatvānnāhaṃ nābhisaṃbhotsya ityevaṃ yogamāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:432_0: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyālakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:432_1: na saṃtrasitavyam, na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvaṃ parityaktavyaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya /
S06bsu049_u:432_2: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - yadi cenmāṃ vyālā bhakṣayeyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:432_6: tathā ca kariṣyāmi, yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ tiryagyonigatāḥ sattvāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra me buddhakṣetre na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:433_0: punaraparaṃ śāriputra corakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:433_1: na saṃtrasitavyam, na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam / tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvasvaparityāgakuśalābhiratā hi [Vaidya_179] bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:433_2: utsṛṣṭakāyenāpi ca bodhisattvena mahāsattvena bhavitavyaṃ parityaktasarvapariṣkāropakaraṇena /
S06bsu049_u:433_3: tenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - sacenmama sattvāḥ sarvapariṣkāropakaraṇāni hareyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:433_7: teṣām api ca mayā na kāyena na vācā na manasā aparāddhavyam /
S06bsu049_u:433_8: evaṃ ca me tasmin samaye dānapāramitā ca śīlapāramitā ca kṣāntipāramitā ca paripūriṃ gamiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:433_10: tathā ca kariṣyāmi, tathā ca pratipatsye, yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataścorakāntārāṇy api tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:433_11: na prajñāsyante / tathā ca buddhakṣetrapariśuddhaye vyāpatsye,
S06bsu049_u:433_12: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre ete cānye ca doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:434_0: punaraparaṃ śāriputraṃ pānīyakāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:434_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? asaṃtrastānutrastadharmāṇo hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:434_2: evaṃ cānena cittamutpādayitavyam - sarvasattvānāṃ mayā sarvatṛṣṇācchedāya śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:434_4: na saṃtrasitavyam, na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam / sacedahaṃ tṛṣṇayā kālaṃ kariṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:434_6: api tu khalu punaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike mahākaruṇācittamutpādayitavyam - aho bata alpapuṇyā amī sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:434_8: tathā punarahaṃ kariṣyāmi, tathā pratipatsye, yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ pānīyakāntārāṇi na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:434_9: na prajñāsyante / tathā ca sarvasattvān puṇyaiḥ saṃniyokṣye,
S06bsu049_u:434_11: tathā ca dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:434_12: yathā vīryapāramitā ca me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:435_0: punaraparaṃ śāriputra bubhukṣākāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:435_1: evaṃ cānena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ - tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye,
S06bsu049_u:435_3: yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre evaṃrūpāṇi bubhukṣākāntārāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:435_4: na prajñāsyante / sukhitā eva te sattvā bhaviṣyanti sukhasamaṅginaḥ sarvasukhasamarpitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:435_5: tathā ca kariṣyāmi, yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ yo ya evābhiprāyo bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:435_7: tattadeva prādurbhaviṣyati tadyathāpi nāma devānāṃ trāyastriṃśānāṃ manasaiva sarvamutpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:435_8: yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ manasaiva sarvaṃ prādurbhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:435_9: manasā sarvamutpatsyate, tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye / yathā teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ dhārmikā abhiprāyāḥ paripūriṃ gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:435_10: avaikalyaṃ ca jīvitapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasattvānāṃ [Vaidya_180] bhaviṣyati sarvathā sarvataḥ sarvadā,
S06bsu049_u:435_11: tathā ca svacittapariśuddhaye vyāyaṃsye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:435_12: yathā dhyānapāramitā ca me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:436_0: punaraparaṃ śāriputra vyādhikāntāramadhyagatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:436_1: evaṃ cānenopaparīkṣitavyaṃ cintayitavyaṃ tulayitavyam - neha sa kaściddharmo yo vyādhyā bādhyate,
S06bsu049_u:436_4: na cotrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:436_5: na ca śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:436_8: evaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na duṣkarasaṃjñotpādayitavyā - bahvī dīrghā caiṣā apūrvā koṭiriti,
S06bsu049_u:436_10: evaṃ śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cireṇānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti notrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrasitavyaṃ na saṃtrāsamāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:436_11: yaḥ khalu punaḥ śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattva ebhyaścānyebhyaś ca dṛṣṭaśrutamatavijñātebhyo bhayabhairavebhyo notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:436_12: jñātavyamidaṃ śāriputra bhavyo 'yaṃ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhumiti /
S06bsu049_u:436_13: evaṃ ca śāriputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena mahāsaṃnāhaḥ saṃnaddhavyaḥ - tathā kariṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:436_14: tathā dṛḍhaṃ vīryamārapsye, yathā me anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya satastasmin buddhakṣetre sarvasattvānāṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvavyādhayo na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:436_15: na prajñāsyante / tathā kariṣyāmi, yathā tathāgatānāmuktavādī yathoktakārī ca bhaviṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:436_16: tathā ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ parijayaṃ kariṣyāmi sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:436_17: yathā prajñāpāramitāpi me tasmin samaye paripūriṃ gamiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:437_0: atha khalu tatra parṣadi anyatarā strī saṃnipatitā saṃniṣaṇṇābhūt /
S06bsu049_u:437_1: sā utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ahaṃ bhagavan atra sthāne notrasiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:437_2: na saṃtrasiṣyāmi, na saṃtrāsamāpatsye / anutrastā ca asaṃtrastā ca sarvasattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:437_3: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ suvarṇavarṇasmitaṃ prādurakarot /
S06bsu049_u:437_4: tadanantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā spharitvā yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata eva mūrdhni antaradhīyata /
S06bsu049_u:437_5: samanantaraṃ prāduṣkṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin smite atha khalu sā strī suvarṇapuṣpāṇi gṛhītvā bhagavantaṃ suvarṇapuṣpairabhyavākiradabhiprākirat /
S06bsu049_u:437_6: atha khalu tāni suvarṇapuṣpāṇyasaktāni antarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitānyabhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:438_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya bhagavantametadavocat - ko bhagavan hetuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:438_1: [Vaidya_181] kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya? nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti /
S06bsu049_u:438_2: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - iyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī anāgate 'dhvani suvarṇapuṣpo nāma tathāgato bhaviṣyati arhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:438_5: seyamānanda gaṅgadevā bhaginī strībhāvaṃ vivartya puruṣabhāvaṃ pratilabhya itaścyutvā akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre abhiratyāṃ lokadhātāvupapatsyate /
S06bsu049_u:438_6: tatra copapannā akṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ cariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:438_7: tataścyutā satī buddhakṣetrādbuddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati avirahitā tathāgatadarśanena /
S06bsu049_u:438_10: tadyathāpi nāma ānanda rājā cakravartīṃ prāsādātprāsādaṃ saṃkrāmet,
S06bsu049_u:438_12: sa yāvanmaraṇāvasthāyāṃ bhūmitalaṃ pabhdyāmanākramya kālaṃ kuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:438_13: evameva ānanda iyaṃ gaṅgadevā bhaginī buddhakṣetraṃ saṃkramiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:438_14: tatra ca avirahitā bhaviṣyati buddhairbhagavadbhiryāvannānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:439_0: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhūt - ye tatrākṣobhyasya tathāgatāsyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:439_2: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmata ānandasya imamevaṃrūpaṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - evametadānanda,
S06bsu049_u:439_4: ye akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:439_6: tasya khalu punarānanda suvarṇapuṣpasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya na pramāṇabaddhaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:439_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? tāvanto hyānanda tatra śrāvakā bhaviṣyanti yeṣāṃ nāsti pramāṇam /
