S06bsu049_u:439_8: api tvaprameyā asaṃkhyeyā ityevaṃ saṃkhyāṃ gamiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:439_9: tena khalu punarānanda kālena tena samayena tasmin buddhakṣetre na vyālakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:439_10: na caurakāntārāṇi na pānīyakāntārāṇi na vyādhikāntārāṇi na durbhikṣakāntārāṇi bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:439_11: etāni cānyāni ca ānanda asātakāntārāṇi tasmin buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:439_12: na prajñāsyante / suvarṇapuṣpasya khalu punarānanda tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya imānyevaṃrūpāṇi bhayabhairavakāntārāṇi sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ tadānīṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:440_0: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - anayā bhagavan gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā katamasya tathāgatasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - anayā ānanda gaṅgadevayā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya [Vaidya_182] tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitam,
S06bsu049_u:440_2: sa ca dīpaṃkarastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ suvarṇapuṣpairevāvakīrṇo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ prārthayamānayā /
S06bsu049_u:440_4: anutpattikeṣu ca mayā dharmeṣu kṣāntiḥ pratilabdhā,
S06bsu049_u:440_5: tato 'haṃ dīpaṃkareṇa tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇavaka anāgate 'dhvani śākyamunirnāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavāniti /
S06bsu049_u:440_6: tadā etasyā bhaginyā mama vyākaraṇaṃ śrutvā evaṃ cittamudapādi - aho bata ahamapyevaṃ vyākriyeya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau yathāyaṃ māṇavako vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:440_7: evaṃ ca ānanda etasyā bhaginyā dīpaṃkarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike prathamacittotpādakuśalamūlamavaropitamabhūdanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:440_8: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ bhagavan kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:440_10: evam etat yathā vadasi - kṛtaparikarmā bateyaṃ kṛtaparyantā gaṅgadevā bhaginī vyākṛtā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
S06bsu049_u:445_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhagavaṃścaratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kathaṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:445_1: kathaṃ vā śūnyatāsamādhiḥ samāpattavyaḥ? bhagavānāha - iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā rūpaṃ śūnyamiti pratyavekṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:445_4: tathā ca pratyavekṣitavyamavikṣiptayā cittasaṃtatyā yathā pratyavekṣamāṇo rūpamiti tāṃ dharmatāṃ dharmatayā na samanupaśyet /
S06bsu049_u:445_5: tāṃ ca asamanupaśyan dharmatāṃ na sākṣātkuryādbhūtakoṭim /
S06bsu049_u:445_6: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - yadbhagavānevamāha - na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śūnyatā sākṣātkartavyeti /
S06bsu049_u:445_7: kathaṃ bhagavan tasmin samādhau sthito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāṃ na sākṣātkaroti? bhagavānāha - yataḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvākāravaropetāṃ śūnyatāṃ pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:445_11: parijayasyāyaṃ kālaḥ, nāyaṃ kālaḥ sākṣātkriyāyā iti pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:445_12: asamāhita evārambaṇe cittamupanibadhnāti - prajñāpāramitā ca me parigṛhītā bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:445_13: na ca sākṣātkṛteti / atrāntarā bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na parihīyate bodhipakṣairdharmaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:445_14: na ca āsravakṣayaṃ karoti, atra ca parijayaṃ karoti / yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati,
S06bsu049_u:445_15: tasmin samaye bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ānimittena ca samādhinā vihartavyam,
S06bsu049_u:445_17: tatkasya hetoḥ? evamārūḍhakuśalamūladharmasamanvāgato hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ - paripākasyāyaṃ kālaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:445_19: prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti /
S06bsu049_u:445_20: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ paramaśūraś ca bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:445_22: dṛḍhapratiṣṭhānaś ca bhavet, abhirūpaś ca bhavet, prāsādikaś ca bhavet, paramadarśanīyaś ca bhavet, bahuguṇasamanvāgataś ca bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:445_25: medhāvī ca bhavet, vacanasamarthaś ca bhavet, pratibhānasaṃpannaś ca bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:445_27: kālajñaś ca bhavet, deśajñaś ca bhavet, sthānajñaś ca bhavet, iṣvastre ca paramagatiṃ gato bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:445_30: supariniṣpannatayā sarveṣveva ca śilpasthāneṣu paramagatiko bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:445_31: smṛtimāṃś ca bhavet, matimāṃś ca bhavet, gatimāṃś ca bhavet, dhṛtimāṃś ca bhavet, nītimāṃś ca bhavet, sarvaśāstraviśāradaś ca bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:445_32: mitravāṃś ca bhavet, arthavāṃś ca bhavet, balavāṃś ca bhavet, ahīnāṅgaś ca bhavet, paripūrṇendriyaś ca bhavet, sarvopakaraṇasaṃpannaś ca bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:445_33: bahujanasya ca priyo manaāpaś ca bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:445_36: nayena ca vyavaharet, sarvatra cāsya mahālābho bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:445_37: tena mahālābhena samanvāgataḥ san bahujanaṃ saṃvibhajet,
S06bsu049_u:445_38: satkartavyaṃ ca satkuryāt, gurukartavyaṃ ca gurukuryāt, mānayitavyaṃ ca mānayet, [Vaidya_184] pūjayitavyaṃ ca pūjayet /
S06bsu049_u:445_39: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa puruṣastatonidānaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā āttamanasko bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:445_40: pramuditaś ca bhavet, prītisaumanasyajātaś ca bhavet? subhūtirāha evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:445_41: evametatsugata / bhagavānāha - sa khalu punaḥ subhūte puruṣastayā mahāsaṃpattyā samanvāgato mātāpitṛputradārān gṛhītvā kenacideva kāraṇasāmagrīyogena mahāṭavīkāntāraṃ pratipanno bhavet mahāpratibhayaṃ bālānāṃ bhīṣaṇaṃ romaharṣaṇam /
S06bsu049_u:445_42: sa tatra praviṣṭaḥ saṃstān mātāpitṛputradārānabhayenābhinimantrayet - mā bhaiṣṭa,
S06bsu049_u:445_43: mā bhaiṣṭa, ahamito yuṣmān mahābhayabhairavādaṭavīkāntārātkṣemeṇa svastinā śīghramapakrāmayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:445_44: śīghraṃ parimocayiṣyāmīti / tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte aṭavīkāntāre tasya puruṣasya bahavaḥ pratyarthikāḥ bahavaḥ pratyamitrāḥ pratyupasthitā bhaveyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:445_45: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa śūraḥ puruṣastaiḥ pratyarthikaiḥ pratyamitrairabhyutthitairavinivartyo dṛḍhavīryabalasamanvāgataḥ prajñāvānatisnigdhaḥ sānukrośo dhīro mahāsaṃbhārasamanvāgatastān mātāpitṛputradārān parityajya tato mahābhayabhairavādaṭavīkāntārādātmānamekamapakrāmayitavyaṃ manyeta? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:445_46: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavaṃstasya puruṣasya tanmātāpitṛputradāramaparityaktam,
S06bsu049_u:445_47: ādhyātmikaś ca bāhyaś ca balavān saṃbhāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:445_48: tasya tatra aṭavīkāntāre bahutarakāś ca śūratarakarāś ca dṛḍhapraharaṇatarakarāś ca teṣāṃ pratyarthikānāṃ pratyamitrāṇāmanye udāratarakāḥ pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrāstiṣṭhanti rakṣanti /
S06bsu049_u:445_49: te tasya pratyarthikāḥ pratyamitrā avatāraprekṣiṇo 'vatāragaveṣiṇo 'vatāraṃ na lapsyante /
S06bsu049_u:445_50: tena sa bhagavan pratibalaḥ puruṣo 'kṣato 'nupahatastanmātāpitṛputradāramātmānaṃ ca tato mahābhayabhairavādaṭavīkāntārācchaktaḥ kṣemeṇa svastinā śīghramapakrāmayituṃ yāvadgrāmaṃ vā nagaraṃ vā nigamaṃ vā anuprāptaḥ syāt /
S06bsu049_u:446_0: evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvahitānukampī maitrīvihārī karuṇāvihārī muditāvihārī upekṣāvihārī upāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ kuśalamūlāni samyagbuddhānujñātayā pariṇāmanayā pariṇāmya kiṃcāpi śūnyatāmānimittamapraṇihitaṃ ca samādhivimokṣamukhānyavatarati,
S06bsu049_u:446_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hyasya balavattamā dṛḍhatamāś ca parigrāhakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:446_6: tenaiṣa pratibalaḥ svastinā kṣemeṇa anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:446_7: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmantike maitrīcittamārambaṇīkṛtya tān paramayā maitryā paribadhnāti,
S06bsu049_u:446_8: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kleśapakṣaṃ mārapakṣaṃ cātikramya śrāvakabhūmiṃ pratyekabuddhabhūmiṃ cātikramya tatra samādhāvavatiṣṭhate /
S06bsu049_u:446_9: aprāptaś ca sa subhūte āsravakṣayaṃ paramapāramitāyāṃ śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:446_10: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāsamādhivimokṣamukhena viharati,
S06bsu049_u:446_11: atrāntare bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na cedānīṃ nānimittena samādhinā viharati /
S06bsu049_u:446_12: na cānena ānimittaḥ samādhiḥ sākṣātkṛto [Vaidya_185] bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:446_13: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte pakṣī śakunirākāśe 'ntarīkṣe carati,
S06bsu049_u:446_14: na ca bhūmau patati, na ca kaṃcinniśrayaṃ niśritya tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:446_15: ākāśa evāntarīkṣe viharati, na ca tatrāpi niśrito na pratiṣṭhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:446_16: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śūnyatāvihāreṇa viharati,
S06bsu049_u:446_17: śūnyatāyāṃ parijayaṃ karoti, ānimittavihāreṇa ca viharati,
S06bsu049_u:446_21: na ca śūnyatāyāṃ vā ānimitte vā apraṇihite vā patatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:446_22: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte balavāniṣvastrācārya iṣvastraśikṣāyāṃ suśikṣitaḥ supariniṣṭhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:446_23: sa ūrdhvaṃ kāṇḍaṃ kṣipet / ūrdhvaṃ kāṇḍaṃ kṣiptvā tadanyaiḥ kāṇḍaistatkāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patat pratinivārayet,
S06bsu049_u:446_24: vārayet, tasya paurvakasya kāṇḍasya kāṇḍaparaṃparayā bhūmau patanaṃ na dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:446_26: yāvannākāṅkṣet - aho batedaṃ kāṇḍaṃ bhūmau patediti /
S06bsu049_u:446_27: evameva subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran upāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ tāvattāṃ paramāṃ bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:446_28: yāvanna tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni suparipakvāni /
S06bsu049_u:446_29: yadā tāni kuśalamūlānyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripakvāni bhavanti suparipakvāni,
S06bsu049_u:446_31: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayatā evameteṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ gambhīradharmatā pratyavekṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā,
S06bsu049_u:447_0: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - duṣkarakārako bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:447_2: yaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati, śūnyatayā ca viharati, śūnyatāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:447_4: atyāścaryamidaṃ bhagavan, paramāścaryamidaṃ sugata / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - evametatsubhūte,
S06bsu049_u:447_6: paramaduṣkarakārako bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ yaḥ śūnyatāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:447_7: śūnyatāyāṃ ca viharati, śūnyatāṃ ca samādhiṃ samāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:447_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:447_10: tasyeme evaṃrūpāḥ praṇidhānaviśeṣā bhavanti - mayaite sarvasattvāḥ parimocayitavyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:447_11: yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ cittamabhinirharati - sarvasattvā mamāparityaktāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:447_12: mayaite parimocayitavyā iti, śūnyatāṃ ca samādhivimokṣamukhamabhinirharati,
S06bsu049_u:447_15: tadā upāyakauśalyasamanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ - nāyamantarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyatyaparipūrṇairbuddhadharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:447_16: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi asyopāyakauśalyaṃ rakṣāṃ karoti /
S06bsu049_u:447_17: sa caivāsya cittotpādo yattasya sarvasattvā aparityaktāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:447_18: sa evamanena cittotpādenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato 'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ na sākṣātkaroti /
S06bsu049_u:448_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte yadā bodhisattvo mahāsattva imāni gambhīrāṇi sthānāni pratyavekṣate,
S06bsu049_u:448_1: pratyavekṣitukāmo vā bhavati - tadyathā śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukham,
S06bsu049_u:448_4: tenaivaṃ cittamabhinirhartavyam - dīrgharātramamī sattvāḥ sattvasaṃjñayā upalambhe caranti /
S06bsu049_u:448_12: evaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena cittotpādena anena copāyakauśalyena samanvāgato nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:448_13: na ca parihīyate maitrīsamādhito na karuṇāmuditopekṣāsamādhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:448_14: tatkasya hetoḥ? upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śuklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:449_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā dharmasaṃjñayā upalambhe caranti /
S06bsu049_u:449_2: so 'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ śūnyatāṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:449_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:450_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā nimittasaṃjñayā nimitte caranti /
S06bsu049_u:450_1: teṣāṃ nimittasaṃjñāprahāṇāya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:450_2: sa ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:450_3: so 'nena cittotpādena paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena samanvāgataḥ ānimittaṃ samādhivimokṣamukhaṃ samāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:450_5: na ca parihīyate maitryāḥ karuṇāyā muditāyā upekṣāyāḥ sarvasamādhitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:450_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:451_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaivaṃ bhavati - dīrgharātramamī sattvā nityasaṃjñayā sukhasaṃjñayā ātmasaṃjñayā śubhasaṃjñayā ca viparyastāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:451_1: tathā kariṣyāmi yathā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya nityasaṃjñāyāḥ sukhasaṃjñāyāḥ ātmasaṃjñāyāḥ śubhasaṃjñāyā viparyāsasya prahāṇāya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyāmi - anityametatsarvaṃ na nityamiti /
S06bsu049_u:451_5: so 'nena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ paurvakeṇa copāyakauśalyena prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhīto nāntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkaroti [Vaidya_187] aparipūrṇeṣu buddhadharmeṣu /
S06bsu049_u:451_8: na ca parihīyate maitrīto vā karuṇāto vā muditāto vā upekṣāto vā /
S06bsu049_u:451_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? upāyakauśalyaparigṛhīto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhūyasyā mātrayā vivardhate śūklairdharmaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:451_12: yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva imaṃ cittotpādamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:451_13: ityapīme sattvā dīrgharātramupalambhe caritāvinaḥ etarhyupalambhe caranti /
S06bsu049_u:451_14: nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api nimittasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:451_15: viparyāse caritāvinaḥ etarhy api viparyāse caranti /
S06bsu049_u:451_16: piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api piṇḍasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:451_17: abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caritāvinaḥ etarhy api abhūtasaṃjñāyāṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:451_18: mithyādṛṣṭau caritāvinaḥ etarhy api mithyādṛṣṭau caranti /
S06bsu049_u:451_19: tathā kariṣyāmi yathaiṣāmete doṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:451_21: evaṃ ca bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena smṛtisamanvāhāreṇa anena cittotpādena samanvāgataḥ upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ prajñāpāramitayā ca parigṛhītaḥ evameteṣāṃ gambhīrāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ pratyavekṣamāṇaḥ śūnyatāto vā ānimittato vā apraṇihitato vā anabhisaṃskārato vā anutpādato vā ajātito vā abhāvato vā /
S06bsu049_u:451_23: yatsa bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ jñānasamanvāgato 'nabhisaṃskāre vā patet,
S06bsu049_u:452_0: evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paripraṣṭavyo bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena - katameṣāṃ dharmāṇāṃ parijayaḥ kartavyaḥ? kiyadrūpāṇi ca cittānyabhinirhartavyāni? yāni cittānyabhinirharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śūnyatāṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:452_1: na ānimittaṃ sākṣātkaroti, na apraṇihitaṃ sākṣātkaroti, na anabhisaṃskāraṃ sākṣātkaroti,
S06bsu049_u:452_2: na anutpādaṃ sākṣātkaroti, na ajātiṃ sākṣātkaroti, na abhāvaṃ sākṣātkaroti, prajñāpāramitāṃ ca bhāvayati /
S06bsu049_u:452_3: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhisattvena mahāsattvenaivaṃ pṛṣṭa evaṃ vyākaroti - śūnyataiva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:452_4: ānimittameva apraṇihitameva anabhisaṃskāra eva anutpāda eva ajātireva abhāva eva bodhisattvena mahāsattvena manasi kartavya iti /
S06bsu049_u:452_7: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāvavinivartanīyatve taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:452_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hyasāvavinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāveṇiko dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:452_9: taṃ dharmaṃ na sūcayati, na prabhāvayati, nopadarśayati, na prajānāti, paripṛṣṭo na vyākaroti, na visarjayati, na tāṃ bhūmimavakrāmayati, yo 'vinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhūmiriti /
S06bsu049_u:453_0: subhūtirāha - syātpunarbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo [Vaidya_188] bhavet? bhagavānāha - syātsubhūte sa paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:453_1: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattva imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrutvā vā aśrutvā va evaṃ pratipadyeta,
S06bsu049_u:453_2: evaṃ visarjayet - avinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:453_3: subhūtirāha - tena hi bhagavan bahavo bodhāya caranti /
S06bsu049_u:453_5: bhagavānāha - tathā hi subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ye vyākṛtā avinivartanīyāyāṃ jñānabhūmau /
S06bsu049_u:453_7: te evaṃ visarjayiṣyanti / te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā uttaptāvaropitakuśalamūlā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:453_8: te te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā asaṃhāryāḥ sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena /
S06bsu049_u:453_9: sacetpunaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti vyavalokayati,
S06bsu049_u:453_10: na ca sākṣātkaroti, idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:454_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā traidhātukāya ca spṛhāmanuśaṃsācittaṃ notpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:454_1: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:455_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pyanekaśatāyāḥ parṣado 'nekasahasrāyā yāvadanekakoṭīniyutaśatasahasrāyāḥ parṣado madhyagataṃ maṇḍalamāle niṣaṇṇaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvasaṃghapuraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamātmānaṃ paśyati /
S06bsu049_u:455_1: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:456_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi vaihāyasamabhyudgamya sattvebhyo dharmaṃ deśayati,
S06bsu049_u:456_3: ye 'nyāsu dikṣu gatvā anyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhakṛtyaṃ kurvanti,
S06bsu049_u:456_4: dharmaṃ ca deśayanti / evam api subhūte svapnāntaragatoa'vinivartanīyo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃjānīte /
S06bsu049_u:456_5: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:457_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo notrasyati,
S06bsu049_u:457_1: na saṃtrasyati, na saṃtrāsamāpadyate / grāmaghāte vā nagaraghāte vā nigamaghāte vā janapadaghāte vā rāṣṭraghāte vā agnidāhe vā vartamāne vyālamṛgān vā tato 'nyān api vā kṣudramṛgajātīn dṛṣṭvā śiraśchede vā pratyupasthite tato 'nyāny api vā mahābhayabhairavāṇi duḥkhadaurmanasyāni vā prāpya tato 'nyeṣām api vā sattvānāṃ mahābhayabhairavāṇi duḥkhāni dṛṣṭvā nāsya bhayabhairavamutpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:457_3: tataś ca svapnāntarātprativibuddhasya samanantaravyutthitasyaivaṃ bhavati - svapnopamamidaṃ sarvaṃ traidhātukam /
S06bsu049_u:457_4: evaṃ ca mayā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya samyagdeśayatā dharmo deśayitavya iti /
S06bsu049_u:457_5: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:458_0: [Vaidya_189] punaraparaṃ subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya svapnāntaragatasya nairayikān sattvān dṛṣṭvā evaṃ bhavati - tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve 'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:458_1: idam api subhūte avinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya apāyapariśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:459_0: tatra subhūte kathaṃ vijñāyeta asyāvinivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve 'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti? sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svapnāntaragato 'pi nirayagatāṃstiryakpretagatān vā sattvān dṛṣṭvā smṛtiṃ pratilabhate /
S06bsu049_u:459_1: sa tāṃ smṛtiṃ pratilabhya evaṃ cintayati - tathā kariṣyāmi yathā me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya buddhakṣetre sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarve 'pyapāyā na bhaviṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:459_2: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya apāyapariśuddhilakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:459_3: idam api subhūte avivartanīyasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇaṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:460_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte svapnāntaragato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nagaradāhe vā grāmadāhe vā vartamāne prativibuddhaḥ saṃstataḥ svapnādevaṃ samanvāharati yathā - mayā svapnāntaragatena ye ākārāḥ yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni dṛṣṭāni,
S06bsu049_u:460_2: te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni mama saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:460_3: etena satyena satyavacanena ayaṃ nagaradāho vā grāmadāho vā vartamāna upaśāmyatu,
S06bsu049_u:460_4: śītibhavatu, astaṃ gacchatu / sacetsubhūte grāmadāho vā nagaradāho vā upaśāmyati,
S06bsu049_u:460_5: śītībhavati, astaṃ gacchati, veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairavinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:460_6: sacennopaśāmyati, na śītībhavati, nāstaḥ gacchati, veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
S06bsu049_u:460_7: sacetpunaḥ subhūte so 'gnidāho 'tikramya gṛhādgṛhaṃ rathyāyā rathyāmanyatarānyatarāṃ rathyāṃ vā gṛhaṃ vā gacchati,
S06bsu049_u:460_8: dahati, nopaśāmyati, na śītībhavati, nāstaṃ gacchati, veditavyametatsubhūte dharmapratyākhyānaṃ duṣprajñasaṃvartanīyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena karmopacitam /
S06bsu049_u:460_11: ityayaṃ subhūte heturayaṃ pratyayo 'sya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya avinivartanīyalakṣaṇatāyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:460_12: ayam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyo 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:461_2: tatsādhu ca suṣṭhu ca śṛṇu, manasi kuru, bhāṣiṣye 'haṃ te / sādhu bhagavannityāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavataḥ pratyaśrauṣīt /
S06bsu049_u:461_3: bhagavānetadavocat - sacetsubhūte kaścideva puruṣo vā strī vā dārako vā dārikā vā [Vaidya_190] amanuṣyeṇa gṛhīto bhavedāviṣṭaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:461_4: tatra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena upasaṃkramya evamadhiṣṭhānaṃ samanvāhartavyam /
S06bsu049_u:461_13: ye 'pi te aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:461_14: na teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ kiṃcidajñātaṃ vā adṛṣṭaṃ vā aviditaṃ vā asākṣātkṛtaṃ vā anabhisaṃbuddhaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:461_15: yathā te buddhā bhagavanto jānanto mamādhyāśayam - ityapyahamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsye iti /
S06bsu049_u:461_16: anena satyena satyavacanena iyaṃ strī vā puruṣo vā dārako vā dārikā vā yena amanuṣyagraheṇa gṛhīto vā āviṣṭo vā,
S06bsu049_u:461_17: so 'pakrāmatu / sacetso 'manuṣyaḥ evaṃ bhāṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāpakrāmati,
S06bsu049_u:461_18: veditavyametatsubhūte nāyaṃ vyākṛto bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
S06bsu049_u:461_19: sacetpunaḥ subhūte evaṃ bhāṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya so 'manuṣyo 'pakrāmati,
S06bsu049_u:461_20: veditavyametatsubhūte vyākṛto 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
S06bsu049_u:466_0: tatra khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ bhāṣiṣyate - yena satyena satyavacanena ahaṃ vyākṛtaḥ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:466_2: tatra subhūte māraḥ pāpīyānautsukyamāpatsyate tasya amanuṣyasyāpakramaṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:466_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? māro hyatra pāpīyāṃstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya cirayānasaṃprasthitasyāntike balavattaraṃ tejovattaraṃ codyogamāpatsyate - kathamayamamanuṣyo 'pakrāmediti /
S06bsu049_u:466_5: evaṃ ca tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bhaviṣyati - mamaiṣo 'nubhāvena amanuṣyo 'pakrānta iti /
S06bsu049_u:466_6: na punaḥ sa evaṃ jñāsyati - mārasyaiṣo 'nubhāvena amanuṣyo 'pakrānta iti /
S06bsu049_u:466_8: sa tenautsukyena tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate uccagdhayiṣyati ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati - ahaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti /
S06bsu049_u:466_9: sa tena tāvanmātrakeṇa bhūyo mānaṃ janayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:466_10: mānaṃ saṃjanayiṣyati, mānaṃ vardhayiṣyati, mānaṃ saṃvardhayiṣyati, mānaṃ stambhayiṣyati, mānamupastambhayiṣyati, mānaṃ bṛṃhayiṣyati, mānamupabṛṃhayiṣyati, mānamutpādayiṣyati / sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena mithyāmānena abhimānena dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām,
S06bsu049_u:466_13: sa tathārūpāṇi kalyāṇamitrāṇi kalyāṇadharmaṇa udārādhimuktikānadhyāśayasaṃpannānupāyakuśalānavinivartanīyadharmasamanvāgatāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvān dṛṣṭvā abhimānamutpādya avamanyamānastathārūpāṇi kalyāṇamitrāṇi na seviṣyate,
S06bsu049_u:466_14: na bhajiṣyate, na paryupāsiṣyate, na pariprakṣyati / tadeva mārabandhanaṃ gāḍhīkariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:466_15: tasya dve bhūmī pratikāṅkṣitavye - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
S06bsu049_u:466_16: evaṃ subhūte satyādhiṣṭhānena māraḥ pāpīyānacirayānasaṃprasthitasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya alpaśraddhasya alpaśrutasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītasya upāyakauśalyavirahitasya antarāyaṃ kariṣyatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:466_17: idam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:467_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:467_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpedeśenāpi mārakarma bhaviṣyati? iha subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ nāmāpadeśenāpi nāmādhiṣṭhānenāpi māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:467_2: anyatarānyatareṇa veṣeṇopasaṃkramya evaṃ vakṣyati - tairvyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:467_4: idaṃ te māturnāmadheyam / idaṃ te piturnāmadheyam / idaṃ te bhrāturnāmadheyam / idaṃ te bhaginyā nāmadheyam /
S06bsu049_u:467_6: yāvadāsaptamaṃ mātāmahapitāmahayugasya nāmadheyamudīrayiṣyati - amuṣyāṃ diśi tvaṃ jātaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:467_7: amuṣmin janapade amuṣmin grāme vā nagare vā [Vaidya_192] nigame vā jāta iti /
S06bsu049_u:467_9: tamenamevaṃ vakṣyati - pūrvam api tvameva mṛduko 'bhūḥ /
S06bsu049_u:467_11: tatastamevaṃ vakṣyati - pūrvam api tvaṃ tīkṣṇendriyo 'bhūḥ /
S06bsu049_u:467_12: sacedāraṇyako bhaviṣyati, sacetpiṇḍapātiko bhaviṣyati, sacetpāṃsukūliko bhaviṣyati, sacetkhalupaścādbhaktiko bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:467_14: sacetraicīvariko bhaviṣyati, sacet śmaśāniko bhaviṣyati, sacedvṛkṣamūliko bhaviṣyati, sacennaiṣadyiko bhaviṣyati, sacedabhyavakāśiko bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:467_15: sacennāmantiko bhaviṣyati, sacedalpecchaḥ saṃtuṣṭaḥ pravivikto bhaviṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:467_18: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyāṃstena tena dṛṣṭadhārmikeṇa guṇenādekṣyati - pūrvam api tvamanena cānena ca guṇena samanvāgato 'bhūḥ /
S06bsu049_u:467_19: niyatastaṃ vyākṛtastaiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau /
S06bsu049_u:467_20: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te amī evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:467_22: evaṃ sa tena paurvakeṇa nāmāpadeśena nāmādhiṣṭhānena pratyutpannadhutaguṇasaṃlekhena ca manyanāmutpādayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:467_23: tasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati - vyākṛto 'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:467_25: taṃ ca māraḥ pāpīyānevaṃ vakṣyati - avinivartanīyastvaṃ vyākṛtastathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:467_26: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi tava ete evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇā saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:467_27: tasya khalu punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāyīyān kadācidbhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:467_28: kadācidbhikṣuṇīveṣeṇa, kadācidupāsakaveṣeṇa, kadācidupāsikāveṣeṇa, kadācidbrāhmaṇaveṣeṇa, kadācidgṛhapativeṣeṇa, kadācinmātṛveṣeṇa, kadācitpitṛveṣeṇa, kadācidbhrātṛveṣeṇa, kadācidbhaginīveṣeṇa, kadācinmitrāmātyajñātisālohitaveṣeṇa upasaṃkramiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:467_29: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati - vyākṛtastvaṃ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau avinivartanīyāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau /
S06bsu049_u:467_30: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi te evaṃrūpā dhutaguṇāḥ saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:467_32: ye khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ guṇā ākhyātāḥ ākārā liṅgāni nimittāni cākhyātāni,
S06bsu049_u:467_33: tāni tasya na bhaviṣyanti / veditavyametatsubhūte tato 'nyairbodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ - mārādhiṣṭhito batāyaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti /
S06bsu049_u:467_34: tatkasya hetoḥ? ye ākārā yāni liṅgāni yāni nimittāni avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06bsu049_u:467_35: tāni tasya na bhaviṣyanti / sa khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nena nāmādhiṣṭhānena abhimānamutpādayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:467_36: abhimānamutpādya mānābhibhūtaḥ stambhābhibhūto mārādhiṣṭhānenābhibhūtastadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate uccagghayiṣyati ullāpayiṣyati kutsayiṣyati paṃsayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:467_37: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmādhiṣṭhānena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:468_0: [Vaidya_193] punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:468_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena mārakarma veditavyam? iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bhikṣuveṣeṇopasaṃkramya bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamevaṃ vyākariṣyati - tavānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhaviṣyatīti yadeva tena cittenānuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritaṃ bhavati - aho bata me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idamevaṃrūpaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhavediti,
S06bsu049_u:468_3: tatra duṣprajñajātīyasya anupāyakuśalasya bodhisattvasyaivaṃ bhaviṣyati - yathā mayā nāmadheyamanuvartitamanuvitarkitamanuvicāritam,
S06bsu049_u:468_4: aho bata me 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhasya sataḥ idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ bhavediti,
S06bsu049_u:468_7: yacca tena māreṇa pāpīyasā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhinirmitena mārādhiṣṭhitena vā bhikṣuṇā nāmadheyamudīritam,
S06bsu049_u:468_8: tadubhayaṃ tulayitvā yathā ca mama cittotpāda utpannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:468_9: yathā ca anena bhikṣuṇā nirdiṣṭaṃ mama nāmadheyaṃ sameti nāmnā,
S06bsu049_u:468_10: nāmavyākṛto 'haṃ taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhāviti maṃsyate /
S06bsu049_u:468_11: yāni ca mayā subhūte avinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāmākārā liṅgāni nimittāni ākhyātāni,
S06bsu049_u:468_12: tāni tasya na bhaviṣyanti / sa tairvirahito 'nena nāmāpadeśena nāmavyākaraṇena manyanāmutpādayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:468_13: sa manyanāmutpādya tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamaṃsyate - ahaṃ vyākṛto 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau,
S06bsu049_u:468_15: evaṃ sa tena mānena atimānena mānātimānena abhimānena mithyāmānena ca tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavamanyamāno dūrīkariṣyati sarvajñatām,
S06bsu049_u:468_16: dūrīkariṣyati buddhajñānam / tasya prajñāpāramitayā aparigṛhītasya upāyakauśalyavirahitasya kalyāṇamitravirahitasya pāpamitraparigṛhītasya dvayorbhūmyoranyatarā bhūmiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā - śrāvakabhūmirvā pratyekabuddhabhūmirvā /
S06bsu049_u:468_17: sacetpunaściraṃ suciraṃ saṃdhāvya saṃsṛtya enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmo bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:468_21: vāntīkariṣyati, jugupsiṣyati, pratiniḥ - srakṣyati, pratideśayiṣyati, tathāpi buddhabhūmistasya durlabhā bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:468_22: tatkasya hetoḥ? tāvadgurutaraṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mananāpattisthānam /
S06bsu049_u:468_23: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte bhikṣoḥ śrāvakayānikasya śrāvakabhūmau catasro mūlāpattayo gurvyo bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:468_26: yo 'yaṃ mānacittotpādaḥ, yaduta nāmāpadeśena bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāvamānanayā mahānakuśalaścittotpāda utpannaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:469_1: pañcabhyo 'pi subhūte ānantaryebhyaḥ [Vaidya_194] karmabhyo gurutaro 'yaṃ cittotpādaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:469_2: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmāpadeśena mānasahagataścittotpāda utpannaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:469_3: ayaṃ tebhyaḥ pañcabhya ānantaryebhyaḥ karmabhyo gurutaraścittotpādo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:469_4: iti hi subhūte anenāpi nāmāpadeśena sūkṣmasūkṣmāṇi mārakarmāṇyutpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:470_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:470_1: kathaṃ ca subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekaguṇena bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramya codayiṣyati smārayiṣyati? iha subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkramiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:470_2: upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyati - vivekasya tathāgato varṇavādī araṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādiṣu vihartavyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:470_3: na cāhaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃvidhaṃ vivekaṃ vadāmi,
S06bsu049_u:470_4: yaduta āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni,
S06bsu049_u:471_0: subhūtirāha - katamaḥ punaḥ sa bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anyo viveko yadi vā āraṇyakāni prāntāni śayanāsanāni vijanapadāni viviktāni vividhāni vanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānapalālapuñjādīni? yadi tāni nādhyāvasati,
S06bsu049_u:471_1: kiyadrūpaḥ punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānyo vivekaḥ? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto bhavati śrāvakapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:471_3: evaṃ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vivikto viharati /
S06bsu049_u:471_4: grāmānte 'pi hi viharan prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyaparigṛhītaḥ sarvasattvamaitrīmahākaruṇāvihāreṇa viharet /
S06bsu049_u:471_5: anena vihāreṇa viharan vivikta eva sa viharati /
S06bsu049_u:471_6: ayaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte mayā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktamanasikāraviveko 'nujñātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:471_7: anena vivekena viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdivānyatināmayati,
S06bsu049_u:471_8: vivikto viharati / sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'raṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānaprāntaśayanāsaneṣvanena vihāreṇa viharati,
S06bsu049_u:471_10: yaṃ punaḥ subhūte māraḥ pāpīyān vivekamupadekṣyati araṇyavanaprasthagiriguhāśmaśānaprāntaśayanāsanavihārān,
S06bsu049_u:471_11: sa tena vivekena śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ saṃkīrṇa eva san prajñāpāramitāyāmanabhiyujyamāno na sarvajñajñānaṃ paripūrayati /
S06bsu049_u:471_12: evaṃ sa saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharan so 'pariśuddhena manasikāreṇa viharan apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ eva bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:471_13: apariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmānta eva saṃstato 'nyān api bodhisattvān mahāsattvān grāmāntavihāriṇo 'saṃkīrṇān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ prajñopāyamahākaruṇāvihāravihāriṇo 'vamaṃsyate /
S06bsu049_u:471_14: araṇye 'pi viharan so 'pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntaḥ san saṃkīrṇavihāryeva bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:471_15: na viviktavihārī / sa prajñopāyamahākaruṇāvihāravihāriṇo [Vaidya_195] grāmānte viharataḥ pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmasamudācārān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktamanasikāraviviktānasaṃkīrṇān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraistāṃstāvatso 'vamanyamāno na dhyānasamādhisamāpattivimokṣābhijñānāṃ lābhī bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:471_17: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi so 'nupāyakuśalo bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:472_0: kiṃcāpi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yojanaśatikeṣvaṭavīkāntāreṣu viharedapagatavyālamṛgapakṣisaṃgheṣu apagatakṣudramṛgavyālayakṣarākṣasānuvicariteṣu apagatacaurakāntārabhayabhairavopadraveṣu saṃtiṣṭhet,
S06bsu049_u:472_1: varṣaṃ vā varṣaśataṃ vā varṣasahasraṃ vā varṣaśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīṃ vā varṣakoṭīśataṃ vā varṣakoṭīsahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā varṣakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:472_2: tato vā upari / imaṃ ca vivekaṃ mayopadiṣṭaṃ na jānīyāt,
S06bsu049_u:472_6: naiva me subhūte etāvatā sa bodhisattvaścittamārādhayati /
S06bsu049_u:472_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? yaḥ subhūte viveko bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mayā ākhyātaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:472_8: tena vivekena viharannasmin viveke na saṃdṛśyate /
S06bsu049_u:472_9: tamenaṃ māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkramya uparyantarīkṣe vihāyasi sthitvā evaṃ vakṣyati - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu049_u:472_10: eṣa bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ tathāgatena viveka ākhyātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:472_13: sa tato vivekātpunareva araṇyādgrāmāntamavatīrya tadanyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān bhikṣūn sabrahmacāriṇaḥ kalyāṇadharmaṇo 'saṃkīrṇān śrāvakapratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ pariśuddhakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntān jīvānavamaṃsyate /
S06bsu049_u:472_14: sa evaṃ vakṣyati - saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa bateme āyuṣmanto viharanti,
S06bsu049_u:472_15: na viviktavihāreṇa / ākīrṇavihāreṇa bateme āyuṣmanto viharanti,
S06bsu049_u:472_17: ye te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā viviktavihāreṇa viharanti,
S06bsu049_u:472_19: ākīrṇavihāreṇa codayiṣyati / ye ca te saṃkīrṇavihāreṇa viharanti,
S06bsu049_u:472_24: ahamamanuṣyaiḥ smārye / eṣa subhūte vihāro yenāhaṃ vihāreṇa viharāmi /
S06bsu049_u:472_33: cauraḥ sadevakasya lokasya / tajjātīyaḥ khaluḥ punaḥ subhūte pudgalo na sevitavyo na bhaktavyo na paryupāsitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:472_34: tatkasya hetoḥ? abhimānapatitā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:472_35: anyeṣām api tathārūpāṇāmalpa [Vaidya_196] sthāmānācirayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ saṃdūṣaṇaṃ kuryuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:472_36: aviśuddhadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalāḥ veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:472_37: anāryā hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:472_38: anāryadharmāṇo hi te tathārūpāḥ pudgalā veditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:472_39: yasya khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya aparityaktāḥ sarvasattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:472_41: tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmarthaṃ kartukāmena tajjātīyāḥ pudgalā na sevitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:472_42: na bhaktavyāḥ, na paryupāsitavyāḥ / api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sarvasattvānāmarthāya abhyutthitena eteṣāṃ ca anyeṣāṃ ca mārakarmaṇāmavabodhāya nityamevodvignacittena bhavitavyaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ mārgamapratilabhamānānāmupadeṣṭumutrastamānasena asaṃsṛṣṭena traidhātukena /
S06bsu049_u:472_43: tatrāpi tāvanmaitrāyamāṇena karuṇāyamānena mahākaruṇāmutpādya anukampāmupādāya samyakpratipanneṣu sattveṣu muditacittenānupalabdhidharmatayā dharmāṇāmupekṣakeṇa evaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - tathā kariṣyāmi yathā sarve mārakarmadoṣāḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ sarvatra sarvadā ca na bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:472_44: notpatsyante / sacedutpatsyante, kṣiprameva pratigamiṣyanti, evaṃ śikṣiṣye iti / ayam api bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ svayamabhijñāya parākramo veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:472_45: idam api subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena vivekaguṇena mārakarma veditavyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:477_0: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimāmantrayate sma - iha subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayasaṃprasthitena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ādita evaṃ kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:477_1: subhūtirāha - katamāni tāni punarbhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06bsu049_u:477_2: yāni bodhisattvena mahāsattvena adhyāśayasaṃprasthitena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ādita eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - buddhā eva subhūte bhagavantaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:477_3: ye ca te 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā bodhisattvacaryākuśalāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:477_6: imāni tāni subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:477_7: prajñāpāramitaiva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitraṃ veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:477_8: sarvā eva ca subhūte ṣaṭ pāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni /
S06bsu049_u:477_9: ṣaḍeva pāramitāḥ śāstā, ṣaṭ pāramitā mārgaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā ālokaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā ulkā, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ avabhāsaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitāstrāṇam, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ śaraṇam, ṣaṭ pāramitā layanam, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parāyaṇam, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ dvīpaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā mātā, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ pitā, ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya anuttarāyai samyaksaṃbodhaye saṃvartante /
S06bsu049_u:477_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? atra hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā pariniṣṭhitā bhavati yaduta ṣaṭpāramitāsu /
S06bsu049_u:477_11: ye 'pi te subhūte atīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya parinirvṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:477_14: ye 'pi te subhūte bhaviṣyantyanāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante,
S06bsu049_u:477_17: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣvaparimāṇeṣvacintyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti,
S06bsu049_u:477_18: dhriyante, yāpayanti, dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, teṣām api buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmitonirjātaiva sarvajñatā,
S06bsu049_u:477_20: aham api subhūte tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha etarhyanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:477_23: tatkasya hetoḥ? āsu hi subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣā dharmā antargatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:477_24: catvāro brahmavihārāḥ, catvāri saṃgrahavastūni / yāvāṃś ca kaścidbuddhadharmo buddhajñānaṃ svayaṃbhūjñānamacintyajñānamatulyajñānamaprameyajñānamasaṃkhyeyajñānamasamajñānamasamasamajñānaṃ sarvajñajñānam,
S06bsu049_u:477_26: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ṣaṭ pāramitā eva kalyāṇamitrāṇi veditavyāni,
S06bsu049_u:477_27: ṣaḍeva pāramitāḥ śāstā, ṣaṭ pāramitā mārgaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā ālokaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā ulkā, ṣaṭ pāramitā avabhāsaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitāstrāṇam, ṣaṭ [Vaidya_198] pāramitāḥ śaraṇam,
S06bsu049_u:477_28: ṣaṭ pāramitā layanam, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ parāyaṇam, ṣaṭ pāramitā dvīpaḥ, ṣaṭ pāramitā mātā, ṣaṭ pāramitāḥ pitā, ṣaṭ pāramitā jñānāya bodhāya sarvajñatāyai anuttarasamyaksaṃbodhiprāptaye saṃvartante /
S06bsu049_u:478_0: āsu khalu punaḥ subhūte ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā,
S06bsu049_u:478_1: arthataś ca dharmataś ca nayataścopaparīkṣitavyā upanidhyātavyā paripraṣṭavyā paripraśnayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:478_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi prajñāpāramitā ṣaṇṇāṃ pāramitānāṃ pūrvaṃgamā nāyikā pariṇāyikā saṃdarśikā avadarśikā janayitrī dhatrī /
S06bsu049_u:478_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāvirahitā hi pañca pāramitā na prajñāyante,
S06bsu049_u:478_5: tasmāttarhi subhūte aparapraṇeyatāṃ gantukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena aparapraṇeyatāyāṃ sthātukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:479_0: subhūtirāha - kiṃlakṣaṇā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - asaṅgalakṣaṇā subhūte prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:479_1: subhūtirāha - syādbhagavan paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa yenaivāsaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
S06bsu049_u:479_2: tenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena sarvadharmāḥ saṃvidyeran? bhagavānāha - evametatsubhūte,
S06bsu049_u:479_3: evam etat / syātsubhūte paryāyo yena paryāyeṇa yenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā saṃvidyate,
S06bsu049_u:479_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi subhūte viviktāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:479_7: tasmāttarhi subhūte yenaiva asaṅgalakṣaṇena prajñāpāramitā viviktā śūnyā,
S06bsu049_u:479_10: sarvadharmāḥ śūnyāḥ, kathaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate,
S06bsu049_u:479_11: kathaṃ bhagavan sattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate? na ca bhagavan viviktaṃ saṃkliśyate,
S06bsu049_u:479_15: na ca bhagavan viviktaṃ vā śūnyaṃ vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:479_18: abhisaṃbhotsyate vā, abhisaṃbudhyate vā / kathaṃ vā vayaṃ bhagavan asya bhāṣitasyārthamājānīmaḥ? deśayatu bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:479_19: deśayatu sugata / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāre mamakāre caranti? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:479_20: evametatsugata / dīrgharātraṃ sattvā ahaṃkāre mamakāre caranti /
S06bsu049_u:479_21: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu ahaṃkāramamakārau śūnyau? subhūtirāha - śūnyau bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:479_22: śūnyau sugata / bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti? subhūtirāha - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:479_23: evametatsugata / ahaṃkāreṇa mamakāreṇa ca sattvāḥ saṃsāre saṃsaranti /
S06bsu049_u:479_24: bhagavānāha - evaṃ khalu subhūte sattvānāṃ saṃkleśaḥ prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:479_29: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvasattvānāṃ vyavadānaṃ prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:479_31: tathā vyavadānam / na cātra kaścidvyavadāyati / evaṃ khalu subhūte caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:479_32: evaṃ khalu subhūte sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:479_33: subhūtirāha - āścaryaṃ bhagavan yāvadyadidaṃ sarvadharmeṣu vivikteṣu sarvadharmeṣu śūnyeṣu sattvānāṃ saṃkleśo vyavadānaṃ ca prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:479_34: evaṃ ca bhagavaṃścaran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:479_35: evaṃ hi caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
S06bsu049_u:479_36: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06bsu049_u:479_37: na vijñāne carati / evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena /
S06bsu049_u:479_38: evaṃ caran bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:479_40: tatkasya hetoḥ? anabhibhūtaṃ hi bhagavan buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam /
S06bsu049_u:479_41: anenāpi bhagavan manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet,
S06bsu049_u:479_45: evam etat / evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:479_46: evaṃ hi caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpe carati,
S06bsu049_u:479_47: na vedanāyāṃ na saṃjñāyāṃ na saṃskāreṣu,
S06bsu049_u:479_48: na vijñāne carati / evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'navamardanīyo bhavati sadevamānuṣāsureṇa lokena /
S06bsu049_u:479_49: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarveṣāṃ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānāṃ caryāmabhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:479_51: tatkasya hetoḥ? anabhibhūtaṃ hi subhūte buddhatvaṃ tathāgatatvaṃ svayaṃbhūtvaṃ sarvajñatvam /
S06bsu049_u:479_52: anenāpi subhūte manasikāreṇa prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena vihāreṇa viharan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo rātriṃdinānyatināmayet,
S06bsu049_u:480_0: sacetkhalu punaḥ subhūte ye jambūdvīpe sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:480_4: yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhanto yāvajjīvaṃ sarvatathāgatān satkuryurgurukuryurmānayeyuḥ pūjayeyurarcayeyurapacāyeyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:480_7: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ? subhūtirāha - bahu bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:480_8: bahu sugata / bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:480_10: [Vaidya_200] tatkasya hetoḥ? yathā yathā hi subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivaṃ viharati,
S06bsu049_u:480_12: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi subhūte nāsti tadanyeṣāṃ sattvānāṃ tādṛśaṃ maitrīsahagataṃ cittam,
S06bsu049_u:480_15: tatkasya hetoḥ? apratipudgalā hi subhūte tathāgatāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:480_17: acintyadharmasamanvāgatā hi subhūte tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:481_0: kathaṃ ca subhūte sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā tāvattatpuṇyamabhinirharati? tādṛśyā subhūte prajñayā samanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:481_1: yādṛśyā prajñayā samanvāgato vadhyagatāniva sarvasattvān paśyati /
S06bsu049_u:481_3: sa divyena cakṣuṣā vyavalokayan aprameyānasaṃkhyeyānaparimeyānaparimāṇān sattvānānantaryakarmasamanvāgatān paśyati,
S06bsu049_u:481_4: akṣaṇaprāptāṃś ca vihanyamānāṃś ca dṛṣṭijālapraticchannāṃś ca mārgamapratilabhamānān /
S06bsu049_u:481_7: tasya tasyāṃ velāyāṃ mahān saṃvega utpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:481_8: te cāsya sarvasattvāstayā mahāmaitryā tayā ca mahākaruṇayā sphāritvā manasikṛtā bhavanti - ahameteṣāṃ sarveṣāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:481_10: na ca tena vā anyena vā nimittena sārdhaṃ saṃvasati /
S06bsu049_u:481_11: ayam api subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya mahān prajñāloko 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhum /
S06bsu049_u:481_12: anena hi subhūte vihāreṇa viharanto bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvalokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ parigṛhṇanti,
S06bsu049_u:481_14: yeṣāṃ ca dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca paribhuñjate cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān,
S06bsu049_u:481_16: teṣāṃ dāyakānāṃ dānapatīnāṃ ca dānadakṣiṇāṃ viśodhayanti /
S06bsu049_u:481_18: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena amoghaṃ rāṣṭraṃ piṇḍaṃ paribhoktukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ mārgamupadeṣṭukāmena vipulamavabhāsaṃ kartukāmena saṃsāragatān sattvān saṃsārātparimocayitukāmena sarvasattvānāṃ cakṣurviśodhayitukāmena anena prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktena manasikāreṇa vihartavyam /
S06bsu049_u:481_21: tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hyenān samanvāhartavyān maṃsyate,
S06bsu049_u:481_24: tathā ca kartavyaṃ yathāyaṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārai rātriṃdivāni kṣapayet /
S06bsu049_u:481_25: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kenacideva puruṣeṇa maṇiratnajñāne vartamānena maṇiratnajātijñena apratilabdhapūrvaṃ mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:481_26: sa tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabhya mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:481_29: tasya satatasamitaṃ tanmahāmaṇiratnaṃ prati saṃyuktā eva manasikārāḥ pravarteran - aho batāhaṃ tena [Vaidya_201] mahāmaṇiratnena viprayukta iti hi sa puruṣastasya mahāmaṇiratnasya na vismaret yāvat tadvā anyadvā tadguṇaṃ tajjātikaṃ tena mahāmaṇiratnaṃ pratilabdhaṃ bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:481_30: evameva subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāmahāmaṇiratnaparibhraṣṭena mahāmaṇiratnaparibhraṣṭeneva mahāmaṇiratnena ratnasaṃjñinā prajñāpāramitāmanasikārāviprayuktena prajñāpāramitāmanasikārāvirahitasarvajñatācittena tāvadanveṣṭavyā,
S06bsu049_u:481_31: yāvatsā vā anyā vā pratilabdhā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:482_0: subhūtirāha - yatpunarbhagavan sarvadharmāḥ sarvamanasikārāḥ svabhāvena virahitāḥ śūnyā uktā bhagavatā,
S06bsu049_u:482_1: tatkathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikāraiḥ sarvajñatāpratisaṃyuktairmanasikārairavirahito bhavati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ manasi karoti - sarvadharmāḥ svabhāvena viviktāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:482_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitā hi subhūte śūnyā /
S06bsu049_u:482_5: sā naiva vivardhate, na ca parihīyate / subhūtirāha - sacedbhagavan prajñāpāramitā śūnyā,
S06bsu049_u:482_6: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
S06bsu049_u:482_7: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vivardhamānayā prajñāpāramitayā bodhaye samudāgacchati,
S06bsu049_u:482_8: kathaṃ ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran vivardhate vā parihīyate vā /
S06bsu049_u:482_10: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
S06bsu049_u:482_12: sa naiva vivardhate, na ca parihīyate / yataḥ subhūte yathaiva prajñāpāramitā śūnyā,
S06bsu049_u:482_13: sā naiva vivardhate na ca parihīyate,
S06bsu049_u:482_15: sa naiva vivardhate, na ca parihīyate / tato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bodhaye samudāgacchati,
S06bsu049_u:482_17: sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate na saṃsīdati,
S06bsu049_u:483_0: subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan prajñāpāramitā carati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāhano hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:483_1: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan yā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śūnyatā,
S06bsu049_u:483_2: sā carati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:483_3: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra prajñāpāramitāśūnyatāyāḥ sa kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:483_4: yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:483_5: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatā carati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:483_6: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatāyāṃ sa kaściddharma upalabhyate yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:483_7: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śūnyatā carati śūnyatāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:483_8: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan rūpaṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyām? [Vaidya_202] bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:483_9: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:483_10: kiṃ punarbhagavan vijñānaṃ carati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:483_11: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra rūpātsa dharmaḥ kaścidupalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:483_12: yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:483_13: āha - kiṃ punarbhagavan anyatra vedanāyāḥ saṃjñāyāḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:483_15: yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:483_16: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ punarbhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? evamukte - bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yaścarati prajñāpāramitāyām? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:483_17: bhagavānāha - samanupaśyasi tvaṃ subhūte tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ yatra prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:483_18: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yo dharmo 'nupalambhaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:483_19: taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi? api nu sa eva dharma utpanno vā utpatsyate vā utpadyate vā,
S06bsu049_u:483_20: niruddho vā nirotsyate vā nirudhyate vā? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:483_21: bhagavānāha - evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anutpattikeṣu dharmeṣu kṣāntirevaṃrūpā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:483_22: evaṃrūpayā ca subhūte kṣāntyā samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:483_23: iyaṃ subhūte tathāgatasya vaiśāradyapratipad yāṃ pratipadyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ evaṃ caran evaṃ ghaṭamānaḥ evaṃ vyāyacchamāno 'nuttaraṃ buddhajñānaṃ sarvajñajñānaṃ mahāsārthavāhajñānaṃ nānuprāpsyatīti naitatsthānaṃ vidyate /
S06bsu049_u:484_1: sā vyākriyate 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:484_2: subhūtirāha - kathamasyedānīṃ bhagavan dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? bhagavānāha - kiṃ punaḥ subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ taṃ dharmaṃ yasya dharmasya vyākaraṇaṃ bhavatyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:484_3: nāhaṃ bhagavaṃstaṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi yo dharmo vyākṛto vyākariṣyate vyākriyate vā anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau /
S06bsu049_u:484_5: yo dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyate, yo dharmo 'bhisaṃboddhavyaḥ, yena vā dharmeṇābhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:484_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmeṣu bhagavan anupalabhyamāneṣu na me evaṃ bhavati - ayaṃ dharmo 'bhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:489_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena śakro devānāmindrastasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaḥ saṃniṣaṇṇo 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:489_1: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīreyaṃ bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:489_8: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - na te bhagavan sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:489_9: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:489_11: evam etat / na te kauśika sattvā avarakeṇa kuśalamūlena samanvāgatā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:489_13: śrutvā codgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:489_16: tatkiṃ manyase kauśika api nu te sattvāstatonidānaṃ bahu puṇyaṃ prasaveyuḥ? śakra āha - bahu bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:489_17: bahu sugata / bhagavānāha - ataḥ khalu punaḥ sa kauśika kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:489_19: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:489_20: asya kauśika puṇyaskandhasya asau paurvakāṇāṃ jāmbūdvīpakānāṃ sarvasattvānāṃ śīlamayaḥ puṇyaskandhaḥ śatatamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:489_21: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:489_22: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate,
S06bsu049_u:489_23: yena kuśalamūlena sa kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā samanvāgato bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:489_25: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:490_0: atha khalvanyataro bhikṣuḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - abhibhūto 'si kauśika tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:490_1: śrutvā codgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:490_2: evamukte śakro devānāmindrastaṃ bhikṣumetadavocat - ekacittotpādenaiva ahamārya tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā abhibhūtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:490_3: kaḥ punarvādo ya imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:490_4: śrutvā ca udgrahīṣyati dhārayiṣyati vācayiṣyati paryavāpsyati pravartayiṣyati [Vaidya_204] deśayiṣyatyupadekṣyatyuddekṣyati svādhyāsyati likhiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:490_5: kaḥ punarvādo ye śrutvā udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya likhitvā tathatvāya śikṣiṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:490_6: tathatvāya pratipatsyante, tathatvāya yogamāpatsyante / te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:490_7: na kevalaṃ te sadevamānuṣāsuraṃ lokamabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:490_9: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:490_10: na kevalaṃ srotaāpannān sakṛdāgāmino 'nāgāmino 'rhataḥ pratyekabuddhānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:490_11: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahādānapatayaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:490_12: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:490_13: na kevalaṃ tān mahādānapatīn bodhisattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:490_14: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā pariśuddhaśīlā akhaṇḍena śīlaskandhenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:490_15: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:490_16: na kevalamakhaṇḍenācchidreṇākalmaṣeṇa paripūrṇena pariśuddhena aśabalena śīlaskandhena samanvāgatān bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:490_17: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣāntisaṃpannā upaśamasaṃpannā apratihatacittā antato dagdhasthūṇāyāmapyāghātacittaṃ notpādayanti prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:490_18: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:490_20: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā ārabdhavīryā anikṣiptadhurā akusīdā anavalīnakāyavāṅmanaḥkarmāntāḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:490_21: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:490_23: ye 'pi te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā dhyānārāmā dhyānaratā dhyānabalino dhyānabalavanto dhyānapratiṣṭhitā dhyānavaśinaḥ prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalyavirahitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:490_24: tān api te sarvānabhibhavanto gamiṣyanti bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:490_25: yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsuralokaṃ sarvān śrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānanupāyakuśalāṃś ca bodhisattvān mahāsattvānabhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:490_26: teṣāṃ cānabhibhūto bhavati / tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hi bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:490_27: prajñāpāramitāmanuvartate, ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñavaṃśasyānupacchedāya sthito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:490_29: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ pratipadyamāno nacirādgamiṣyati bodhimaṇḍam /
S06bsu049_u:490_30: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ sattvān kleśapaṅke saṃsīdamānānuddhariṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:490_31: ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:490_32: na śrāvakaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate, na pratyekabuddhaśikṣāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:490_33: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ ca prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ [Vaidya_205] catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramyaivaṃ vakṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra asyāṃ bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣasva,
S06bsu049_u:490_34: laghu śikṣasva / imāni te catvāri pātrāṇi yāni tvayā bodhimaṇḍe niṣadya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhena pratigrahītavyānīti /
S06bsu049_u:490_35: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ yathānirdiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na kevalaṃ catvāro lokapālā mahārājāna upasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:490_38: tathāgatair api so 'rhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairnityameva samanvāhṛto bhaviṣyati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:490_39: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya yāni kānicillaukikāni duḥkhāni paropakramikāṇi vā anyāni vā utpadyeran,
S06bsu049_u:490_40: tānyasya sarveṇa sarvaṃ sarvathā sarvaṃ notpatsyante /
S06bsu049_u:490_41: ayam api bhagavan dṛṣṭadhārmiko guṇastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:491_0: atha khalvāyuṣmata ānandasyaitadabhavat - kimayaṃ śakro devānāmindraḥ svakena pratibhānena bhāṣate,
S06bsu049_u:491_1: utāho buddhānubhāveneti? atha khalu buddhānubhāvena śakro devānāmindra āyuṣmata ānandasya cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya āyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - buddhānubhāvo 'yamāryānanda veditavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:491_5: evam etat yathā śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa bhāṣitam /
S06bsu049_u:496_0: atha khalu bhagavān punarapyāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - yasmin khalu punarānanda samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:496_2: prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, tasmin ānanda samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:496_3: te sarve saṃśayitā bhavanti - kimayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'ntarā bhūtakoṭiṃ sākṣātkariṣyati śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā,
S06bsu049_u:496_5: punaraparamānanda tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ śokaśalyaviddhā bhavanti yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati /
S06bsu049_u:496_6: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:496_8: prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati, tasmin samaye mārāḥ pāpīyāṃso bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya viheṭhāmupasaṃharanti,
S06bsu049_u:496_10: digdāhānupadarśayanti - apyeva nāma ayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'valīyeta vā romaharṣo vā asya bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:496_12: tatra ānanda na sarvasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:497_0: ānanda āha - kiyadrūpasya bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya upasaṃkrāmati māraḥ pāpīyān viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ? bhagavānāha - yena ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvāntataḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmadhimukticittaṃ notpāditaṃ bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:497_1: asya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:498_0: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ saṃśayaprāpto bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:498_2: evaṃ na vā syāditi, asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:499_0: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kalyāṇamitravirahito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:499_2: sa gambhīrāṇi gambhīrāṇi sthānāni prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na śṛṇoti,
S06bsu049_u:499_3: aśṛṇvanna jānāti, ajānanna paripṛcchati - kathaṃ prajñāpāramitā bhāvayitavyeti,
S06bsu049_u:499_4: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:500_0: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'saddharmaparigrāhakamālīno bhavati - eṣa mama sahāyakaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:500_2: bahavo 'pi bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mamānye 'pi sahāyakāḥ santi /
S06bsu049_u:500_4: ayaṃ tu mayā pratirūpaḥ sahāyo labdhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:500_6: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:501_0: [Vaidya_207] punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'syāṃ gambhīrāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāmanyaṃ bodhisattvamevaṃ vadet - gambhīrā bateyaṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:501_1: kiṃ tavainayā śrutayā? na hyevamatra yujyamānamanyeṣu sūtrānteṣu yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitam /
S06bsu049_u:501_3: kiṃ tavainayā śrutayā likhitayā veti? evamanyān api bodhisattvān mahāsattvān vivecayate /
S06bsu049_u:501_4: asyāpyānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya māraḥ pāpīyānupasaṃkrāmati viheṭhanābhiprāyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:502_0: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nyān bodhisattvānavamanyate - ahaṃ vivekavihāreṇa viharāmi,
S06bsu049_u:502_3: tasminnānanda samaye māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:503_0: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāmagrahaṇaṃ vā gotragrahaṇaṃ vā dhutaguṇaparikīrtanaṃ vā bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:503_1: evaṃ sa tāvanmātrakeṇa tato 'nyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān peśalān kalyāṇadharmaṇo 'vamanyate /
S06bsu049_u:503_2: te ca tasya guṇā na saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:503_3: ye 'vinivartanīyānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ guṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:503_4: te ākārāstāni liṅgāni tāni nimittāni tasya na saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:503_6: yaduta ātmānamutkrośayati, parān paṃsayati - na khalvete teṣu dharmeṣu saṃdṛśyante,
S06bsu049_u:503_7: yatrāhaṃ saṃdṛśya iti / tatra mārāṇāṃ pāpīyasāmevaṃ bhavati - na śūnyāni mārabhavanāni bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:503_8: utsadāni bhaviṣyanti / mahānirayāstiryañcaḥ pretaviṣayā āsurāś ca kāyā utsadā bhaviṣyantīti /
S06bsu049_u:503_10: yathā te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā evaṃ pravṛttā adhyākrāntā lābhasatkāreṇa bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:503_13: teṣāṃ ca sa mahājanaḥ śrotavyaṃ śraddhātavyaṃ maṃsyate /
S06bsu049_u:503_18: evaṃ te na tathatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā na tathatāyāṃ pratipadyamānā na tathatāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānāḥ saṃkleśaṃ vivardhayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:503_19: evaṃ te viparyastayā cittasaṃtatyā yadyadeva karma ārapsyante kāyena vā vācā vā manasā vā,
S06bsu049_u:503_24: imamapyānanda arthavaśaṃ saṃpaśyan māraḥ pāpīyāṃstuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:504_0: punaraparamānanda yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:504_1: tasmin [Vaidya_208] samaye mārasya pāpīyasa evaṃ bhavati - dūrīkariṣyati batāyaṃ kulaputraḥ sarvajñatām,
S06bsu049_u:504_2: atidūre sthāsyati sarvajñatāyāḥ sacetpunarbodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo 'nyena bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyati vivadati vigṛhṇīte ākrośati paribhāṣate vyāpadyate doṣamutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:504_3: tatra māraḥ pāpīyān bhūyasyā mātrayā tuṣṭo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:504_5: evaṃ cāsya bhavati - ubhāvapyetau bodhisattvau dūre sthāsyataḥ sarvajñatāyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:505_0: punaraparamānanda yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo vyākṛto 'vyākṛtena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ kalahāyet vivadet vigṛhṇīyāt ākrośet paribhāṣeta vyāpadyeta doṣamutpādayet,
S06bsu049_u:505_1: cittaṃ cāghātayet, tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena cittotpāde tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnāhyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:506_0: evamukte āyuṣmānānando bhagavantametadavocat - asti bhagavaṃsteṣāṃ cittotpādānāṃ kiṃcinniḥsaraṇam,
S06bsu049_u:506_1: utāho tāvata eva kalpānavaśyaṃ tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ? bhagavānāha - saniḥsaraṇamānanda mayā dharmo deśitaḥ śrāvakayānikānāṃ pratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ ca pudgalānām /
S06bsu049_u:506_2: tatra ānanda yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya na pratideśayati,
S06bsu049_u:506_4: anuśayaṃ vahati, anuśayabaddho viharati, nāhamānanda tasya pudgalasya niḥsaraṇaṃ vadāmi /
S06bsu049_u:506_5: avaśyaṃ tena ānanda pudgalena punareva tāvata eva kalpān saṃnāhaḥ saṃnahyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:506_6: yaḥ punarānanda bodhisattvayānikaḥ pudgalo bodhisattvayānikena pudgalena sārdhaṃ kalahāyitvā vivaditvā vigṛhya ākruśya paribhāṣya vyāpadya doṣamutpādya pratideśayati,
S06bsu049_u:506_8: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayati - yena mayā sarvasattvānāṃ vigrahā vivādā virodhā utsārayitavyā nidhyāpayitavyāḥ praśamayitavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:506_13: so 'haṃ pareṣu tvamity api vācaṃ bhāṣe,
S06bsu049_u:506_14: paruṣaṃ vā karkaśaṃ vā prativaco dadāmi /
S06bsu049_u:506_17: parato duruktāni durāgatāni durbhāṣitāni bhāṣyamāṇāni śṛṇvatā cittaṃ nāghātayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:506_19: na caitanmamāṃ pratirūpam, yo 'haṃ parasya doṣāntaraṃ saṃjāne /
S06bsu049_u:506_20: etad api me na pratirūpam, yadahaṃ pareṣa doṣāntaram api śrotavyaṃ manye /
S06bsu049_u:506_21: tatkasya hetoḥ? na mayā adhyāśayo vikopayitavyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:506_24: sa nāmāhaṃ vyāpadye / na ca mayā svaparāddheṣv api pareṣu vyāpattavyam /
S06bsu049_u:506_26: idaṃ mayā na karaṇīyam / dṛḍhaparākramatayā parākrāntavyam /
S06bsu049_u:506_27: na ca mayā jīvitāntarāye 'pi kriyamāṇe kṣobhaḥ karaṇīyaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:506_30: evaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śrāvakayānikānām api pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam,
S06bsu049_u:506_33: kathaṃ cānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena apareṣāṃ bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāmantike sthātavyam? tadyathāpi nāma ānanda śāstari /
S06bsu049_u:506_34: ete mama bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śāstāra ityevaṃ sthātavyam /
S06bsu049_u:506_39: yatraibhiḥ śikṣitavyam, tatra mayā śikṣitavyam / yathaiva caibhiḥ śikṣitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:506_40: tathaiva mayā śikṣitavyam / sacetpunareṣāṃ kaścidvyavakīrṇavihāreṇa vihariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:506_43: mayāpyevaṃ śikṣitavyam / evaṃ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ānanda bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antarāyo na bhavatyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:511_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kva punarbhagavan śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate? bhagavānāha - sacetsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:511_1: sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate / evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau /
S06bsu049_u:511_3: sarvajñatāyāṃ śikṣate / subhūtirāha - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām,
S06bsu049_u:511_4: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣaye śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:511_5: evamanutpāde 'nirodhe 'jātau abhāve viveke virāge ākāśe dharmadhātau nirvāṇe śikṣamāṇaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyāmiti? tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:511_6: api nu sā kṣīyate? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:511_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan kṣayaḥ kṣīyate /
S06bsu049_u:511_8: akṣayo hi bhagavan kṣayaḥ / bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:511_9: api nu sā utpadyate vā nirudhyate vā jāyate vā bhavati vā vibhavati vā vivicyate vā rajyate vā virajyate vā ākāśībhavati vā dharmībhavati vā? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:511_10: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yā tathāgatasya tathatā yayā tathatayā tathāgatastathāgata iti prabhāvyate,
S06bsu049_u:511_11: api nu sā nirvāti? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:511_12: bhagavānāha - tasmāttarhi subhūte evaṃ śikṣamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ na tathatā kṣīyate ityevaṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:511_13: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate sarvajñatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:511_15: śikṣate buddhabhūmau, śikṣate baleṣu, śikṣate vaiśāradyeṣu, śikṣate sarvabuddhadharmeṣu, śikṣate sarvajñajñāne / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvaśikṣāpāramitāmanuprāpsyati /
S06bsu049_u:511_16: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na śakyo māreṇa vā māraparṣadā vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhirabhimarditum /
S06bsu049_u:511_18: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipraṃ bodhimaṇḍe niṣatsyati /
S06bsu049_u:511_19: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svake gocare carati /
S06bsu049_u:511_20: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate nāthakarakeṣu dharmeṣu,
S06bsu049_u:511_21: śikṣate mahāmaitryām, mahākaruṇāyāṃ śikṣate, mahāmuditāyāṃ śikṣate, mahopekṣāyāṃ śikṣate / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śikṣate triparivartasya dvādaśākārasya dharmacakrasya pravartanāya /
S06bsu049_u:511_22: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadhātuṃ nonīkariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:511_23: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastathāgatavaṃśasyānupacchedāya śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:511_24: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'mṛtadhātudvāraṃ vivariṣyāmīti śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:511_25: neyaṃ subhūte udārā [Vaidya_211] śikṣā śakyā hīnasattvena śikṣitum /
S06bsu049_u:511_26: na hi alpasthāmnā śakyamasyāṃ śikṣāyāṃ śikṣitum /
S06bsu049_u:511_27: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvasattvasārā hi te subhūte,
S06bsu049_u:511_30: ya iha śikṣante / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na nirayeṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:511_31: na tiryagyoniṣūpapadyate, na pretaviṣayeṣūpapadyate, nāsureṣu kāyeṣūpapadyate, na pratyantajanapadeṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:511_32: na caṇḍālakuleṣūpapadyate, na śākunikakuleṣūpapadyate, na niṣādadhīvaraurabhrikakuleṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:511_34: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo nāndho bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:511_35: na badhiro bhavati, na kāṇo bhavati, na kuṇṭho bhavati, na kubjo bhavati, na kuṇirbhavati, na laṅgo bhavati, na khañjo bhavati, na jaḍo bhavati, na lolo bhavati, na lollo bhavati, na kallo bhavati, na hīnāṅgo bhavati, na vikalāṅgo bhavati, na vikṛtāṅgo bhavati, na durbalo bhavati, na durvarṇo bhavati, na duḥsaṃsthāno bhavati, na hīnendriyo bhavati, na vikalendriyo bhavati / sarvākāraparipūrṇendriyo bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:511_36: svarasaṃpanno bhavati / evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na prāṇātipātī bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:511_37: nādattādāyī bhavati, na kāmamithyācārī bhavati, na mṛṣāvādī bhavati, na piśunavāgbhavati, na paruṣavāgbhavati, na saṃbhinnapralāpī bhavati, nābhidhyālurbhavati, na vyāpannacitto bhavati, na mithyādṛṣṭiko bhavati, na mithyājīvena jīvikāṃ kalpayati /
S06bsu049_u:511_38: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate,
S06bsu049_u:511_42: tatkasya hetoḥ? asti hi tasyopāyakauśalyaṃ yenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na dīrghāyuṣkeṣu deveṣūpapadyate /
S06bsu049_u:511_43: tatpunaḥ subhūte upāyakauśalyaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya katamat? yaduta iyameva prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:511_45: yathā anyenopāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhyānāni ca samāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:511_47: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
S06bsu049_u:512_0: āyuṣmān subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavan sarvadharmā evaṃ prakṛtipariśuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:512_1: tatkatamasya bhagavan dharmasya bodhisattvo mahāsattvo balapariśuddhiṃ nigacchati,
S06bsu049_u:512_5: evam etat / tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi subhūte prakṛtyaiva pariśuddhāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:512_6: evaṃ subhūte prakṛtipariśuddheṣu sarvadharmeṣu bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya yā asaṃsīdanatā anavalīnatā,
S06bsu049_u:512_8: evaṃ subhūte bālapṛthagjanā enān dharmānajānanto 'paśyanto dharmāṇāṃ dharmatāṃ na jānanti,
S06bsu049_u:512_9: na paśyanti / teṣāṃ sattvānāṃ [Vaidya_212] kṛtaśaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vyāyacchante,
S06bsu049_u:512_11: vayamevamapaśyakān sattvān paśyayiṣyāmaḥ ityatra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣante /
S06bsu049_u:512_12: atra śikṣāyāṃ śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā balānyanuprāpnuvanti,
S06bsu049_u:512_14: evaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ parasattvānāṃ parapudgalānāṃ cittacaritavispanditāni yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti /
S06bsu049_u:512_16: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte alpakāste mahāpṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīpradeśāḥ ye 'pagatapāṣāṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:512_17: yatra suvarṇaṃ vā jātarūpaṃ vā rajataṃ votpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:512_20: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:512_22: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:513_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:513_2: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:513_4: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:513_7: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:514_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:514_2: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:514_4: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:514_6: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:515_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte tadyathāpi nāma alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:515_2: atha khalu bahutarakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:515_4: evameva subhūte alpakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:515_6: atha khalu bahutarakāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:515_8: tasmāttarhi subhūte alpakāste sattvāḥ sattvanikāye saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:515_12: [Vaidya_213] tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpatarakebhyastathatvāya pratipadyamānebhyo 'lpatamāste ye prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyante /
S06bsu049_u:515_13: tebhyo 'pi subhūte alpatamebhyaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogamāpadyamānebhyo 'lpatamāste bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:515_15: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ya ete 'lpatamebhyo 'lpatamā avinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:515_16: teṣu gaṇanāṃ gantukāmena ihaiva prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:516_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya na khilasahagataṃ cittamutpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:516_8: evaṃ hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitā saṃgṛhītā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:516_12: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte satkāyadṛṣṭau dvāṣaṣṭidṛṣṭigatānyantargatāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:516_13: evameva subhūte prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasyāṃ sarvāḥ pāramitā antargatā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:516_14: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye pravartamāne sarvāṇīndriyāṇyantargatāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:516_15: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya sarvakuśalā dharmā antargatā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:516_16: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣasya jīvitendriye niruddhe sarvāṇīndriyāṇi niruddhāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:516_17: evameva subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇasya ajñāne niruddhe sarve 'kuśalā dharmā niruddhā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:516_18: sarvāś ca tadanyāḥ pāramitā antargatāḥ parigṛhītā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:516_19: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ parigrahītukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:516_20: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānāmagratāyāṃ śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:516_22: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yāvantastrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvāḥ sattvasaṃgraheṇa saṃgṛhyamāṇāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:516_23: api nu te bahavo bhavanti? subhūtirāha - jāmbūdvīpakā eva tāvadbhagavan bahavaḥ sattvā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:516_24: kaḥ punarvādo ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ /
