S06bsu049_u:516_25: bhagavānāha - yaḥ subhūte eko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvajjīvaṃ tiṣṭhaṃstān sarvasattvān cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sarvasukhopadhānaiścopatiṣṭhet,
S06bsu049_u:516_26: tatkiṃ manyase subhūte api nu sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati? subhūtirāha - bahu bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:516_27: bahu sugata / bhagavānāha - ataḥ sa subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvastatonidānaṃ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati,
S06bsu049_u:516_29: tatkasya hetoḥ? evaṃ mahārthikā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārikā /
S06bsu049_u:516_30: tasmāttarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena sarvasattvānāmanuttaratāṃ gantukāmena sarvasattvānāmanāthānāṃ nāthena bhavitukāmena [Vaidya_214] buddhaviṣayamanuprāptukāmena buddhavṛṣabhitāmanugantukāmena buddhavikrīḍitaṃ vikrīḍitukāmena buddhasiṃhanādaṃ naditukāmena buddhasaṃpattimanuprāptukāmena trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau dharmasāṃkathyaṃ kartukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:516_31: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ subhūte śikṣamāṇasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāhaṃ tāṃ saṃpattiṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:516_32: yā tena na śikṣitā bhavati / subhūtirāha - kiṃ punarbhagavan śrāvakasaṃpattir api tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati? bhagavānāha - śrāvakasaṃpattir api subhūte tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena śikṣitā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:516_33: na khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śrāvakasaṃpatyāṃ sthāsyāmīti śikṣate,
S06bsu049_u:516_36: tān api sa jānāti, na ca tatrāvatiṣṭhate / evaṃ ca vyavacārayati, na ca prativahati - mayāpyete śrāvakaguṇā deśayitavyāḥ prakāśayitavyā iti śikṣate /
S06bsu049_u:516_37: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya dakṣiṇīyatāṃ gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:516_38: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvāṃstato 'nyān dakṣiṇīyān śrāvakapratisaṃyuktān pratyekabuddhapratisaṃyuktāṃścābhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:516_40: evaṃ śikṣamāṇaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na riñcati,
S06bsu049_u:516_42: evaṃ caran subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'parihāṇadharmā aparihāṇadharmeti veditavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:516_45: sacetpunarasyaivaṃ bhavati - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā imāṃ sarvajñatāmāhariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:516_46: ityevaṃ saṃjānīte, carati prajñāpāramitām / atha tām api prajñāpāramitāṃ na saṃjānīte - iyaṃ sā prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:516_48: evam api subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃjānīte,
S06bsu049_u:516_49: na samanupaśyati / sacedevaṃ carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:521_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - caranneva tāvadayaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvasattvānabhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:521_1: kaḥ punarvādo yadā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddho bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:521_6: spṛhaṇīyāste sattvā ye sattvasārā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyante /
S06bsu049_u:522_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyabhinirmāya puṣpāṇāmañjaliṃ kṛtvā tathāgatamarhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhamabhyavākirat,
S06bsu049_u:522_1: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - yairbodhisattvayānikaiḥ pudgalairanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam - anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyāmahe,
S06bsu049_u:522_2: abhisaṃbudhya sarvasattvān mahatā saṃsārārṇavenohyamānān same pārime tīre pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāma iti,
S06bsu049_u:522_9: yatte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā mahākaruṇayā samanvāgatā vivarteran anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheriti /
S06bsu049_u:522_10: na me bhagavan ekacittotpādo 'pyutpadyate yatte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:522_11: tato vivarteran / iti yadbhūyasyā mātrayā praṇidhiṃ janayiṣyantyanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau imāni saṃsārāvacarāṇi duḥkhāni sattvānāṃ saṃpaśyantaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:522_12: tatkasya hetoḥ? tayā mahākaruṇayā arthakāmā hitakāmā hi te sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasyānukampakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:522_13: ye imairevaṃrūpaiścittotpādaiḥ samanvāgatāḥ kimiti vayaṃ tīrṇāḥ sattvāṃstārayema,
S06bsu049_u:522_14: muktā mocayema, āśvastā āśvāsayema, parinirvṛtāḥ parinirvāpayema,
S06bsu049_u:522_16: yasteṣāṃ bhagavan prathamayānasaṃprasthitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ cittotpādānanumodate,
S06bsu049_u:522_19: kiyatsa bhagavan kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sumeroḥ parvatarājasya palāgreṇa tulyamānasya pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:522_20: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:522_21: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta cāturmahādvīpake lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:522_22: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:522_23: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta sāhasre cūlike lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:522_24: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:522_25: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta [Vaidya_216] dvisāhasre madhyame lokadhātau palāgreṇa tulyamāne pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:522_26: na tveva kauśika tasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:522_27: syātkhalu punaḥ kauśika śakyeta trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau tulyamāne palāgreṇa pramāṇaṃ grahītum,
S06bsu049_u:522_28: na tveva kauśika tasya kulaputrasya vā kuladuhiturvā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyapramāṇaṃ grahītum /
S06bsu049_u:523_0: evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - mārādhiṣṭhitāste bhagavan sattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:523_1: ye bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prathamacittotpādamupādāya yāvadanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbuddhānāmevamaprameyamanumodanāsahagatasya cittotpādasya puṇyamiti na śṛṇvanti,
S06bsu049_u:523_2: na jānanti, na paśyanti, tāmanumodanāṃ na samanvāharanti /
S06bsu049_u:523_5: mārabhavanebhyaś ca te bhagavan sattvāścyutā bhaviṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:523_7: tatkasya hetoḥ? mārabhavanavidhvaṃsanakarā hi tairbhagavan ime cittotpādā abhinirhṛtāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:523_13: dharmo 'parityaktaḥ, saṃgho 'parityaktaḥ, taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:524_2: dharmo 'parityaktaḥ, saṃgho 'parityaktaḥ, taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:524_3: yaiḥ kauśika kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittopādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
S06bsu049_u:524_5: na virāgayiṣyanti / evamukte śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - evametadbhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:524_6: evametatsugata / yaiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhiśceme cittotpādā anumoditā bodhisattvayānikairvā pratyekabuddhayānikairvā śrāvakayānikairvā,
S06bsu049_u:524_10: gurukṛtāś ca bhaviṣyanti, mānitāś ca bhaviṣyanti, pūjitāś ca bhaviṣyanti, arcitāś ca bhaviṣyanti, apacāyitāś ca bhaviṣyanti / na ca te amanaāpāni rūpāṇi drakṣyanti
S06bsu049_u:524_12: na ca te amanaāpān gandhān ghrāsyanti /
S06bsu049_u:524_13: na ca te amanaāpān rasān paribhokṣyante /
S06bsu049_u:524_14: na ca te amanaāpāni spraṣṭavyāni sprakṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:524_17: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi taiḥ kulaputraiḥ kuladuhitṛbhirvā sarvasattvasukhāvahānyaprameyāṇāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni yair api bhagavaṃśchandamutpādya bodhaye bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:524_18: teṣāṃ te cittotpādā [Vaidya_217] vivardhamānā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherāhārakā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:524_22: yena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ te cittotpādā anumoditāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:524_23: anena kauśika paryāyeṇa tena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ tāṃścittotpādānanumodya aprameyāṇāṃ sattvānāmasaṃkhyeyānāṃ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyanumoditāni bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:525_0: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ ca bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittamanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyopamaṃ cittam? subhūtirāha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:525_1: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte samanupaśyasi tvaṃ māyām? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:525_2: nāhaṃ bhagavan māyopamaṃ cittaṃ nāpi māyāṃ samanupaśyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:525_3: bhagavānāha - tatkiṃ manyase subhūte yanna māyāṃ nāpi māyopamaṃ cittaṃ samanupaśyasi,
S06bsu049_u:525_4: tatkiṃ tvamanyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyasi yo dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? āha - no hīdaṃ bhagavan /
S06bsu049_u:525_5: nāhaṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmaṃ samanupaśyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:525_7: so 'haṃ bhagavan anyatra māyāyā māyopamādvā cittāt taṃ dharmasamanuśyan katamaṃ dharmamupadekṣyāmi astīti vā nāstīti vā? yaś ca atyantavivikto dharmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:525_8: na so 'stīti vā nāstīti vā upaiti /
S06bsu049_u:525_11: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan asaṃvidyamāno dharmo 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:525_14: nāsau dharmo bhāvayitavyaḥ / nāpyasau kasyaciddharmasyāvāhako vā nirvāhako vā /
S06bsu049_u:525_15: kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'tyantaviviktāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate? anuttarāpi nāma bhagavan samyaksaṃbodhiratyantaviviktā /
S06bsu049_u:525_18: tadā kathaṃ bhagavan viviktena viviktamabhisaṃbuddhaṃ bhavati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sādhu sādhu subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:525_19: evametatsubhūte, evam etat / atyantaviviktā subhūte prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:525_24: na sā prajñāpāramitā syāt / evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate,
S06bsu049_u:526_1: tathā gambhīre bhagavan arthe carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:526_3: evam etat / gambhīre 'rthe subhūte carati bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:526_5: yo gambhīre 'rthe carati, taṃ cārthaṃ na sākṣātkaroti yaduta śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā /
S06bsu049_u:527_2: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi bhagavan sa eva dharmo nopalabhyate yaḥ sākṣātkuryāt,
S06bsu049_u:527_5: sacedbhagavan evaṃ bhāṣyamāṇo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06bsu049_u:527_6: nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate, na vipṛṣṭhībhavati, notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:527_8: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / āsannā me 'nuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiriti sacedevamati na samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:527_9: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / dūrīkṛtā me śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmirveti sacedasyaivam api na bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:527_10: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan ākāśasya naivaṃ bhavati - kasyacidahamāsannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:527_11: kasyacidvā dūra iti / tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādbhagavan ākāśasya /
S06bsu049_u:527_12: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarāṃ samyaksabodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:527_13: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:527_15: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan māyāpuruṣasya naivaṃ bhavati - māyākāro mamāsannaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:527_16: yaḥ punaranyo janakāyaḥ saṃnipatitaḥ sa mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:527_18: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:527_19: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:527_21: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan pratibhāsasya naivaṃ bhavati - yenārambaṇena pratibhāsa utpadyate tanmamāsanne,
S06bsu049_u:527_22: ye tu khalu punaratra nopasaṃkrāntā ādarśe vā udakapātre vā te mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:527_24: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya naivaṃ bhavati - anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirmamāsannā,
S06bsu049_u:527_25: śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūra iti /
S06bsu049_u:527_27: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatasya kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā na saṃvidyate,
S06bsu049_u:527_29: evameva bhagavan prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya na kaścitpriyo vā apriyo vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:527_33: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavaṃstathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena yo nirmitako nirmitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:527_34: na tasyaivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre,
S06bsu049_u:527_37: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ carato naivaṃ bhavati - śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca mama dūre,
S06bsu049_u:527_40: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan sa nirmitako yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśo nirmitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:527_41: tatkṛtyaṃ karoti / sa ca nirmitako 'vikalpaḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādeva nirmitasya /
S06bsu049_u:527_42: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06bsu049_u:527_43: tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti, sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā /
S06bsu049_u:527_45: tadyathāpi nāma bhagavan dakṣeṇa palagaṇḍena vā palagaṇḍāntevāsinā vā dārumayī strī vā puruṣo vā yantrayuktaḥ kṛto bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:527_47: tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti / sa ca dārusaṃghāto 'vikalpaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:527_49: evameva bhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yasya kṛtyasya kṛtaśa imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,
S06bsu049_u:527_50: tacca kṛtyaṃ karoti, sā ca prajñāpāramitā avikalpā /
S06bsu049_u:527_51: tatkasya hetoḥ? avikalpatvādeva bhagavan asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā iti /
S06bsu049_u:532_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati,
S06bsu049_u:532_2: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirāyuṣmantaṃ śāriputrametadavocat - sāre batāyamāyuṣman śāriputra bodhisattvo mahāsattvaścarati,
S06bsu049_u:533_0: atha khalu saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāmetadabhavat - namaskartavyāste sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:533_5: anenāpi paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:533_8: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtisteṣāṃ saṃbahulānāṃ kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrasahasrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkamājñāya tāni saṃbahulāni kāmāvacarāṇāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ sahasrāṇyāmantrayante sma - nedaṃ devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaram,
S06bsu049_u:533_10: idaṃ tu devaputrāsteṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ duṣkaraṃ caiva paramaduṣkaraṃ caiva,
S06bsu049_u:533_11: yadaprameyānasaṃkhyeyānapramāṇān sattvān parinirvāpayiṣyāma iti saṃnāhaṃ saṃnahyante /
S06bsu049_u:533_12: te ca sattvā atyantatayā na saṃvidyante,
S06bsu049_u:533_13: asaṃvidyamānā nopalabhyante, sattvaviviktatvāt / evaṃ vainayikā atyantatayā na saṃvidyante /
S06bsu049_u:533_14: evaṃ ca bodhisattvā mahāsattvā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitāḥ sattvān vineṣyāma iti,
S06bsu049_u:533_15: ākāśaṃ sa devaputrā vinetavyaṃ manyeta yaḥ sattvān vinetavyān manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:533_16: tatkasya hetoḥ? ākāśaviviktatayā hi devaputrāḥ sattvaviviktatā veditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:533_17: anena devaputrāḥ paryāyeṇa duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:533_19: ākāśena na sa devaputrāḥ sārdhaṃ veditavyaṃ manyeta,
S06bsu049_u:533_20: yaḥ sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnāhaṃ saṃnaddhavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:533_21: ayaṃ ca saṃnāho bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sattvānāṃ kṛtaśaḥ saṃnaddhaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:533_25: sacedatraivaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati,
S06bsu049_u:533_27: tatkasya hetoḥ? sattvaviviktatayā hi rūpaviviktatā veditavyā /
S06bsu049_u:533_32: evaṃ devaputrāḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati /
S06bsu049_u:534_0: atha khalu bhagavān jānanneva āyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - kiṃ kāraṇaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati? subhūtirāha - [Vaidya_221] viviktatvādbhagavanna saṃsīdati /
S06bsu049_u:534_1: anena bhagavan kāranena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sarvadharmaviviktatāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ na saṃsīdati /
S06bsu049_u:534_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi bhagavan kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:534_4: yaḥ saṃsīdet / so 'pi bhagavan dharmo nopalabhyeta,
S06bsu049_u:534_7: evam etat / api tu khalu punaḥ subhūte sacedevaṃ bhāṣyamāṇe deśyamāne nirdiśyamāne evamupadiśyamāne bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na saṃsīdati na viṣīdati na viṣādamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:534_8: nāvalīyate na saṃlīyate, na vipṛṣṭhīkaroti mānasam, na bhagnapṛṣṭhīkaroti, notrasyati na saṃtrasyati na saṃtrāsamāpadyate,
S06bsu049_u:534_10: evametatsugata / sacedbhagavan bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:534_11: carati prajñāpāramitāyām / evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti /
S06bsu049_u:534_12: bhagavānāha - na kevalaṃ subhūte evaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ sendrakā devāḥ sabrahmakāḥ saprajāpatikāḥ seśānāḥ sarṣinaranārīgaṇā ārātprāñjalībhūtā namasyanti,
S06bsu049_u:534_13: ye 'pi te subhūte brahmakāyikā devā brahmapurohitā brahmapārṣadyā mahābrahmāṇaḥ parīttābhā apramāṇābhā ābhāsvarāḥ parīttaśubhā apramāṇaśubhāḥ śubhakṛtsnā anabhrakāḥ puṇyaprasavā bṛhatphalā asaṃjñisattvā abṛhā atapāḥ sudṛśāḥ sudarśanā akaniṣṭhāś ca devāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:534_14: te 'pi subhūte taṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ evaṃ carantaṃ namasyanti /
S06bsu049_u:534_15: ye 'pi te subhūte aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:534_16: te 'pi buddhā bhagavantaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāmevaṃ carantaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ buddhacakṣuṣā paśyanti /
S06bsu049_u:534_17: te ca subhūte bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantamanugṛhṇanti,
S06bsu049_u:534_18: samanvāharanti / ye ca khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantastathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanugṛhyante samanvāhriyante,
S06bsu049_u:534_19: te te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodherdhārayitavyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:534_20: na ca teṣāmantarāyā utpatsyante mārato vā anyato vā /
S06bsu049_u:534_21: tatkasya hetoḥ? ye subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:534_23: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte /
S06bsu049_u:534_24: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:534_25: tiṣṭhantu khalu punaḥ subhūte trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasattvā mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:534_26: yāvanta subhūte gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu sattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:534_28: ekaikaś ca māraḥ pāpīyāṃstāvatīreva mārasenā abhinirmimīte,
S06bsu049_u:534_29: te 'pi subhūte mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsastasya buddhasamanvāhṛtasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato na pratibalā antarāyaṃ kartumanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:534_30: dvābhyāṃ subhūte dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye durdharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:534_31: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām? yaduta sarvasattvāścāsya aparityaktā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:534_32: sarvadharmāś ca anena śūnyatāto vyavalokitā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:534_33: [Vaidya_222] ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:534_34: aparābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ dharmābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:534_35: katamābhyāṃ dvābhyām? yaduta yathāvādī tathākārī ca bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:534_37: ābhyāṃ subhūte dvābhyāṃ samanvāgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo durgharṣo bhavati māraiḥ pāpīyobhirmārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:534_38: evaṃ carataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya devā apyupasaṃkramitavyaṃ maṃsyante /
S06bsu049_u:534_41: paryupāsitavyaṃ maṃsyante, utsāhaṃ cāsya vardhayiṣyanti - kṣipraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyase /
S06bsu049_u:534_42: tasmāttarhi kulaputra anenaiva vihāreṇa vihara yaduta prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:534_43: tatkasya hetoḥ? etenaiva hi tvaṃ kulaputra vihāreṇa viharan anāthānāṃ sattvānāṃ nātho bhaviṣyasi,
S06bsu049_u:534_53: evaṃ te devaputrāstasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyotsāhaṃ vardhayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:534_54: tatkasya hetoḥ? etena hi subhūte prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ye te 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:534_55: te 'pi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtā bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharatastasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ebhirevaṃrūpairguṇaiḥ samanvāgatasya yaduta prajñāpāramitāviharaṇaguṇaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:534_56: buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:534_58: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte ahametarhi ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya,
S06bsu049_u:534_59: śikhino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpo dharmaṃ deśayāmi,
S06bsu049_u:534_60: udānaṃ codānayāmi apareṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānām,
S06bsu049_u:534_61: ya etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caranti /
S06bsu049_u:534_62: evameva subhūte te 'pi buddhā bhagavanto ye etarhi iha mama buddhakṣetre bodhisattvā mahāsattvā brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:534_64: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:535_0: subhūtirāha - kiṃ sarveṣāmeva bhagavan bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:535_1: udānaṃ codānayanti? bhagavānāha - no hīdaṃ subhūte /
S06bsu049_u:535_2: na subhūte sarveṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpāste buddhā bhagavanto dharmaṃ [Vaidya_223] deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:535_3: udānaṃ codānayanti, kiṃ tarhi subhūte ye te 'vinivartanīyā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvasaṅgavigatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:535_4: teṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:535_5: subhūtirāha - santi bhagavan avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā tato 'nye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:535_6: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:535_7: udānaṃ codānayanti? bhagavānāha - santi subhūte pratipakṣabalino bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalāḥ avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā,
S06bsu049_u:535_8: yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:535_9: udānaṃ codānayanti / te punaḥ katame? ye etarhi akṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacārikāṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:535_10: anuśikṣamāṇarūpā viharanti, ime te subhūte bodhisattvayānikāḥ pudgalā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:535_11: udānaṃ codānayanti / ye 'pi te subhūte ratnaketorbodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya bodhisattvacaryāmanuśikṣamāṇarūpā bodhisattvacaryāṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:535_12: anuśikṣamāṇā viharanti, ime 'pi te subhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā avinivartanīyān bodhisattvān mahāsattvān sthāpayitvā yeṣāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:536_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carantaḥ sarvadharmā anutpattikā ityadhimuñcanti,
S06bsu049_u:536_4: anenāpi subhūte vihāreṇa viharatāṃ teṣāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:536_5: udānaṃ codānayanti / yeṣāṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ ca rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:536_6: udānaṃ codānayanti, prahīṇā teṣāṃ śrāvakabhūmiḥ pratyekabuddhabhūmiś ca /
S06bsu049_u:536_9: tatkasya hetoḥ? yeṣāṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ te buddhā bhagavanto nāma ca gotraṃ ca balaṃ ca varṇaṃ na rūpaṃ ca parikīrtayamānarūpā dharmaṃ deśayanti,
S06bsu049_u:537_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte ye bodhisattvā mahāsattvā imāṃ gambhīrāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāṃ śrutvā adhimokṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:537_1: na dhandhāyiṣyanti, na kāṅkṣiṣyanti, na vicikitsiṣyanti, evametadyathā tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena bhāṣitamityadhimucya vistareṇa śroṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:537_2: evaṃ ca cittamutpādayiṣyanti - [Vaidya_224] imāṃ vayaṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntikādvistareṇa śṛṇuyāmeti,
S06bsu049_u:537_3: teṣāṃ ca bodhisattvayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ ye cāsya buddhakṣetre brahmacaryaṃ caranti,
S06bsu049_u:537_5: te 'pyenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmadhimucyamānā yathā tathāgatena bhāṣitā tathā cādhimokṣyante,
S06bsu049_u:537_7: evaṃ subhūte bahukaraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ śravaṇam api vadāmi,
S06bsu049_u:537_10: tathatvāya pratipatsyante / tathatvāya sthitvā tathatvāya pratipadya tiṣṭhanti tathatāyām /
S06bsu049_u:537_11: tathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhantaḥ sarvajñatāyāṃ ca dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S06bsu049_u:538_0: subhūtirāha - yadā bhagavaṃstathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:538_1: tadā ko 'yaṃ bhagavan dharmaḥ sthāsyati tathatāyām,
S06bsu049_u:538_3: ko vā ayamimaṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yatsubhūte evaṃ vadasi - yadā tathatāvinirmukto nānyaḥ kaściddharma upalabhyate,
S06bsu049_u:538_14: abhisaṃbhotsyate vā, abhisaṃbudhyate vā / na subhūte tathatā dharmaṃ deśayati /
S06bsu049_u:539_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - gambhīrā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:539_3: tatkasya hetoḥ? na ca nāma bhagavan kaściddharmastathatāyāṃ tiṣṭhati,
S06bsu049_u:540_0: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtiḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkauśika evaṃ vadasi - duṣkarakārakā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:540_1: yeṣāmevaṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣu bhāṣyamāṇeṣu na bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:540_3: sarvadharmeṣu kauśika śūnyeṣu kasyātra kāṅkṣāyitatā vā bhavati dhandhāyitatā vā bhavati? śakra āha - yadyadeva āryasubhūtirnirdiśati,
S06bsu049_u:540_5: na ca kvacitsajjati / tadyathāpi nāma antarīkṣe iṣuḥ kṣipto naiva kvacitsajjati,
S06bsu049_u:541_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindro bhagavantametadavocat - kaccidahaṃ bhagavan subhūtiṃ sthaviramārabhya evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavāmi dharmavādī ca,
S06bsu049_u:541_1: dharmasya cānudharmaṃ vyākurvan vyākaromi? evamukte bhagavān śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - yatkhalu [Vaidya_225] tvaṃ kauśika evaṃ bhāṣase - evametatkauśika,
S06bsu049_u:541_2: evam etat / evaṃ bhāṣamāṇaṃ evaṃ nirdiśaṃstathāgatasyoktavādī bhavasi dharmavādī ca,
S06bsu049_u:541_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? yadyadeva hi kauśika subhūteḥ sthavirasya pratibhāti,
S06bsu049_u:541_6: tatkasya hetoḥ? subhūtirhi kauśika sthaviraḥ prajñāpāramitām api tāvanna samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:541_17: balānyeva tāvannopalabhate, kutaḥ punaryo balasamaṅgī bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:541_20: dharmameva tāvannopalabhate, kutaḥ punaryo dharmaṃ deśayiṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:541_21: sarvadharmaviviktavihāreṇa sarvadharmānupalambhavihāreṇa hi kauśika subhūtiḥ sthaviro viharati /
S06bsu049_u:541_22: yaḥ khalu punarayaṃ kauśika subhūteḥ sthavirasya sarvadharmaviviktavihāraḥ sarvadharmānupalambhavihāraśca,
S06bsu049_u:541_23: eṣa kauśika vihāro bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharataḥ śatatamīm api kalaṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:541_24: sahasratamīm api śatasahasratamīm api koṭītamīm api koṭīśatatamīm api koṭīsahasratamīm api koṭīśatasahasratamīm api koṭīniyutaśatasahasratamīm api kalāṃ nopaiti /
S06bsu049_u:541_25: saṃkhyām api kalām api gaṇanām api upamām api aupamyam api upanisām api upaniṣadam api na kṣamate /
S06bsu049_u:541_26: tathāgatavihāraṃ hi kauśika sthāpayitvā tato 'nyān sarvān vihārānabhibhavatyayaṃ vihāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:541_27: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharato vihāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:541_29: śreṣṭha ākhyāyate, jyeṣṭha ākhyāyate, vara ākhyāyate, pravara ākhyāyate, praṇīta ākhyāyate, uttama ākhyāyate, anuttama ākhyāyate, niruttara ākhyāyate, asama ākhyāyate, asamasama ākhyāyate / sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhavihārānayaṃ vihāro 'bhibhavati,
S06bsu049_u:541_30: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato viharato vihāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:541_31: tasmāttarhi kauśika sarvasattvānāmagratāṃ gantukāmena śreṣṭhatāṃ gantukāmena jyeṣṭhatāṃ gantukāmena varatāṃ gantukāmena pravaratāṃ gantukāmena praṇītatāṃ gantukāmena uttamatāṃ gantukāmena anuttamatāṃ gantukāmena niruttaratāṃ gantukāmena asamatāṃ gantukāmena asamasamatāṃ gantukāmena kauśika kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā anena vihāreṇa vihartavyam,
S06bsu049_u:541_32: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratāṃ viharatāṃ vihāra iti /
S06bsu049_u:546_0: atha khalu tasmin samaye 'nyataro devaputrastrāyastriṃśairdevaputraiḥ sārdhaṃ māndāravāṇi mahāmāndāravāṇi ca puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā yena bhagavāṃstenopasaṃkrāntaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:546_1: ṣaṣṭhaṃ śataṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ tasminneva samaye tasyāmeva parṣadi saṃnipatitaṃ saṃniṣaṇṇaṃ cābhūt /
S06bsu049_u:546_2: te utthāyāsanebhya ekāṃsānyuttarāsaṅgāni kṛtvā dakṣiṇāni jānumaṇḍalāni pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayāmāsuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:546_3: teṣā bhikṣūṇāṃ buddhānubhāvena te 'ñjalipragrahā māndāravamahāmāndāravāṇāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ paripūrṇā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:546_5: abhyavākiran, abhiprākiran, evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - vayaṃ bhagavan asyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:546_6: vayaṃ bhagavan anena anuttareṇa prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa vihāriṣyāma iti /
S06bsu049_u:547_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ smitaṃ prādurakarot /
S06bsu049_u:547_1: dharmatā khalu punareṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatām - yadā smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti,
S06bsu049_u:547_2: atha tadā nānāvarṇā anekavarṇā raśmayo bhagavato mukhadvārānniścaranti - tadyathā nīlapītalohitāvadātamāñjiṣṭhasphaṭikarajatasuvarṇavarṇāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:547_3: te niścarya anantāparyantān lokadhātūnābhayā avabhāsya yāvadbrahmalokamabhyudgamya punareva pratyudāvṛtya bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavato mūrdhanyantardhīyante /
S06bsu049_u:548_0: atha khalvāyuṣmānānanda utthāyāsanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantametadavocat - nāhetukaṃ nāpratyayaṃ tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ smitaṃ prāduṣkurvanti /
S06bsu049_u:548_1: ko bhagavan hetuḥ, kaḥ pratyayaḥ smitasya prāduṣkaraṇāya? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - idamānanda bhikṣūṇāṃ ṣaṣṭhaṃ śatamanāgate 'dhvani tārakopame kalpe anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbhotsyate,
S06bsu049_u:548_4: tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ śāstāro loke bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:548_5: teṣāṃ khalu punarānanda avakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ sarveṣāṃ samaḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:548_6: sarveṣāṃ ca teṣāmavakīrṇakusumanāmnāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ samamevāyuḥpramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati viṃśatikalpasahasrāṇi /
S06bsu049_u:548_7: sarveṣāmeva caikaikasya vaistārikaṃ pravacanaṃ bhaviṣyati pṛthuvaipulyaprāptaṃ devamanuṣyeṣu /
S06bsu049_u:548_10: sarve ca te yato yata eva grāmanagaranigamajanapadarāṣṭrarājadhānīto 'bhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:548_12: pravartya ca yatra yatra ca vihariṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:548_13: yato yataś ca yatra yatraiva ca pravekṣanti,
S06bsu049_u:548_14: yena yena ca yato yata eva cābhiniṣkramiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:548_15: tatastatastatra tatra teṣāṃ praviśatāmabhiniṣkrāmatāṃ viharatāṃ ca pañcavarṇikānāṃ puṣpāṇāṃ puṣpavarṣāḥ pravartiṣyante /
S06bsu049_u:548_16: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvairmahāsattvairuttamena vihāreṇa vihartukāmaiḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa [Vaidya_227] vihartavyam /
S06bsu049_u:548_18: ye hi kecidānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ cariṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:548_19: niṣṭhā tatra gantavyā - manuṣyebhya evaite cyutā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:548_20: te ihopapannāstuṣitebhya eva vā devanikāyebhyaścyutā bhaviṣyanti manuṣyeṣvevopapannāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:548_21: tatkasya hetoḥ? tathā hi manuṣyeṣu tuṣiteṣu ca deveṣu iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā vistareṇa pracariṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:548_22: tathāgatāvalokitāḥ khalu punarānanda te bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:548_25: dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti,
S06bsu049_u:548_26: antaśo likhiṣyanti, udgṛhya dhārayitvā vācayitvā paryavāpya pravartya deśayitvopadiśyoddiśya svādhyāyya antaśo likhitvā bodhisattvān mahāsattvānavavadiṣyanti anuśāsiṣyanti saṃdarśayiṣyanti samādāpayiṣyanti samuttejayiṣyanti saṃpraharṣayiṣyanti /
S06bsu049_u:548_27: avaropitakuśalamūlāste ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvā veditavyāstathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu /
S06bsu049_u:548_28: na kevalaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhānāmantike taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni iha prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitum,
S06bsu049_u:548_29: niḥsaṃśayaṃ khalu punarānanda tathāgateṣvarhatsu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu taiḥ kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:548_31: na cotrāsamāpadyante / ye ca ānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāmudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti ca,
S06bsu049_u:548_33: niṣṭhā ānanda tatra gantavyā - saṃmukhībhūtāste abhūvan bodhisattvā mahāsattvāstathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:548_35: na prativahanti, na pratikopayanti, na pratisaṃharanti, na pratiṣedhayanti, na pratikṣipanti, na pratibādhitavyāṃ maṃsyante,
S06bsu049_u:549_0: kiṃcāpyānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmantike kuśalamūlamavaropitam,
S06bsu049_u:549_1: evaṃ hi tanna śrāvakapratyekabuddhatvāya dāsyati vipākam /
S06bsu049_u:549_2: sacedbodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau na visaṃvādayiṣyati praṇidhānam,
S06bsu049_u:549_3: api tu khalu punarānanda prāyeṇa tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena kṛtajñena bhavitavyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatā /
S06bsu049_u:549_4: tasmāttarhi te ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā akṣarasaṃnipātādudgrahaṇāya dhāraṇāya vācanāya paryavāptaye pravartanāya cirasthitaye yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta /
S06bsu049_u:549_5: sacettvamānanda yo mayā te dharmo deśitaḥ sākṣāt sthāpayitvā prajñāpāramitām,
S06bsu049_u:549_7: punarevotsṛjeḥ vismārayeḥ, na me tvamānanda etāvatā aparāddhaḥ syāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:549_8: yatkhalu punastvamānanda prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ padaṃ vā padasāmantakaṃ vā nāśayeḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_9: utsṛjeḥ, vismārayeḥ, tāvatā tvamānanda mamāparāddhaḥ syāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_12: punarevotsṛjeḥ, vismārayeḥ, na tvayāhaṃ satkṛto gurukṛtaḥ syām,
S06bsu049_u:549_13: na mānito na pūjito nārcito nāpacāyitaḥ syām /
S06bsu049_u:549_14: ye 'pi [Vaidya_228] te ānanda atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_15: te 'pi tvayā ānanda na satkṛtā na gurukṛtā na mānitā na pūjitā nārcitā nāpacāyitā bhavanti /
S06bsu049_u:549_17: punarevotsṛjeḥ, vismārayeḥ, tāvatā tvamānanda mamāparāddhaḥ syāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_19: tatkasya hetoḥ? uktametadānanda tathāgatena - prajñāpāramitā atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī sarvajñatāyā āhāriketi /
S06bsu049_u:549_20: tasmāttarhi ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi te imāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
S06bsu049_u:549_32: sumanasikṛtā ca sudhṛtā ca suparyavāptā ca supravartitā ca tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:549_34: tatkasya hetoḥ? atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ dharmakāyateti tāṃ dharmatāṃ pramāṇīkṛtya /
S06bsu049_u:549_35: yathā tattvamānanda etarhi me tathāgatasya tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya yāpayato hitaiṣitayā premato vā gauravato vā kalyāṇato vā sparśavihārato vā kartavyaṃ vā dātavyaṃ vā samanvāhartavyaṃ vā manyase,
S06bsu049_u:549_36: tathaiva tvayā ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyā upadeṣṭavyā uddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā bhāvayitavyā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā,
S06bsu049_u:549_37: tayā hitaiṣitayā tena premṇā tena gauraveṇa tayā guṇavattayā /
S06bsu049_u:549_38: evaṃ tvayā ānanda ahaṃ pūjito bhavāmi,
S06bsu049_u:549_40: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ ca buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmantike prema ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ cotpāditaṃ bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:549_41: yadi te ānanda ahaṃ priyo manaāpo 'parityaktastathāgataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_42: tataste ānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā priyā manaāpā aparityajanīyā bhavatu,
S06bsu049_u:549_43: yathā te ekapadam api na praṇaśyet,
S06bsu049_u:549_44: yathā nāntardhīyeta / bahv api te ānanda ahaṃ bhāṣeyaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ parīndanāmāramya kalpaṃ vā kalpāvaśeṣaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīṃ vā kalpakoṭīśataṃ vā kalpakoṭīsahasraṃ vā kalpakoṭīśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā upari /
S06bsu049_u:549_47: yādṛśāste atītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantaḥ sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya śāstāraḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_50: aparimāṇayā parīndanayā prajñāpāramitāṃ te parīndāmyanuparīndāmi sadevamānuṣāsurasya lokasya hitāya sukhāya /
S06bsu049_u:549_52: dharmo na parityaktaḥ, saṃgho na parityaktaḥ, atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhirna parityaktā,
S06bsu049_u:549_55: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:549_56: yo hi kaścidānanda enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ pralujyamānāmanuparigṛhṇīte,
S06bsu049_u:549_57: atītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ tena bodhiranuparigṛhītā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:549_58: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi ānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ bodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:549_59: ye 'pi te ānanda abhūvannatīte 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_60: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirabhūt /
S06bsu049_u:549_61: te 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_62: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:549_63: ye 'pi te ānanda aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā etarhi tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:549_64: teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ prajñāpāramitānirjātaiva anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:549_65: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitukāmena iyameva prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyopadeṣṭavyoddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:549_67: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hi ānanda prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā jananī janayitrī /
S06bsu049_u:549_68: ye 'pi kecidānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitvā niryātāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_70: sarve te ānanda prajñāpāramitāmāgamya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu śikṣitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:549_71: te 'pi sarve enāmeva prajñāpāramitāmāgamya ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu nirjātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:549_72: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitānirjātā hi ānanda sarvāḥ pāramitāḥ āhārikā bhavantyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:549_73: tasmāttarhi ānanda bhūyasyā mātrayā enāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ dvitīyakam api tṛtīyakam api parīndāmyanuparīndāmi te,
S06bsu049_u:549_74: yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta / eṣā hi ānanda tathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāmakṣayo dharmakoṣaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_75: yaduta prajñāpāramitā / tatkasya hetoḥ? yo hi ānanda atīte 'dhvani anavarāgre saṃsāre sattvānāṃ buddhairbhagavadbhirdharmo deśitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:549_77: yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ / ye 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani buddhā bhagavanto 'parimite saṃsāre 'nuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya sattvānāṃ dharmaṃ deśayiṣyanti,
S06bsu049_u:549_78: te 'pi buddhā bhagavanta ita eva dharmakoṣāt,
S06bsu049_u:549_79: yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ / ye 'pi te ānanda etarhi aprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:549_80: dharmaṃ ca deśayanti, teṣāmapyānanda buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmita eva dharmakoṣātprabhāvanā bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:549_81: yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ / tasmāttarhi ānanda akṣaya eṣa dharmakoṣo yaduta prajñāpāramitākoṣaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:549_82: sacettvamānanda śrāvakayāni śrāvakayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ śrāvakabhūmau dharmaṃ deśayes tasyāṃ ca dharmadeśanāyāṃ ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau satvās te sarve arhatvaṃ sākṣāt kuryus tathāpi tvayā me śrāvakeṇa dharmacakrapravartanānupravartanato dharmadeśayatā śrāvakakṛtyaṃ na kṛtaṃ syāt sacet punas tvam ānanda bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya ekam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayeḥ saṃprakāśayeḥ evam ahaṃ tvayā śrāvakeṇa dharmacakrapravartanānuvartanato dharmaṃ deśayanato ārādhitaḥ syān.
S06bsu049_u:549_83: na tu tayā paurvikayā dharmadeśanayā yayā te trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sarvasatvā arhatvaṃ prāpitās.
S06bsu049_u:549_84: teṣāṃ cārhatāṃ yad dānamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu śīlamayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu bhāvanāmayaṃ puṇyakriyāvastu tat kiṃ manyase ānandāpi nu sa bahu puṇyaskandhaḥ?" /
S06bsu049_u:549_85: ānandaḥ āha / "bahu bhagavan! bahu sugata!" bhagavān āha /
S06bsu049_u:549_86: "tata sa ānanda! śrāvakayānikaḥ pudgalo bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvānāṃ mahāsatvānāṃ prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati.
S06bsu049_u:549_87: ato 'pi sa ānanda! bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati yo bodhisatvo mahāsatvo 'parasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayati /
S06bsu049_u:549_88: antaśa ekadivasam api tiṣṭhatv ānandaikadivasam antaśaḥ purobhaktam api.
S06bsu049_u:549_91: antaśa ekanālikām api ekanālikāntaram api vā tiṣṭhatv ānanda! ekanālikāntaram antaśo muhūrtam api tiṣṭhatv ānanda! muhūrtam antaśa ekalavam api tiṣṭhatv ānanda! ekalavam antaśa ekakṣaṇasaṃnipātam api yo hy ānanda! bodhisatvo mahāsatvaḥ aparasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya ekakṣaṇalavam api prajñāpāramitāpratisaṃyuktaṃ dharmaṃ deśayanty ayaṃ tato 'tibahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati /
S06bsu049_u:549_92: idaṃ hy ānanda! tasya bodhisatvasya mahāsatvasya dharmadānaṃ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhayānikānāṃ pudgalānāṃ kuśalamūlāny abhibhavati /
S06bsu049_u:549_93: / evam ānanda! kuśalamūlasamanvāgato bodhisatvo mahāsatva evam etat kuśalamūlaṃ samanvāharann asthānam etad ānandānavakāśo yat sa bodhisatvo mahāsatvo vivartetānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodher naitat sthānaṃ vidyate" /
S06bsu049_u:549_94: / atha khalu bhagavāṃs tasyāṃ velāyāṃ tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān yathārūpeṇa ṛddhyabhisaṃskṛtena tāś catasraḥ parṣado bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikādevanāgayakṣagandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragā manuṣyāmanuṣyā vā sarve te buddhānubhāvenākṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyanti sma bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaṃ [Vaidya_230] dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ sāgaropamāyāṃ gambhīrāyāmakṣobhyāyāṃ parṣadi bodhisattvairmahāsattvairacintyaguṇasamanvāgataiḥ parivṛtaṃ puraskṛtaṃ sarvaiścārhadbhiḥ kṣīṇāsravairniḥkleśairvaśībhūtaiḥ suvimuktacittaiḥ suvimuktaprajñairājāneyairmahānāgaiḥ kṛtakṛtyaiḥ kṛtakaraṇīyairapahṛtabhārairanuprāptasvakārthaiḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaiḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacitaiḥ sarvacetovaśiparamapāramiprāptaiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:550_0: atha khalu bhagavāṃstamṛddhyabhisaṃskāraṃ punareva pratisaṃharati sma /
S06bsu049_u:550_1: pratisaṃhṛte ca bhagavatā tasmin ṛddhyabhisaṃskāre na bhūyaḥ sa bhagavānakṣobhyastathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saṃdṛśyate sma /
S06bsu049_u:550_3: te ca mahāśrāvakāḥ, tacca buddhakṣetraṃ tāsāṃ catasṛṇāṃ gandharvāsuragaruḍakinnaramahoragāṇāṃ manuṣyāmanuṣyāṇāṃ ca na cakṣuṣa ābhāsaṃ bhūya āgacchanti sma /
S06bsu049_u:550_4: tatkasya hetoḥ? pratisaṃhṛto hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhena sa ṛddhyabhisaṃskāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:550_5: tena te sarve sarveṣāṃ teṣāṃ na bhūyaścakṣuṣa ābhāsamāgacchanti sma /
S06bsu049_u:551_0: atha khalu bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - evamānanda sarvadharmā na cakṣuṣo 'pyābhāsamāgacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:551_2: na dharmādharmān paśyanti, na dharmādharmān jānanti / tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi ānanda ajānakā apaśyakāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:551_3: na kāryasamarthāḥ / tatkasya hetoḥ? nirīhakā hi ānanda sarvadharmā agrāhyā ākāśanirīhakatayā /
S06bsu049_u:551_6: evaṃ caranta ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāścaranti prajñāpāramitāyam /
S06bsu049_u:551_8: evaṃ śikṣamāṇā ānanda bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ śikṣante prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:551_9: sarvaśikṣāparamapāramitāṃ mahābodhiṃ prāptukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:551_10: tatkasya hetoḥ? eṣā hyānanda śikṣā sarvaśikṣāṇāmagrā ākhyāyate,
S06bsu049_u:551_11: śreṣṭhā ākhyāyate, jyeṣṭhā ākhyāyate, varā ākhyāyate, pravarā ākhyāyate, praṇītā ākhyāyate, uttamā ākhyāyate, anuttamā ākhyāyate, niruttarā ākhyāyate, asamā ākhyāyate, asamasamā ākhyāyate, sarvalokahitāvahā sarvalokasukhāvahā anāthānāṃ nāthakarī buddhānujñātā buddhapraśastā /
S06bsu049_u:551_12: asyāmānanda prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitvā atra śikṣāyāṃ sthitvā tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā imaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasraṃ lokadhātumekena padāṅguṣṭhenotkṣipya punareva nikṣipeyuḥ /
S06bsu049_u:551_13: na ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāmevaṃ syāt - utkṣipto vāyaṃ trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ nikṣipto veti /
S06bsu049_u:551_15: asyāmānanda prajñāpāramitāśikṣāyāṃ śikṣitvā buddhā bhagavanto 'tītānāgatapratyutpanneṣu dharmeṣvasaṅgatāmanuprāptāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:551_17: sarvāsāṃ tāsāmānanda śikṣāṇāmiyameva prajñāpāramitāśikṣā agrā ākhyāyate,
S06bsu049_u:551_18: śreṣṭhā ākhyāyate, jyeṣṭhā ākhyāyate, varā ākhyāyate, pravarā ākhyāyate, praṇītā ākhyāyate, uttamā ākhyāyate, anuttamā ākhyāyate, niruttarā ākhyāyate, asamā ākhyāyate, asamasamā ākhyāyate / apramāṇā hyānanda prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:551_22: ākāśasya hi sa ānanda pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyetaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:551_23: yaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayaṃ vā paryantaṃ vā grahītavyaṃ manyeta /
S06bsu049_u:551_27: na mayā ānanda prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ vā kṣayo vā paryanto vā ākhyātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:551_30: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hyānanda nāmakāyapadakāyavyañjanakāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:552_0: ānanda āha - kena punaḥ kāraṇena bhagavan bhagavatā prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pramāṇaṃ nākhyātam ? bhagavānāha - akṣayatvādānanda prajñāpāramitāyāstathāgataḥ pramāṇaṃ na nirdiśati /
S06bsu049_u:552_3: kutaḥ punarasya pramāṇaṃ bhaviṣyati? evamānanda prajñāpāramitā aprameyatvādapramāṇā aparimāṇā /
S06bsu049_u:552_4: ye 'pi te ānanda atīte 'dhvanyabhūvaṃstathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:552_6: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣīṇā vā parikṣīṇā vā /
S06bsu049_u:552_7: ye 'pi te ānanda anāgate 'dhvani bhaviṣyanti tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:552_9: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣeṣyate vā parikṣeṣyate vā /
S06bsu049_u:552_10: ye 'pi te ānanda etarhyaprameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāstiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:552_12: na ceyamānanda prajñāpāramitā kṣīyate vā parikṣīyate vā /
S06bsu049_u:552_15: na cānanda iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā kṣīyate vā parikṣīyate vā /
S06bsu049_u:552_16: tatkasya hetoḥ? ākāśaṃ hi sa ānanda kṣayayitavyaṃ manyeta,
S06bsu049_u:553_0: atha khalvāyuṣmataḥ subhūteretadabhavat - gambhīramidaṃ sthānaṃ tathāgatena bhāṣitam /
S06bsu049_u:553_2: atha khalvāyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - akṣayā bhagavan prajñāpāramitā? bhagavānāha - akṣayā hi subhūte prajñāpāramitā yaduta ākāśākṣayatvātsarvadharmānutpādataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:553_3: subhūtirāha - kathaṃ bhagavan bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā? bhagavānāha - rūpākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:553_4: evaṃ vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārāḥ / vijñānākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:553_5: evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:553_6: avidyākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:553_7: evaṃ saṃskārākṣayatvena vijñānākṣayatvena nāmarūpākṣayatvena ṣaḍāyatanākṣayatvena sparśākṣayatvena [Vaidya_232] vedanākṣayatvena tṛṣṇākṣayatvena upādānākṣayatvena bhavākṣayatvena jātyakṣayatvena jarāmaraṇākṣayatvena śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsākṣayatvena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:553_8: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya antadvayavivarjitā pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā /
S06bsu049_u:553_9: evaṃ vyavalokayan subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyanutpādamanādyantamadhyaṃ taṃ vyavalokayati /
S06bsu049_u:553_10: ayaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāveṇiko dharmo bodhimaṇḍe niṣaṇṇasya,
S06bsu049_u:553_12: evaṃ vyavalokayataḥ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pratītyasamutpādaḥ sarvajñajñānapratilambho bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:553_13: yo hi kaścitsubhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ anena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati,
S06bsu049_u:553_14: sa na śrāvakabhūmau vā pratyekabuddhabhūmau vā sthāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:553_16: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivartante 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:553_17: sacet imān manasikārānidaṃ copāyakauśalyamanāgamya na jānanti - kathaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā,
S06bsu049_u:553_18: kathaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavya iti /
S06bsu049_u:553_19: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā vivṛttā vivartante,
S06bsu049_u:553_21: sarve te idamupāyakauśalyamanāgamya vivṛttā vivartante vivartsyante ca /
S06bsu049_u:553_22: ye kecitsubhūte bodhisattvā mahāsattvā na vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca,
S06bsu049_u:553_23: sarve te imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmāgamya na vivṛttā na vivartante na vivartsyante ca anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:553_24: evaṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā bodhisattvena mahāsattvena akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitā abhinirhartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:553_25: evaṃ ca akṣayābhinirhāreṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ pratītyasamutpādo vyavalokayitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:553_26: evaṃ khalu punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayan na kaṃciddharmamahetukamutpadyamānaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:553_27: na kaṃciddharmaṃ nityaṃ vā dhruvaṃ vā śāśvataṃ vā avipariṇāmadharmakaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
S06bsu049_u:553_28: na kaṃciddharmaṃ kārakaṃ vā vedakaṃ vā samanupaśyati /
S06bsu049_u:553_29: iyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharato 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ pratītyasamutpādavyavalokanā /
S06bsu049_u:553_30: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmakṣayābhinirhāreṇa abhinirharan pratītyasamutpādaṃ vyavalokayati,
S06bsu049_u:553_31: tasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvo na rūpaṃ samanupaśyati,
S06bsu049_u:553_32: na vedanāṃ na saṃjñāṃ na saṃskārān,
S06bsu049_u:553_33: na vijñānaṃ samanupaśyati, nāvidyāṃ samanupaśyati / evaṃ na saṃskārānna vijñānaṃ na nāmarūpaṃ na ṣaḍāyatanaṃ na sparśaṃ na vedanāṃ na tṛṣṇāṃ nopādānaṃ na bhavaṃ na jātiṃ na jarāmaraṇaṃ na śokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsān samanupaśyati /
S06bsu049_u:553_37: yena dharmeṇa idaṃ vā anyadvā buddhakṣetraṃ samanupaśyet /
S06bsu049_u:553_38: iyaṃ sā subhūte bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ prajñāpāramitā /
S06bsu049_u:553_39: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:553_40: tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:553_41: [Vaidya_233] tadyathāpi nāma subhūte puruṣo mātāpitṛṣu kālagateṣu paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:553_42: evameva subhūte yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:553_43: tasmin samaye māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:554_0: subhūtirāha - kimeka eva bhagavan māraḥ pāpīyān paramaśokaśalyasamarpito bhavati,
S06bsu049_u:554_1: utāho bahavo mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:554_2: utāho ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāḥ pāpīyāṃsaḥ te 'pi sarve tasmin samaye paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa viharati,
S06bsu049_u:554_3: tasmin samaye ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau mārāṃ pāpīyāṃsaḥ te sarve paramaśokaśalyasamarpitā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:554_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāvihāreṇa hi viharato 'sya subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sadevamānuṣāsuro loko 'vatāraṃ na labhate grahaṇāya,
S06bsu049_u:554_6: gādhaṃ na labhate, yatrainaṃ gṛhītvā viheṭhayedvā vivartayedvā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:554_7: tasmāttarhiḥ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhukāmena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
S06bsu049_u:554_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati,
S06bsu049_u:554_9: evaṃ śīlapāramitā kṣāntipāramitā vīryapāramitā dhyānapāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchati /
S06bsu049_u:554_10: prajñāpāramitāyāṃ hi subhūte carato bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya sarvāḥ ṣaṭ pāramitā bhāvanāparipūriṃ gacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:554_12: tasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carato yāni kānicinmārakarmāṇyutpadyeran,
S06bsu049_u:554_14: prajānan visarjayiṣyati / sarvopāyakauśalyāni subhūte parigrahītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam,
S06bsu049_u:554_16: yasmin samaye subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati,
S06bsu049_u:554_18: tasmin samaye subhūte na bodhisattvena mahāsattvena ye 'prameyeṣvasaṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu buddhā bhagavantastiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:554_19: te samanvāhartavyāḥ / teṣām api itonirjātaiva sarvajñatā yaduta prajñāpāramitātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:554_20: evaṃ samanvāhṛtya tena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena punarevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - ahamapyetān dharmānanuprāpsyāmi ye tairbuddhairbhagavadbhiranuprāptā iti /
S06bsu049_u:554_21: evaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caratā ime cittotpādā utpādayitavyā abhinirhartavyā divasasyātyayena,
S06bsu049_u:554_23: yaś ca subhūte aupalambhiko bodhisattvo mahāsattvo gaṅgānadīvālukopamān kalpān dānaṃ dadyāt,
S06bsu049_u:554_25: yo 'yaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divasasyātyayena imāṃ prajñāpāramitāmabhinirharet,
S06bsu049_u:554_29: yo 'syāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran imāṃścittotpādānutpādayati divasasyātyayena [Vaidya_234] antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api /
S06bsu049_u:554_31: tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā? tathāgatasamanvāhṛtasya hi subhūte bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya nānyā gatiḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyā anyatrānuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:554_37: ime 'pi subhūte guṇāḥ, ime 'pyanuśaṃsā bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:554_41: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte gandhahastino bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya ya etarhyakṣobhyasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ caratīti /
S06bsu049_u:559_0: punaraparaṃ subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena evaṃ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā - sarvadharmāsaṅgataḥ prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:559_5: sarvadharmāś ca nāmamātreṇa vyavahāramātreṇābhilapyante iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:559_6: vyavahāraś ca na kvacinna kutaścinna kaścidvyavahāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_7: sarvadharmā avyavahārā avyāhārā avyavahṛtā avyāhṛtā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:559_18: sarvadharmā nāgacchanti, na gacchanti, ajānānā ajātā atyantājātita iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:559_20: sarvadharmā āryārhantaḥ prakṛtipariśuddhā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:559_23: tatkasya hetoḥ ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte adeśamapradeśaṃ prakṛtisvabhāvataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_25: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte adeśamapradeśaṃ prakṛītisvabhāvataḥ sarvadharmanirodhaprahlādanatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:559_28: tatkasya hetoḥ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate /
S06bsu049_u:559_30: vijñānaṃ hi subhūte satattvena svabhāvena na rajyate na virajyate prakṛtipariśuddhatvāditi prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:559_31: sarvadharmā asaktāḥ saṅgāsaṅgavigatā iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:559_35: sarvadharmā maitrīvihāriṇaḥ karuṇāvihāriṇo muditāvihāriṇa upekṣāvihāriṇa iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:559_36: sarvadharmā brahmabhūtā doṣānutpādanataḥ sarvadoṣānutpādanata iti prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:559_61: tatkasya hetoḥ ? rūpaṃ hi subhūte samudrasamam /
S06bsu049_u:559_64: rūpaṃ hi gaganasamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_65: vijñānaṃ gaganasamam / rūpaṃ vicitramerūsamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_66: vijñānaṃ vicitramerusamam / rūpamaparyantasamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_82: rūpaṃ pṛthivīsamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_83: vijñānaṃ pṛthivīsamam / rūpamapsamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_84: vijñānamapsamam / rūpaṃ tejaḥsamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_85: vijñānaṃ tejaḥsamam / rūpaṃ vāyusamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_86: vijñānaṃ vāyusamam / rūpamākāśasamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_87: vijñānamākāśasamam / rūpaṃ vijñānasamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_109: rūpaṃ cittacaritotpattiḥ / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_111: rūpaṃ kuśalamakuśalam, yāvadanupalabdhiḥ / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_112: vijñānaṃ kuśalamakuśalam, yāvadanupalabdhiḥ / rūpaṃ siṃhanādasamam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_113: vijñānaṃ siṃhanādasamam / rūpamakopyam / evaṃ vedanā saṃjñā saṃskārāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:559_114: vijñānamakopyam / evaṃ hi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitā anugantavyā /
S06bsu049_u:560_0: yadāyaṃ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evamenāṃ prajñāpāramitāmanugamiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:560_1: vyavacārayiṣyati avatariṣyati avabhotsyate cintayiṣyati tulayiṣyati upaparīkṣiṣyate bhāvayiṣyati sarvamāyāśāṭhyavivarjitairmanasikāraiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:560_12: tadā nāsya durlabhā bhaviṣyati sarvaguṇānāṃ paripūriḥ,
S06bsu049_u:565_2: ya etarhi bhīṣmagarjitanirghoṣasvarasya tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāntike brahmacaryaṃ carati /
S06bsu049_u:565_3: evamukte āyuṣmān subhūtirbhagavantametadavocat - kathaṃ bhagavan sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattveneyaṃ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā? evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantaṃ subhūtimetadavocat - sadāpraruditena subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pūrvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena kāye 'narthikena jīvitanirapekṣeṇa lābhasatkāraślokeṣvaniśritena paryeṣamāṇena paryeṣitā /
S06bsu049_u:565_4: tena prajñāpāramitāṃ paryeṣamāṇena araṇyagatena antarīkṣānnirghoṣaḥ śruto 'bhūt - gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra pūrvasyāṃ diśi /
S06bsu049_u:565_6: tathā ca gaccha, yathā na kāyaklamathamanasikāramutpādayasi,
S06bsu049_u:565_13: noṣṇamanasikāramutpādayasi / mā ca kvaciccittaṃ praṇidhāḥ adhyātmaṃ vā bahirdhā vā /
S06bsu049_u:565_15: mā dakṣiṇena, mā pūrveṇa, mā paścimena, mottareṇa, mordhvam, mādhaḥ, mā ca anuvidiśamavalokayan gāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:565_16: tathā ca kulaputra gaccha, yathā nātmato na satkāyataścalasi /
S06bsu049_u:565_17: yathā na rūpataścalasi, yathā na vedanāto na saṃjñāto na saṃskārataḥ,
S06bsu049_u:565_18: yathā na vijñānataścalasi / yo hyataścalati, sa vitiṣṭhate / kuto vitiṣṭhate? buddhadharmebhyo vitiṣṭhate /
S06bsu049_u:565_20: sa saṃsāre carati / yaḥ saṃsāre carati, sa na carati prajñāpāramitāyām /
S06bsu049_u:566_0: evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ nirghoṣametadavocat - evaṃ vai kariṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:566_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? ahaṃ hi sarvasattvānāmālokaṃ kartukāmo buddhadharmān samudānetukāma iti /
S06bsu049_u:566_2: evamukte sa nirghoṣaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra sadāprarudita /
S06bsu049_u:567_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ punar api śabdamaśrauṣīt /
S06bsu049_u:567_1: evaṃ cāśrauṣīt - śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu ca tvayā kulaputra sarvadharmeṣvadhimuktimutpādya prajñāpāramitā paryeṣṭavyā /
S06bsu049_u:567_2: nimittaparivarjitena bhāvaparivarjitena sattvadṛṣṭiparivarjitena ca tvayā bhavitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:567_4: kalyāṇamitrāṇi ca tvayā sevitavyāni bhaktavyāni paryupāsitavyāni,
S06bsu049_u:567_5: yāni ca śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitānutpādājātāniruddhābhāvāḥ sarvadharmā iti dharmaṃ deśayanti /
S06bsu049_u:567_6: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra pratipadyamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi pustakagatāṃ vā dharmabhāṇakasya bhikṣoḥ kāyagatām /
S06bsu049_u:567_7: yasya ca tvaṃ kulaputra antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇuyāḥ śāstṛsaṃjñā tvayā tatrotpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:567_8: kṛtajñena ca tvayā bhavitavyaṃ kṛtavedinā ca - eṣa mama kalyāṇamitraṃ yasyemāṃ prajñāpāramitāmantikācchṛṇomi /
S06bsu049_u:567_9: yāmahaṃ śṛṇvan [Vaidya_239] kṣiprameva avinivartanīyo bhaviṣyāmyanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ,
S06bsu049_u:567_12: akṣaṇāṃś ca vivarjayiṣyāmi / kṣaṇasaṃpadaṃ ca ārāgayiṣyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:567_13: imāstvayā kulaputra anuśaṃsāḥ paritulayamānena dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau śāstṛsaṃjñotpādayitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:567_14: na ca tvayā kulaputra lokāmiṣapratisaṃyuktayā cittasaṃtatyā dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:567_15: dharmārthikena ca tvayā dharmagauraveṇa dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:567_17: asti hi kulaputra māraḥ pāpīyān dharmabhāṇakasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya rūpaśabdagandharasasparśānupasaṃharati sevituṃ bhaktuṃ paryupāsitum /
S06bsu049_u:567_19: tatra ca tvayā kulaputra dharmabhāṇake bhikṣau nāprasādacittamutpādayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:567_20: api tvevaṃ cittamutpādayitavyam - nāhaṃ tadupāyakauśalyaṃ jāne,
S06bsu049_u:567_22: eṣa sattvavinayena sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlaparigrahamupādāya enān dharmān pratisevate bhajate paryupāste /
S06bsu049_u:567_23: na hi kvacidbodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ saṅgo vā ārambaṇaṃ vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:567_24: tatkṣaṇaṃ ca tvayā kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaḥ pratyavekṣitavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:567_25: katamaś ca kulaputra dharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaḥ? yaduta sarvadharmā asaṃkleśā avyavadānāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:567_26: tatkasya hetoḥ? sarvadharmā hi svabhāvena śūnyāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:567_27: sarvadharmā hi niḥsattvā nirjīvā niṣpoṣā niṣpuruṣā niṣpudgalā māyopamāḥ svapnopamāḥ pratiśrutkopamāḥ pratibhāsopamāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:567_28: evaṃ tvaṃ kulaputra sarvadharmāṇāṃ bhūtanayaṃ pratyavekṣamāṇo dharmabhāṇakamanubadhnan nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāyāṃ niryāsyasi /
S06bsu049_u:567_29: aparam api tvaṃ kulaputra mārakarma samanvāhareḥ /
S06bsu049_u:567_31: na samanvāharati, tatra tvayā kulaputra na prativāṇiḥ kartavyā /
S06bsu049_u:567_32: api tu dharmārthikenaiva dharmagauraveṇaiva anirviṇṇamānasena dharmabhāṇako bhikṣuranubaddhavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:568_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasya nirghoṣasyāntikādimāmanuśāsanīṃ pratigṛhya yena pūrvā dik tena pratikrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:568_1: aciraprakrāntasya cāsyaitadabhūt - na mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:568_3: tatra rudan krandan śocan paridevamānaḥ evaṃ cintayati sma - asminneva pṛthivīpradeśe ekaṃ vā rātriṃdivamatināmayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:568_4: dve vā, trīṇi vā, catvāri vā, pañca vā, ṣaḍ vā, sapta vā rātriṃdivānyatināmayiṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:568_14: tadyathāpi nāma subhūte kaścideva puruṣaḥ ekaputrake kālagate mahatā duḥkhadaurmanasyena samanvāgato 'bhavat,
S06bsu049_u:568_17: evameva subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tasmin [Vaidya_240] samaye nānyaḥ kaścinmanasikāraḥ pravartate sma,
S06bsu049_u:568_18: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ tāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:569_0: atha khalu subhūte sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathotkaṇṭhitasya tathāgatavigrahaḥ purataḥ sthitvā sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu049_u:569_1: yastvamenāṃ vācaṃ bhāṣase / evaṃ hi kulaputra paurvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitā paryeṣitā,
S06bsu049_u:569_2: yathā tvametarhi paryeṣase / tena hi tvaṃ kulaputra etenaiva vīryeṇa etenaivotsāhenaṃ etayaivārthikatayā etayaiva cchandikatayā anubadhya pūrvāmeva diśaṃ gaccha /
S06bsu049_u:569_3: asti kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairgandhavatī nāma nagarī saptaratnamayī,
S06bsu049_u:569_6: dvādaśa yojanāni āyāmena, dvādaśa yojanāni vistāreṇa, ṛddhā ca sphītā ca kṣemā ca subhikṣā ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyā ca pañcabhirantarāpaṇavīthiśatairālekhyavicitrasadṛśairdarśanīyairnirviddhā asamasamairanutpīḍajanayugyayānasaṃkramaṇasthānasthāpitaiḥ sumāpitā /
S06bsu049_u:569_7: samantataḥ prākārāś ca tasyā nagaryāḥ saptaratnamayāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:569_8: teṣāṃ ca saptaratnamayānāṃ prākārāṇāṃ jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya khoḍakaśīrṣāṇi pramāṇavantyupodgatāni /
S06bsu049_u:569_9: sarvasmiṃś ca khoḍakaśīrṣe saptaratnamayo vṛkṣo jāto nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ phalaiḥ phalavān /
S06bsu049_u:569_10: sarvataś ca khoḍakavṛkṣādratnamayaṃ sūtraṃ dvitīyaṃ khoḍakavṛkṣāntaramavasaktam /
S06bsu049_u:569_11: sarvāvatī ca sā nagarī sauvarṇena kiṅkiṇījālena praticchannā /
S06bsu049_u:569_12: tasya ca kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteneritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyaḥ śabdo niścarati /
S06bsu049_u:569_13: tadyathāpi nāma pañcāṅgikasya tūryasya sametya saṃgītyāṃ kuśalairgandharvaiḥ saṃpravāditasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:569_14: evameva tasya kiṅkiṇījālasya vāteritasya valgurmanojño rañjanīyo nirghoṣo niścarati /
S06bsu049_u:569_15: tena ca śabdena te sattvāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:569_16: samantācca tasyā nagaryāḥ parikhā vāriparipūrṇā anusārivārivāhinyo vāriṇo nātiśītasya nātyuṣṇasya pūrṇāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:569_17: tasmiṃś ca vāriṇi nāvaḥ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ vicitrā darśanīyāsteṣāmeva sattvānāṃ pūrvakarmavipākenābhinirvṛttāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:569_18: yāsu te sattvā abhiruhya krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:569_20: anyaiś ca abhijātābhijātaiḥ sugandhagandhibhiḥ puṣpaiḥ saṃchāditam /
S06bsu049_u:569_21: nāsti sā kācittrisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau puṣpajātiryā tatra nāsti /
S06bsu049_u:569_26: sarvāsu tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu saptaratnamayāni vicitrāṇi darśanīyāni utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāṇi jātāni,
S06bsu049_u:569_27: yaistadudakaṃ saṃchāditam / sarvāṇi ca tānyutpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkāni śakaṭacakrapramāṇapariṇāhāni sugandhāni nīlāni nīlavarṇāni nīlanidarśanāni nīlanirbhāsāni,
S06bsu049_u:569_34: yathāpi nāma dīrgharātraṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavatāṃ buddhanetrīcitrīkārānugatasugataśrutacittānāṃ sattvānāṃ dīrgharātraṃ gambhīreṣu dharmeṣvadhimuktānām /
S06bsu049_u:569_35: tatra ca kulaputra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ madhyeśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya gṛhaṃ yojanaṃ samantāt /
S06bsu049_u:569_40: aśokaṃ ca nāma śokavigataṃ ca nāma puṣpacitraṃ ca nāmodyānam /
S06bsu049_u:569_41: ekaikasmiṃścodyāne 'ṣṭāvaṣṭau puṣkariṇyo yaduta bhadrā ca nāma,
S06bsu049_u:569_42: bhadrottamā ca nāma, nandā ca nāma, nandottamā ca nāma, kṣamā ca nāma, kṣamottamā ca nāma, niyatā ca nāma, avivāhā ca nāma / tāsāṃ ca khalu puṣkariṇīnāmekaṃ pārśvaṃ sauvarṇamayaṃ dvitīyaṃ pārśvaṃ rūpyamayaṃ tṛtīyaṃ pārśvaṃ vaidūryamayaṃ caturthaṃ pārśvaṃ sphaṭikamayam /
S06bsu049_u:569_43: adhobhūmiḥ karketanamayī, suvarṇavālukāstīrṇā / ekaikasyāṃ ca puṣkariṇyāmaṣṭāvaṣṭau sopānāni nānāvicitrai ratnamayaiḥ sopānaphalakaiḥ pratimaṇḍitāni /
S06bsu049_u:569_44: sarvasmiṃś ca sopānaphalakavivarāntare jāmbūnadasya suvarṇasya kadalīvṛkṣo jātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:569_46: samantācca tāsāṃ puṣkariṇīnāṃ nānācitrāḥ puṣpavṛkṣā jātāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:569_47: teṣāṃ puṣpavṛkṣāṇāṃ vāteneritāni puṣpāṇi puṣkariṇīṣu patanti /
S06bsu049_u:569_48: sarvāsu ca tāsu puṣkariṇīṣu candanagandhikaṃ vāri,
S06bsu049_u:569_50: tatra ca dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saparivāro 'ṣṭaṣaṣṭayā strīsahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitaḥ samanvaṅgībhūtaḥ krīḍati ramate paricārayati /
S06bsu049_u:569_52: striyaś ca puruṣāśca, te 'pi sarve nityapramuditā udyāneṣu puṣkariṇīṣu ca pañcabhiḥ kāmaguṇaiḥ samarpitāḥ samanvaṅgībhūtāḥ krīḍanti ramante paricārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:569_53: sa khalu punardharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ parivāreṇa tāvatkālaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati,
S06bsu049_u:569_55: ye 'pi te sattvāstatra gandhavatyāṃ nagaryāṃ vāstavyāḥ te 'pi madhyenagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya āsanaṃ prajñapayanti,
S06bsu049_u:569_56: suvarṇapādakaṃ vā rūpyapādakaṃ vā vaiḍūryapādakaṃ vā sphaṭikapādakaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:569_57: tūlikāstīrṇaṃ vā, goṇikāstīrṇaṃ vā, uparigarbholikaṃ vā, kāśikavastrapratyāstaraṇaṃ vā ardhakrośamuccaistvena /
S06bsu049_u:569_58: upariṣṭāccāntarīkṣe cailavitānaṃ muktāvicitritaṃ samaṃ sahitā niratāḥ kimayaṃ saṃsthita iti susaṃsthitavicitravipākatayā dhārayanti /
S06bsu049_u:569_59: samantācca taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ pañcavarṇikaiḥ kusumairabhyavakiranti saṃpravikiranti /
S06bsu049_u:569_61: yathāpīdaṃ dharmāśayaviśuddhyā tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmagauraveṇa ca /
S06bsu049_u:569_62: tatra dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣaṇṇaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayati /
S06bsu049_u:569_63: evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra dharmagauraveṇa dharmāṇāṃ saṃniśrayatayā [Vaidya_242] śraddheyaśraddadhānatayā śraddhotpādanena te sattvā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śṛṇvanti /
S06bsu049_u:569_64: tatra ca bahūni prāṇiśatāni bahūni prāṇisahasrāṇi bahūni prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi saṃnipatitāni devamanuṣyāṇāṃ śṛṇvanti /
S06bsu049_u:569_66: sarvaṃ ca te sattvā avinipātadharmāṇo 'vinivartanīyā anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:569_67: tasya tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ gaccha /
S06bsu049_u:569_69: sa hi tava kulaputra dīrgharātraṃ kalyāṇamitraṃ saṃdarśakaḥ samādāpakaḥ samuttejakaḥ saṃpraharṣako 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:569_71: yathā tvametarhi paryeṣase / gaccha tvaṃ kulaputra rātriṃdivamadhiṣṭhitamanasikāramutpādayamāno nacireṇa prajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyasi /
S06bsu049_u:570_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ idaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanaskaḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajāto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:570_1: tadyathāpi nāma puruṣaḥ saviṣeṇa śalyena viddho nānyaṃ manasikāramutpādayati,
S06bsu049_u:570_2: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ śalyahartāraṃ vaidyaṃ lapsye yo mamedaṃ śalyamuddhariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:570_4: evameva sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasmin samaye nānyaṃ kaṃciddharmaṃ manasi karoti,
S06bsu049_u:570_5: api tu kadā nāmāhaṃ taṃ kulaputraṃ drakṣyāmi yo māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ śrāvayiṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:570_6: yanmama dharmaṃ śrutvā upalambhamanasikārāḥ prahāsyanta iti /
S06bsu049_u:571_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastasminneva pṛthivīpradeśe sthitaḥ tasya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayataḥ śṛṇoti sma /
S06bsu049_u:571_18: rajopagato nāma samādhiḥ / sarvasattvābhipramodano nāma samādhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_21: astambhito nāma samādhiḥ / prakṛtyavyavahāro nāma samādhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_23: rājopagato nāma samādhiḥ / nāmaniruktipadavyañjano nāma samādhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_27: gaganakalpo nāma samādhiḥ / vajropamo nāma samādhiḥ / āsannarūparājo nāma samādhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_28: asapatnarājo nāma samādhiḥ / jayalabdho nāma samādhiḥ / avivartyacakṣurnāma samādhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_31: āśvāsadātā nāma samādhiḥ / siṃhābhigarjito [Vaidya_243] nāma samādhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_33: vigatarajo nāma samādhiḥ / asaṃkliṣṭo nāma samādhiḥ / padmavyūho nāma samādhiḥ / kāṅkṣocchedano nāma samādhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_42: tamopagato nāma samādhiḥ / sarvadharmanimittāpagato nāma samādhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_46: merukalpo nāma samādhiḥ / asaṃhāryo nāma samādhiḥ / māramaṇḍalavidhvaṃsanakaro nāma samādhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_48: raśminirhāro nāma samādhiḥ / tathāgatadarśano nāma samādhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_50: sa eṣu samādhiṣu sthitaḥ san daśadiśi loke buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma aprameyānasaṃkhyeyān imāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ prakāśayato bodhisattvebhyo mahāsattvebhyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_51: te ca tathāgatāḥ sādhukāraṃ dadati sma,
S06bsu049_u:571_53: evaṃ cāvocan - asmābhir api kulaputra pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhirevameva prajñāpāramitā parigaveṣitā /
S06bsu049_u:571_54: parigaveṣamāṇaiś ca ete eva samādhayaḥ pratilabdhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:571_56: enāṃś ca samādhīn pratilabhya gatiṃgatāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:571_58: te vayameteṣāmeva samādhīnāṃ prakṛtiṃ svabhāvaṃ vyavalokayantastaṃ dharmaṃ na samanupaśyāmo yaḥ samāpadyate vā vyuttiṣṭhate vā,
S06bsu049_u:571_59: yo bodhāya caret, yo vā anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyeta /
S06bsu049_u:571_64: aśītiścānuvyañjanāni / vyāmaprabhatā ca / acintyaṃ ca anuttaraṃ buddhajñānaṃ buddhaprajñā,
S06bsu049_u:571_65: anuttaraś ca buddhasamādhiḥ, sarvabuddhadharmaguṇapāramitā ca anuprāptā yasyā guṇapāramitāyā na śakyaṃ tathāgataireva tāvatpramāṇaṃ grahītuṃ paryanto vā nidarśayitum,
S06bsu049_u:571_66: kiṃ punaḥ śrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ? tasmāttarhi kulaputra eteṣveva tvayā dharmeṣu gauravamutpādayitavyaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayā arthikatayā chandikatayā ca /
S06bsu049_u:571_67: arthikasya hi kulaputra chandikasya ca na durlabhā bhavatyanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ /
S06bsu049_u:571_68: kalyāṇamitreṣu ca tvayā kulaputra tīvraṃ gauravamutpādayitavyam,
S06bsu049_u:571_69: prema ca karaṇīyam, prasādaś ca karaṇīyaḥ / kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītā hi bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ kṣiprameva anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyante /
S06bsu049_u:572_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāṃstathāgatānetadavocat - ko 'smākaṃ kalyāṇamitramiti? ta enametadavocan - dīrgharātraṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau paripācitaḥ parigṛhītaś ca /
S06bsu049_u:572_2: sa tava kulaputra parigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:572_3: tattvayā kṛtajñatayā kṛtaveditayā ca satkṛtya tatkṛtaṃ dhārayitavyam /
S06bsu049_u:572_4: sacettvaṃ kulaputra dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ [Vaidya_244] mahāsattvamekaṃ vā kalpaṃ dvau vā kalpau trīn vā kalpān kalpaśataṃ vā kalpasahasraṃ vā kalpaśatasahasraṃ vā tato vā uttare cailoṇḍukamiva śirasā parikarṣeḥ,
S06bsu049_u:572_7: tān sarvānupanāmayeḥ / evam api tvayā kulaputra tasya kulaputrasya naiva kṛtasya pratikṛtaṃ bhavet /
S06bsu049_u:572_8: tatkasya hetoḥ? tasya hi kulaputra kulaputrasya anubhāvena tavaiṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ samādhīnāṃ pratilambhaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:573_0: atha khalu te tathāgatāḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ samāśvāsya antarhitā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:573_3: kva vā te tathāgatā iti / sa tāṃstathāgatānapaśyan mahatīmutkaṇṭhāṃ paritasanaṃ cāpannaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:573_4: tasyaitadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinakṛtādhikāraḥ mama saṃparigrāhakaḥ kalyāṇamitraṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:573_6: yannvahametamarthaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhigamyopasaṃkramya paripṛccheyam - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:573_7: kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti /
S06bsu049_u:574_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgate bodhisattve mahāsattve prema ca prasādaṃ ca citrīkāraṃ ca gauravaṃ ca upasthāpayati /
S06bsu049_u:574_1: upasthāpya evaṃ prācintayat - kiyadrūpayā nu khalvahaṃ satkriyayā taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam? daridraścāsmi /
S06bsu049_u:574_2: na ca me kiṃcittathārūpaṃ vastraṃ vā ratnaṃ vā suvarṇaṃ vā maṇayo vā muktā vā vaidūryaṃ vā śaṅkhaśilā vā pravālaṃ vā rajataṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpo vā gandho vā mālyaṃ vā vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ vā cīvaraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭā vā patākā vā saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:574_3: kenāhaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāṃ gurukuryām? na ca mamaitatpratirūpaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:574_5: daridraścāsmi / na ca me prītirvā prāmodhaṃ votpadyate /
S06bsu049_u:575_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃrūpairguṇairgauravamanasikārairgacchan anupūrveṇa anyataraṃ nagaramanuprāpto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:575_1: tatra tasyāntarāpaṇamadhyagatasya etadabhūt - yannvahamimamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya tena mūlyena dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kuryām /
S06bsu049_u:575_2: dīrgharātraṃ hi mamātmabhāvasahasrāṇi bhagnāni kṣīṇāni niruddhāni vikrītāni /
S06bsu049_u:575_3: punaḥ punaraparimāṇe saṃsāre aparimāṇāni ca nirayaduḥkhāni mayā kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānamanubhūtāni /
S06bsu049_u:575_4: na punarevaṃrūpāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kṛtaśa evaṃrūpāṇāṃ vā sattvānāṃ satkārāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:575_5: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvontarāpaṇamadhyagataḥ śabdamanuśrāvayāmāsa,
S06bsu049_u:576_0: atha khalu mārasya pāpīyasa etadabhūt - ayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmakāmatayā yadyātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkāraṃ kariṣyati,
S06bsu049_u:576_1: [Vaidya_245] prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca pariprakṣyati - kathaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caran kṣipramanuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pariniṣpatsyate iti,
S06bsu049_u:576_3: adhṛṣyaś ca bhaviṣyati māreṇa vā mārakāyikābhirvā devatābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:576_6: tāṃś ca mama viṣayādatikrāmayiṣyati anyāṃś ca anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya /
S06bsu049_u:577_0: atha khalu māraḥ pāpīyāṃstān brāhmaṇagṛhapatikāṃstathā pratyutthāpayāmāsa,
S06bsu049_u:577_1: yathā te taṃ ghoṣaṃ nāśrauṣuḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya - kaḥ puruṣeṇārthikaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:577_3: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yadā ātmanaḥ krāyakaṃ na labhate,
S06bsu049_u:577_4: tadā ekāntaṃ gatvā prārodīt, aśrūṇi prāvartayat / evaṃ cāvocat - aho batāsmākaṃ durlabdhā lābhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:577_5: ye vayamātmabhāvasyāpi krāyakaṃ na labhāmahe - yadvayamātmabhāvaṃ vikrīya dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmeti /
S06bsu049_u:578_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - yannvahaṃ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ tulayeyam - kiṃ nvayaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'dhyāśayapratipanna ātmabhāvaparityāgaṃ prati dharmakāmatayā,
S06bsu049_u:578_1: uta neti / atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamabhinirmāya yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:578_2: tenopasaṃkrāmati sma / upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra dīnadīnamanā utkaṇṭhitamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ? sadāpraruditastamevamāha - ahaṃ māṇavaka ātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:578_4: taṃ māṇavakarūpī śakra āha - kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāya ātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ? sadāpraruditastamāha - ahaṃ māṇavaka dharmakāmatayā imamātmānaṃ vikrīya dharmapūjāṃ kartukāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:578_9: yena taṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjāṃ kuryām,
S06bsu049_u:578_10: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmiti /
S06bsu049_u:578_11: atha khalu māṇavakaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu mama kulaputra puruṣeṇa kṛtyam /
S06bsu049_u:578_12: api tu khalu punaḥ piturbhe yajño yaṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:578_15: taddāsyasi tvaṃ krayeṇa? atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:578_16: pariniṣpannaṃ cātmabhāvaṃ jāne prajñāpāramitopāyakauśalye buddhadharmeṣu ca,
S06bsu049_u:578_17: yanmayāyaṃ māṇavakaḥ krāyako labdhaḥ hṛdayasya rudhirasya ca asthimajjāyāśceti /
S06bsu049_u:578_18: sa hṛṣṭacittaḥ kalyacittaḥ pramuditacittastaṃ māṇavakametadavocat - dāsyāmi māṇavaka yena yenaiva te iti ātmabhāvādarthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:578_19: sa tametadavocat - kiṃ te kulaputra mūlyaṃ dadāmi? sa tametadavocat - yatte māṇavaka parityaktam,
S06bsu049_u:578_20: taddehīti / atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā dakṣiṇaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:578_21: dakṣiṇaṃ coruṃ viddhvā nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:578_23: sā adrākṣītsadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ bāhuṃ viddhvā rudhiraṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntam /
S06bsu049_u:578_24: tasyā etadabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ kulaputra ātmanaivātmanaḥ īdṛśīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayati? yannvahamenaṃ kulaputramupasaṃkramya paripṛccheyam /
S06bsu049_u:578_25: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā yena sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkrāntā /
S06bsu049_u:578_26: upasaṃkramya sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kiṃ nu khalu tvaṃ kulaputra evaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayasi? kiṃ cānena rudhireṇa kariṣyasi tvamasthimajjābhyāṃ ca? sadāprarudita āha - asya dārike māṇavakasyāntike idaṃ vikrīya prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi,
