S06bsu049_u:578_27: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:579_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvatadavocat - kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirniṣpatsyate guṇaviśeṣo vā,
S06bsu049_u:579_1: yattvamātmano hṛdayaṃ rudhiraṃ cāsthimajjānaṃ ca vikrīya taṃ kulaputraṃ satkartukāmaḥ? sa tāṃ dārikāmetadavocat - sa dārike kulaputro 'smākaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ copadekṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:579_3: tatra vayaṃ śikṣamāṇāḥ sarvasattvānāṃ pratiśaraṇaṃ bhaviṣyāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:579_4: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhya suvarṇavarṇaṃ ca kāyaṃ pratilapsyāmahe /
S06bsu049_u:579_5: dvātriṃśacca mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni aśītiṃ cānuvyañjanāni vyāmaprabhatāṃ ca anantaraśmitāṃ ca mahāmaitrī ca mahākaruṇāṃ ca mahāmuditāṃ ca mahopekṣāṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:579_9: pañca ca abhijñāḥ, acintyāṃ ca śīlaviśuddhim, acintyāṃ ca samādhiviśuddhim,
S06bsu049_u:579_10: acintyāṃ ca prajñāviśuddhim, daśa ca tathāgatabalāni pratilapsyāmahe /
S06bsu049_u:579_13: yena ca sarvasattvānāṃ saṃvibhāgaṃ kariṣyāma iti /
S06bsu049_u:580_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - āścaryaṃ kulaputra yāvadudārāḥ praṇītāścāmī tvayā dharmāḥ parikīrtitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:580_1: ekaikasyāpi tāvatkulaputra evaṃrūpasya dharmasyārthāya gaṅgānadīvālukopamān api kalpānātmabhāvāḥ parityaktavyā bhaveyuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:580_5: api nu khalu punaḥ kulaputra yena yenaivārthena te kṛtyam,
S06bsu049_u:580_6: tattatte dāsyāmi suvarṇaṃ vā maṇīn vā muktāṃ vā rajataṃ vā vaidūryaṃ vā musāragalvaṃ vā lohitārkaṃ vā sphāṭikaṃ vā puṣpaṃ vā dhūpaṃ vā gandhaṃ vā mālyaṃ va vilepanaṃ vā cūrṇaṃ vā vastraṃ vā chatraṃ vā dhvajaṃ vā ghaṇṭāṃ vā patākāṃ vā dīpaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:580_7: tena tvaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi /
S06bsu049_u:580_8: mā ca ātmana imāmevaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ /
S06bsu049_u:581_0: [Vaidya_247] atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māṇavakaveṣamantardhāpayitvā svakenātmabhāvena sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purato 'sthāt,
S06bsu049_u:581_3: evaṃrūpayā ca dharmārthikatayā pūrvakair api tathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhiḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paripṛcchadbhiranuttarā ca samyaksaṃbodhirabhisaṃbuddhā,
S06bsu049_u:581_6: na rudhireṇa, nāsthimajjābhyām, api tu khalu punarahaṃ tvāmeva mīmāṃsitukāma ihāgataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:581_7: vṛṇīṣva kulaputra varam / kiyadrūpaṃ te varaṃ dāsyāmīti? sa tāmāha - anuttarān me śakra buddhadharmān dehīti /
S06bsu049_u:581_8: devendra āha - na mamātra kulaputra viṣaye viṣayitā /
S06bsu049_u:581_10: anyaṃ varaṃ vṛṇīṣveti / sadāprarudita āha - alpotsukastvaṃ devendra bhava atra sthāne mamātmabhāvaparipūrimupādāya /
S06bsu049_u:581_14: tena devendra satyena satyavacanena mama yathāpaurāṇo 'yamātmabhāvo bhavatu /
S06bsu049_u:581_15: atha khalu tatkṣaṇaṃ tallavaṃ tanmuhūrtaṃ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya buddhānubhāvena āśayapariśuddhyā ca yathāpaurāṇo 'sya kāyaḥ saṃsthito 'bhūt,
S06bsu049_u:581_16: arogo nirupadravaś ca / atha khalu śakro devānāmindro māraś ca pāpīyān niṣpratibhānaḥ sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyottare pratibhānamapratipadyamānastatraivāntarhito 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:582_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ehi tvaṃ kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:582_1: yenāsmākaṃ niveśanam, tenopasaṃkrāma / ahaṃ te mātāpitṝṇāmantikāttaddhanaṃ dāpayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:582_3: taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi,
S06bsu049_u:582_4: yaduta dharmakāmatayā / atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ tayā śreṣṭhadārikayā yenāsyāḥ svakaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:583_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā svakaṃ niveśanaṃ praviśya svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caitadavocat - amba tāta daddhvaṃ hiraṇyaṃ suvarṇaṃ ratnāni maṇīn vastrāṇi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:583_2: mām api sārdhamebhiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśatairyā mamopasthāyikā yuṣmabhireva dattāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:583_3: gamiṣyāmyaham api sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyāntikaṃ tasya pūjārthaṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:583_6: atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām - kaḥ punareṣa dārike sadāprarudito nāma bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:583_7: kva vā sa etarhi tiṣṭhati? dārikā āha - eṣa kulaputro 'smākameva niveśanadvāramūle 'vasthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:583_8: eṣa ca kulaputro 'dhyāśayena anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃboddhuṃ saṃprasthitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:583_11: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkartukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:583_13: alabhamānaḥ san duḥkhito durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamanā aśrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:583_14: sa śakreṇa devānāmindreṇa māṇavakarūpamabhinirmāyoktaḥ - kiṃ tvaṃ kulaputra duḥkhī durmanāḥ pradhyāyan dīnamānaso 'śrūṇi pravartayamānaḥ sthita iti? sa tamāha - ātmānaṃ vikretukāmo 'ham /
S06bsu049_u:583_15: tasya ca krāyakaṃ na labhe / māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha - kasya punastvaṃ kulaputra arthāyātmānaṃ vikretukāmaḥ? sadāpraruditenoktaḥ - prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:583_16: āryaṃ ca dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayā /
S06bsu049_u:583_17: tatra pratibaddhāś ca me buddhadharmā iti /
S06bsu049_u:583_18: māṇavakarūpī śakrastamāha - na mama kulaputra tvayārthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:583_19: api tu khalu punaḥ piturme yajño bhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:583_20: tatra me puruṣasya hṛdayena rūdhireṇa asthimajjābhyāṃ ca kṛtyamiti /
S06bsu049_u:583_22: sa tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā ātmano bāhuṃ viddhvā lohitaṃ niḥsrāvya ūruṃ ca nirmāṃsaṃ kṛtvā asthi bhettuṃ kuḍyamūlamupasaṃkrāntaḥ ekānte sthitvā asthi bhittvā majjānaṃ ca dāsyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:583_24: tasyā mamaitadabhūt - kiṃ nu khalvayaṃ puruṣa ātmanaivātmana evaṃrūpāṃ kāraṇāṃ kārayatīti? tamenamahamupasaṃkramyaivamavocam - kimarthaṃ tvayā kulaputra ātmanaivātmana evaṃ kṣaradrūdhiraṃ śarīraṃ vikṛtaṃ kṛtam? tata eṣa māmevamāha - asya dārike māṇavakasya lohitaṃ hṛdayamasthi majjānaṃ ca dāsyāmīti /
S06bsu049_u:583_26: daridro 'smīti / tamenamahamevamavocam - kiṃ punastvaṃ tena dhanena kariṣyasīti? sa eṣa māmetadavocat - prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayiṣyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:583_27: taṃ cāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyāmi yaduta dharmakāmatayeti /
S06bsu049_u:583_28: tamenamahamevamavocam - kā punaste kulaputra tato guṇajātirbhaviṣyati guṇaviśeṣo veti? tataḥ so 'cintyān me buddhaguṇān varṇayati saṃprakāśayati,
S06bsu049_u:583_29: aprameyāṃś ca buddhadharmān - eṣāmevaṃrūpāṇāṃ buddhadharmāṇāṃ me tata āgamo bhaviṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:583_30: tasya me mahattaraṃ prītiprāmodyamutpannaṃ tānacintyān buddhaguṇān śrutvā /
S06bsu049_u:583_31: evaṃ ca me 'bhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkarakārakaścāyaṃ kulaputro 'tīva dharmakāmaśca,
S06bsu049_u:583_33: ayaṃ hi nāma kulaputro dharmakāmatayā ātmānaṃ parityajati /
S06bsu049_u:583_34: kasmādasmābhirdharmo na pūjayitavyaḥ? evaṃrūpeṣu ca sthāneṣu praṇidhānaṃ na kartavyaṃ syāt,
S06bsu049_u:583_35: yeṣāmasmākaṃ prabhūtā vipulāś ca bhogāḥ saṃvidyante iti /
S06bsu049_u:583_36: sāhamenaṃ kulaputrametadavocam - mā mā tvaṃ kulaputra imāmevaṃrūpāmātmanaḥ prāṇahāriṇīṃ kāraṇāṃ kārṣīḥ /
S06bsu049_u:583_37: ahaṃ te prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ dhanamanupradāpayiṣyāmi yena tavārthaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:583_38: tena tvaṃ tamāryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkariṣyasi gurukariṣyasi /
S06bsu049_u:583_39: aham api tvayaiva sārdhaṃ yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkramiṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:583_40: aham api tasya kulaputrasya pūjāṃ kariṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:583_41: vayamapyevaṃrūpān dharmānniṣpādayiṣyāmo yaduta anuttarān buddhadharmān ye tvayā parikīrtitā iti /
S06bsu049_u:583_42: tanmāmamba tāta anujānīta / prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ ca me dhanaskandhaṃ daddhvam,
S06bsu049_u:583_43: yenāhametenaiva kulaputreṇa sārdhaṃ gatvā āryaṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ pūjayiṣyāmi /
S06bsu049_u:584_0: [Vaidya_249] atha khalu tau tasyā dārikāyā mātāpitarau tāṃ dārikāmetadavocatām - āścaryaṃ yāvadduṣkaraṃ ca tvametasya kulaputrasya sthānamācakṣe /
S06bsu049_u:584_4: anujānīva āvāṃ tvāṃ dārike / āvayorapyavakāśaṃ kuru, yadāvām api gacchāvastvayaiva sārdhaṃ taṃ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ draṣṭuṃ vandituṃ paryupāsituṃ pūjayituṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:585_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitāṃ svāṃ mātaraṃ pitaraṃ ca viditvā etadavocat - amba tāta evaṃ kuruta,
S06bsu049_u:585_2: ityuktvā evaṃ sā śreṣṭhidārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pūjārthaṃ satkārārthaṃ ca prasthitā babhūva /
S06bsu049_u:586_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkārayāmāsa /
S06bsu049_u:586_2: alaṃkṛtya nānāvarṇāni vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā nānāraṅgāṇi vastrāṇi puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś ca gṛhītvā nānāratnāni ca vicitrāṇi nānāratnamayāni ca vicitrāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā prabhūtaprabhūtaṃ khādanīyaṃ bhojanīyaṃ svādanīyaṃ ca gṛhītvā ekaṃ rathaṃ sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sārdhamabhiruhya taiḥ pañcabhī rathaśataiḥ pañcadārikāśatābhirūḍhaiḥ parivṛttā puraskṛtā mahatā ca parivāreṇa mātāpitṛpūrvaṃgamā yena pūrvā dik tena prakrāntā /
S06bsu049_u:586_3: anupūrveṇa ca gacchan sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'drākṣīddūrādeva tāṃ gandhavatīṃ nagarīṃ saptānāṃ ratnānāṃ citrāṃ darśanīyāṃ saptabhiḥ prākāraiḥ saptaratnamayairanuparikṣiptāṃ saptabhistoraṇaiḥ saptabhiḥ parikhābhiḥ saptabhistālapaṅktibhiranuparikṣiptāṃ dvādaśa yojanāni vistāreṇa dvādaśa yojanānyāyāmena ṛddhāṃ sphītāṃ ca kṣemāṃ ca subhikṣāṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyāṃ ca pañcabhirantarāpaṇavīthīśatairālekhyavicitracitrasadṛśairdarśanīyairnirviddhāṃ samasamairanutpīḍajanayugyayānasaṃkramaṇasthānasthāpitaiḥ sumāpitāṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:586_4: madhye ca nagaraśṛṅgāṭakasya adrākṣīddharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmāsanagatamanekaśatayā parṣadā anekasahasrayā anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛttaṃ puraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantam /
S06bsu049_u:586_5: sahadarśanenaiva ca tasya evaṃrūpaṃ sukhaṃ saṃpratilabhate sma tadyathāpi nāma prathamadhyānasamāpanno bhikṣurekāgreṇa manasikāreṇa /
S06bsu049_u:586_6: dṛṣṭvā cāsya etadabhūt - na mama pratirūpametadbhavet,
S06bsu049_u:586_7: yadahaṃ rathagata eva dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamupasaṃkrāmeyam /
S06bsu049_u:586_8: yannvahaṃ rathādavatareyam / sa tato rathādavātarat / tāny api pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikayā saha rathebhyo 'vateruḥ /
S06bsu049_u:586_9: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛto 'parimāṇapūjāvyūhena yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ tenopasaṃkrāmati sma /
S06bsu049_u:587_0: tena khalu punaḥ samayena dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāḥ kṛtaśaḥ saptaratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kāritamabhūt lohitacandanālaṃkṛtaṃ muktājālaparikṣiptam /
S06bsu049_u:587_4: yatra śuddhaṃ kṛṣṇāguru dhūpyate sma yaduta prajñāpāramitāyāḥ pūjārtham /
S06bsu049_u:587_5: tasya ca kūṭāgārasya madhye saptaratnamayaḥ paryaṅkaḥ prajñapto 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:587_6: caturṇāṃ ratnānāṃ peḍā kṛtā, yatra prajñāpāramitā prakṣiptā suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu likhitā vilīnena vaidūryeṇa /
S06bsu049_u:588_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamaiḥ pañcadārikāśataiḥ taṃ kūṭāgāramadrākṣīdaparimāṇena pūjāvyūhena pratimaṇḍitam /
S06bsu049_u:588_2: śakraṃ ca devānāmindraṃ divyairmāndāravapuṣpairdivyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca suvarṇacūrṇairdivyaiś ca rūpyacūrṇaistaṃ kūṭāgāramavakirantamabhyavakirantamabhiprakirantam /
S06bsu049_u:588_3: divyāni ca vādyānyaśrauṣīt / dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kimarthaṃ tvaṃ devendra anekairdevatāsahasraiḥ sārdhamidaṃ ratnamayaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ divyairmāndāravaiḥ puṣpairdivyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiḥ suvarṇacūrṇairdivyaiś ca rūpyacūrṇairavakirasi abhyavakirasi abhiprakirasi? imāni ca divyāni vādyāni devairuparyantarīkṣe pravāditāni? evamukte śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - na tvaṃ kulaputra jānīṣe? eṣā hi sā prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā pariṇāyikā,
S06bsu049_u:588_4: yatra śikṣamāṇā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ sarvaguṇapāramitānugatān sarvabuddhadharmān sarvākārajñatāṃ ca kṣipramanuprāpnuvantīti /
S06bsu049_u:588_5: evamukte sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakraṃ devānāmindrametadavocat - kvāsau kauśika prajñāpāramitā,
S06bsu049_u:588_6: yā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ mātā pariṇāyikā? śakra āha - eṣā kulaputra asya kūṭāgārasya madhye suvarṇapaṭṭeṣu vilīnena vaidūryeṇa likhitvā āryeṇa dharmodgatena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena saptabhirmudrābhirmudrayitvā sthāpitā /
S06bsu049_u:588_8: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhai pañcabhirdārikāśataiḥ samagrībhūtaiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:588_9: yānyanena puṣpāṇi gṛhītāni mālyadāmāni ca vastraratnāni ca dhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākāś ca suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi,
S06bsu049_u:588_11: anyatarānyataraṃ ca tataḥ pratyaṃśaṃ sthāpayāmāsuḥ yaduta dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya satkārāya /
S06bsu049_u:589_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni puṣpadhūpamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiḥ suvarṇarūpyamayaiś ca puṣpairdivyaiś ca vādyaiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ pūrvaṃ pūjayitvā yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastenopasaṃkramya dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiścandanacūrṇaiḥ suvarṇarūpyamayaiś ca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran,
S06bsu049_u:589_1: divyāni ca vādyāni saṃpravādayati sma dharmapūjāmevopādāya /
S06bsu049_u:590_0: atha khalu tāni puṣpāṇi dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyopariṣṭānmūrdhni puṣpakūṭāgāraṃ prātiṣṭhan /
S06bsu049_u:590_1: tāni ca nānāvarṇāni puṣpāṇi suvarṇarūpyamayāni ca puṣpāṇi [Vaidya_251] vihāyasi vitānamiva sthitāni /
S06bsu049_u:590_2: tāny api cīvarāṇi vastraratnāni ca antarīkṣe nānāratnamayo 'bhramaṇḍapa iva saṃsthito 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:590_3: adrākṣītkhalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyedamevaṃrūpamṛddhiprātihāryam /
S06bsu049_u:590_4: dṛṣṭvā ca punareṣāmetadabhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvanmaharddhikaścāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo yāvanmahānubhāvo yāvanmahaujaskaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:591_0: atha khalu tāni śreṣṭhidārikāpūrvaṃgamāni pañca dārikāśatāni dharmodgate bodhisattve mahāsattve spṛhāmutpādya sarvāstāḥ samagrībhūtā adhyāśayena anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpādayāmāsuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:591_1: evaṃ cāvocan - anena vayaṃ kuśalamūlena anāgate 'dhvani tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā bhavema /
S06bsu049_u:591_2: bodhisattvacaryāṃ ca vayaṃ carantya eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema,
S06bsu049_u:591_3: yeṣāṃ dharmāṇāmayaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo lābhī /
S06bsu049_u:591_5: yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ satkaroti gurukaroti /
S06bsu049_u:591_6: bahujanasya ca saṃprakāśayema yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saṃprakāśayati /
S06bsu049_u:591_7: evameva ca prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgatā bhavema /
S06bsu049_u:591_8: pariniṣpadyemahi ca yathāyaṃ dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitayā upāyakauśalyena ca samanvāgataḥ pariniṣpannaś ca /
S06bsu049_u:592_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni ca śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni prajñāpāramitāṃ pūjayitvā dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkṛtya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya pādau śirasābhivandya ekānte sagauravāḥ sapratīkṣāḥ prāñjalīn kṛtvātiṣṭhan /
S06bsu049_u:592_1: ekānte sthitaś ca sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - ihāhaṃ kulaputra prajñāpāramitāṃ gaveṣamāṇo 'raṇyagato nirghoṣamaśrauṣam - gaccha kulaputra pūrvāṃ diśam /
S06bsu049_u:592_3: so 'haṃ samyak taṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yena pūrvā dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:592_4: tasya me etadabhūt - samyak ca mayā nirghoṣaḥ śrutaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:592_5: na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam,
S06bsu049_u:592_6: kasya vā antikātprajñāpāramitāṃ śroṣyāmi lapsye veti /
S06bsu049_u:592_8: so 'haṃ tena daurmanasyena mahatīmutkaṇṭhāṃ paritapanaṃ cāpanno 'bhūvam /
S06bsu049_u:592_11: api tu prajñāpāramitāmeva manasi karomi - kiyaddūraṃ mayā gantavyam,
S06bsu049_u:592_12: kuto vā prajñāpāramitāṃ lapsye śravaṇāya? na ca mayā sa nirghoṣaḥ paripṛṣṭaḥ iti /
S06bsu049_u:592_14: sa māmevamāha - gaccha kulaputra itaḥ pañcabhiryojanaśatairanupūrveṇa gandhavatī nāma nagarī /
S06bsu049_u:592_15: tatra drakṣyasi dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayantaṃ prakāśayantamiti /
S06bsu049_u:592_17: so 'haṃ tenaiva mahatodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena sphuṭastataḥ pṛthivīpradeśānna calitaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:592_19: tasya me śṛṇvato bahūni samādhimukhāni prādurbhūtāni /
S06bsu049_u:592_20: [Vaidya_252] tatra sthitaṃ māṃ daśadiglokadhātusthitā buddhā bhagavantaḥ samāśvāsayanti,
S06bsu049_u:592_21: sādhukāraṃ ca dadati - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu049_u:592_24: te māṃ tathāgatāḥ sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya antarhitāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:592_26: tasya me etadabhūt - kuto nu te tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:592_27: kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti? tasya ca me etadabhūt - āryo dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ pañcābhijñaḥ pūrvajinākṛtādhikāro 'varopitakuśalamūlaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:592_30: yataste tathāgatā āgatā yatra vā te tathāgatā gatā iti /
S06bsu049_u:592_31: so 'haṃ tasya tathāgatavigrahasya nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā yathānuśiṣṭaṃ yena pūrvāṃ dik tena saṃprasthitaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:592_35: so 'haṃ tvāṃ kulaputra pṛcchāmi - kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:592_36: kutra te tathāgatā gatā iti? deśaya me kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca /
S06bsu049_u:592_37: yathā vayaṃ teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ gamanaṃ ca jānīma,
S06bsu049_u:597_0: evamukte dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattva mahāsattvametadavocat - na khalu kulaputra tathāgatāḥ kutaścidāgacchanti vā gacchanti vā /
S06bsu049_u:597_1: acalitā hi tathatā / yā ca tathatā, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra anutpāda āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:597_2: yaś ca anutpādaḥ, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra bhūtakoṭyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:597_3: yā ca bhūtakoṭiḥ, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra śūnyatāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:597_4: yā ca śūnyatā, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra yathāvattāyā āgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:597_5: yā ca yathāvattā, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra virāgasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:597_6: yā ca virāgatā, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra nirodhasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:597_7: yaś ca nirodhaḥ, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra ākāśadhātorāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:597_8: yaś ca ākāśadhātuḥ, sa tathāgataḥ / na hi kulaputra anyatra ebhyo dharmebhyastathāgataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:597_9: yā ca kulaputra eṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ tathatā,
S06bsu049_u:597_10: yā ca sarvadharmatathatā, yā ca tathāgatatathatā, ekaivaiṣā tathatā / nāsti kulaputra tathatāyā dvaidhīkāraḥ /
S06bsu049_u:597_12: tathatā na dve na tisraḥ / gaṇanāvyativṛttā kulaputrā tathatā yaduta asattvāt /
S06bsu049_u:597_13: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto grīṣmāṇāṃ paścime māse 'bhigate madhyāhnakālasamaye marīcikāṃ paśyet syandamānām /
S06bsu049_u:597_14: sa tena tena pradhāvet - atrodakaṃ pāsyāmi,
S06bsu049_u:597_15: apānīyaṃ pāsyāmīti / tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kuta etadudakamāgataṃ kva vā tadudakaṃ gacchati,
S06bsu049_u:597_16: pūrvaṃ vā mahāsamudraṃ dakṣiṇaṃ vā paścimaṃ vā uttaraṃ vā? sadāprarudita āha - na hi kulaputra marīcikāyāmudakaṃ saṃvidyate /
S06bsu049_u:597_17: kiṃ punarasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā prajñāyate? sa khalu punaḥ kulaputra puruṣo grīṣmābhitapto bālajātīyo duṣprajñajātīyo marīcikāṃ dṛṣṭvā anudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:597_20: evam etat / evameva kulaputra ye kecittathāgatarūpeṇa vā ghoṣeṇa vā abhiniviṣṭāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:597_21: te tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:597_22: ye ca tathāgatasyāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:597_23: sarve te bālajātīyā duṣprajñajātīyā iti vaktavyāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:597_24: tadyathāpi nāma sa eva puruṣo yo 'nudake udakasaṃjñāmutpādayati /
S06bsu049_u:597_25: tatkasya hetoḥ? na hi tathāgato rūpakāyato draṣṭavyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:597_26: dharmakāyāstathāgatāḥ / na ca kulaputra dharmatā āgacchati vā gacchati vā /
S06bsu049_u:597_27: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:597_28: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra māyākāranirmitasya hastikāyasya vā aśvakāyasya vā rathakāyasya vā pattikāyasya vā nāstyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:597_29: evameva kulaputra nāsti tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā /
S06bsu049_u:597_30: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra puruṣaḥ suptaḥ svapnāntaragata ekaṃ vā tathāgataṃ paśyet,
S06bsu049_u:597_31: dvau vā trīn vā caturo vā pañca vā ṣaḍvā sapta vā aṣṭau vā nava vā daśa vā viṃśatiṃ vā triṃśadvā catvāriṃśadvā pañcāśadvā śataṃ vā sahasraṃ vā,
S06bsu049_u:597_32: tato vā uttare / sa prativibuddhaḥ san ekam api tathāgataṃ na paśyet /
S06bsu049_u:597_33: tatkiṃ manyase kulaputra kutaste tathāgatā āgatāḥ kva vā te tathāgatā gatā iti? sadāprarudita āha - na khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapne kasyaciddharmasya [Vaidya_254] pariniṣpattiḥ prajñāyate /
S06bsu049_u:597_34: mṛṣāvādo hi svapno 'bhūt / dharmodgata āha - evameva kulaputra sarvadharmāḥ svapnopamā uktā bhagavatā /
S06bsu049_u:597_35: ye kecitkulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmāṃstathāgatena nirdeśitān yathābhūtaṃ na prajānanti,
S06bsu049_u:597_36: te tathāgatān nāmakāyena vā rūpakāyena vā abhiniviśya tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:597_37: yathāpi nāma dharmatāmaprajānanto ye ca tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:597_40: gacchanti gamiṣyanti ca / sarve te prajñāpāramitāyā dūre /
S06bsu049_u:597_42: ye khalu punaḥ kulaputra svapnopamān sarvadharmān svapnopamāḥ sarvadharmā iti tathāgatena deśitān yathābhūtaṃ prajānanti,
S06bsu049_u:597_43: na te kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:597_44: utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā / ye ca na kasyaciddharmasyāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti,
S06bsu049_u:597_45: utpādaṃ vā nirodhaṃ vā, te dharmatayā tathāgataṃ prajānanti /
S06bsu049_u:597_47: na te tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ vā gamanaṃ vā kalpayanti /
S06bsu049_u:597_51: te ca bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ amoghaṃ rāṣṭrapiṇḍaṃ paribhuñjate /
S06bsu049_u:597_52: te ca lokasya dakṣiṇīyāḥ / tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra mahāsamudre ratnāni na pūrvasyā diśa āgacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:597_53: na dakṣiṇasyāḥ, na paścimāyāḥ, nottarasyāḥ, na vidigbhyo nādhastānnopariṣṭānna kutaściddeśebhyo digbhya āgacchanti,
S06bsu049_u:597_54: api tu khalu punaḥ sattvānāṃ kuśalamūlānyupādāya mahāsamudre ratnānyutpadyante /
S06bsu049_u:597_57: nirudhyamānāni ca tāni ratnāni ca kvaciddaśadiśi loke saṃkrāmanti /
S06bsu049_u:597_58: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ tāni ratnāni prabhāvyante,
S06bsu049_u:597_59: teṣāṃ pratyayānāmasatāṃ na teṣāṃ ratnānāṃ prabhāvanā bhavati /
S06bsu049_u:597_60: evameva kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāṃ kāyapariniṣpattirna kutaściddaśadiśi lokādāgatā,
S06bsu049_u:597_62: na ca ahetuko buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:597_65: api tu khalu punaryeṣāṃ pratyayānāṃ satāṃ kāyābhiniṣpattirbhavati,
S06bsu049_u:597_67: tadyathāpi nāma kulaputra vīṇāyāḥ śabda utpadyamāno na kutaścidāgacchati,
S06bsu049_u:597_69: na kvacitsaṃkrāmati, pratītya ca hetupratyayasāmagrīmutpadyate hetvadhīnaḥ pratyayādhīnaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:597_70: tadyathāpi nāma droṇīṃ ca pratītya carma ca pratītya tantrīś ca pratītya daṇḍaṃ ca pratītya upadhānīś ca pratītya koṇaṃ ca pratītya puruṣasya ca tajjavyāyāmaṃ pratītya evamayaṃ vīṇāyāḥ śabdo niścarati hetvadhīnaḥ pratyayādhīnaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:597_71: sa ca śabdo na droṇyā niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:597_72: na carmaṇo na tantrībhyo na daṇḍānnopadhānībhyo na koṇānna puruṣasya tajjavyāyāmataḥ śabdo niścarati,
S06bsu049_u:597_73: api tu khalu punaḥ sarveṣāṃ samāyogācchabdaḥ prajñapyate /
S06bsu049_u:597_75: evameva kulaputra buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ kāyaniṣpattirhetvadhīnā pratyayādhīnā anekakuśalamūlaprayogapariniṣpannā ca /
S06bsu049_u:597_76: na caikato hetuto na caikataḥ pratyayato na caikataḥ kuśalamūlato buddhakāyaprabhāvanā /
S06bsu049_u:597_77: na ca nairhetukī / [Vaidya_255] bahuhetupratyayasāmagryāṃ samutpannā sā na kutaścidāgacchati /
S06bsu049_u:597_79: evaṃ tvayā kulaputra teṣāṃ tathāgatānāmāgamanaṃ ca gamanaṃ ca draṣṭavyam /
S06bsu049_u:597_82: yataḥ kulaputra tvamevaṃ tathāgatāṃś ca sarvadharmāṃś ca anutpannānaniruddhāṃś ca saṃprajñāsyasi,
S06bsu049_u:598_0: asmin khalu punastathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśe bhāṣyamāṇe mahān bhūmicālo 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:598_1: sarvaś ca trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāramahādaśamahānimittaṃ kampate prakampate saṃprakampate,
S06bsu049_u:598_7: sarvāṇi ca mārabhavanāni saṃkṣobhitāni jihmībhūtāni cābhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:598_9: te sarve yena dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastena praṇatā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:598_12: śakraś ca devānāmindraścatvāraś ca mahārājāno dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ divyaiścandanacūrṇairdivyaiś ca puṣpairavākiran abhyavākiran abhiprākiran /
S06bsu049_u:598_13: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣanta - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:598_14: tava kulaputra anubhāvena adyāsmābhiḥ paramārthanirjātā kathā deśyamānā śrutā sarvalokavipratyanīkā,
S06bsu049_u:599_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - kaḥ punaḥ kulaputra atra hetuḥ,
S06bsu049_u:599_1: kaḥ pratyayo 'sya mahataḥ pṛthivīcālasya loke prādurbhāvāya? dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva āha - imaṃ kulaputra tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ tava ca pṛcchato mama ca nirdiśato 'ṣṭānāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmanutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilambho 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:599_3: catuḥṣaṣṭeś ca prāṇisahasrāṇāṃ virajāṃsi vigatamalāni dharmeṣu dharmacakṣūṃṣi viśuddhāni /
S06bsu049_u:600_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ paramodāreṇa prītiprāmodyena samanvāgato 'bhūt - lābhā me paramasulabdhāḥ,
S06bsu049_u:600_1: yasya me prajñāpāramitāmimaṃ ca tathāgatānāmanāgatyagamananirdeśaṃ paripṛcchataḥ iyatāṃ sattvānāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:600_2: etadevāsmākaṃ paryāptaṃ kuśalaṃ bhavedanuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ pariniṣpattaye /
S06bsu049_u:600_3: na ca me bhūyo vicikitsā pravartate 'nuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ /
S06bsu049_u:600_5: sa tenaiva prītiprāmodyena samanvāgataḥ saptatālaṃ vihāyasamabhyudgamya saptatāle sthitvā evaṃ cintayati sma - kenāhametarhi antarīkṣe sthitaḥ dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ satkuryāmiti? atha khalu śakro devānāmindra sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhyudgataṃ dṛṣṭvā cetasaiva cāsya cittamājñāya divyāni cāsmai māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇyupanāmayati sma,
S06bsu049_u:600_6: evaṃ cāvocat - ebhistvaṃ kulaputra divyaiḥ puṣpairdharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ [Vaidya_256] mahāsattvaṃ satkuru /
S06bsu049_u:600_8: tava hi kulaputra anubhāvena adya bahūnāṃ prāṇisahasrāṇāmarthaḥ kṛtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:600_10: ye sarvasattvānāṃ kṛtaśo 'prameyānasaṃkhyeyān kalpānutsahante mahāntaṃ bhāramudvoḍhuṃ yathā tvayā utsoḍham /
S06bsu049_u:601_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śakrasya devānāmindrasyāntikānmāndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamavākirat,
S06bsu049_u:601_1: abhyavākirat, abhiprākirat / svakena ca kāyena dharmodgataṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvamabhicchādayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:601_2: evaṃ ca vācamabhāṣata - eṣo 'haṃ kulaputra adyāgreṇa tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmi upasthānaparicaryāyai /
S06bsu049_u:601_3: sa ātmānaṃ niryātya dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya purataḥ prāñjaliṃ kṛtvāsthāt /
S06bsu049_u:602_0: atha khalu sā śreṣṭhidārikā tāni ca pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - etā vayam api kulaputra tavātmānaṃ niryātayāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:602_1: vayamapyanena kuśalamūlena eteṣāmeva dharmāṇāṃ lābhinyo bhavema,
S06bsu049_u:602_2: tvayaiva ca sārdhaṃ punaḥ punarbuddhāṃś ca bhagavato bodhisattvāṃś ca satkuryāma gurukuryāma /
S06bsu049_u:602_4: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ śreṣṭhidārikāṃ tāni ca pañca dārikāśatānyetadavocat - yadi me yūyaṃ dārikā adhyāśayamanuvartadhvam,
S06bsu049_u:602_7: dārikā āhuḥ - anuvartiṣyāmahe tava vayamāśayenādhyāśayena ca /
S06bsu049_u:602_9: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni sarvālaṃkārabhūṣitāni kṛtvā tāni ca pañca rathaśatānyalaṃkṛtya sarvāṇi ca tāni dharmodgatāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya niryātayati sma upasthānaparicaryāyaiḥ - imāḥ kulaputra ahaṃ tavopasthāyikā niryātayāmi,
S06bsu049_u:602_10: imāni ca pañca rathaśatāni niryātayāmi paribhogāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:603_0: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastasmai kulaputrāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:603_2: evaṃrūpeṇa ca tyāgacittena bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipramanuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhimabhisaṃbudhyate /
S06bsu049_u:603_3: evaṃ ca dharmabhāṇakāṇāṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā śakyaṃ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca śrotum /
S06bsu049_u:603_4: tair api kulaputra paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaiḥ pūrvaṃ bodhisattvacaryāṃ caradbhirevaṃrūpa eva tyāge sthitvā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca paripraśnayadbhiriti /
S06bsu049_u:604_0: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni pañca rathaśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kuśalaparipūrimupādāya pratigṛhṇīte sma /
S06bsu049_u:604_2: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattva utthāyāsanāt svakaṃ gṛhaṃ prāvikṣat sūryasya cāstaṃgamanakālo 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:605_0: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - naitanmama sādhu pratirūpaṃ bhavet,
S06bsu049_u:605_2: śayyāṃ ca parikalpayeyam / yannvahaṃ dvābhyāmeva [Vaidya_257] īryāpathābhyāṃ sthitvā sthānena caṃkrameṇa ca kālamatināmayeyam,
S06bsu049_u:605_3: yāvaddharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ svakādgṛhānnirgato bhaviṣyati yaduta dharmasaṃprakāśanāyeti /
S06bsu049_u:606_0: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sapta varṣāṇyekasamādhisamāpanna evābhūt /
S06bsu049_u:606_2: sadāprarudito 'pi bodhisattvo mahāsattva sapta varṣāṇi dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayan na styānamiddhamavakrāmayāmāsa /
S06bsu049_u:606_6: api tu kadā nāma dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:606_7: yannu vayaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattva mahāsattvasya dharmāsanaṃ prajñapayiṣyāmaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:606_9: taṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaṃ susiktaṃ sumṛṣṭaṃ ca kariṣyāmo nānāpuṣpābhikīrṇam,
S06bsu049_u:606_10: yatra pṛthivīpradeśe dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāmupāyakauśalyaṃ ca saṃprakāśayiṣyatīti cintayāmāsa /
S06bsu049_u:606_11: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañca dārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni dvābhyāmeva īryāpathābhyāṃ kālamatināmayāmāsuḥ sarvāḥ kriyāstasyānuvartamānāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:607_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvo divyaṃ nirghoṣamaśrauṣīt - itaḥ saptame divase dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'smātsamādhervyutthāsyati,
S06bsu049_u:607_1: vyutthāya ca madhyenagarasya niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:607_2: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ divyaṃ nirghoṣaṃ śrutvā tuṣṭa udagra āttamanāḥ pramuditaḥ prītisaumanasyajātastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ śodhayāmāsa sārdhaṃ śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhaiḥ pañcadārikāśataiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:607_4: svakaṃ cottarāsaṅgaṃ kāyādavatārya tasyāsanasyopari prajñapayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:607_5: atha khalu tā dārikāḥ svakasvakānuttarāsaṅgān kāyādavatārya pañcottarāsaṅgaśatāni tatrāsane prajñapayāmāsuḥ atrāsane dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvo niṣadya dharmaṃ deśayiṣyatīti /
S06bsu049_u:607_6: evaṃ tāś ca sarvā dārikā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanamāstīrya tuṣṭā udagrā āttamanasaḥ pramuditāḥ prītisaumanasya jātā abhūvan /
S06bsu049_u:608_0: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ sektukāmaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:608_4: apyeva nāma asya sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyodakamalabhamānasya cittaṃ khidyeta,
S06bsu049_u:609_0: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - yannvahamātmanaḥ kāyaṃ viddhvā imaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ rudhireṇa siñceyam /
S06bsu049_u:609_1: tatkasya hetoḥ? ayaṃ hi pṛthivīpradeśa uddhatarajaskaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:609_2: mā rajodhāturito bhūpradeśāddharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya kāye nipatet /
S06bsu049_u:609_3: kiṃ vā anenātmabhāvenāvaśyaṃ bhedanadharmiṇā kuryām? varaṃ khalu punarmamāyaṃ kāya [Vaidya_258] evaṃrūpayā kriyayā vinaśyatu,
S06bsu049_u:609_4: na tu niḥsāmarthyakriyayā / api ca kāmahetoḥ kāmanidānaṃ bahūni me ātmabhāvasahasrāṇi punaḥ punaḥ saṃsāre saṃsarato bhinnāni,
S06bsu049_u:609_7: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattva iti pratisaṃkhyāya tīkṣṇaṃ śastraṃ gṛhītvā svakāyaṃ samantato viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svarudhireṇa sarvamasiñcat /
S06bsu049_u:609_8: tāny api śreṣṭhidārikāpramukhāni pañcadārikāśatāni sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyānuśikṣamāṇāni sarvāṇi tāni tīkṣṇāni śastrāṇi gṛhītvā svakasvakāni śarīrāṇi viddhvā taṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ svakasvakairlohitaiḥ sarvamasiñcan /
S06bsu049_u:609_9: na ca sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tāsāṃ vā sarvāsāṃ dārikāṇāṃ cittasyānyathātvamabhūt,
S06bsu049_u:609_10: yatra sa māraḥ pāpīyānavatāraṃ labhet kuśalamūlāntarāyakaraṇāya /
S06bsu049_u:610_0: atha khalu śakrasya devānāmindrasyaitadabhūt - āścaryaṃ yāvaddharmakāmaścāyaṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:610_1: yāvaddṛḍhasamādānaś ca yāvanmahāsaṃnāhasaṃnaddhaś ca anapekṣaḥ kāye jīviteṣu bhogeṣu ca,
S06bsu049_u:610_4: atha khalu śakro devānāmindrastatsarvaṃ lohitodakaṃ divyaṃ candanodakamadhyatiṣṭhat,
S06bsu049_u:610_5: samantācca tasya pṛthivīpradeśasya acintyaṃ paramodāraṃ gandhaṃ yasya divyasya candanodakasya paripūrṇam /
S06bsu049_u:611_0: atha śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - sādhu sādhu kulaputra /
S06bsu049_u:611_2: sādhvī ca te anuttarā dharmakāmatā dharmaparīṣṭiś ca /
S06bsu049_u:611_3: evaṃrūpeṇa kulaputra adhyāśayena evaṃrūpeṇa vīryeṇa evaṃrūpayā ca dharmakāmatayā taiḥ paurvakaistathāgatairarhadbhiḥ samyaksaṃbuddhairanuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiḥ samudānītā /
S06bsu049_u:612_0: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasyaitadabhūt - prajñaptaṃ mayā dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya dharmāsanam /
S06bsu049_u:612_1: ayaṃ ca pṛthivīpradeśaḥ susiktaḥ susaṃmṛṣṭaś ca kṛtaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:612_4: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakireyam? atha khalu śakro devānāmindraḥ sadāpraruditaṃ bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvametadavocat - imāni te kulaputra pratigṛhāṇa divyāni māndāravāṇi puṣpāṇi /
S06bsu049_u:612_6: dharmodgataṃ ca bodhisattvaṃ mahāsattvaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ dharmāsane niṣaṇṇamabhyavakira /
S06bsu049_u:612_7: sa tasmai divyaṃ khārīsahasraṃ divyānāṃ māndāravapuṣpāṇāmupanāmayati sma /
S06bsu049_u:612_8: atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvastāni puṣpāṇi gṛhītvā anyataraiḥ puṣpaistaṃ pṛthivīpradeśaṃ puṣpābhikīrṇamakārṣīt,
S06bsu049_u:613_0: atha khalu dharmodgato bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ saptānāṃ varṣāṇāmatyayena tataḥ samādhervyutthāya yena dharmāsanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya prajñapta evāsane nyaṣīdat,
S06bsu049_u:613_1: anekaśatasahasrayā parṣadā parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ deśayāmāsa /
S06bsu049_u:614_0: [Vaidya_259] atha khalu sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ sahadarśanenaiva dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tādṛśaṃ sukhaṃ pratilabhate sma,
S06bsu049_u:614_2: tatreyaṃ dharmodgatasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya prajñāpāramitādeśanāyaduta sarvadharmasamatayā prajñāpāramitāsamatā /
S06bsu049_u:615_0: atha khalu sadāpraruditasya bodhisattvasya mahāsattvasya tathāniṣaṇṇasyaiva tasyāṃ belāyāṃ sarvadharmasamatā nāma samādhirājo jātaḥ /
S06bsu049_u:615_19: vajropamaś ca nāma samādhiḥ, sarvadharmāsaṃbhedaś ca nāma samādhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:615_24: evaṃpramukhāni ṣaṣṭiḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇi sadāpraruditena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena pratilabdhānyabhūvanniti /
S06bsu049_u:620_0: sahapratilabdhānāṃ ca subhūte ṣaṣṭyāḥ samādhimukhaśatasahasrāṇāṃ sadāprarudito bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pūrvasyāṃ diśi,
S06bsu049_u:620_2: vidikṣu adha ūrdhvaṃ ca diśi daśasu dikṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopameṣu trisāhasramahāsāhasreṣu lokadhātuṣu gaṅgānadīvālukopamān buddhān bhagavataḥ paśyati sma bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtān bodhisattvaguṇapuraskṛtān etaireva nayairebhireva nāmabhiretairevākṣarairimāmeva prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣamāṇān /
S06bsu049_u:620_3: tadyathāpi nāma ahametarhi asminneva trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau dharmaṃ deśayāmi bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛto bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaḥ,
S06bsu049_u:620_6: sarvāsu ca jātiṣu na jātu buddhavirahito 'bhūt /
S06bsu049_u:620_7: yatra yatra buddhā bhagavantaḥ saṃmukhībhūtā bhavanti,
S06bsu049_u:620_8: tatra tatropapadyate sma / avirahitaś ca bhavati sma buddhairbhagavadbhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:621_0: tatra khalu punarbhagavānāyuṣmantamānandamāmantrayate sma - tadanenāpi te ānanda paryāyeṇa evaṃ veditavyam - ityapīyaṃ prajñāpāramitā bodhisattvānāṃ mahāsattvānāṃ sarvajñajñānasyāhāriketi /
S06bsu049_u:621_1: tasmāttarhi ānanda bodhisattvairmahāsattvaiḥ sarvajñajñānaṃ pratilabdhukāmairasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ caritavyam /
S06bsu049_u:621_2: iyaṃ prajñāpāramitā śrotavyā udgrahītavyā dhārayitavyā vācayitavyā paryavāptavyā pravartayitavyā deśayitavyopadeṣṭavyoddeṣṭavyā svādhyātavyā likhitavyā /
S06bsu049_u:621_3: tathāgatādhiṣṭhānena mahāpustake pravyaktapravyaktairakṣaraiḥ sulikhitāṃ kṛtvā satkartavyā gurukartavyā mānayitavyā pūjayitavyā arcayitavyā apacāyitavyā puṣpairdhūpairgandhairmālyairvilepanaiścūrṇaiścīvarairvādyairvastraiśchatrairdhvajairghaṇṭābhiḥ patākābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:621_4: samantācca dīpamālābhiḥ, bahuvidhābhiś ca pūjābhiḥ / iyamasmākamantikādānanda anuśāsanī /
S06bsu049_u:621_5: tatkasya hetoḥ? atra hi prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sarvajñajñānapariniṣpattirbhaviṣyati /
S06bsu049_u:621_6: tatkiṃ manyase ānanda śāstā te tathāgataḥ? ānanda āha - śāstā me bhagavan,
S06bsu049_u:621_7: śāstā me sugata / evamukte bhagavānāyuṣmantamānandametadavocat - śāstā te ānanda tathāgataḥ /
S06bsu049_u:621_11: tasmāttarhi ānanda yathaiva tvayā mamaitarhi tiṣṭhato dhriyamāṇasya yāpayato 'smin samucchraye prema ca prasādaś ca gauravaṃ ca kṛtam,
S06bsu049_u:621_12: tathaiva tvayā ānanda mamātyayādasyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ kartavyam /
S06bsu049_u:621_13: dvir api trir api te ānanda parīndāmi anuparīndāmi enāṃ prajñāpāramitām,
S06bsu049_u:621_14: yatheyaṃ nāntardhīyeta, yathā nāsyāṃ tvamanyaḥ puruṣaḥ syāḥ /
S06bsu049_u:621_18: avirahitāste ānanda sattvā buddhadarśanena dharmaśravaṇena saṃghopasthānena ca veditavyam /
S06bsu049_u:621_20: ya enāṃ prajñāpāramita [Vaidya_261] śroṣyantyudgrahīṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti paryavāpsyanti pravartayiṣyanti deśayiṣyantyupadekṣyantyuddekṣyanti svādhyāsyanti likhiṣyanti satkariṣyanti gurukariṣyanti mānayiṣyanti pūjayiṣyantyarcayiṣyantyapacāyiṣyanti puṣpadhūpagandhamālyavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajaghaṇṭāpatākābhiḥ,
S06bsu049_u:622_1: te ca maitreyapramukhā bodhisattvā mahāsattvāḥ āyuṣmāṃś ca subhūtirāyuṣmāṃś ca śāriputraḥ āyuṣmāṃścānandaḥ śakraś ca devānāmindraḥ sadevamānuṣāsuragaruḍagandharvaś ca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti /
S06bsu049_u:624_0: samāptā ceyaṃ bhagavatyā āryāṣṭasāhasrikāyāḥ prajñāpāramitā sarvatathāgatajananī bodhisattvapratyekajinaśrāvakāṇāṃ mātā,
S06bsu049_u:624_1: dharmamudrā dharmolkā dharmanābhirdharmabherī dharmanetrī dharmaratnanidhānam akṣayo dharmaḥ acintyādbhutadarśananakṣatramālā sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvalokavanditā sarvasukhaheturiti /
S06bsu049_u:625_0: prajñāpāramitāṃ samyagudgṛhya paryavāpya ca dhārayitvā pravartya enāṃ viharantu sadārthina iti //
S06bsu049_u:626_0: ye dharmā hetuprabhāvā hetusteṣāṃ tathāgato hyavadat /
S06bsu049_u:627_0: teṣāṃ ca yo nirodha evaṃvādī mahāśramaṇaḥ //
